comments:
Gary and his wife were perfect hosts. The property is better than expected and all needs and conveniences were available. Full kitchen and bath with a large closet and bed. We could not have asked for anything more. 
Placed in a quiet residential neighborhood, yet easy access to highways, small grocery store just down the street and if you wanted a mall, just a short 10 min drive. Entrance is available from the side gate in the front but around back is a gated driveway that pulls right up to the guest house and lets you park off street in a secure location. Perfect!
Thank you Gary and Robin, you hit the top mark on hosting.

This place was more than what I expected! The place was super clean, and super comfortable. So nice that we spent a lot of time just relaxing inside. The rooftop pool and hot tub took everything to the next level. Amazing views from the roof as well. Chelsea was super fast with responding to and questions I had. The location couldn't be any better. It's right in the heart of downtown. There was a lot of things going down on the streets, but with the windows closed and the AC on you can't hear a thing which was awesome. Can't wait to come back and stay here again. Highly recommend.

The place was nice. I didn’t think the bed was very comfortable. The pool was nice but the neighbor has a bird that they put outside during the day and it made the most annoying sounds ever. That did kinda mess with the relaxation part.

Alix and Johnny's place was perfect for our night in Venice! My boyfriend and I hit traffic on the drive up from San Diego and Alix was incredibly nice about it and flexible with our check in time. The apartment is in the perfect location in Venice, a short walk to great stores and restaurants. The space is perfect for a couple with a great patio for sitting outside and relaxing, a couch and really comfortable sleep number bed. While we didn't meet Johnny, Alix was awesome and a wonderful host and their dog Penny is adorable and well behaved! They also left a great and very clear guide to the apartment, complete with area recommendations and personal favorites of theirs.  I would highly recommend their place!

I booked Gretje and Ryan's charming place for my parents to stay at while they were in town for a visit, and I'm so glad I did. Gretje was friendly and fast to respond to questions, and the house in a nice pocket of El Sereno had everything my parents needed to enjoy their stay!

This place is large and well-furnished.  The beds and furniture are comfortable, and Dennis was a friendly and accommodating host.  The location is super convenient for many Los Angeles activities.  Recommended!
This place was beautiful as seen on the pictures, very clean & communication with Cecilia 10/10 and it’s also in a very peaceful neighborhood I would definitely stay here again!
We absolutely loved Mari’s place! It’s a cute & cozy studio surrounded by a beautiful garden! The studio was very clean and had everything we needed for our short stay in LA. Perfect for a couple!
We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is very comfortable and ideally placed. The garden and the pool are lovely. Jeremy is welcoming and very reactive. I recommend ! :)
Great stay!
Guy was really friendly. Took care of everything and checked in to make sure things were ok. The house has a friendly vibe, had a good set of people when I was there.

Marcus place has to be the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. Marcus was so easy to communicate with from beginning to end. He’s just as sweet in person that I felt safe, secure, and almost like I’ve known him forever. The house was sparkling clean and had EVERYTHING you could ever need at your vacation home, like literally. I will forever use Marcus’ home when vacationing in LA!!! Thank you Marcus for going above and beyond our expectations.

EJ's place was perfect. Included were every type of amenity necessary for a stay by the beach. We felt like we were in a hotel. I would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for an authentic stay by Venice beach. 
There was some misunderstanding about the parking situation, but EJ gave us the benefit of the doubt and allowed us to use his own personal spot and we are grateful.

The views were spectacular & Tricia was very nice. I liked the deck views & pretty well-kept, friendly neighborhood. The accommodations are modest and rustic cabin-like on the interior. Could use some improvements.  The overall experience was good. Linens were clean & good quality & the beds were comfortable in master bedroom.

The place is tucked away on a side alley keeping a lot of the traffic noise away. It's easily located to all sorts of fun activities. There is shopping near by income you need something. It's the perfect place to end your fun filled days or start them with a cup of coffee enjoyed on the patio :)
Vanesa’s place was very clean and she was very friendly and accommodating. Her dog Taz was very friendly too. Would definitely stay here again!

Aina was always very responsive and positive about our trip.  The apartment is exactly as stated and is in a great location (couple of blocks away from 3rd St Promenade, the beach and the Santa Monica pier).  The apartment is on a beautiful street and in a neighbourhood that made us feel very safe with our kids.
I really enjoyed my stay !!
The house is near the hollywood walk of fame. It is easy to take subway. Also the host is really good. But if you are sensitive about noise, I don't want to recommend this house.

This place is perfect!! It was clean and tidy. It had everything I needed. Checking in was a breeze. The host was very helpful with whatever I needed but didn’t bother me! The location is also perfect! There’s restaurants, bars, parks all in walking distance but not far from Universal, Downtown and Hollywood. I had a great time and definitely will stay again when I come back in town!!

Gosh, where to start? 
It's such a clean and cozy space that my sister and I bemoaned having to leave it to move on to the next leg in our trip. It was also really convenient to have a washer & dryer in our unit (with detergent included!) and the bed gave us the best sleep in awhile! Would absolutely stay here again in the future!

A centrally located place. Small and simple for a couple of nights in Santa Monica. Unfortunately the floors were incredibly dusty like they had not been cleaned in months. Otherwise the place was nice and simple and perfectly located. It just needs to be vacuumed every so often.

Angela is an amazing host. She's very helpful and friendly. Everything was perfect. The space was exactly what I needed and the location is very good too. 
Gente, a Angela é tudo! Host perfeita! A casa é muito boa e o quarto também. Ela está sempre pronta pra ajudar e é uma gracinha de pessoa. O local é bem central.
Apartment was beautiful!  Great location for Universal Studios.  Communication with owner was very good and would not hesitate to stay there again.
Very responsive and helpful! So friendly and the place is in great walking distance to a few eateries and hangouts. Would stay again!

Such an amazing place ! Neat, tidy, and beautifully decorated with a comfortable bed. Perfectly located in hollywood in a quiet neighborhood yet near all the action.  

Wonderful host provided us with everything we needed. Will definitely stay again if in the area . Thank you - Marla ♥️

Nicolette's home was very lovely. My partner and I enjoyed our stay so much.  Both Nicolette and her husband were so welcoming and inviting. They even have us a couple of recommendations of places to eat in LA. The view from our room was amazing! Everything was clean and neat. The space itself is great. I would definitely reccomend this place to anyone who is looking to spend sometime in LA.  Thank you again for making us feel welcomed!
Good space , little noisy near the door
Great location, clean space. Perfect for anyone looking to experience West Hollywood or Beverly Hills. Would highly recommend, and we will be back!
I had a wonderful time during my weekend stay. Will definitely be coming here in the future and recommend to others!
Gramercy is a nice place to getting the rest after a long traveling day. I could meet interesting people for chatting about music, movies, business and play chess.
Steve’s place is incredibly chic and inspiring. Had a great stay - was here for business and his studio was perfect work space and peaceful rest. Sonos throughout the space made it a charm!
Wonderful place. I would recommend this place.
I did not end up staying at this location but Kedje was very communicative through out the whole process! Thank you!

Our host was hospitable and very easy to stay in touch with via text or email. Her Welcome Packet answered all of our questions. The place
was bright and cozy! The location had plenty of parking and was within minutes of Los Angeles sites and shops.  We enjoyed our stay!

Best shower I have ever experienced.
Very comfy beds.
Wonderful view from the upstairs deck.
Good grilling facilities on the first floor.
Very clean!
Nice front house. Spotless and with enough beds for my family here from out of town. They loved how quiet it was and had a nice restful time.
Incredible stay in Topanga! Beautiful property and cottage and Sylvia was a gracious and attentive host. We had a blast and will definitely be back.

The house look better than the pictures for sure.  The owner had almost everything from the welcoming bottle of wine and Peregino spring water along with all the amenities you'd expect from a resort.  Place was impeccably clean  and the host was very responsive.  When we had an issue with a broken shower handle that left the it running in the middle of the night, the host had a handyman come out within half an hour, which in LA time and traffic is almost immediate!  We felt the place was more than worth it. Good location, great home, super hosts!
Tina's place is in a great location! The apartment is within walking distance to many bars and restaurants. The place itself was very clean and spacious. Would definitely stay here again.
Clean, nice, private, nice backyard, easy in and out, and great hosts.  It was my first Air BnB and was a great experience.

This little cottage and a set of unbelievable amenities they have was out of this world. Hosts were very friendly and very accommodating to all of our needs. Our family had a great little vacation there for my 55th birthday,  and we definitely will remember it fir a ling time
It was very clean, comfortable and so private. I would recommend.

An awesome little house.  A work colleague and I stayed here.  Can walk to restaurants/shops.  Great neighborhood.  Didn't meet Grace but she left all instructions so was very smooth.  Would stay again in a heartbeat

Bob’s place is absolutely stunning. Stayed here 3 nights, and it was great. The backyard is amazing and the private hot tub was a nice touch. Great house and a $10 Lyft ride downtown!  Great host and overall great experience!

Joshua is a warm and welcoming host whose house is very conveniently situated near LA's famed Koreatown. It's close to a metro stop and lots of great food. The location is fantastic - it is close enough to the downtown core but also tucked away enough to provide some peace and quiet. The room is comfortable and had everything that we needed for our short stay. Joshua was quick to respond to any inquiries we had, and had great tips for dog-friendly places to visit in town. We had a great time, and hope to return someday.

Carrick's place is super cute, quiet, and feels rural while being a stones throw from all the best of my old neighborhood. Two hammocks for the barn alone!! An adorable playful puppy, Delta! Views! A chicken. I had an inspiring, creative stay here. The bed is very comfortable too, I slept really well for a change.
Great location and a nice space. Would stay here again.

Such a beautiful little place! We felt cozy and safe. The hosts responded very quickly to all my silly questions since it was the first time I had actually used Airbnb. The directions to park and get into the space were very clear. We actually missed it as soon as we locked up to leave! I would definitely stay here again :)

Location was nice. We mostly hung out in the K-town area which was fairly close (about 5-10 min drive depending on traffic). I stayed in room #3. The room was definitely smaller than I expected, but that's always the case with Airbnb. Didn't expect to see ants crawling in the bathroom, so if you're not about that life, then you should look for a different place. I was only staying there for 2 nights so I couldn't care less. There were small dirty stains on the pillow and comforter, but then again I guess you get what you pay for. Very affordable and great location. Easy communication with the host. I would recommend if you're planning on staying for a short term.

Everything about our stay was great, and Rita is an outstanding host.  The location is close to everything in Washington Sq., and you truly feel like you're at the beach.  Rita's place is surprisingly quiet, despite it being so close to a major road and just a block away from a bunch of bars and restaurants.   It was really the perfect place for us to stay.
Excellent stay with great location! Fun for a big group
Barbara is a very pleasant and friendly host. Her house calm, has a pleasant garden and is well located.
Very clean and nice apartment

What a great place! The location was perfect, the house was cozy and clean and Buz was a very easy to work with-I wish I could've stayed there longer.  The beds were comfy and the rooms had so much light- I will definitely try to come back again. 
Thanks do much Buz!

Cari was an amazing host. Happy to chat and give local suggestions but equally respectful of space. Her place is perfectly located for walking access to central Beverly Hills but also perfectly secluded on a quiet street close to the park. Her two dogs are extremely quiet and relaxed. The place was clean and the housekeeper came twice during my 1 month stay. Private bathroom was also a plus. Would definately stay again.

Linda's place was amazing. Every little detail made my stay so comfortable. You can find literally everything you need at her place. And she's kind enough to provide drinks and snacks for the guest.  I really liked this place and will definitely come to stay again when it's available. Thank you for the hospitality Linda! Highly recommend to anyone.

Great location, host communicated very well. Their is no hot tub in the home so that was misleading on the amenities. The sheets were a bit stained but they were clean. The shower had fruit flies in it and wasn’t very clean. But besides that it was a great home to stay in.
Michael & Joanna went above and beyond! Amazing hospitality and provided everything you could ever need or want. Definitely exceeded any expectations I had. Thank you!

It was actually beyond my expectation. It was really cheap compared with other houses but I still got what I needed. Each room was divided with curtains and it had nice bed, small table, fan and light. Really recommend it to those who are looking for a cheap place to stay.
We had a great stay! Cute place!

Marlene’s place is great. Clean, quiet and spacious. Communication ans check in was very easy. Marlene has lovely dogs :) Everything is as described. LAX is super close ($15 with Uber). I highly recommend staying here.

Place was sparkling clean  and communication was efficient. When I couldn’t figure out how to unlock the safety box he was very patient and understanding. Location every close to the airport! Highly recommend if you’re staying for less then 3 nights!
Very good and affordable stay.
This house is very beautiful I felt a sense of peace there.

Great spot for going to several places around LA. Greatful for the kitchen and utensils/sheets super soft and comfy. Not a lot of food options in the area but Manhattan beach is close by. Would definitely stay here or recommend to others.

We enjoyed our stay at Michael's. The apartment is in a safe neighborhood and has a lighted walkway. We were greeted by a friendly woman who lived in the other building across from Michael's. We felt welcomed right away and arrived to find the apartment exactly as shown in the pictures here on AirBNB. Michael walked us through getting in on the first day over the phone. We barely used the kitchen. It's a little outdated, but great to have and make our stay feel more like home. We took advantage of the washer/dryer but wished there had been a bottle of detergent. We had to buy and leave behind a bottle we nearly used. I hope the next few guests can make use of it. The bathroom is also outdated, but the water temperature while showering remained nice and hot the entire time! The bedrooms are simple and clean and it was a nice perk to have TV & Wifi access. There's TONS of street parking, but if you go out at night and return past 10pm, you will have to circle for a bit. There won't be anything out front. With all that said, I would definitely stay again. Great price and wonderful host.

We really enjoyed our time in LA. Phoebe's Bigger Little Villa provided us with a wonderful home base. We were able to make Christmas Eve and Christmas dinner in her nicely provisioned kitchen.  We used her cool stereo system to Pandora Holiday music as we cooked.- awesome! There are tons of things to do and things to eat :) within walking distance of her tucked away house in Echo Park. There is a beautiful vista of the Angeles Mountains from the back patio + a secret garden! Can't get much better. 

Maggie
Connecticut

Three thumbs up- oh wait I only have 2! :)
Such a cute comfortable place to stay. Close to everything!  Lots of extra touches that made my stay so welcoming!  Will definitely go back!!

Loni was a super host, she replied within seconds. the home is beautiful, great place, great views. we always had a parking spot. we would definitely recommend. 
thx for everything.
A fantastique location with scenic view on LA. The room would desserve a little refurbishment and deep cleaning. Mehran is a friendly host.
The space was quiet, clean, safe, and roomy. The host was attentive, generous, warm, and a delight to chat with. I highly recommend this stay!
House was great and accurate description. Dissapointed as the hot tub was not working. Good house and Doris was available when needed.

I have to say this room was very cute and extremely clean. I personally didn’t spend much time in the room because my daughter and I were exploring LA. However for sleeping and showing it was perfect. The neighborhood was really nice and quiet. There were no bugs at all. I highly recommend this stay.

Kevin & Susan were great hosts! The house was perfect for what we needed, a relaxing weekend away. Keven & Susan promptly replaced the bike that had some chain issues when we notified them. We loved to commute around the area and the house was a perfect location for getting to the beach or enjoying restaurants!
This was a fantastic stay for us!  Great location, nice clean apartment, and very prompt service whenever we needed something.  I highly recommend this location to anyone visiting the area!

This private cottage was the perfect spot for my adventure to LA. It was very easy to settle in and feel at home. Martine and Adam were a pleasure to communicate with for my stay. I will certainly stay here again when I return to the area.

Staying at Barbara's place was a great relaxing time. Her house is very nice and she made us feel very welcomed to use whatever we needed from shared rooms. The bedroom is perfect for a couple. She placed some snacks in the little fridge and had everything very clean.

I loved staying at Donna's guest house. It's a lovely, very private and very quiet place. Photos are accurate. I especially enjoyed having morning coffee outside on the balcony. My only regret was we never go to meet Rosco the dog. I'm already looking forward to staying at Donna's on my next trip to Los Angeles.

I booked Kimberly’s place last minute as my previous arrangement fell through and Kimberly was quick to respond and the room was ready so I checked in soon after she approved my booking and it was self check in and smooth. The place is exactly how described with a few extra nice touches. 
The two sofa beds in the room are identical and good for a short stay. I put the sleeping pad on the floor as I prefer more solid bed. 
Both bedroom and the shared bathroom were spotless clean and so was the rest of the house. And Kimberly was warm and welcoming and very friendly. 
The only thing that I would have preferred it didn’t happen was the night time activity and movement. As quiet as it was meant to be, it still woke me up a few times every night. But over all a good stay.
I recommend Kimberly’s place.
Great place, amazing host.

Sara has a real Hollywood gem, full of charm. Nestled away next to the Hollywood Bowl, it is the perfect escape for anyone looking for a private and quiet getaway. I found it extremely easy to walk to some of the most famous Hollywood attractions, restaurants and nightlife.  The apartment is outfitted with all the amenities that one would desire, and the its character makes the place feel like a home away from home. Sara has prepared the perfect guidebook for guests who are unfamiliar with Los Angeles, and was always available if needed!

Location was ideal and exactly as described, close to 2nd street and the beach. The house was clean and well stocked as mentioned. Although for us the bed was not comfortable, we managed! We loved the charm of this home and we thank you for your hospitality and allowing us to stay here, thank you!

We had a great stay at your place.  Loved the off street parking, that made our stay so much nicer! The room is comfortable and we appreciated the cold water pitcher as well as on site shampoo, conditioner and body wash.  Thanks for a great stay in Santa Monica!
Super clean, comfortable bed, very quiet place which is important for help us sleep well.

As a first timer with "Airbnb" and our stay with Michele,  I must say that we had a pretty awesome experience! Her place was everything we had hoped for and more. Michele was most definitely a great host and very attentive, I would recommend her place to all.

My stay with Elizabeth exceeded my expectations.  I booked with her based on her reviews and location and I was more than satisfied.  She was thoughtful, super accommodating and respected our privacy even though I wouldn't have minded if she hung out with us because she's really cool.  Good luck getting a better view anywhere else because her panoramic view is beyond anything you will find.  The neighborhood is spectacular which added to my LA experience. She totally lived up to her reviews and would stay there again easily.

I enjoyed experiencing Venice Beach and the neighborhood I stayed in. Even though it's a hotspot and busy area, I had no trouble sleeping at night. Kristens dogs were well-behaved and loving and were not shedders!  I appreciate Kristen concern for security and hope to stay again.
Katherine is a very welcoming and gracious host. The room is very clean and tidy.

This house was as described and close to santa monica and venice. Check in was easy and the host was very responsive. Be careful with street parking since we were ticketed and it's not cheap. Otherwise a great stay!

Beautiful spot! A very special little oasis tucked in a peaceful residential neighborhood. The tinyhouse was cozy and had all the basic amenities that I needed  - a nice desk and space for luggage, close clean bathroom with shower (great water pressure!), outdoor kitchenette area with coffee and mini fridge, and lots of outdoor lounge space in a garden courtyard.

James made us feel right at home immediately upon arrival. He was very generous and trusting, offering us the use of anything we needed in his house. The bedroom was really comfortable and we appreciated the private bathroom. 
We enjoyed great conversations and found a lot of common ground so it was like visiting a friend!
The location is excellent and the area easy to navigate with plenty of great restaurants nearby. 
Thanks so much for a great Hollywood experience Jimmy!
Very clean spot
It was cozy and spacious place for spending a few days discovering LA.
Thanks again sir .

Yana is a warmhearted and caring host. We are happy that we met her and her wonderful family. We are friends now. The cosy house with the nice garden was great for me and my family. It's perfect and safe located with all the things Venice is famous for. Cafe Gratitude is a great place with best healhy food. The Yoga collective is always open whenever you need to do a downward facing dog. Rose Cafe is a must go. And the Gjusta bakery the place to go. You will find all of this just around the corner. Thank you for everything. We will miss you Yana!

Great location downtown LA, secure building across the street from Pershing Square. Lots of good restaurants/shopping within walking distance. We enjoyed the Farmers Market on Sunday. The apartment was comfortable, rooftop pool and Jacuzzi were a nice bonus.
A quaint, private place that provided a very comfortable stay.  We would definitely recommend this location.
Good price. The place was quiet, so I was able to rest well. The parking is kind of small and difficult to maneuver.

This place is just perfect! It's a quiet, safe area that is a quick 5 minute walk to Abbot Kinney shops and restaurants,  and seconds away from the scenic Venice Canals. The place is exactly as pictured -- we felt right at home and didn't want to leave! Mike was excellent at communicating and even offered for us to extend our stay which we happily took him up on. I also ended up leaving a few things behind and he messaged me right away and allowed me to come pick them up. We will definitely try to stay here again -- great spot and host!
Jeremy was a great host. Very friendly and flexible with my schedule and needs. His home is very nice and the area is fairly secluded. Would definitely stay there again in the future. Thanks!
Patrick's place is LEGIT! You can't beat the location or the price. He's so responsive and helpful. If I stay in West Hollywood again, I'll specifically search him out.
It was good. I stayed for 1 night. Both of them were really helpful. I enjoyed my stay.

We stayed at Joanna’ home for 6 nights. She was so nice and the place was a quiet place for rest. The bedroom is with bathroom, so no need to share with anyone else. Walking distance to the Metro and Laundry, and it was so nice that Joanna prepared Tap cards and laundry cards. Really good place for your stay in LA. :)
Check in was very easy and exactly as described. There was plenty of space for everyone and having 2 parking spaces available for our use was helpful as well. Would definitely stay here again.

Bev's place was amazing! She was just as amazing! I told her we were celebrating a birthday when I booked. When we arrived there was a cute birthday balloon and a card with champagne from her. It's definitely the little things that matter. Bev's place is centrally located and when we needed groceries, you literally could walk to everything. Parking also wasn't an issue since she has two dedicated spots for your stay. She even had robes, which I loved and could really relax and feel at home. It's definitely a home away from home. Will be staying again whenever I come to LA.

This place was great. It was perfect for what we were looking for. Yani was there to great us and show us around. He had some great recommendations on places to eat, and bars to go to.  The place was clean and had everything we needed. It was a great overall experience.
take it !
A great time

Abby is very nice and her place is very nice. The only issue is parking. I had to park 2 blocks away my last night because of street sweepers. Normally when I stay here I can find a parking about a block away. I stayed in Room B last time and it was very comfortable and has double beds but the bed I stood in this time in Room A was very hard. I did wake up with some pain in my back and neck. Nothing major though. I don’t want to complain because I usually always enjoy my stay here. Next time I’ll make sure to get Room B not Room A.
A perfect place to relax with a endless number of places to eat, visit, and explore that are so close to the house. I recommend to anyone on any agenda. Evan was a perfect host.

Although we did not meet Adel, our check-in and communication with him was very easy and prompt.  The location of the listing was perfect for what we wanted to do and would return here if ever came back through town and certainly recommend to friends and family.

The Silver Lake Studio Apt was great. Walt provided everything I needed for my month stay in LA. I didn't need to contact him for anything but I feel if I had needed to he would have gotten it taken care of immediately. The studio is perfect for 1 or 2 people and it really felt like home for the month I was in LA. Probably the biggest perk aside from the location is that with the parking pass, I was able to park in front of the house every day and not drive around aimlessly looking for parking or have to lug items long distances.
Place was beautiful.  Interior was exactly described.

I had an amazing stay! Michael and Chris had everything I needed for my stay and more. There were water and snacks and responded to any questions I had within 15 minutes. Definitely recommend their beautiful place! The location was perfect as well! Close to everything! My favorite part was the giant King bed looking over the giant window in the living space. Beautifully decorated!

Matt was an incredible host! He went out of his way to ensure we had an awesome stay. He had great attention to detail and gave great suggestions. This was ideal for us to stay before hearing back to the east coast. It only took 20 minutes to get to LAX.
Lana is an excellent host. Lana responds quickly to messages. Place is neat & clean as advertised. Thanks Lana!

If you're looking for a central location, this is the place. We had never been to LA before, so were not sure as to the location. But, it is close to all the sights we wanted and was so easy to navigate the area. Parking can be a bit tight in the driveway, but manageable. 

Did not get the chance to meet either Nicole or Howie, but can honestly say, this was more than  worth it. When we make our next trip to LA, we will be sure to book this place.

Edwin's place kept every promise that it gave. It was the perfect place for our needs, as a little family traveling with our teenaged son. The house was contemporary/modern, with all the fasilities you need. Everything was clean and neat, and ready for our arrival. A nice little peaceful garden, for our morning coffee and afternoon breaks. Beautiful location, near proximity to Marina Del Rey, Venize Beach, Santa Monica, Cetral LA and Westwood.. all the places that we wanted and needed to get to during our week in LA. We will be back, that is for sure! Edwin and his beautiful little house comes highly recommended! Thank you for our stay! Regards Lena, Gisle & Nickolai
Christian was a great host! Easygoing and friendly. The apartment is beautiful just like the pics depicts. I will definitely stay with him again.

This is a very nice spot, close to everything! The complex is gated which made staying there feel more secure. My friends and I really enjoyed staying here and Kye is a great host! Wonderful communication.

My wife, two young boys, and I stayed at 1517 Griffith Park Drive for four days. Entry was easy.  Nice, quiet, clean, renovated bungalow with lots of light. Private deck was great for having coffee and sprawling out with kids. Tim was quick to respond to our queries. Street parking was always available within a block or so. Lots of good food, coffee, etc. nearby.

Great place in DTLA! Luxurious apartment complex with a great gym. Great location and walking distance to La Live, Whole Foods and minutes from great restaurants. Ideally located near I-10 as well. Apartment was cute and spacious. Maxim was super responsive and let me alter my reservation by a day. Would def rent again!

Nora was such a wonderful host.  The place was great clean and nicely decorated, very relaxing.  Amazing views.  We had such a great time, would stay there again!   She was always very responsive and had everything prepared for our arrival.
Good
Great space, very clean. Up to date appliances. Refreshments in fridge by host
We were disappointed to be moved to a different apartment from the original apartment due to overbooking, without any prior warning. Therefore we cannot comment on this particular apartment.

Clean, Safe, & cozy spot for a reasonable
Price.  Close to beach cities with nightlife,  also close to freeway access.

Very good activity organized by Chikako ! 
A manual activity suitable for both adults and children.
She explained the different steps very well while explaining to us the origin of the goshuin notebook.
I really recommend it !

Very central Hollywood location. Good place to stay over when you have whole days filled with activities and need a place to sleep in such a location. Other than Friday/Saturday night you don't really hear the noise of Hollywood. There is a big, comfortable bed and there is a lot of natural light in the apartment.
Chala was great! Very welcoming and flexible with my arrival time. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay! And Ken was very communicative during my whole trip. Absolutely recommended!
This place is beautiful. Super easy to find. The apartment is nice and quaint. It feels like you’re at home.
(Hidden by Airbnb) g is a perfect host. The room was exactly as stated in the listing. I would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay for a few nights! Benjamin was a great host and was easy to communicate with.

The apartment was exactly as pictured, super clean and everything we needed was provided. Despite the LA heat, the place was still very airy and cool. Everything was only about a half hour drive away. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks Daisy and Mark!
This place was super stylish and relaxing. We really enjoyed our stay, and Dorothy was very reliable with responding quickly.

We didn't get a chance to meet Marzena, but her husband gave us a warm and friendly welcome when we arrived.  The place is immaculately clean, has a spacious patio area with plenty of fun seating (we enjoyed our dinner outside!), and the personal touches made us feel so special :  an ice cold pitcher of orange infused water was waiting for us on the table, along with chocolates, various snacks, and beverages galore in the mini fridge (including wine!).  Marzena provided hotel sized toiletries and extra blankets and pillows for our son that we requested before booking.  Two things: THE BED IS SO COMFORTABLE, like sleeping on a puffy cloud!!!  There is a skylight above the bed though, so be prepared for the early morning light to filter in.  Also, THE RAIN STYLE SHOWER is amazing!  Everything was pristine, spotless, and we felt like we were in a log cabin.  Communication was fast and A+++  Wonderful stay.  We would book again in a heartbeat.

My husband and I had a great weekend here. The location is very convenient to the beach and restaurants. The studio is small, but the space is maximized. It had everything we needed...comfy bed, tv, bathroom. We didn't cook but the kitchen is stocked. Barbara left lots of information for us to cover any needs during our stay. Would definitely rent this place again!
Heidi was easy to communicate with and has an amazing space. 5 stars all around.
Linda’s Airbnb is lovely, sparkling clean, and Linda was a superb host, responded rapidly to my inquiries, and provided excellent instructions for my late arrival. I highly recommend staying here.

Shimon’s place was in the perfect location for my friend and I. Close to stores and restaurants, and of course the beach. Though the bathroom was not “spotless,” it was not a huge issue to us and I would certainly still highly recommend that others stay here.

Check in was easy and Shimon he the apartment set up with everything we needed.
Great place, bigger than I expected! We enjoyed our stay.

My wife and I had a very nice stay at Carrie's place.  The beds were comfy and the location was quiet, but also close enough to the beach and shopping.  Carrie always responded quickly when we wrote to her or had questions.
Amazing home.  Easy check in and parking! Much better then I ever anticipated! I would stay here again for sure!
Great & Stylish place! Close to everything. I would definitely stay here again if i were to be back.

Amir's place is very nicely located and the underground parking is nice to have for those with a vehicle. I felt like it could have a few nicer touches for the price, such as paper towels, a few more dishes and glasses, and perhaps a piece of art or two on the walls, but if you're just looking for a place to crash and a central location without any frills, you are good to go.

Really enjoyed our stay at this property with a prime location and easy check-in/check-out process. Our host was great in ensuring all our needs were met. The neighbouring properties are fairly close so a lot can be heard from next door.
I´ve had a great time. Haim was always there when needed. the location suited me perfectly. Close to the beach and everything close by that one could ask for. Parking was easy.
Awesome place. Perfectly situated central to LA hot spots. Very nice and modern look. I would definitely come back to stay here!

I really much enjoyed my stay in this beautiful home. There is many amenities but a small fridge, but we made it work. It is close to Long Beach, it took us like 15 minutes to walk there. The only thing was that the beach wasn’t the cleanest. There is seal beach that is also a drive away but it’s nicer. There is also a cute little patio to sit out and enjoy your morning coffee. It comes with a garage which is a plus but it’s a very tight fit. Overall a comfy home.
Beautiful spot to relax and rewind. Amazing views. Tranquil and restorative. Close proximity to great hiking!
Place was great!

Eddie and Cherry's place was clean and comfortable. I was there for a whole month and had no issues. It's close to the Los Feliz area and at a walking distance to many other attractions. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Place was decent. Backyard is beautiful. Nice family. Not as private as we would have hoped and lacked some basic amenities such as a TV, toaster, hand towels, etc. However if you need a safe place to stay while driving through town for the night this should work.
Very clean, comfortable bed, close to beach

Outside does look a little sketch, but inside was pretty much exactly like the pictures. The area is super cute. Only negative was it got a little warm at night for us and the window was small with no fan. Other than that hosts were chill and I thought the place was decorated in a cute way. We barely were at the place as it was just a place to take a break on our drive home, but still enjoyable. Also had a little jar of earplugs for if the traffic was too loud.

Melissa was a great host.  She greeted me upon arrival to show me around.  The place was exactly as described, very clean and simple.  The full kitchen was wonderful to have during my stay, and Melissa even provided essentials like coffee and olive oil for use.  I was very comfortable during my stay!

Wir wurden sehr herzlich von dem Co-Host Patti empfangen. Die Unterkunft übertraf die Beschreibung sogar noch. Das Bad ist sehr geräumig. Der "Küchen- und Kochbereich" enthielt alle notwendigen Utensilien um zwei bis drei mal zu frühstücken. Im Kühlschrank waren Bagels, englische Muffins, verschieden Sorten Marmelade und Frischkäse. Des Weiteren waren Wasser und Kaffee vorrätig.
Alles in allem war das Apartment sehr liebevoll und detailreich eingerichtet.
Den Garten- und Poolbereich konnten wir ebenfalls mitbenutzen, leider hat das Wetter dafür nicht unbedingt mitgespielt.
Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen und können einen Aufenthalt nur empfehlen.

Great apartment, great location in a historic building in the heart of Hollywood. 

Nicole was a great host. I would be happy to stay again.

Beautiful home with wonderful views! Kasia was an amazing host who kept in constant communication with us to make sure we were enjoying our stay. 

Having access to a pool was fantastic. We enjoyed the space the home provided. Kasia also let us check in early and check out later which was an extra bonus. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Talia goes out of her way to make you feel comfortable staying in her home. The saltwater pool and hammock are so relaxing. She provided everything we could think of: coffee, wine, beach towels, portable speaker, bikes, pool floats, wifi, tv, grill, two cute dogs ... the list goes on and on. So glad we stayed :)
Great location and hosts. Very attentive to your needs and lots of amenities in the bathroom and kitchen!
Hosts are very nice , the place is cozy and clean. The neighborhood is safe and the recommendations they give about what to do in LA very useful. Communication is quick and good. Thanks guys
LOVE this house! Perfect location. Host was extremely responsive and kind.

Sur RBnB pourras tu stp mettre ce commentaire, merci beaucoup  

I really enjoyed the apartment. In particular cleanliness, bedding and silence. It is very well decorated with taste and the kitchen has everything that is useful. The garden is absolutely fantastic with its small pond. Very nice and quiet, it is ideal to cool off in summer. It is very well located near Abott Kinney which is less than a 10 minute walk.
It is quite easy to find a place to park in the street.
I recommand it.
The place is everything I expected, clean, bright, cozy and super good hosts.
Very nice place in the middle of Pasadena. Easy to find and everything you need. Kind and helpful host.

It was so easy to feel at home there. She open
Their house to us as soon as we arrived! We loved
Sitting in the balcony and seeing the moon over
The ocean! The bed was so comfortable. Gracious 
Hosts and beautiful home.
Place was in a great location! Really enjoyed the amenities provided and cozy feeling of the place.

We thoroughly enjoyed our one-night stay at Patrick’s guesthouse and could have easily stayed longer. 
There are many rules and instructions provided, which show that the hosts truly- and understandably- care about the condition of their guest home. You will definitely feel like you are staying in a well-cared for home, which is refreshing compared to all of the property managed AirBnBs we have stayed at in the past. Patrick greeted us upon our arrival and gave us a quick and helpful tour of the place.
The home is extremely clean, spacious, and fully-stocked with everything you need for a comfortable stay including a Roku TV (with fast Internet), stocked full-sized kitchen, access to washer/dryer and a private patio.
The location is good- quiet street, easy to find parking, not super close to the beach/boardwalk, but close enough. Also comfortably close to Abbott Kinney and their adorable local/trendy shops. 
When we booked the place, we were looking forward to the cruiser bikes available for guests’ use. Unfortunately, none of the bikes were in comfortable riding-condition, so we ended up not using them. 
Overall, we felt safe, as the guesthouse is located behind an electronically-locked gate. It’s also worth noting that Patrick is LGBTQ friendly, and we felt very comfortable staying here.
A few recommendations in the area: Brunch at Great White (get the ricotta hotcakes!), dinner at Gjusta, and ice cream at Salt & Straw!

I loved my stay! Jodea was a kind and generous host and the room is incredibly comfortable. I liked having my own bathroom in the guest room, and the bed is very comfortable. I slept great! The neighborhood is quiet and was very convenient for me. I would stay here again.
Debi's space was amazing.  Super clean and stylish!  It is in a great location, allowing you to walking pretty much anywhere in Venice! Highly recommend!
Very nice host, quick responses, and love the Airbnb, great neighborhood to do morning jogs and close to the beach

Kathy was a great host; she was very helpful, even offering to come and pick us up, and she was also very accomodating, allowing us to check in early and check out late. She was quick to respond to any queries or issues and had thoughtfully provided everything we might need in the house. We loved our stay in her cozy, spick and span cottage, and the quiet, tree-lined, lovely neighbourhood it was located in.

Sepi war sehr unkompliziert und hat uns kurzfristig aufgenommen. Die Kommunikation verlief einfach und unkompliziert. Die Wohnung ist extrem zentral gelegen, direkt am Hollywood-Boulevard. Wenn mal dieses Erlebnis haben möchte, ist diese Wohnung der perfekte Ort dafür. Eine toll ausgestattete Wohnung! Danke.

The stay at Carina's place was great. Make sure you read carefully because the post is very accurate in terms of logistics (car space is only big enough for Camrys and smaller, how to self check in, etc).
Great location to explore LA from. Can walk to anything in Santa Monica. Host is very responsive. Lots of light and surrounded by bougainvillea. Great option for dog friendly place.

This small home is MIGHTY when it comes to thoughtful, homey touches! It was completely comfortable, clean and inviting. We felt instantly at home and relaxed the minute we entered, sleeping so well that night. If you are staying in the area, do yourself a treat and stay in this wonderful place!
Nice house with easy check-in. just the air-con in bedroom and living room was noisy and i have to turn off them while sleeping.  Overall is great!
Nice place and clean. Host was very helpful
Beautiful house,awesome host!A nice trip in LA. Really!

My stay at Felix's house was while a week period. From the very first day I felt like I was home. Felix is very good-natured person so the house reflects the same to newcomers. The atmosphere in the house remains very quite and comfort fellings.
Definitelу I strongly recomend to stay in Felix's house.
Thank you dear Felix !
Karim was a great host, the place was a great stay. Great location. Will be back!

This was my second time using Airbnb & it set the standard for all future rentals. The pool house looked exactly  liked the photos, the location is central to major freeways & within walking distance to grocery stores, shopping boutiques, restaurants, hiking trails, etc. Wifi, A/C, washer/dryer works great, plenty of tv channels to chose from, super comfy patio along side the pool to enjoy. There's plenty of parking if you have a car & car rental places close by as well.
Joanne was extremely accommodating throughout the Entire process, she thinks of & provides all the little things that you would want when showing up with just your suitcase. I felt at home from the start.  I hesitated to do a guest house but I felt I had complete privacy & yet Joanne was very accessible. I had one small complaint, I sent Joanne a text, & with in an hour it was taken care of; I greatly appreciated feeling comfortable enough to ask & how effortless it was to be handled. I will certainly be back to Joanne's pool house on my next visit to LA!!

Emily was a great host! I was in contact with her a couple of days before the trip where I told her that I was getting in really early in the morning. She was willing to be there, up and ready when I arrived. Their house is super cute! They had all the accommodations I needed. I even forgot my hair dryer and there was one in the room. Emily was very welcoming and we had several conversations where she told me some places to check out. Their house is in a safe area, but about 45min-1hr from downtown LA. I liked staying with her, but keep in mind the house is not close to many of the places you might want to explore. I didn't mind bc I had a rental car and loved being able to drive everywhere and explore on my own. I loved LA and will be back soon! Definitely would stay at Emily's house again if it's available.

Naomi was super kind, and always ready to communicate with us. The guesthouse was large enough to accommodate our family (2 adults and 2 kids) and the beds were excellent. I especially liked the yard where my kids played with seesaw. We asked a few things such as hair dryer or plastic bags for trash can, and Naomi quickly responded, and brought it to us. The floor was pretty dusty, and shoes were definitely required in the house, which was not so easy for some from Asia like us.
Great hosts to go with the great location and facilities.. thanks to both of you.

Christopher’s place is the best secure place with private lockable truly private rooms and big closets for a business professionals to stay at near North Hollywood, Burbank or Glendale. 

If you are a partier, smoker or want someone to wait on you, this is not for you. 

The kitchen access and BBQ grill for making your own meals, plenty of no hassle free street parking, very comfortable beds / pillows, 100meg internet and own closet are great. What impressed me most was the early evening music sessions, piano guitar and voice. I have zero talent, but I saw and heard greatness in action with Chris and a few of his friends, 2 of the evenings I was present. If You want privacy, it yours, quiet hours are just that. He is under priced compared to others in the area months. Hands down best deal out there. I generally do not give out recommendations or reviews and 2 last Ainbnb this month were nothing like the photos or descriptions, they were dumps or flop houses. 

Chris’s place is a real jewel that you should book without hesitation.

My kids and I had a lovely stay in this guest house. It's a short walk to everything we needed and a reasonable drive to other parts of LA. The guest house is beautifully decorated and comfortable. Robert is super attentive and helpful which was I was really thankful for. The only discomfort was the bathroom/shower combo for my kids but this is because I have two teenagers (a boy and girl). It made them a bit uncomfortable. I personally did not have an issue and really loved the uniqueness of the set up. If I come back to Santa Monica I'll definitely be renting it again.

Let me start off by saying Phillip and Kathleen are awesome people with a beautiful home. Upon arrival we were greeted by Phillip, who doesn't like for you to call him sir by the way. He was very welcoming. Super nice guy. The house was perfect I don't want to say too much because I want others to walk in and have the same pleasant surprises we encountered but just know the bed is AWESOME! The house is literally 20 minutes away from all major attractions, close enough to everything but far enough from the city for a peaceful night's sleep. Wonderful house, wonderful family Ms. Kathy is a sweetheart. Did I mention there's a pool included. Book NOW!
Cute place.
Super nice view and very clean 10/10

Comfy bed, great workspace, nice to have an air conditioner and also option for an open window. The house is very well organized, and the common spaces are cleaned daily. However, when the house is full of guests, there are too  many for one bathroom! The greatest advantage is closeness to public transit.
房间非常的干净整洁,对于去附近旅游或者探访亲友后的临时住所非常的合适｡其他的房客也都尽量保持安静,住的很舒服｡因为我入住的时间比较晚,我并没有见到coco本人,但是通过信息沟通我的入住也没有任何的问题｡如果下次再去该地区玩的话还会选择住在这里｡
Very good place to relax and use as home base to see the city

Darrell's place is a must for the ultimate LA experience! The place is absolutely breathtaking with beautiful architecture and interior design. Darrell was a very warm and welcoming host that made sure his guests had everything they could ask for. The space was very clean and well equipped with all kinds of amenities. Waking up to that view each day was truly a blessing! Would very highly recommend! Thank you Darrell, or as we say in Sweden - tack!
Beautiful home! Laura is very sweet and accommodating. We loved little touches like the treats she left out and how welcoming she is. Would definitely stay again!
The place is quiet and the shared bathroom is clean. This place worth staying
Tommy was an excellent host, friendly and accommodating. His place is clean and very well decorated.
brett was so helpful if you need any help. The room was very private. We loved staying with hi.
Perfect quiet location! Safe and clean. Loved the garden area.

Sandra’s place is in Echo Park, which is a really cool, hipster community. The decor was very cute, and I love how private it is. It’s tucked away so you’re shielded from any noise or chaos.
The shower could’ve been cleaner, and the shower head has mineral/calcium build-up. The mattress isn’t very comfortable, but the linen and pillows were! I’d stay here again! 
This place has a couple of bars and small eatieries on its block, which is convenient! Try Woodcat Coffee Bar right across the street. Amazing coffee, a chill vibe, and great decor!
Propreté impeccable, le wifi un peu capricieux mais John s’en est très rapidement chargé, très réactif, je recommande grandement
Can not beat the location.  Place is huge perfect for playing music and spending time with friends.
The pool was nice.
房东热情,干净整洁,跟图片差不多,非常好的住宿体验!

This place is sparkling clean and provides you with all the supplies you need. From first aid kits and extra dish soap to an iron and an ironing board. The location is safe and is only a 10 minute drive away from Universal Studios. I will definitely stay here again when I come back.
clean.  big space.  air conditioning was great along w the gas stove and fridge.  kitchen is a nice space.  great couches.
Henry’s place was fantastic! It’s very cozy and stylishly decorated, plus Henry himself was very chill & easy to talk to. Highly recommend staying there if you get the chance

We had a great experience staying with Nika and Austin! We’d never stayed at an Airbnb that shared space with other guests and the host and didn’t know what to expect. Nika and Austin made it so comfortable and welcoming, like we’d been friends for years! Great place and location!

This little apartment was the perfect accommodation for my boyfriend and I. The place was lovely and we couldn't have asked for a better host. Robert was easy to communicate with and quick to respond. He even provided snacks and drinks which was much appreciated. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and seamless stay in the LA area. We'd consider staying her again, no doubt!
Great place, easy check-in, and in good area.
Easy to check in and out. Hosts are super nice and quick to respond if you message them.
Awesome house. Great location.
Good place, lots of space.

Great little place !
Very cool and comfy. 
Like staying in a small hideaway with a pool right outside the main window.

The place is at an amazing location and is really close to popular LA destinations, which is always a plus. Alex and Marrisa were really good at providing us privacy and our own personal space. We highly recommend this place.

One word to describe the host: "chill". Zach is professional but also home-y. This eccentric, century-old home had only made my stay even more comfortable by Zach's welcoming and ask-me-anything attitude. I grew up around here, so I can personally vet that the blend of the this house and the host in this location make the price too good to pass up. 10/10 highly recommend!
Wonderful place to stay! Very surprised this property isn’t priced higher!
Great stay!
Joani's place totally exceeded my expectations, super clean and tidy, great layout in an awesome location!
Really nice place. Was traveling alone and it felt really safe too, even tho it’s a shared space

Jeff’s place is beautiful! The pictures don’t do it justice! It’s bigger than it looks in the pictures. Jeff replies quickly to my questions. The house was super clean. The view and balcony are beautiful!
it was great home, very clean, very modern. and we got very qucik answers for our questions.  thank you very much we had a graet time .
accueil chaleureux de la part de Lisa et Tim, appartement bien placé, non loin de l'aéroport et des plages de Venice

Bruce was a very communicative host, which made our stay very easy and comfortable. We felt very at home in his beautifully decorated midcentury house. Attention to detail and cleanliness were superb. We hope to stay here again soon!
Excelente lugar, limpieza, atención, amabilidad, mucho más de lo que esperábamos. Anfitriona al pendiente en todo momento, privacidad y áreas comunes muy bien cuidadas.

An incredible sanctuary...however, it's in the backyard of their house and attached to their art studio, which does not make it very private or quiet.
However, the location is great. Very safe neighborhood, very clean studio, great deck, and yes, you are in the trees.
The hosts were very warm
I’ve stayed here a couple times and will come again when I’m in town.  Clean, quiet, and comfortable.  All expectations were met.  Great host.
Lesli was beyond amazing! 10/10 would recommend! Everything was perfect I don’t have not a single complaint if anything it exceeds expectations!

This is a beautiful, clean, and accessible property. We stayed at the property for a week and the owner always made us feel welcome. He willingly dropped off some extra blankets as soon as we asked and always asked if there was anything else we needed. The property is beautiful and very spacious for a big group.  I would recommend this property to anyone that is looking for space and comfort at a reasonable price.
perfect!!!! 정말 좋았어요 조용하고 지하철이랑도 가까운편이예요
Awesome!! The House was gorgeous! a great view! clean! and a very good Location to Hollywood. We love the house!

My 2nd time in Los Angeles. I tried air bnb this time. I found Kye’s lovely place. It was in a quiet area. Car space was gated for protection. Place was clean. Furniture was stylish. Cable for the kid. Had a microwave, an oven and refrigerator. I actually enjoyed my time. I payed my head down without any worries. I would be glad to stay again at this home. Thank you so much for making my family vacation a time to remember.

This place is truly AMAZING! The bathroom is beautiful and I just wanted to live in it! Especially the cool bluetooth features. The bed was very cozy and the place was very clean. Very close to almost everything! Trust me and just stay here. The host is also so kind and helpful and warm at showing you around things. I would have no problem staying again!
We had a wonderful stay at the cabin! Highly recommend.

From the moment you make contact with Kathy you understand why she's a SuperHost! She made my husband and I completely comfortable from the very 1st email correspondence and helped us navigate our way for all our needs around town. Kathy is not just accessible, but made sure we knew how to contact her our whole stay should we need anything.

The Backyard Bedroom really is a little Retreat! Our stay turned out to be the coldest days of the year and she was so accommodating. We had more blankets than we needed and space heaters. It was chilly, but still a great stay.

The neighborhood is delightful! I'll certainly stay with Kathy again.
Fantastic views on the beach and Waverly is a very gracious host.
Lucy is so sweet! The place was nice and clean!
Nice house, very clean. Nice location, very quiet. Friendly host. I recommend Brett house.
Great location and luxurious apartment. Good coffee is extra plus.

Gregory and Paige were great hosts and were available to answer all of our questions from start to finish! The apartment was tastefully decorated, clean, comfortable and surprisingly spacious (such a bonus)! We only stayed a couple of nights but those simple extra touches definitely made us feel welcomed and right at home! Would definitely stay here again!
You can’t beat waking up to the ocean breeze and fresh air. View is amazing and starting every day with a beach run is the way to go. Will stay again.

As always my stay with Mike was great. The apartment is quiet clean and very close to a great little community with restaurants and shopping. It’s just a few quick minutes to several freeways and locations against the mountains is always a pleasure to wake up to. Business or pleasure this is just a great place to stay and you can always trust Mike and the cleaning staff to do things right the first time and whenever there is a need.

Michael
The apartment was beautiful and conveniently located.  Tom was helpful and nearby but not in any way intrusive.
The host canceled this reservation 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great view of downtown LA!

Excellent location in the heart of Westwood Village! SO convenient. Great place to stay if you have kids. We traveled with our infant son and dogs. Area is very pet friendly. Also nearby so many stores: Target, Ralph’s grocery store, Trader Joe’s are all on the same block! So we just bought whatever baby stuff we didn’t feel like packing. Also many other drug stores, shopping and restaurants nearby, so you don’t have to deal with LA traffic if you don’t want to. We walked downstairs to have breakfasts at the coffee shop and Mexican restaurant across the street. There is also a CorePower yoga studio right downstairs. We didn’t have time to check out the amenities that come with the apartment like the gym, sauna etc but it was nice to know they’re available! Carlos was a very helpful and accommodating host. Thanks for a great stay!
Loved staying at Robert's place! GREAT location with lots within walking distance. Robert is a great host!!

I had a Comfortable stay in general. My stay was good, the place looks like the pictures, it is clean and has everything you could need. The host was responsive and helpful. The location can get a little bit dodgy specially if you are a Solo female traveler.
I would stay there again

Elizabeth's room was perfect for my short stay near LAX airport.  It was clean, spacious and was safe for a single person's stay.  It's in a great location so close to the beach and  it definitely would work well for a small family on vacation, as well.  I was there late and only had a short interaction face to face with Elizabeth but she was courteous, gracious and kind - she knocked on my door to alert me that my car was parked in a place that could get a ticket.  I would recommend to friends, family and people reading this to stay at Elizabeth's for a cost effective, fun, safe and beautiful place to relax and enjoy Redondo Beach, Hermosa Beach, etc., and LA!

Huge space, much larger than showed in the picture. Dusty is very kind and nice! Best location and very close to restaurants, markets and the beach! Very private and cute place in LA. Good choice for family.
the house is clean as described but the whole house has a very strong cigarette smoke smell like a casino
Nice spot in a great neighborhood.

You will love Lisette's home for an LA getaway. It met my needs health wise as a sensitive person, as well as my budget. Most of all Lisette is an amazing person and this is what makes her home the special place that it is. From the start everything was forthcoming.. communication, suggestions, privacy. Oh, and the cleanliness! Grateful for the peaceful and beautiful space too.. I am a quiet person and love being alone and the privacy gave me options for being quiet or social depending on my needs. It is close to everything and pacific palisades is such a sweet and quaint community oasis. Very smooth and easy to be there, and I so appreciate Lisette opening her home so wholeheartedly to me. I will be back again and again.

STAY HERE! My boyfriend and I stayed with Penni and couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay! She and her husband were so sweet, had a CLEAN home, gave you space, you had your own private bathroom and bedroom ! They are five minutes from TONS of food and shopping and seven minutes from sixflags! Calarts is literally in their neighborhood ! Such a cute home with a HUGE pool and homey feeling ! I would stay with Penni again when I go back to the area ! She even puts chocolates in the room and has fruit and muffins for you in the morning for breakfast ! Bring an extra pillow though if you like your pillows really fluffy !
What a wonderful place to stay in Hollywood. A peaceful beautiful house and a very nice host!
Awesome...Mary is really hospitable

Zay offers a great loft near the downtown center of Los Angeles (it's 10 minutes by feet). The style of the interieur is tasteful and there's everything you need. Also a very good AC. We would definitely book again.
Booked a last minute weekend getaway in LA and this was the perfect fit - great value for a basic room in a really great location

This was a wonderful experience. The room was clean. The bed was super comfortable and Trevor gave just the right kind of chill California vibe. Also, you can't beat the location.  The room had a sign that said Welcome to Paradise which was very accurate!
Steve was an amazing host. His place is spotless and very comfortable and extactly what we wanted! The location couldn't have been better for us.
Great space for a nice relaxing trip. Close to everything and the Sunday Farmers market was fantastic. Absolutely enjoyable!  Thanks!

Maya was the most responsive host ever! She got right back to me any time I messaged her. The place was amazingly clean. The location is unbeatable- right next to restaurants, shops, grocery store, etc. It was fairly private, and we enjoyed hanging by the pool. The guest house is cute, comfy, and well stocked. Definitely recommend!

This is the 4th time I am staying at Kathy's home.
I feel lucky that I found it available.
It is my favorite place to stay in all Los Angeles.
Very clean,very spacey room,friendly guests throughout and Kathy is always kind every single time my stay here feels so pleasant.
Thank you Kathy :)

Shelby is a great host, very nice, easy going and super interesting person to talk to. Shelby takes super good care of her lovely house. Our room was very clean and nice. We even had little chocolates sitting on our beds when we arrived. The house is located very central;  Abbot Kinney is a nice 30 minutes walk away. We strongly recommend staying with Shelby.

Charlotte’s place is a little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of LA. Only minutes from the freeway, her place is nestled in a quiet little neighborhood- it’s very cozy and peaceful and has an amazing backyard for those looking to relax. Calabasas and restaurants are very close by.

Highly recommend!!
Super clean very nice stay
Awesome stay! Thank you

Ladell's place has everything you need for a home away from home while vacationing! The queen bed in the bedroom is super comfy and our children slept well on the sofa bed and the extra fold-away bed provided. The location offers plenty of privacy and is in a very charming and quiet tree lined neighborhood.

Even I read all good reviews, the hospitality of Eric still surprised me.
I’ve been traveling a lot. But Studio1080 is the best experience so far.
The location is excellent, not far to any attractions. 
Btw, if you are wondering rent a car or Uber, Uber. It gonna save tons of your time in parking.
Thanks Eric for shipping my forgot item to my address, so that I still can catch my flight.
Not that used to write comments, but this is one that I wanted to.
Jonah's place was perfect.  The location was great with many nearby places to eat , shop, etc.  The beds were very comfortable.  Would definitely stay again.
Great stay, plenty of room and great location!
What a special place! The view is amazing and location is perfect.

The little house we stayed in was clean and had many useful amenities. It felt very private. Our host was super nice and was good enough to introduce us to their four friendly, quiet dogs. Great location. Cafecito Organico is just around the corner for good coffee. We would definitely go back.

Perfect area with walking distance to restaurants and bars. Short enough distance to the beach to get those extra steps in. The place has everything you need and beyond. Even nights to stay in, Apple TV is available to binge watch shows and movies. Even though there wasn’t private parking, finding a spot along the streets was fairly easy. Highly recommend.
Super cute location! Host is very nice and accommodating to check in and check out procedures.

This is our second stay at the cottage and it was just as magical as our first visit. Marsha is such a warm and welcoming host; she made our stay that much more enjoyable. 

The cottage is lovely and set up perfectly for an extended stay. We stayed for a whole week and were able to pick up groceries at the local Whole Foods for easy breakfasts and lunches. 

The private patio made for the perfect spot to sip iced coffee from Intelligentsia in the mornings. 

The pool is stunning. We took full advantage of it and swam several hours most days. 

You really can’t beat the location if you’re looking to stay in Venice. Cannot recommend this gem enough!
Amazing hosts!!!
Great host, great house.

I stayed in the house Bre 4 days. The house is located close to the central attractions. In the house everything was ready for my arrival, fresh bedding and clean towels. Bre was very caring hostess, keep in touch and was very kind! Thank you so much for your hospitality, as well as for incredible comfort and care! Highly recommend Brie's house to travelers!

Brenda's place is very nice and clean. The room was as described, and the bathroom was very clean. The house is well located in a quiet neighborhood in Westwood, and is very close to a lot of places, especially UCLA and Santa Monica. I would recommend it to anyone without a second thought.
Dove was a great host.  She was super helpful and friendly.  Her place was exactly as listed!
Comfortable room for a great night’s sleep.

Ricks place was AWESOME. He definitely went above and beyond the call of duty for a host and checked in multiple times over the course of our stay to see if we were happy and well taken care of. I actually got to see how he handled a difficult issue with another tenant and I can tell you that he is a person with a strong moral compass even when confronted by a less than ideal and perhaps even unfair set of circumstances. I'd recommend Rick to any airbnb'er... A+++
Superb stay! Everything was perfect. We checked in late and still Lorene was very patient to show us around. The house is extremely comfortable and very well located!

This home was perfect for my family. The host has excellent communication and it was a clean home. I also enjoyed the outside gym, got that workout in! The TVs were perfect to entertain the kids as well

I'll definitely be staying again.
Valerie was a great host, as well as her two lovely dogs! She was caring an gave me great advice on the area and what to do. It felt more like visiting my grandmother than renting a room.
Really wonderful space!  Cozy, easy, and convenient!!

I really enjoyed my stay here the room was clean and spacious. The room is really nice and private. there were water bottles for us and Shampoo and soap was also provided which was nice. It was cold during the night so she had a small heater for us to use if we wanted to and extra blankets. She was also quick and detailed with her responses with anything that i needed. I would recommend this place and the price is a good deal!

Robert is a great host and very easy to communicate. The place is just as described - great value for money. The location is very convenient - not far from Venice or LAX. The street parking is safe and easy.

This is a great space to spend some time. The two weeks we stayed there where not only trouble free but down right enjoyable. The neighborhood has a lot of small town charm and the cottage is outfitted in a way that makes you feel at home. Jerry is an excellent host who was concern about any needs we might have while at the same time giving us complete privacy to enjoy this tranquil mountain setting. Beautiful hiking trails nearby with the 210 fwy.  just five minutes away. Old town Sierra Madre is a must for a quaint meal.  This property and host come highly recommended.

The appartment was excately as published. Everything nice and neat! We enjoyed our stay very much. Great location, only 2 blocks from the heart of Hollywood, but in a quiet side street. Communication with landlord regarding key exchange was very easy. Thanks for everything!
Excellent room, very clean and good location.
Es muy confortable la casa

A wonderful little gem in a quiet residential neighbourhood.  There were snacks and drinks provided by Eloisa and Jean Pierre which is very thoughtful of them.  If you like parks, Wilderness Park is located about 15-20 mins walking and is a pleasant way to spend a little time in nature.   I didn’t have too much time to explore the neighbourhood so I can’t fairly say if it’s walkable-except for the park.  
Either way I would like to stay here again if the opportunity arises.

We arrived at Mei's house so early(7 a.m.) but you guys welcomed us. I appreciate again^^♥ Our room is very modern and comfortable and clean. Even there are some fresh foods like apples, bananas, tangerine and 2 sprites! And when we leave LA, we can ride William's car so we could go UnionStation so easy! I am so sorry that we came back house so late(one day we went 11p.m.)!!Thank you for your kindness ♥♥ I hope to see you again~~^^
很好很好的位置和房间,吃饭便利
Decent location close to DTLA

Brandon's home was incredible! The road up to the house is very narrow and curvy, but the view is beautiful. The home is so cute and immaculately decorated - exactly like the pictures! Brandon was so hospitable and catered to our late check in after photographing and driving from a wedding in Chino. This was our first time with an AirBnB location and we are sooo excited to book more, however, Brandon's home set the bar high and we will always compare it to future locations! Thank you Brandon!

What an amazing place!  And what a fantastic host!  My CEO and I just finished a 3 week stay with Jane at Beach Chic Living, and it was perfect.  We came to LA to expand our company, so we needed someplace quiet for work, but close to Santa Monica’s restaurants/nightlife to entertain our Silicon Beach client base.  Beach Chic Living had it all and more.
 
The house is gorgeous: totally stylish, super clean, and extremely comfortable.  The pictures don’t do it justice.   The beds, the linens, the amenities, were all top notch and the neighborhood is one of the best in LA.  We loved our morning beach runs, the quiet afternoons for “work from home” productivity, and especially the quick/easy access to nearby SM/Venice hot spots like Bungalow, Sugarfish, and Gjelina.
 
Jane couldn’t have been nicer, more welcoming, or more responsive.  She made sure we were comfortable at all times, kept the house clean and organized, and provided great conversation/laughs over a few take-out dinners at home.
 
The only drawback to the place is the somewhat spotty cell service inside her house.  But that was easily resolved by texting or stepping outside for longer calls.
 
We highly recommend Jane’s Beach Chic Living and hope to return very soon.  Whether your trip is for vacation or work…you should stay here….you will love everything about it!

I enjoyed my stay at this downtown studio. The place was immaculate. Lightning and decor made it felt bright and new. There was no designated parking but public transportation was literally steps away. The property was well maintained and secure so it felt very safe. Location was great close to Staples center. Booking and checking in/out was seamless. I appreciated our hosts hospitality and would definitely stay again.

Vinnie was an excellent host. He was very friendly and welcoming. I arrived a bit later than expected cause of the dreaded LA traffic and he accommodated me no problem. Room was exactly as described and very close to the beach and 3rd st. promenade. Full recommendation!
Great place, everything perfect!

This was a wonderful Airbnb experience - the house was beyond our expectations - quiet, welcoming, clean and cozy – it had wine, extra towels, coffee and comfy beds. My husband and I stayed for a weekend to be near family, and we found Heather’s place to be charming and peaceful yet convenient to call home base.  The private backyard was lovely too - with trees and flowers, there's seating to enjoy a book, meal or glass of wine.  There’s even a yoga platform to de-stress (mats available). Several great restaurants and stores nearby too- The Commons was 5 min away...Thanks!!!
Muy buena ubicación! Cerca de todo! Muy lindo barrio

Amazing decorations! This place has wonderful antiques and vintage items in it, I kept finding new things to see daily! I especially loved the wood framed mirror in the bathroom.  Use caution when using the shower, it does get on the floor, there is no shower curtain. The kitchen is very well stocked with almost everything you could need, except food, to cook with! We were just a couple miles from Hollywood Bl and Sunset Bl. The neighborhood was nice to drive through and the neighbors were nice when we saw them. The drive way is tight for a Mid-sized SUV but otherwise, it was great!  i would definitely rent this place again if we were staying in Hollywood, and I would recommend this place to others as well!!!! You will not be disappointed in this place!!!

Maiana’s studio apt is delightful.
Decor is wonderfully rustic and creative.  Oversized shower.  Bed is a full size and very comfortable for one.  The private patio is a wonderful spot for an evening cocktail or morning coffee and a good book.  Apt and patio area are private with a wall of bamboo plants. So pretty!  The activity of the house above can be heard, but not distracting.
I would highly recommend this studio. Easy walk to Echo Park and Lake.  Delightful!
Absolutely perfect, lovely escape from LA, with great views and silence, nice shady areas to sit, hiking nearby - this is the real Topanga at its most charming and grand.
We loved our stay here! The apartment is beautiful, and wonderfully located just a short stroll from the Venice boardwalk and the beach.
Taitu's airbnb is highly recommended - it's a bright, sunny place in a great area. Lots of restaurants, cafes, etc nearby.
Awesome pad awesome peeps

Room was as described. Very clean and spacious. We couldn't have asked for anything else. Andrea was very welcoming and friendly, we didn't have a lot of interaction as we were out all day. The only downfall was it was a bit further away from the beach than expected, (40min walk) but was only about $4 in an uber.
Great place to stay! Stephanie was very quick with responding to our questions and the place was very lovely, very clean. Would stay there again.

Sandra and her cottage were both completely welcoming.  It is a charming home with all the touches necessary for comfort and charm.  An extra nice piece was being let into the cottage a bit early due to a down pour and cancelled plans.  Thank you, kind Sandra!  The property is cozy and set back from the street which makes for a hide-away ambiance and a peaceful setting.  Not knowing Sandra well, I would still guess that she is a very kind and generous person.
