Good location, was exactly as advertised. Hosts were very accommodating
Janet is the greatest host I would recommend here place to everybody and I will come back again perfect 10 spot

Super easy check in, gorgeous back patio, quiet, well stocked, comfy beds, clean, and safe. Incredible value.

We loved our stay here, was comfortable for 3 adults. Yes, the shower is a little short, even for me at 5'5", but that was negligable among the countless great features of this place. 

Highly recommended!

Nice place , Santa Monica beach nearby.
A little bit too small for a family of 4 people; for a couple it would be perfect.

Support of owner was great, thank you!
This was a great place to stay, awesome location, and fantastic hosts

Lovely night stay. Great balcony views and relaxing hot tub. The loft was modern and stylish. Comfy place overall with restaurants all around and walking distance to food & drink. Hosts were very welcoming. Only con was the noise pollution, you can hear all the drunk ppl and honking cars, although I did stay on a Friday night it may be useful to use ear plugs. Overall nice location with fun amenities.
Thank you for your hospitality and response to our request. We had a great stay and really enjoyed our visit. Would definitely stay with you again!
Great location, nice people
Great location, very clean, responsive hosts - wonderful place to visit Santa Monica!

This place was awesome to stay in! Best location - so much available to walk to around the area which is rare in LA (CVS, Trader Joe’s, SoulCycle, &plenty of food options within 10 min). Felt safe with the 24 hour security. Pool and parking spot were also a major plus. If I come to LA long term I would book here again. So glad I stayed here!

We absolutely loved staying here! Sylviane was very friendly and accommodating. The property is beautiful and has a very peaceful atmosphere. It's also in such a great location with excellent hiking trails so close by. The space was very clean, cozy, and stylish. We will definitely be coming back!

Christopher’s delightful home is a very artistic & cozy oasis in Silver Lake. Guests have privacy w/their own entry, bathroom & a well-stocked breakfast nook. The bed is super comfortable & the (attractively tiled) shower nice & hot. As advertised, there is the marvelous bonus of off-street parking too. 

Christopher is a charming host—every welcoming detail was thought of to make our arrival & stay more pleasant! It felt like staying w/old friends. 

The garden is lovely also, & if the weather were right, guests could savor some coffee/tea/wine in the landscaped sitting areas. All this literally just steps up the street from trendy Sunset Blvd.! Suffice it to say, we had an excellent time & would be happy to return to Christopher’s charming home when back in LA.
Nice cozy room.  Miriam is a wonderful host.  Very warm and welcoming and gives you space to relax after travelling.

The studio unit was clean, charming, and inviting!  It was roomy, and recently refurbished, it seemed to me. The wood and tile floors throughout were shiny and fresh. I slept well. There is a small fenced outdoor area, which my chihuahua and I enjoyed. 
Access was private and well-lighted. Emma's key entry system was simple to use. Parking is a city challenge, but you can pay $8.00 at the corner gas station.
I felt safe and comfortable, and will stay there again when I am in town.
Very clean and comfort house,Alice and Neville are friendly.
Close to all the nice restaurants and close to grove mall. Nice area and the house was comfortable!
Just perfect. In a great area, close to transit, and walking distance to shops, restaurants, and the movie theatre. A perfect Old Hollywood bungalow
Awesome place! Great creative hosts!
Great location, close to everything. Very easy check-in and free garage parking.
Nancy was a great host! She replied quickly to every message, she was attentive, and very kind! Her dog, pumpkin, was so cute and very friendly.
Great location, easy parking and privacy in a nice quiet neighborhood. That was what we were looking for and what we got. Recommended.
Always enjoy stating at my favorite spot in Venice and this was no exception. You will always be happy here. Brought my wife this time and she is ready to move in for good!
Awesome little studio

Great location in the middle of Downtown, will lots to do and great shopping nearby. House is VERY spacious and very little noise from street or neighbours.

Al was great with communication leading up and throughout the stay. Would very happy stay there again.

We had very comfortable stay at jay house.
The beds were very comfortable and very clean room and bathroom. Jay and his wife are very friendly and welcoming to their home. However, this is a new experience for me to use Airbnb , it was good experience.

George was an awesome host. Extremely hospitable and kept on giving me tips of things I should do or check out while I was there. His place is fantastic great for just hanging out or exploring the surrounding beaches and bars.

Beautiful home with all the amenities in upscale, quiet neighborhood. Ron is an exceptional host very professional and helpful. I hope to meet Sky next time. Thanks Ron for a very pleasant stay. I’d definitely book again.
Clean, basic, good value for money room in a good location! Would recommend
In the hills of Beverly Hills. House is as advertised. Good hosts

Very cozy place to stay! The only thing is we wish there was a microwave. We ate out a few times and had to heat things up the old fashioned way. 
Thank you so much for letting us into your nice guest house :)

-Naomi & Jake

Steve's place is awesome and I had a wonderful time. Everything in the loft is of high quality and the place is super clean. It has all the amenities I needed and a cool balcony. The place is close to restaurants and bars and is safe. It is also very bright and airy. Highly recommended!

convenient location but would not recommend to families due to the following reasons:
1. filled with smell of marijuana. i think the smell is coming from the next door. if you are visiting from countries where marijuana is inexcusably bad and you are sensitive about marijuana, I would not recommend.

2. very loud volume on weekends: the next door started blasting music from 7PM til 2AM on Friday night.
Enjoy them if you have the guts to do so otherwise, you cannot sleep.

3. sharing 2bedrooms with a stranger: if you have a child and he/she isn’t used to interacting with foreigners, this may not be the place as you may end up sharing the living space with another guest.

Overall, its located in a very convenient place and it’s nice and clean.
Most people will be outside for more than 12-16 hours a day so if you are seeking for a convenient location, go for it.
I had a great time staying here. It's very quiet, private and comfortable. The view from the terrace is beautiful. Kara is an incredible host and very helpful.
Very hospitable.

Best airbnb I've stayed at and for whatever reason it was a third the price I usually pay.  Everything you need is in this comfortable, clean & quiet room.  Many restaurants and stores are within a couple blocks, but it's still quiet.  The bed is longer than it looks and Kara is sweet

Amara was super accommodating with my arrival time.  when I needed.  Everything was clean, tidy and easy to understand.  Every day I admired the lovely pool-side setting - but with unseasonably cold January weather, could not enjoy it.  The location is quiet at night and easy to park one car.  The location can reach many key roads quickly.  Entry and exit felt private.  Amara is great with prompt communications.  This is an outstanding little studio.
From our first moment , I knew it would be a lovely memory.  The breeze, the atmosphere, the smiles from our hosts .. We laughed & shared life for a bit . I’ll never forget the kindness ..
We really enjoyed our stay here. The apartment was spotlessly clean and exactly as advertised. It is in a great location, just 5 minutes walk from Sunset Boulevard.

Evelyn's loft is fantastic. It was a unique experience to be able to live in one of the most historic buildings in Hollywood. The building is one of the quietest places I've ever lived, and the 24-hour security staff were always friendly and helpful. Some of the best features of the apartment are the upscale appliances, comfortable bed, and DirecTV package with lots of channels. I found it to be an ideal place for both relaxation and productivity (it even has a printer available for use).

If you ever need to stay in the heart of Hollywood, I wholeheartedly recommend Evelyn's place. It's tough to beat!

Public Service Announcement:
Keep the house keys on you at all times. Do not adhere to the hosts rules, when it comes to them. If you do, you may find yourself in a very sketchy situation. Please take my word for it.

After a VERY rough two months and four bad experiences in said months, Lena’s home was exactly where I should’ve been the whole time. The privacy and autonomy I had were one hundred percent ideal. Beautiful home, easy to access kitchen, great amenities like the gym and pool.

However, I should say two things about the spot for prospective travelers. One is that the street parking is a nightmare, more so on nights before street cleaning, and the spots are often disadvantageous to anyone with a car bigger than compact.

Furthermore, Lena’s husband was VERY rude to me on the last day. He gave me 15-20 minutes’ notice to leave, even as I was preparing to check out. He was belligerent and intimidating in a way that he hadn’t been at all in the previous two weeks, making me feel as if I’d done something wrong. I had to call to make sure I could come earlier to my next spot.

Other than these two sidenotes, this was a very pleasant experience that capped of one of the most stressful living situations of my life.

I really loved having my own place with kitchen facilities.  I  highly recommend the place!!!
Super petite annexe, très pratique; Marine et Barry ont vraiment pensé à tout pour que le visiteur puisse profiter pleinement  du séjour à Long Beach.
Excelente estadia, tudo conforme anunciado! Bem localizado. Recomendo!
Stephan was great to us! His house was clean and very cosy. We definitely are saving this listing for future projects. Great communication and understanding. Loved this place!
I loved staying at Sandra's place, she's a wonderful host and her dog is very sweet. Location of the house is convenient and I also got to borrow her bike for transportation. Great experience!
Great location! Loved the hot tub, and the general environment.... made for such a relaxing weekend!
非常满意
Levi was super helpful. House was exceptionally clean and well stocked for guests!

We had a fantastic stay at Lauren's studio. The location is brilliant, a few blocks away from Sunset Boulevard's independent restaurants, cafés and shops. The studio is spotless and charming, with nice personal touches and all you need to cook if you wanted to; it felt really private. Lauren is a lovely host, she's been very helpful and accommodating. We're very pleased and would love to come back.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Location is great. You are close to the Venice attractions, while still feeling away from it all. The space was comfortable and relaxing. This listing is also family friendly and Linda provided a crib for our 15 month old son.  Also free parking!
Tiffany is an excellent host! Very friendly and very helpful. The place is super clean too! This was my second time staying with her and I'll definitely come back!
Very nice room and responded very quick to all my questions. Thank you.

James' has an amazingly great personality, the real life person sounds completely different from online chats and voice calls. Has a lot of great recommendations for places to go and things to do. The overall location of the place is actually very good, you are within 10 min walking distance to the most popular streets in LA and a train station + a fly away from/to LAX is also within 15 walking distance away. Ultimately if there was another concert at the Palladium, I actually would 100% go back to James' place if I could.
Beautiful place, very spacious with great amenities and a wonderful view. Maria was really nice and overall was a phenomenal experience!

This reservation was as advertised -- house was very clean and comfortable, with plenty of room. We didn't make use of the pool as the weather turned before we got a chance, but it looked nice. One of the owners met me to give me the key, and that was simple to arrange. Only two things to note (both of which are in the listing): only 1.5 baths and they have a "strict" policy for cancellation and adjustment (i.e., no adjustment in schedule allowed at all and from making the reservation until 1 week before only 50% refund; then no refund).
Great place. Everything as describe. Very well located and super clean.
The house is very nice and well laid out. Nice patio in back. Hosts were very helpful and accommodating. I would certainly stay here again.
All you could ask for: great location, very clean, and very easy check in process.
Reality great home! One of the best Restaurants out there and a very good neighbourhood!
Very nice host. Everything was great!!!!

Daniel's place is truly a peaceful haven, away from the bustling big town, but it is still very centrally located. We came by car and  Daniel made sure there was a parking pass  for street parking for us.  The house is sparkling clean, every comfort is available,  the checking in went smoothly and we even got to meet our host. We recommend Daniel's place highly.

I enjoyed my stay at Michelle's place. The space is good-sized, clean, and comfortable. I had everything I needed for a weeklong stay. Michelle and Lorraine are very friendly and hospitable- they'll give you a tour of everything when you check in. If you have a car, there's street parking available, but it can be tough to find a spot late at night. It was really nice to have laundry onsite as well. I would recommend their place!

This place is great if you are in LA for a job. I loved it. Stacey is the perfect host. She is super accommodating and quick to answer any question you might have. She obviously cares a great deal about making your stay as nice as possible. 

The building itself ( the guest house of a Neutra ranch)  is clean, comfortable and incredibly well-appointed.  You can tell a great deal of care went into the choosing of everything from the art on the walls to the towels and bedding. 

And, having spent two weeks in South Pasadena, I now know why so many people want to move there. So quiet and beautiful, it’s a great place to come home to after a long day  in LA. 

If you get a chance to stay here, do it. You won’t be disappointed. 5 stars!

Staying at Paul’s was amazing. Paul kept the place super clean and fresh, we were really comfortable. There were extras of everything we could possibly need in the room and the bed was really comfortable. We would recomend to stay here to anyone!

We had a great stay at Anthony's place. The location is very close to everywhere you'll ever need to get to and he responded promptly to messages. Downstairs neighbours were a bit loud late into the night but this was only for a small portion of the trip and has no reflection on Anthony or his place. Very lovely space with great amenities.
Great location with a good layout for 4-5 adults, the deck and staircases weren't very safe for kids but everything else was excellent
Top top host !! Will not find a better priced apartment in this area of Hollywood, will visit again and again.

Klaudiya's place is really great! The location is perfect for going to the La Brea Tar Pits, LACMA, the Grove , or restaurants on Wilshire. Klaudiya was very nice and provided warm and cold water for me to use while I was there. Everything was clean and tidy. The apartment complex also has a gym you could go to! Highly recommended!

El alojamiento es una casa muy moderna y bien equipada en un lugar bastante exclusivo de Hollywood. Es seguro y tranquilo. Tiene un dormitorio principal que se separa del resto de la casa con una gran cortina (tipo Loft). Tuvimos un problema con las pilas del control central de la calefacción (invierno) y en minutos llego una persona a resolverlo. Es una casa espectacular.
Nice little place to stay. Very close to the beach. Highly recommended!
Geir was great with helping us get aquatinted with the location and flexible with our arrival times.  He made his space open to us, and was friendly throughout our stay.

Hillary's place was just as described. A perfect location to explore Hollywood and Universal Studios. We loved the beautiful view of the hills and the absolute quiet. Parking was a breeze in the driveway, the beds were very comfortable and the shower was strong and relaxing. It was everything we wanted and more than we expected. Would definitely recommend and stay again anytime we're back in the area.

Everything was clean and ready for us when we got there, didn't see Glecy for check in but she came later on. Very nice and welcoming home/Host , would definitely stay here again when I come back! Would recommend it to anyone that is just trying to stay somewhere that feels like home.☝

The place is spacious and convenient, close to downtown LA, Santa Monica beach, and many restaurants and shops. The check-in instruction was not available on the AirBnB page, so I would recommend reaching out to Monica prior to the stay.

Matt was a wonderful host! The place was close to everything we needed to go to (Fashion District). It was clean, stylish & comfortable (especially the beds!). I loved that we were getting solutions to our questions (i.e. early check-in and late check-out) really quickly! I would book this again!
Best place to stay so far, feels like home and the host family is really kind and nice. I would definitely book again.

Nous avons passé un super moment. Appartement avec beaucoup de charme et bien équipé. 
Nous avons apprécié la proximité de la plage et la possibilité de garer sa voiture facilement grâce à une place de parking qui nous était dédié.
Cheery little one bedroom casita. Perfect for exploring the neighborhood. Lots of great bars, clubs, restaurants within easy walking distance. Friendly hosts and comfy bed!
An amazing loft! Very chic and trendy! Also very comfortable!
xxx

A perfect place to gather with friends: so much natural light, the ocean at your feet, and a wonderful location. The interior was clean and beautiful and the kitchen was well-stocked. Couldn't have been better!
Booked this for an employee to stay in for a couple nights. Great location and worked perfectly for my needs. Owner was able to accommodate a last minute booking and was very communicative.
The host was very hospitable and the room was very nice.

Barbara’s place fit our need perfectly; it was very close to where we needed to be. It was clean, comfortable, and had all the amenities we needed and more. Barbara was a great host and we would stay there again if we visit the area again.

This is the best place to stay in downtown LA. Cosy stylish apartment. It also had the MOST comfy beds. Central to everything, including food, bars and shopping. The pool is great fun and the atmosphere is very safe, calm and relaxing! Great for a happy stay!

We had a great stay with California Dream Homes, and couldn't recommend it enough. The location was perfect, and the house well appointed. We were so sad to leave, and would definitely recommend this home to anyone looking for a relaxing stay in Santa Monica.

We had so much fun staying in Darren’s home. The views were stunning and we would not have had the same experience of LA or West Hollywood anywhere else.  Darren was very hospitable and was a joy to talk to, and he also has an adorable dog named Chloe. There was complementary coffee, and snacks. The room itself was beautiful, and the house was stunning and very clean. We will definitely be staying here again on our next visit to LA.

Wow! Our stay at James and Brittney’s place was remarkable. As their first goaround as AirBnB hosts, these two welcomed us to their beautiful (this word doesn’t do it justice) place! The room is so much more than described! Truly epic, and their common area is immaculate. They travel a lot, and it shows in their decoration. Beautiful, marvelous place, a few minutes walk to Santa Monica and Venice!

The place is great, but what about the hosts? Even better than the place. They came to greet us, showed us around the place, and just treated us like friends. Gave us lots of great recommendations, brought sweet snacks every day, and had the most loving conversations. James’s heritage story is amazing, and he’s too eager to share, just like the place! I wish we could’ve stayed a bit longer to hang with them a little longer, but now that we met, the opportunity has been created!

True pioneers of this platform, these two! Love you both!

Perfect place to stay in Venice. Tony, Claudia and their dog (so cute) are great hosts. The cottage is pretty spacious with lovely interieur. The beach is in walking distance and Tony also provides free beach cruiser bikes.
Buen lugar muy económico, tomar en cuenta que el baño lo compartirás con otros huéspedes de otra habitación

The best thing about this place is the host. Very good and nice people. And the place is amazing. So many small amenities and all were taken care of. Felt like living at home with every thing there already. And the host was great to put so much extra stuff in the fridge for us like as simple as milk for cereal. Keurig coffee maker for coffee... So so so many good things. Very very good people too. We forgot some stuff after we checked out and host was very nice enough to send us pictures and let us know. This experience by far my best in Airbnb. And I have had more than 50 times used Airbnb... All I got to say to the host is Thank you so very much.

Cari is a lovely, personable host; we enjoyed our stay with her & meeting her family.  The cottage is very cozy & comfortable in a lovely garden back yard.  She had the kitchen stocked with great healthy breakfast treats, which included good coffee!!  She was very accessible & helpful with many helpful suggestions.  THANK YOU!

A design dream with stunning views over LA. The guest house is spacious, stylish and very well located (15 min to DTLA and 20 min to Hollywood). Plus the owners really go the extra mile with little details to make you feel welcome and homely. If you want the true LA experience, look no further and book now!
Ok!!
greathouse responds fast text very helpful
The place was really nice. Very quiet and convenient location in WeHo. It’s a great size for a weekend getaway for 2-3 people. The space was clean and had everything we needed.

This is what Airbnb was meant to be! A friendly person opening up their home to you and making a new friend. Also getting to meet their family learn about where they come from and learn about what they believe in. I don't think I'll ever have a better Airbnb experience!

Now if you're shy and you want seclusion you've chosen the right place. However, if you stay in your room the entire time you'll miss out on meeting one of the most beautiful people you'll ever meet. Inside and out.

Rebekah (or Beks, as you'll come to know) is an Australian goddess. Age defying radiant beauty covering a genuinely kind person. What could be better?!? 

On top of that, she's got a great family. Her daughter Tia is wise beyond her years, and happy to help you have a great stay. Her father Brendan will keep you laughing.  

I am definitely going to stay again. Quite literally already am. 

This space is cozy and perfect for a couple and their dog! The shower is perfect pressure too. Also you get to use her laundry facilities. 

I loved the area too. Right near a Jack on the box if you need fast food within walking distance. Driving distance to a great burger and wing joint called Master Burger. 

The International House of Beks is truly truly an international House of kindness and friendship. You'll remember this place. It's a dream come true
Great location and they are great people!

Jack's place is one of those that is booked well in advance.  My party of three had intended to book his Master bedroom, but it was already booked up three months in advance, so we stayed in the smaller bedroom next door for the first four out of eight nights of our total stay.  It is a nice and cozy bedroom with a large bathroom.  This is our second time staying at Jack and Katherine's place and we definitely see ourselves coming back in the future when we are in the area again.  Their place is always nicely well kept and their hospitality is amazing.  Very easy and convenient to go in and out of their home via all keypad locks.  It is always a pleasant surprise to see what is in the common refrigerator for breakfast.  Items included avocados, salads, juice, etc.  Bread, peanut butter, bananas, tea, instant noodles are always available in the kitchen/dining area.  I highly recommend Jack and Katherine's place to anyone looking to stay in the 626 area.
Good place

My wife and I stayed at Sandra's fantastic studio for an entire month in March, it was everything we wanted and more!! Not only did Sandra & her family warmly welcome us & our cat Rico, but she went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we could need.
Communication was quick and easy from the time we booked all the way through our stay. Sandra wanted to ensure we had our complete privacy, while remaining very involved for all our needs.
Sandra has put a lot of effort & love towards making this Airbnb the ideal long or short-term getaway, and it shows:
The studio is connected to her main house by a common door in the garage, but otherwise it's completely private. We had our own little world, and plenty of space for two people and a cat (could have had a 3rd person in there easily). The place looks exactly like in the pictures, if not even better!! Plenty of natural light, very very clean, super comfortable bed (important!), and a small balcony overlooking the street and the park across from us. There is even a gas fireplace, and the TV has infinite channels.
Aside from the very tasteful aesthetics, what really stood out for us was the level of attention Sandra has put into fully stocking this studio for every need we required. There was great wifi, a printer and business supplies, tons of fresh towels, extra blankets, plenty of closet space, and a fully stocked kitchen ready to host a dinner party!! From the wine glasses, dishes, cookware & appliances, we challenge anyone to need something that isn't already THERE!
On day 3, I cut myself cooking and there were even bandaids in the cupboard. Doesn't sound like a big deal, but it speaks volumes about the level of detail and thought put into this place. Sandra cares about you!!
Here's a quick recap.
GOOD:
- easy private indoor parking
- best host ever
- super clean
- optimized & clever layout
- super safe neighbourhood (mostly families)
- great location (7 minute drive to Venice, 15 minute drive to Beverly Hills)
- huge park across street, with outdoor workout machines
- optimal for business travellers (supplies & wifi)
- whole foods & starbucks is a 2-minute drive away

BAD (if we had to find some!):
- street can get busy during rush hours as it's a main artery. not even a big deal, but we had to find something!
- um, that's pretty much it, lol, seriously

WE RECOMMEND:
- 10 min drive to Abbott Kinney Blvd, our favorite street in the USA (coffee @ Intelligentsia, ice cream @ Salt & Straw)
- rent a bike @ Venice Beach and bike the beach to Santa Monica
- find the hidden water canals in Venice (too many people don't even know about this!! Go walk them)
- Go for drinks on the roof of Ace Hotel downtown, what a view!

Much better than I expect it.
Host was really great with a great personality, The host makes sure you have everything you need for a comfortable stay. Best feature of the guest house is the mood lights and the fact that the AC is running and you’re never hot or cold Because everything is set on a Timer Which makes it really great.  I recommend this place It’s great and I most definitely will come back

ENCHANTING, LUSH, PRIVATE... perfect location, quiet residential neighborhood in the "Hills", just a few blocks from Sunset Bldv!  Close to EVERYTHING!  Exceeded our expectations!  Loved it sooo much we didn't want to leave!  Host provided every convenience -- Thank you Pat!!

Great location, close to restaurants and freeway, plenty of parking around, place was very clean, and hosts were very friendly. I had the master bedroom with the private bathroom I felt right at home. I would bump into the host or other guests when walking in and out of the house but everyone was very friendly. Would definitely visit again and recommend to friends in search of a place for a mini getaway.

We had a wonderful stay at Matthews house. The pictures don't do the place justice, it is beautifully restored and the view from the back deck is amazing. Something particularly noteworthy about this place is how well stocked the kitchen is. We cooked a bunch, and were supplied with everything we needed and more. Another awesome part was how walkable the neighborhood is. The house is up a very steep hill, but there are alternate routes you can take to get down to Sunset where there is a grocery store and tons of shops. Would definitely love to come stay again!

Katie and Will were great hosts and were patient with me when I had to check in later than expected. Their overall place is really cute, but I especially loved the privacy of the room we stayed in. I didn’t know what to expect with the pullout couch, but the mattress was really comfortable! If there was a bathroom in the room itself, it would’ve been amazing, but we didn’t see it as too inconvenient. We got to say hi to their adorable kids everytime we went in anyway! Access to room was very easy and didn’t feel like we were bothering anyone coming in and out. You can’t beat the value of this place. We would love to stay again!

Dorothy's place was super clean and the showers are nice and hot.
Make sure you are hungry if you go to the Blackbird Cafe and plan on a long walk on the beach afterwards. ThX again
Great place, will book again!

First, I would like to thank Scott and Emily for sharing their home with us. The pictures did no just to how spacious and the beautiful the home & yard was. We did not really communicate throughout our stay however, Scott left his number in case we needed anything. The home is about 10 minutes (or less) from Hollywood Blvd. Our Uber & Lyft's ranged from $10-12 no matter where we went (downtown LA and Hollywood Blvd) which was perfect. My friends and I decided last minute not to rent a car due to where the location of the home, but when our friends came to visit, the driveway was a major plus. I would definitely stay here again when visiting Los Angeles.
Great place to stay in Burbank.  Easy and convenient.
Mary's place is a great option that is close to everything in Hollywood! It is very clean and easy to get to.

The stay was great! The self check-in and secure parking made everything so much easier. 
The microwave and refrigerator provided in the room came in handy so much. Thomas had even provided water and soda which was very nice of him. With all that was stated above, the fair price makes it even better. 
Something to note however is that it can get hot in the room at times and was kind of a minor issue at first, so it is best to bring light clothes if booked during the summer or warm days. However, this isn't the host's fault, and the room is provided with a portable AC which is enough to keep the room and yourself cool for the rest of your stay. 
Other than that, it was a wonderful experience! Definitely would be staying with Thomas again if I ever come to LA.
Great place. Clean.

We loved staying at Susan and Jim's. The location is ideal: great restaurants and shops are close by on 2nd Street in Belmont Shores, and lots of nice walking in the area. One morning we rented kayaks and explored the nearby Naples canals! 

The apartment is quiet and lovely, with very comfortable queen size beds,two bathrooms, a well stocked kitchen and a spacious living room. We only had breakfasts there but could have easily made all of our meals. Use of the laundry room and garage was a bonus. 

Communication with Jim and Susan was excellent from start to finish. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area, and highly recommend this to other guests.
Exelente ubicacion para nuestro intinerario
Merci beaucoup
房东人很好,房子很干净,周围很方便也很便利｡推荐!!!

We had a great time at the carriage house ! The location is great to visit Hollywood and Los Angeles and close to the subway. Checking in and out was very easy, the apartment is very well equipped, especially the kitchen. If you are visiting LA you can't go wrong by booking this house ! Thank you for hosting us !
Eve is a kind host with a comfortable apartment in a great location

Very good and safe location, a small kosher supermarket and many coffee shops are within walking distance on Pico avenue, overall the apartment feels comfortable, Netflix, internet, easy parking space and the kitchen has new and clean appliances (key point for my wife)
Great hospitality, nice area.
Jina will make your experience an absolute pleasure.
Nice place.
Robins place was great! The bed was super comfortable, the bathroom was very clean, check in was flawless, all around great experience!
Great and quite location. The room is nice, clean and new. Dee was very helpful. We really like that place.

Het huisje dat David verhuurt is uniek op de wereld. Kijk maar naar de foto's van de advertentie. David was op zijn terrein bezig, dus we hebben hem regelmatig gesproken. Op dat terrein staan meerdere huisjes voor de verhuur, die zelf gemaakt zijn. Allemaal even inventief. David is een cradle-to-cradle man in hoe hij zijn terrein en zijn huizen onderhoudt.
Topango is een hele leuke plaats, een beetje alternatief, on-Amerikaans. Het strand, op 10 minuten afstand (met de auto), waar veel gesurfd wordt, is klein maar fijn.

We thoroughly enjoyed our five nights at Jaqueline's place. The location is perfect for studio hopping and touring LA, with free parking and a pool, the rooms are bright, clean, and comfortable. Jaqueline provided us with muffins, fruit, and coffee and was available for any questions. We'll definitely stay here the next time we visit LA and will recommend it to all our friends and family.
Comfortable and convenient for several LA attractions without strictly needing a car. Well appointed and stocked. Thanks!

Brooke is the best! 
Available and VERY friendly. 
Has provided for ALL my questions or requests! 

This is a great place to stay!
Great area, and close to so much!

Noelle is a kind, gracious host offering a no frills space right off the beach. Easy access to the board walk (1 block), your own parking space, a comfy California king, sink and stool connected to your room, shared shower at the end of the hall. Nice restaurants literally steps away. Noelle pointed us in the right direction for great pizza for Sweet 16 basketball. Easy walk to Main Street. Muscle Beach & Santa Monica Pier. Great communication. Noelle will tell you where to park, give you keys to front door & your room. Great value. However, if a water bong in the front yard, drugs consumed or homeless  people on the streets around you then Venice Beach is not where you’ll be comfortable staying. We loved that Noelle opens a spot in her carport for a painter friend to pitch his tarp the rainy night we arrived.
La maison de Mark vaut le détour ! C'est un véritable galerie d'objets en tout genre.  Mark s'est montré très sympathique et disponible pour répondre à nos messages.
Great experience, the room is very clean, I hope next time have the opportunity to go
Has a great location close to everything in Hollywood!

Christiane’s place is a little gem.  A (very) short walk to Abbott Kinney and Venice beach and yet hidden away on quiet street. Perfect.  The place itself is fantastic and feels newly done and clean.  Very light and airy, with great outdoor spaces.   The bed is superb, as is the shower.   And there is plenty of wardrobe and storage space.  The kitchen has all the accessories you would need to comfortably cater for yourself if all the nearby fantastic restaurants inspire! 

Christiane was a superb host.  Answering questions almost immediately and checking in to make sure we were comfortable, and had all we needed.  Check in/out were both super straight forward.  

Highly recommend.

This was a nice secluded area. But still had stores around the area. Wildflower cafe was pretty good for breakfast, and the walk to the beach was an easy walk. We brought our daughter and she even liked the space!

I absolutely loved it here. It by far exceeded our expectations! It was just what we were looking for and more. They were very quick to respond to any questions and concerns we might have had. The check-in was such a breeze and the home was just overall fantastic! We will stay here in the Cozy Home next time we visit California. Great price!
Such an enjoyable experience. Great location. Very relaxing and comfortable. Outdoor shower experience was wonderful!

My husband and I were in a bit of a pickle. This host took us in last minute and the lodges were gorgeous, clean and host was incredibly welcoming... everything you need is in walking distance. Inside and out it is beautiful.
We really enjoyed our stay at this adorable cottage! Tons of charm and character and the location was great. Kristina was very welcoming and responsive.

Good host
Very kind and perpect house.
Truly a perfect place to get the full Venice Beach experience. Would definitely recommend.
Wonderful stay, would highly recommend.
These ladies are great hosts.
BRILLIANT

Gillan's place was as close to perfect as it could get. It was almost exactly like the pictures.  It was in a nice quiet area. The only issue we had was getting to the studio on the first day but Gillan provided a map for us with the route we should take outlined and we were perfectly fine after that. I cannot wait to go back to LA so I can stay here again!
Excellent and value stay. The apt complex is very nice with friendly people and pool and hot tub and gym. And nice to walk around in and the apartment itself was awesome..
Studio confortable qur Venice Boulevard. Il fait prendre la voiture ou le bus pour aller à Venice Beach mais se fait très facilement. Le plus la place de parking et la piscine dans l'immeuble
Very cute space, but it’s too close to the neighbors so you can’t really enjoy the space.

Sandy's guest home was just perfect for us. It's clean, stylish, quiet and has all the amenities you require. Sandy left lots of information about LA and the local area, and checking in and out was really easy too. I was so touched thay Sandy went out of her way and got me a magazine from my country too. The area is really lovely and is perfectly located: close to several supermarkets and a short drive to various touristy and retail areas. Highly recommend!

This place is amazing! They have delicious passion fruit growing in the front yard.  My partner locked me out rand Linda heard me knocking. She got her son to give me a key which saved my life! I had just came from the airport. The place is amazing and the bed has inspired us to get one that size of our own.  We didn’t spend more than $20 on a lyft or Uber from here to most of the city: it’s very centrally located!! If you’re a bigger person the shower is a little narrow! So it can be hard to get in and out of.  It’s a little dark in the place, but can just open the windows.  Overall, it’s an amazing and we will be staying here again next time we are back.

We booked this place very last-minute, and Michael was very quick & friendly in communicating. He came to meet us to show us the place and was available via phone all the time. The neighborhood is well-suited for a visit to LA, with plenty of street parking right outside. The bungalow itself is in an enclosed courtyard with loads of flowers, and the bungalow itself has everyting you need: it's spatious and perfectly clean. All in all well recommended!

We absolutely loved our time here.  It was clean, comfortable, and well appointed.  Several small touches, like fresh cut flowers, plenty of coffee and water, and treats in the fridge made it extra special.  The temperature was perfect and easy to control.  Being right on the beach was incredible, and beach access is only 4 houses down.  You can see sea lions and dolphins right from the deck.  Towels and linens were clean and plentiful and it was nice to have beach towels and chairs, which we did in fact use.  The efficiency kitchen was more than suitable for us to be able to cook breakfast every morning, a nice money saver while on a long vacation.  Connie was warm and accessible, we appreciated her flexibility on the timing of our check in since we were traveling.  I would love to stay at this property again.  We both really loved it and are grateful for the experience.
Great place - highly recommend

Very private, in a converted garage separate from the house with very nice bathroom and two beds. You get a gate opener to come in and have parking right there.  You can come and go as you please day or night.  You have a private door to the garage area that has been converted to a kitchen.  I used the fridge and the micowave.  Wi Fi hook up is there also.  I will use again for I visit there  for family and work.

We had such a lovely stay at Chad and Lara's cabin. It was perfectly equipped for a quiet retreat in the beautiful Topanga. Check in and communication was seamless and the cabin itself was perfect and very stylish. Hope to come back soon! Thanks for a lovely stay!

This is our second stay at Evangeline's bungalow. She is super pleasant and attentive. You can tell that she takes great pride in being a Superhost!  The place is sparkling clean and quiet. The added touches like bathrobes and kitchen supplies and a comfy heater in the bathroom were much appreciated. We can't wait to stay with Evangeline again when we come back to visit our kids in Burbank!

Pros: walking distance to beach and pier. Very close to restaurants. Great pool. Super Plus!!

Cons: the biggest negative was that it was filthy. My baby crawled on the rug and her pjs were black on the knees and sleeves. I felt a film on my feet. I have 3 young children and was disappointed as the reviews said how clean it was. We found a steak knife in one of the sofa cushions. The bed sheets smelled like they had not been washed. The sliding glass doors of the bathroom were sitting in the closet. The bathroom rugs looked like they were left there from the 90s. I would have called Sofia but with 3 small kids and limited time, just didn’t bother. Also, we chose and Airbnb for the convenience and comfort of a home. But the kitchen was pretty bare with plates. The balcony was pretty nice and would have loved to have used it but no patio furniture! It just was not very homey. For what we paid, comparatively speaking, good price but it wasn’t cheap. You dont get much for Your money.    

The place is great, I think, if you are with friends but not super great for families - in my opinion.

The home was absolutely lovely! Jerry was wonderful and so is his home. He was very quick to respond, sweet, nice, and checked in on us and asked how things were. Such a great host. The home itself was LOVELY!! Very stylish, the beds were so comfortable, the bathrooms were spotless and very pretty! I absolutely loved his home and will definitely be coming back the next time we are in the area. Thanks so much Jerry!

Yolanda was great - she gave us detailed instructions on how to access the apartment. Also her guidebook (available on the AirBnB page) gives a good list of cafes etc to visit for breakfast/lunch. The apartment is beautiful, clean and matches the pictures and description accurately.
Great place. Quick Uber from many attractions and landmarks. WiFi went out for a bit but David quickly helped us get it back on. Overall, great stay.

Stayed at Olga's place for a night, and it sleeps 6 people comfortably. Check in was simply and 2 available parking lots was convenient. However, do note that if your vehicle has a higher clearance like most SUVs, you might not be able to fit through the gate into the garage.

I've stayed at Brian's place two times now when traveling to L.A. for work. Great guy with excellent communication and recommendations. The space has been clean and welcoming both times and this area of Echo Park is perfect! Must try Valerie Bakery right down the street for breakfast. Only a minute walk from Airbnb!
Great host! Very generous and open would definitely stay again!
We had a wonderful weekend

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the tiny house. Equipped with everything you need. It is bigger than it looks with room for our 2 suitcases and we stayed 7 nights. It was fairly cold when we stayed but the heater was efficient and quickly warmed up the space. We used as a base and drove to all the sights and beaches. Nats cafe was great for breakfast just a couple of blocks away. There is a dog hotel on site, very little noise from the doggos. Located in a quiet neighborhood with off road parking. The shopping centre is really handy with lots of shops and eateries. Would recommend for a short or a longer stay.
Very nice ladies and the bed was super comfortable.

If you're going to a show at the Hollywood Bowl, there really isn't a better place. Easy, super cute design and Ben was very communicative through the whole process. We would love to stay here again, next time we're at the bowl.
Exactly what we needed for our short stay in LA!
The apartment is cozy and has great views of the valley!

The place described was accurate and better I'd have to say. The host was very prompt in communication.  We loved the spaciousness of the home. Despite the heater not working during our time,  Jill took rolled out extra blankets and portable heaters for us.  The location of the home is the best part. If you're looking to eat well, shop a lot, and get pampered,  this is a great place to stay at for all the things you'd want to do is walking distance.
Its nice
Minor hiccups but definitely a great value for the price!!
Clean. Comfortable. Convenient. A repeat stay for us and we will return again.
Casa impecable. quizá demasiado. estuvimos muy agusto. Gente agradable.
Good place to stay at

I spent a lovely few days at Robin's place with friends.   The location in the middle of West Hollywood is perfect with only a five minute walk to lots of shops, gyms and restaurants .  The house itself is clean, bright and cheery and well supplied with all conveniences - bathrooms are newly remodeled and the kitchen is large and offers a full range of appliances and accessories.  Robin & Ania were very easy to reach and check in was seamless.  Totally recommended!
A great place to stay especially if you like cats, there is a friendly four-legged co host that will welcome you! :)
Sabrina&Damian are fantastic.  Absolutely gorgeous space to stay in... beautiful grounds and landscaping, and a clean, quiet and beautiful guesthouse in one of the most beautiful parts of Pasadena.

Gual is very nice but the apartment not so much. When we arrived we had to wait on her too meet us. We had to call and call and call. There was no toilet paper. I texted her and asked was there anymore, she texted back an entire  day later. Saying she “thinks there was some”....there wasn’t. There was no bath soap. What is listed as 2 balconies is only one. And there were roaches that just started coming out of everywhere.

The place was very clean, the beds were comfortable. We found the place to be very centrally located to plenty of restaurants downtown. Be aware that the building is located right next door to Good Samaritan hospital, so there is the possibility of ambulance traffic, but I did not find the noise levels to be louder than expected for a downtown area. we had a second vehicle with us, and public parking proved to be a little tricky even on a Sunday, so if you are in a rush, factor in some time for that.
Donna is AMAZING!!! She is so sweet and a great host!! Her dog Penny is the cutest dog in the world.. We would definitely stay here again!

The house itself was quaint, and the perfect size for what we needed. It was nice, clean, and comfortable. In addition, Ben, was extremely helpful and polite. The instructions he gave us for the house were very thorough, and he responded to all of our questions quickly. Overall the experience was great.

My kids and I stayed here! Everything was pretty close by as described and communication was great!  Cute place but would recommend stay for no more than 2 people. We didn't mind the couch pull out as my son is only 6, but it would have been uncomfortable for an adult. Everything is as described and would recommend stay.

close to bus station,  easy to call uber as well. 
quick responds via messages and phone calls. 
reasonable price,
thank you so much.
Great location, safe neighborhood, nice courtyard area with fire pit!

It’s a great little space. Nice room upstairs. Has its own bathroom and balcony so it’s unique. They had all the amenities. If not just ask and he’ll provide it. Great time; would definitely come back

My stay at Pilar's home was excellent. The privacy of the room, cleanliness and amenities, and friendliness from the hostesses made this a great experience. I was in LA taking the Step 2CS examination, and was even offered a ride to the test center (5 mins away) on the morning of my test. This made my morning stress free and was a great example of how Pilar goes the extra mile to ensure the comfort of the guests. Highly recommend this to anyone taking the USMLE exam in LA.

My family enjoyed a wonderful vacation at Susan's place.  It's a beautiful, pristine house that offered a place to relax after sightseeing in LA or a day at the beach.  Loved that so many restaurants and shops were an easy walk away!
Great apartment, worked very well for our needs. Thank you Yana!:)

Geena’s home is as pictured! Cozy, clean, and beautiful. It’s near shops and restaurants and not too far from other LA destinations. Her response time was also great. I would stay at her place again in a heartbeat.
Great spot, super clean! Would recommend this place to anyone.

This was my first AirBnB experience and it couldn't have gone better. Patrick was a great host. The place was beautifully designed and had everything I needed to make my LA trip comfortable and easy. I hope to stay there again on future trips.

Perfect for families on vacation. Close to shopping and restaurants. Wifi is good. Close to attractions.

I highly recommend this place.

The host is a kind and caring person made me feel comfortable and warm. This is a very old house, the air-conditioner made big noise when it works,  but anyway it’s a perfect stay, good privacy, well equipment of kitchen, and best location.
Angela est une très gentille femme, très accommodante et prête à rendre service, sa maison est très pratique niveau localisation et dans un quartier très sure, à 10 minutes du métro. Je recommande !!
Great location. There’s so many things to do near there. It was a nice place and would recommend it to anyone.

1. View is nice. 
2. The area was okay, not Marina Del Rey vibe more like a Venice vibe.
3. FREE parking is nearly impossible to find, the parking space assigned will for a very small sedan & if you are parking on weekend I would be careful because there will be another vehicle there on weekends so maneuvering might be difficult. 
4. Pictures of residence are extremely outdated & the residence is outdated as well. I’m not high maintenance but this place really needs some tending to. You can simple walk out to the beach & look around & notice even the outside is not esthetically pleasing. 
5. This would be great place to stay for a single individual hosting other single individuals but I wouldn’t recommend for a family with children due to the lack of cleanliness. I felt very uncomfortable inside, & I left 4 hours into my stay because I wouldn’t be able to sleep well.
6. The TV in the master bedroom wasn’t able to even plug into the wall because of the TV cable length. I have pictures of current status of this residence to further explain this situation. 
7. As stated with others this is not on the beach but a floor above. 


I have stayed in plenty of Airbnb’s & I wouldn’t recommend this place to others. Your money spent can go a lot farther.
M's place was cosy and well situated in Venice. M was also very responsive throughout the stay.
The space is stylish, efficient, and very convenient to the many dining and shopping options available on Glendale Blvd and beyond. Family friendly as well.
This is a great location!! Right in the heart of Santa Monica! :)

This is a beautiful place to stay in LA. The room is very tasteful and the bed is incredibly comfortable with a wonderful view over the city. We found it the best combination of having a peaceful and quiet stay and also to be fast at the beaches (Venice, Manhattan, Santa Monica). Linda is very kind and hospitable.

There is also a supermarket close by and street parket is free and a breeze. Highly recommended!
Lovely space and great location!
Better than nothing! It's just very small. And tight. The bathroom is right where the head of the bed is. Overall it did the job. Just a little space and privacy was needed.

Just a nice place to land...simple but comfortable room, kitchen right there and a private bath.  Good back porch for sitting with a cup of tea and a brisk walk to Sunset Junction.  Best coffee in LA just 4 blocks away.  Janet is very quiet and respectful.  I plan to stay again...this was my second stay.

Sarah’s room was very clean. Very comfy. Very clean bathroom too! I would stay again

房间很干净｡非常舒服｡非常干净的卫生间!我会再次入住｡ Sarah 很友善!

Great home
As pictured
Very comfortable 
I would go back
Great apartment. Great location. Great host. Perfect for a family.

Like so many other reviewers said, this was the best airbnb experience we've had!! It allowed us privacy but also the great company of the warmest people - Griselda and Alex are natural hosts. The only negative was that we weren't able to stay longer!! But we hope to be back. Stay with them, you won't regret it!
Great location and host gave great restaurant tips for the area!
Place was amazing, perfect for some alone time, good views and relaxation! Super quiet and peaceful and they have great amenities to keep you occupied if you want to stay indoors

We loved the apartment! It's designed so cute and while small, it had everything we needed. The bed was super comfy. The bathroom was beautiful and the shower was so luxurious! I also found the kitchen, while tiny, to be really useful - we cooked eggs every morning! We did think a toaster/toaster oven would've been nice. Larissa provided a bunch of snacks and drinks which was such a lovely, generous treat and really appreciated. We also loved the neighborhood and the views from the window were lovely. There is a lot foilage which made it feel pretty private. 

Our only complaint was that the walls felt a little thin. I think maybe someone was on the other side of the internal door at one point and we could hear everything they were saying - almost like being in the same room. That only happened once though. 

We would definitely stay here again if we're in LA!
Well appointed, nice place. Comfy sleep. Super easy to get in and out. Thanks!

GREAT spot! It was neat, clean and comfortable , stocked with all the basic necessities.  Great location!
 I really appreciated the driveway and the nearby park....beautiful!  Ricardo responded quickly whenever I had a question. Loved it and would definitely visit again.

Alicia's studio was perfect! We were in town for a wedding so we traveled all around town for events and such--Alicia's studio was a perfect central location for travelling around the city. The courtyard in front of the studio was adorable and we loved everything about our stay. Thank you Alicia!

Pros:
- Bes is extremely comfortable and it works the best for one person but it can be for two.
- Three Couch is relaxing with a big sitting space.
- Very clean and literally equipped with everything you need.
- TV channels and ultra speed WiFi
- The hosts are very nice people.
- Close to a lot of shops.

Cons:
- The A/C should be above 75F which is not that cold. You may struggle if you like sleeping in a cold place and you have to turn it off if you go out.
- The place is full of stuff so you may feel uncomfortable if you like the open spaces.
- There are two dogs parking every time you go in or out of the house but they are totally separated  from your pathway by a 6 ft vinyl so you may feel uncomfortable.

However, these could be not CONS to other people but I mention that so you can have a good decision. For me, I would stay again :)

We loved our stay at Ron's place! He was completely helpful and detailed in giving us all the arrival info we needed, and was accommodating since our flight arrived after 1 am. Despite tricky residential parking, we loved being in walking distance to the artsy and hip cafes and shops along Washington Blvd, we appreciated the quiet neighborhood, and felt safe walking there at night. The apt is equipped with all the amenities we needed for a 3-day visit, and the bed was super comfy - a relief for someone like me with a bad back. Would happily stay here again next time!

Staying at Angela's was, probably, the best thing of visiting Los Angeles. The room has its private entrance, and it has a private bathroom, which is really nice to have. The room has everything you need and it's size is perfect. The bed is really confy, the smartTV is really entertaining, the kitchen is helpfull and we even had a private fridge to keep our food. 

If you feel like relaxing, you can just sit in the front porch and have a tea cup just feeling the fresh evening breeze: could we ask for anything else to be happy? 

The house is located two block from the Redondo Pier, a few blocks from Hermosa Beach and others beaches, and she even have a couple bikes so you can go wherever you want in the area since there is a bike path al along the coast (from Venice to Long Beach). 

If you are driving, there is free parking at both sides of the street. You can drop your car and walk all the way to lots of stores, shops, restaurants, bars, supermarkets and more. If you are not in a car, there are bus lines that come by close to the house. For example, you can go back and forth to LAX by bus: that is certainly a plus!

Thank you, Angela, for waking us up with coffee (OMG, the smell of coffee in the morming is pure magic!), for the farewell dinner, the dougnuts, your lovely friends to introduced to us, and more. 

Bailey (the little dog) and her co-host Angela are really lovely girls (trust us, you are gonna love "baby bunny" Bailey). There are no words how good you made us feel in the stay!
Perfect location and host are amazing!
Nice place to stay, and very close to the airport
Derricks place was great. Great spot in the heart of weho. Would def stay here again. Great price for the locations. Never met derricks but he was easy to get ahold of. Would stay again
John is a wonderful host. This place is really convenient to the beach and highways. Would love to come back again.

I've now stayed with Phill twice and even brought along my parents this trip. The other guests sharing the space were repeat visitors as well.  That says a lot. 

Not only is the space an absolute dream, but Phill goes above and beyond to ensure you have everything you might need, and more! Each room is cozy and unique, providing all the amenities you would expect. The pool and patio area are perfect for slipping in a bit of tele-work, sipping wine, and relaxing on the comfy and cozy furniture. 


If you love a tranquil atmosphere, beautiful art, gorgeous landscaping, socialization, and a wonderful host, this is the spot for you!

Great place right by the beach and within walking distance to many fun places in Venice. Buz was very easy to get ahold of when needed. Directions for our stay were very clearly communicated. Great trip!! Would very much recommend this vacation rental.
Wonderful space and sparkling clean and friendly hosts, Would 100% recommend!!!
Dory's place was wonderful :) very clean, spacious and close to everything. Dory was very helpful, checking in on us to make sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend :)
Location with terrific access to LAX, Santa Monica and Loyola Marymount campus. Issac is a responsive and hospitable host, very cozy home. It is close to the freeway, so expect some ambient noise.

Wir verbrachten vier super, unkomplizierte, tolle Tage bei Ana und Edgar und ihren erwachsenen Kindern in LA. Sie gaben uns tolle Tipps um die Stadt zu entdecken. Unser Highlight war das Frühstück von Ana. Wir kommen gerne wieder und es ist sehr empfehlenswert.
Visperd's place was really great, clean, comfortable and well decorated. The arrival and departure are really easy. I recomend this place !

It’s a clean and nice place to stay with all the amenities you could want. The location is in a gentrifying neighborhood with some rough spots. I did not feel totally safe walking around here at night, but it’s pretty safe during the day.

This whole place was a great area for family stay. We cooked every day and the kitchen is clean and conevenient. The sofa bed is so soft and large, just as same as the main bed. Michael is nice and friendly, and always helped me when needed. Anyway, this whole experience is enjoyable and terrific!
Great building with nice amenities.  Outdoor space is incredible.  Condo had everything you needed to feel like home.  Comfortable bed and great views of LA.  Check in and out was easy.

Es ist ein toll eingerichtetes altes Haus und bietet viel Platz fuer vier Personen. Der Boden ist aus Holz und sehr geraeuschhaft. Auch ohne Schuhe, hatten die unteren Bewohner viel Geraeusche. Die Kuechenuntensilien sind sehr veraltet und teils defekt. Die Dusche haben wir nie benutzt, da sie sehr veraltet ist.

We loved our stay here! Very relaxing place to come home to after a long day exploring the city. Everything was super clean and the hosts were very accommodating and helpful when we had issues. Thanks for everything!

It was a very nice stay for us. The guesthouse is even better than in the pictures. very nice and comfortable bed, nice bathroom, very clean, the kitchen was good (no stove, so nothing if you want to cook), fridge and freezer, cutlery, plates and glasses all there. No toaster or oven to warm up bagels or toast which is not necessary but would have been awesome since we love toasted bagels :) the aircondition was available which is a big plus. but if you like to leave it on all night it would be a little loud and the fan is going in bed direction, so we turned it off during the night. Very nice and quite neighbourhood with lots of eateries in walking distance as well as free parking everywhere. (Jim got us a parking permit just in case which was very nice.) We didnt speak or see Jim or Amy during our stay except when we arrived which was totally fine for us. If you wanna interact with the hosts a lot i guess you are not going to book a seperate guesthouse anyways :) All in all a very nice stay - definitely recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lots of amenities for a traveler. Kitchen stocked with basic and beyond basic supplies. Free parking was an added perk. Everything was clean and ready for a guest. The host was prompt and attentive. Great communication throughout. Highly recommend!
Amazing hosts, amazing house, amazing location, all around amazing. Don't even think of staying anywhere else this place is a dream! Thank you Steve and Henry for an amazing trip :)
Good location. Easy access to lots of Hollywood. Beds were comfortable. Quick uber/lyft to a show at the Wiltern.

For starters, Michael was very responsive not only when setting up the stay but throughout the time I was there. It’s centrally located to shop for essentials at Trader Joe’s and Target. I also appreciated the on-site parking in the rear of the unit. Tree top views are lovely as well as the entrance.
This place is nice. Nothing fancy, but a great value and close to terranea resort. Exactly what we needed. Qi was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Thanks!
Great location in echo park. Clean and comfortable. Debbie very helpful. Will stay here again.
Very nice place to stay, greatneighborhood!
Very accommodating and warm hosts, I felt very comfortable. Perfect place to crash and have a little solitude for a few days. Great location and first visit and  in Santa Monica!
Perfect location, and nice condo. I would stay here again.
If you need to be in the area of LAX but don't want to be in the flight zone, a great location.  Even in rush hour, only 25 minutes.

This was my first booking on Airbnb and the accommodation was really comfortable. My stay in the house was perfect from the beginning to the end. Tara and Michael are very kind and provided me a lots of insider tips what to see in LA and my trip northbound to SF. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay. Little trouble with parking but that is a problem for any place in LA.

we lived in Darren's house twice during this trip. it was a nice stay. the house is very clean, Darren is a really sweet and intimate host. many snacks he prepared in the house. we will definitely choose here when next time go to L. A

This was a lovely retreat in the mountains off Malibu Canyon Road and 10-15 minutes from Pepperdine University and the Malibu beaches.  Mathias has done a great job designing and building this apartment onto his house and it is clean, has a great TV and wi-fi, had some thoughtful touches (coffee for the Keruig). The bed was very comfortable.
This is a perfect find! Very clean. stylish and comfortable, everything you need during your stay. Plus the hosts were amazing! This will be the only place we stay when we are in The LA area!

Very unpleasant experience communicating with the host. The other guest had a medical emergency abroad (her father had a stroke) and she refused to refund our trip even after repeated explanations about the situation. Bottom line: she wanted to make sure she got paid.
Rachel is the ideal host! Makes you feel at home and helps anyways she can

At first I booked the hotel because of the free shuttle which I actually never used because the bus somehow never came. It might be my fault on miscommunication, perhaps. Besides that, the room I got in looked like the photos, it was clean, and private. The shared bathroom is good, actually better than my expectation, it was quite clean!

Spacious room, and the host is very generous to lend his own bicycle to me.If u have a car, the place is very near to long beach airport, otherwise, it's a little time-comsuming using public transit vehicles.

The place is spacious and the description is accurate. Close to the bus stops and the signal hill park. Not too many choices for restaurants nearby if you don’t drive. Great communication with Jim and his brother Don.

Lia showed us around when checking in and offered swim towels for us! Everything worked great and we especially loved the pool. The location of the house was close to grocery stores and restaurants. Plenty of space for off street parking.

I had an excellent stay in this room of Lisa's, it was very clean and extra spacious plenty of room for one or two persons. Clean bathroom as well. It's also very secure and quiet. The local neighborhood Alhambra has one of the biggest concentrations of authentic Hong Kong & Cantonese foods, so it's very good eats around here. It's a 5 min bus ride to Cal State LA, 25 mins to downtown, and a 15 mins by car. Clean comfy room, great neighborhood and a Great hostess A+
Very close to LAX, food available within walking distance, quite neighborhood. Mark was very friendly, welcoming, and always available if I had questions!
Awesome place, great views. Really enjoyed the little time I had there would definitely go back if I could!

My friends and I had an AMAZING stay at David's - from a funkycool space, to extra blankets within moments of asking for them, to a super chill host who offered to get our vehicle up a tricky hill for us; this was one of the best AirBnB experiences of our lives. Not only was the house rad af, but the property was just the right mix of wild and pure art. Loved this stay.
Joseph's studio was nice. My boyfriend and I enjoyed the ocean breeze and the place was private off the front house.  His place was clean and organized. I would consider staying at this studio again.

This place is just a beautiful as pictured. It was perfect for my families vacation. It was clean, in a safe nice neighborhood, beautifully decorated and had all the extra supplies that we could possibly need. Thank you April and Justin!

We loved our stay here in long beach! Kate was very kind and accommodating when we had any requests! The place is very close to the beach and a ton of great restaurants. I would highly recommend staying at Kate's place!
I loved my stay and the outstanding hospitality. I’ll be looking to book again when in the area.
We loved staying in this comfortable, immaculate, lovely, equipped and ideally located apartment.
Brinda and her place were absolutely perfect. Incredible communication and one of the most beautiful homes. We will hopefully get the pleasure of visiting again:-)

CAsa localizada em bairro residencial bem próximo das principais vias da cidade. SUpermercado Vons bem perto. Casa limpa. Cozinha equipada e funcional. Camas muito confortáveis e com lençois limpos. Televisão com Netflix e Sling. Internet rápida. Tudo perfeito.

Perfect location if you're attending a concert at the Hollywood Bowl or a show at the Pantages. Traffic is a nightmare in the area during the summer concerts, but the Bowl is an EASY walk from Linda's place. Linda provided a permit to park in her neighborhood. The space was very tastefully decorated and artful, and Linda was a pleasure to meet and chat with. It's been very hot in LA lately, and it was therefore very very hot in the apartment. However, turning on the AC  (there's a note to not go any cooler than 70 degrees, and don't leave it on when you're out) and turning on the fans can cool it down a bit. This is a great choice if you have an event to attend in Hollywood!

This was the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. Josh made me feel at home and is incredibly thoughtful and generous. This Airbnb is great for people who are looking for more than just a place to stay--there's more of a sense of community and is a great way to meet people in LA. I can't recommend Josh and his Airbnb more!
Ala was a fantastic host. Everything was perfect in the house (it was gorgeous and just as described). He also was great at communicating with us and was very welcoming. 5 Stars!

Natasha's place was the perfect stay in Long Beach. Right across the street from the beach front where you can take a stroll or relax on the sand. The grocery store, cafes, and other little places to eat were all within walking distance of the apartment. The apartment itself was just the right size for two people to stay and had everything you needed. Natasha is very responsive and a great host!

This was our very first Airbnb experience, and we couldn’t have been happier! My friends and I were very grateful to stay at Jiyune’s home. We mostly were only around to sleep at night the 5 days we were in LA, but the fact that there are two sleeping areas  in separate rooms was wonderful (plus each room had a TV and AC). The shower had good pressure and the beds were comfy! For the most part, the neighborhood was quiet, just normal noises like the occasional garbage truck, airplane, or car door. The location was great! It was about equidistant from all the places we wanted to go (WeHo, Hollywood, Santa Monica, downtown.) We used the metro a lot which is just a quick 5 minute walk with a gas station on the way for a quick morning coffee. We felt very comfortable walking during the day. Lots of people outside doing yard work, walking dogs, kids walking home from school, etc. We did get a little uncomfortable walking after dark, but we’re also from a small town so we’re not used to big urban areas. But it was no problem! Being as centrally locates as it was, it was a cheap Lyft ride! Since we the majority of time out and about, we didn’t cross paths with Jiyune a lot, but she was very friendly when we did and she has some very adorable dogs! :)
Very good location!!

I expected the place to be a bit better but it wasn’t awful. Like most Airbnbs,  the home was older and has cockroaches. I saw a couple in the bathroom and I wanted to leave because I hate roaches, it makes everything feel dirty. You can tell that the host cleans very well and is very caring about their clients, but I just can’t stand cockroaches so I won’t be coming back.

Great place!  I booked last minute for work, and it was perfect.  Quiet and easy to access.  I was in Bedroom A, so I had my own bathroom. The space was private and safe.  House was within walking distance to shops and restaurants.  Easy drive to airport.
Beautifully presented loft in Downtown LA. Jason was very helpful and quick to respond when we had queries. Bit noisy overnight, but otherwise we had a great time. Thanks

Only stopped one night so we could visit Santa Monica and thing that did it for us were the location close to the beach. The hosts were very responsive over emails. The property itself is exactly like shown in the photos.

I would recommend a stay if you want to visit Santa Monica
This great if you looking for a place to sleep for the night and get on a flight. It's about an hour walk from the airport straight up on Century!

A lovely neighborhood in old Pasadena, close to downtown, and public transportation nearby, although we used LYFT. Bryant responded to my inquiries immediately, and when we arrived we were greeted warmly. The guest house is a comfortable studio with upgraded bathroom and  kitchen. Internet and Roku TV are also included. I couldn't figure out the very simple coffee maker, so Bryant popped in and pushed the "on" button for me quite cheerfully one morning. We enjoyed our stay and will be returning the next time we visit Pasadena.
Great location! Walking distance to 99 ranch and all the shops! Highly recommend for those who like to live close to stores!
Great stay in the house! Thank you Jo
We had a great stay at Yoshi's place. Good location and a great host. Perfect with the private parking.
Very nice place, good location and hosting was fantastic.
Haben ein zweites Mal ein Zimmer im Haus von Alex gebucht, auch hier hat alles gepasst.

Shandon & MJ were out of town while I was at their place, so I didn't had the chance to meet them in person. We had some contact by phone and they were very helpful and friendly. The room itself was very nice and clean, with some handy tips written down for the visitors. No complaints during my stay  :-)

Manju is a very sweet woman who made our stay delightful and easy! The room is extremely spacious with a large bed and a mirrored closet. There's also an AC which is a huge plus since I was visiting in the summertime. Would definitely stay here again!

Жильё соответствует заявленному на сайте. В целом, за эти деньги нормальный вариант размещения на непродолжительное время. 
Есть кухня, можно готовить, есть все необходимое. Своя парковка во дворе дома. Недалеко супермаркет. Близко к достопримечательностям. 
Хозяин отзывчивый. 
Из минусов: из сменного постельного белья только простынь. Есть запах сигарет, некурящим может мешать.

Susan was an awesome host to say the least! Her hospitality was second to none and she went above and beyond to accommodate all my needs! I can't say enough great things about Susan and I HIGHLY recommend her if anyone needs a location near Beverly Hills. It's less than 20 minutes right smack down Rodeo Drive! Great location with easy parking and easy freeway access. There's so many benefits where the location is and is in a nice peaceful neighborhood. I've give it a 10 star review! Will definitely go back if in the area!
Kevin's place was beautiful with a great location near the beach, and was a very kind and attentive host!

The studio is just as pictured! It was a perfect for our house hunting trip as we are relocating to LA! It is centrally located so that it was only a $5-10 uber to Santa Monica, Marina Del Ray and Culver City. It is only a 3 minute walk to Venice Beach board walk so we were able to watch the sunset every night just by walking across the street. Donna was easily accessible via text/call. It was a cold morning when we arrived, so I had to reach out to Donna to find out if there was a heater. Donna responded very quickly with directions. We really enjoyed our time and would stay again!
Great place! Clean, private, and convenient!

We absolutely loved our stay here! It was a stylish, peaceful haven while being centrally located to just about everything you could need. The directly surrounding neighborhood was beautiful to walk around, and you’re only a few blocks away from restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores. It was easy, and cheap, to get to other parts of town via Lyft. 

It was impeccably clean, and the towels and sheets were high quality. As this is an old (and beautiful) building the walls are thin, but we didn’t have any problems with noise. There’s also a tv with Netflix/Hulu which is nice to unwind after a long day of exploring. 

Checking in/out was so simple and easy, and the one question I had was answered in less than a minute. 

I highly recommend staying here!
Suzi’s place was great! Me and my girlfriend had no trouble getting in and Suzi gave great tips on local eateries.

Jacob and Amelie are really good hosts. The place is nice and convenient. The train station is close, freeway entrance too. Parking is limited in the street but there is some free parking all day long a few blocks away.
The only bad point is to hear the freeway trafic, especially if you like to sleep window open.
I recommand to anyone to go Jacob and Amelie's !
Fallon was a great host!  She has a lovely, comfortable, and inviting space to rest in!  It was a perfect fit, and great location.  I would definitely stay again upon a return visit!  Thank you!

Had a pleasant beach weekend at DuBois comfortable place. He was very informative, helpful and kind. The room was very clean, quite and private as described. I would stay again, thanks for everything.

We really enjoyed our stay! The place was exactly what we needed. Very comfortable, very clean and we LOVED the location. So close to so many things. Quiet neighbourhood too. Todd was very pleasant to communicate with. We would definitely go back and stay next time we visit LA!
