Hiromi is a great host! Location for the CS is absolutely superb! Safe location, easy to get food around the house. The main issue for me as a doctor with hygiene standards was the bathroom with molds and stuff. I did not use the kitchen because I did not have to. Other than that best price, best location, best host.

Nina is The BEST! She was sooo gracious to take me in at a VERY Late booking time... (right at midnight), she came out,  was so welcoming and Gracious), I Recommend Anyone to Stay Here, you will have a Great Host, Privacy and the place is Very Clean.
this place was absolutely wonderful! The furniture was new and the makeshift bed in the drawing room was comfortable too. Very well maintained and at a very good location near the airport
There is sand on the porch because it is literally on the beach!
Great value and very clean! Katrina is very nice. House does have a smell of cigarette smoke though.

Nathalie is a wonderful host. She quickly addressed our questions. The apartment has a fantastic location; close to the airport, beaches, and tourist attractions. The apartment was clean, has modern kitchen and bathroom, and had great amenities.
Super comfortable, and perfect location.

Me and my friends absolutely loved this place the outside does not do it justice at all!! It was super clean and modern also, it was very close to the events we were going to so we hardly spent any money on transportation. Although we are from La it literally felt like a vacation. :)

We rented Hoss and Cathy's beautiful bungalow for my parents' 2 1/2 week holiday visit. The setting and environment are beautiful. The bungalow itself is cozy and comfortable. And Hoss and Cathy are lovely hosts who are easy to communicate with and anticipate needs. I live just down the street and the close but not too close location facilitated a longer visit, but kept family relations on an even keel. We definitely plan to rent the bungalow for future visits! Thank you Hoss and Cathy!
Really cute space, everything was great!
convenient place,5 min to metro red line. a bit noisy at night because of the clubs but i was too tired so i slept alright
Location is fabulous.  Amenities like beach chairs, beach umbrella, cooler and bikes were awesome.  Michael was very responsive before and during our trip.
The room and bathroom are clean and nice, close to the airport and very convenient

A great place to stay! Quiet, sunny, and very close to downtown shopping centers and restaurants. The room has nice decorations, and the bed is comfortable. Ramon also let us store the suitcases, which was really helpful.

The location of the apartment is fantastic. You can walk to the beach, restaurants, grocery store, and more. It's big enough a space for a couple, and the shower works well. It's easy getting in and out, too, although the lock makes twisting noises every 5 mins and freaked us out a few times. We faced some cleanliness issues, so our stay was just okay. We enjoyed our trip, overall.
Very pleasant stay. Katy is very responsive and answered all our questions within minutes. Very clean and neat house. Travel to Down town LA can be a pain during rush hour traffic.

Probably one of the most pleasant experiences I have ever had through AirBnB - and I have an exceptional track record!  The (seriously beautiful) pictures don't even do this place justice and Yvonne was the perfect host: informative, available, communicative, resourceful, and friendly!

The views off of the balcony are beautiful. The beds are comfortable and the rain showerhead in the the bathroom is delightful. The club across the alley is loud during the day, but by bedtime is quiet. Be prepared to have trouble getting a car in/out of the alley because of rideshares, scooters and valet parking by that club.
Really nice place..
Jorge is a great host, and this is a great apartment in a great location. The room was really nice and comfortable, and I really enjoyed my stay. I appreciate the good hospitality. Thanks!
Great spot close to dodger stadium and close to downtown. Can see the Hollywood sign from the back yard if you can find the right spot.
Such a lovely gem of a place!
Just a room for the weekend became a home thanks to Marko’s wonderful hospitality!

My family and I stayed in this apartment for two months on the summer.
Overall - Reda: We would definitely stay in any of her apartments
Overall - Apartment: We would stay there only if another fan is provided or mini-split (read cons)

Pros:
Great location.
Close to bike route.
Mostly quiet. In a period of two months, there was only one party with loud noise in the front building.
Nice details. After many hours of driving when arriving at the apartment from my home, I just wanted water, a place to rest, and a clean bathroom. All of them were provided, having clean water in the fridge and a flower was a nice detail.
Big apartment. It has one big bedroom enough for two beds.
Extra mattress. There was an extra mattress.
Good TV.
Quick response. We message Reda and she answered quickly. We didn't actually meet her, but we met her son who helped us whenever we needed him.

Cons:
It is on a second floor and there's no elevator. It is really painful to use the stairs when doing grocery shopping, laundry or taking the baggage to the apartment.
Very hot (July '18). It has two big windows making this apartment very hot. Three fans are provided but if you're from south-west of Texas it will not be enough.
Steven has an incredible place to stay I would recommend it to anyone!
The place was great and In such a good location. Right in the middle of everything

Our stay was amazing.  Dean's home had everything we needed and was very charming.  It helped to make our trip a very relaxing getaway.  We loved being able to walk in the beautiful nearby neighborhoods.  It was perfect for our group of six adults.  We would go back in a heartbeat!
Great place, super nice host, highly recommend staying here.
Great quiet, clean and comfortable place. Right next to the Fox studios and a 5 minute car ride to Century City mall. Easy communication to host, perfect check-in

This is a brand new property, a 2 bedroom room unit with very large space.  Close to the elevator.  In a good location - quite but safe neighborhood.  A walking distance to the Walk of Fame, Hard Rock cafe, Madame Tussauds, Hop on Hop Off buses, etc.  

The property comes with a secured private parking - need not worry about street parking.  Good access to major freeways to main attractions such Warner Bros Studios and Anaheim Disneyland.

Check-in was fast and seamless.  Caretaker was very helpful

Highly recommended.
Ray & Adreana were great hosts and the space is just perfect! They really go above and beyond to make sure you feel right at home. Would definitely book again! 5 stars!

Belmont Shore is a great place for a urban/beach getaway and Pauline's place is the perfect launch pad!  Comfy,  great neighbors, close to the beach, bike path, ocean and bay. 2 blocks from 2nd Street  and all the restaurants and bars you could want.  Nearby Alamitos Bay has kayak and paddle board rentals and a safe swimming beach.

My friend and I had an amazing experience at this home. We felt very welcomed and SPOILED! The kindest and most giving hosts you'll ever meet. With a bunch of snacks and instant foods for us to dig in the kitchen when we had late night hunger, a wide variety of cleansers, soaps, and shampoos, AND a complimentary bottle of wine. Did I mention it was squeaky clean ! I think it's safe to say they set the bar high for future airbnbs that we will be hitting up in our future travels. I want to thank you both for being our cali parents for the weekend. We already miss you!
Beautiful place. Great location. Would definitely stay again
Chris's place was clean and comfortable. It was convenient to get to places from there and using uber is always very easy (and cheap). Checking in and out was easy.

Amazing home with a gorgeous view of silvelake. Easy parking, friendly neighbors and a quick walk to nightlife but a secluded enough place for relaxation. Absolutely loved our stay and can't wait to stay again.
We really had a good Time! Everything was great and Mona was a super friendly and helpful host. Thank you!

The house was more magical than the pictures showed and it has a very artsy vibe to it. This house has serious personality and the surrounding area is serene. Chloe was a great host and got us everything we needed before we could even ask for it! 10/10 place and we would genuinely love to stay here again in the future.
Amazing place

Fiona y David son unos anfitriones excelentes, calidos y atentos. Su casa está conformada de forma tal que no falta nada, mucha luz y un jardín lindo y tranquilo. Muy respetuosos de tu privacidad y siempre presentes cuando los necesitas, lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Marlene was a great host. She communicated well from the beginning to the end of the stay. Everything about the house was clean and neat. I would definitely recommend her as a host.
Nice location
Second time staying here and I can’t recommend it enough, I will stay here again every chance I get.

Elena was gracious and welcoming.She responded promptly to our requests.
The apt was exactly as pictured and described.
Place was nice, location was superb. It had everything as mentioned and needed for a comfortable stay.
Very stylish accommodation. 100% recommend
Great place to stay. It's completely private, very comfortable and perfect for a biz traveler like me. I'll be back.
Amazing place loved my stay here best place everrrr
host is very communicative and friendly. place was very comfortable and ideally located. I highly recommend this place
Lamia’s house was very clean and well appointed. We really appreciated the secure parking. Lyfts were easy to get and getting around easy. I’d gladly stay here again.
Great stay for a small getaway! The pool was awesome!
Great location, perfect communication, easy self check-in, parking slot.

Our stay was great. The place was nice and open and very clean. Extra bedding and bathroom amenities were also provided for us. The beds were very comfy as well; a great plus! There is street parking, but hosts were kind enough to let us use one of their spots when we were unable to find close parking at night. The location is also about a 5 minute drive to the Staples center, so this place is great if you are looking to spend some time in that area.
Great location one block from the beach. Restaurants and bars a short walk away. Very clean and comfy. Would definitely stay again.
Beautiful artsy  place.

Darrel was a great host, extremely responsive and easy to get in contact with. The loft is exactly what the pictures show, it's spacious, well kept and has everything you need. The location is in the heart of the Jewelry District which is a very up and coming area with lots of restaurants and bars within walking distance.
Really close to the Forum. Provided lockable doors. Very good communication.

It was great to stay for my trip ! He's place is very clean and great interior. Living room was good and room either ! The location might be uncomfortable but if you drive it will be great! All big cities were near but parking spot was not enought since there are only street parking.
Clean, comfortable, and in a great location. I highly recommend for anyone considering a stay at Lilith’s!
Loved our stay at David’s place in Venice Beach. Everything was perfect from the location, to check-in/communication, to the well appointed apartment. I would highly recommend this AirBnb!

There are so many things that make this place special. The space itself is sparsely decorated but everything is part of the story. The view is unparalleled, with sweeping views of the hills, downtown, and even the Hollywood sign. Tim was very quick to respond to emails and Kenneth, the keeper of the property, was cheery and kind. I’ve told everyone I know practically, to stay here when headed to LA. It’s not only perfect, but inspiring. Book now!

This was our second stay with Debbie.  After our first visit I felt we left with a new friend and now after this visit I feel we left as family.  Debbie not only welcomes you into her home but into her heart as well.  It's needless to say how wonderful her guest rooms are, but it's the genuine love she has for her guests that keep us coming back!  Thanks Debbie, and we will see you again soon!!

Melody and Patricia are excellent, willing to help and provide local tips and assistance around LA. Their accommodation is perfect for couples or singles on short stop overs. They made our first trip to the US a great start.

We had a very comfortable stay in this spacious basement apartment. Fixtures and fittings were well presented and clean. Hosts were very communicative and availed kindly a late check out request we had. Shower pressure was wonderful. A 5* stay.
Although we do not meet Ben, he is very friendly. The apartment is clean, comfortable and safe. It is close to the subway.  Hopefully we can stay here next time.
They were so great. House was very awesome. I will be staying here everytime I am in the LA/Pasadena area.

David’s cottage is all that it promises to be and more. Despite being on a busy street the grounds are quiet as can be, and the garden beyond the gate is phenomenal! So lush and green. Cottage patio is a wonderfully peaceful place for morning coffee or a relaxing evening cocktail. Garden succulents, cacti and wisteria grow with a feeling of wild abandon.  You will love this spot!
We cannot wait to return.

Timothy was a real chill guy, he was always nice and helpful as soon as we arrived. He even had 2 bikes we were able to borrow and checkout late. The bed is very comfortable although a little squeaky and also the upper level.

Had a great stay again at Mary's apartment. The location is indeed unbeatable, with many bars, shops and restaurants within a walking distance and a great farmers market literally right on the doorstep.
Great repeat stay!  Truly enjoy my experience

We had a wonderful stay at David’s place! Great communication, home exactly as described and it’s very convenient location, whether going into Hollywood or Burbank/ North Hollywood. We’d stay here again!

Great location; close to beach, coffee shops and restaurants.  No air conditioning, so be mindful about the time of year you go.  Parking was not great.  A few times it was a hassle to find a spot anywhere close and I had to park about 15 minute walk away from the apartment (it depended on the time day).
Expect a very clean, comfortable, and cozy place to stay! Julie is very hospitable and has great communication.
Warm and welcoming,.  Thank you!

강아지들이 너무 귀여웠습니다! 체크인도 빠르고 좋았어요! 강아지 냼썌 놈모 나요 이불 not ㅃr는거 가톄여 .! ! !!!!!!좜도 못 쨔께써요 냼쎄 ㄴr^ㅓ ,,❤️총굘도 짼내 뺄루네요 Oi불도 ㅎr루 지나서 줟0ㅓ요 ^^ ** 호쓷흐가 아닌 ㄷr른 싸라미,, 윗츼도 ㄱH로! ㄱrㄲr운 곳뚜 업꼬 차가 없으면 좀 멀어요~ 체크아웃 하고도 짐도 맡아주셨습니다 감사합니다~

This apartment was just like the pictures posted. It was clean and comfortable to stay in. The area had everything you needed, like grocery stores, CVS, and some bars and little places to eat. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone staying in or around Hollywood. Everything we did within our weeks stay was not more than 30 min away by car so the area was within reach with everything we wanted to do. Also it was quiet, no noisy or loud neighbors which was a plus. And again I cannot stress how clean and well kept the apartment was.

The space is great, room was spacious and had a fridge and microwave. Bathroom was very clean and they supplied towels. Family is super friendly and was a pleasure to talk to. Home is in an amazing location about a 20 min drive from everything. Stay was amazing
Very nice place , host was excellent , great stay and much appreciated hospitality

The room is as expected, clean and comfortable. The shared bathroom was always clean and water pressure fantastic. Didnt need to use the kitchen but it seemed to have everything you would need. Could hear light snoring through the walls but nothing too intrusive. overall an extremely quiet house great for resting.
Great place with great outdoor space. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

The Bungalow is the perfect place to stay wether you’re there to see the sights, visit friends, or on a business trip. It’s super clean and well decorated through the entire space and the kitchen has everything you would need to cook. Brenna and her family were incredibly hospitable and it was great meeting them! The other perfect thing about this place is how convenient it is. You are an easy walk from “downtown” Culver City with shops, restaurants, and a movie theater. If you’re looking for a place to stay in Los Angeles, look no further!
The place was beautiful. Way better than I expected. Very spacious, view was amazing, and the location was perfect.
Great clean place to stay, easy check in direction. Awesome location for all of Hollywood!

This was truly an oasis during an otherwise hectic weekend with 2 young children. The cottage is airy and sunny, private and beautifully decorated. The hosts incredibly responsive, and truly care about this property and their guests' experience. Thank you, Dana and Brad, for making our trip in to LA that much more easy and memorable.

This place is located very close to the freeway and not far from shopping and restaurants. The little house was very clean and felt very safe. It is on a busy street, so the traffic at night is a little loud in the main room if you are not used to it. Robert is a great host and very quick to respond to questions or concerns.
Perfect location, clean and quiet. Highly recommended.

Robbie and Hadrian were very responsive to requests and friendly in person. My daughter and I are neat freaks and we definitely loved how clean everything was. The added bonus was the AC unit in each room. Everything furnished was clean and tidy. Great communication, they even had great tips of things to do and see. Everything is literally a small Uber fare ride away. We would definitely stay here again. This was our first ever Airbnb experience and the guys definitely made it a memorable one. Thank you!
It's very clean house, and it is convenience to every view pot (Hollywood).There are three room with three beds and be suitable for family to live in together .

The pictures for this place do not do it justice. This place has enough space for a family to be more than comfortable. Erwin and his wife are extremely nice and accommodating. No complaints here!

This location is about 20 minutes from downtown without traffic. Its a bit of a drive but it was definitely nice to come home to a place where everyone had their own space.
Myrna’s place is very clean and in very safe and beautiful neighbourhood. Beaches and services are really close. I truly recommend.
The room is very clean and the bed is large and comfortable. Constantine's mother was very kind. A very good experience!

Dear Paulo and Kevin!
This was our first airbnb experience and it was AMAZING!! Your hospitality was above and beyond our expectations, the room was as described! The bed was very very comfortable, and we must say that the house is lovely!!! In addition dear Paulo,you took us to see beautiful places at LA what could we asked for more?! And dear Kevin thanks for your explanations and for the delicious cap-cakes!!!! We cann't tell how much we appreciate what both of you have done for us!!! Thanks for all, hope to see you again soon, Mor and Simi.

Chris was awesome! He let us check in early and check out late. He was very easy to communicate with and went out if his way to make sure we enjoyed our stay. 
We visit Venice/Santa Monica often and this loft is PERFECTLY located just one block from Abbot Kinney and all the great restaurants and shops it has to offer and is only a 15 minute walk to Venice Beach boardwalk. We walked to Santa Monica 3rd Street Promenade in approximately 35-40 minutes.  The loft has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We had a great time, !
thanks in part to Chris!

This place was just perfect for what are Trip down to LA was. Didn’t spend much time there besides getting ready, sleep & occasional naps between all the running around with family. It was less then a 10 min drive to where we needed to go see family and still super close to check out some places in LA. Everything was clean and instructions to check in where super easy. Definitely would recommend & stay again

I stayed for almost two months. Vive and Linda are so hospitable and accommodating. They provided loads of snacks and granola bars, as well as tea, coffee and water.

The room is so clean and quiet! The room and bathroom were completely spotless, and the house and neighborhood are so quiet. The garden is very private, with tall ivy walls surrounding the perimeter of the lawn. There's a beautiful lighted pathway of stones leading from the driveway to the gate that leads to the room's separate entrance. Vive added a beautiful wicker patio set outside the room. I really enjoyed doing my work out there; the chairs are so comfortable! There's also a small carved fountain that sounds like a tiny, peaceful waterfall, but isn't too loud to be disruptive.

Temperature is always perfect and appropriately air conditioned. If it becomes too cold, there's an electric fireplace. It provides a tranquil ambiance when the heat is not turned on as well. The bed is slightly on the softer side, with fluffy, soft sheets. There are plenty of pillows to choose from. 

I didn't use the television, but it is wall-mounted with a bunch of programs like Hulu. There are many options, I just didn't read the others. Everything you could possibly need is provided; there's a mini fridge, microwave, tea kettle, Keurig coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. 

My favorite part of the room is the bathroom! The carpets are so cute with textured stone patterns that match the stone shower walls. The bathroom floors, counter, mirrors, toilet and tub were completely spotless. There's even a towel heating rack!

I am so impressed, I will be returning in a few months for another stay. Highly recommend!
We had a great stay and the Hosts were very kind and hospitable.
If they want to have a great time with family, bbq, drink, listen to music, have an intimate time with their guest, this is the house
Trent’s place is as exactly as pictured and so close to sunset blvd. He responded quickly when we had a minor issue but all was resolved. Would definitely come back and recommend!!
Great place to stay, right off the beach :)

Danielle’s place was great. The studio had all the amenities you could want for a comfortable stay: kitchenette with sink, microwave, minifrige, kitchenware, dishes, glasses and cups, coffee maker, coffee, teas, etc. The studio had a TV, dresser, couch, full size bed, beautiful bathroom with fluffy towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hand soap, etc. Her two children were adorable and sweet and me and my little dog Minnie loved meeting them. The neighborhood was peaceful and quiet and we really enjoyed our walks. If you’re looking for a clean, private and nicely furnished place to stay I highly recommend Danielle’s studio.
Very solid space with easy access to bathroom and kitchen! Also a great location for a pedestrian friendly experience of LA
This place is awesome. Has the best location near the beach, the bay, dining, bars, and shopping. We had a great stay and would definitely stay again.

Decemberben szálltunk meg kisbabával. A szálláshelyen a fűtés nem működött. A házigazda tudott a hibáról de azt előre nem jelezze, annak kijavításáról kérésünk ellenére nem gondoskodott és visszatérítést sem adott. Arra hivatkozott hogy messze lakik és szerelő nem áll rendelkezésére. Előre jeleztük számára hogy több család kíván megszállni a szálláshelyen kisbabával, ami erre télen fűtés nélkül alkalmatlan. Közömbössége, hanyagsága és inkorrektsége elfogadhatatlan ezért a szálláshelyet senkinek sem ajánljuk.

Sean is a very good host, quick response, details about the house rules in 3 days advance. House is very clean, gorgeous, feels comfortable like at home, location is very convenient to most attractions and supermarkets, the only issue I had is the kitchen utensils( pots) not clean. Overall I would recommend this place instead of a hotel

Lori’s place is an oasis in the middle of the canyon, birds tjirping, bright stars to see at night, quiet and such green surroundings after the rains. Loved the jacuzzi! It was very comfortable for us, my daughter and I. Also my cousin stayed in the little cottage (extra charge but so worth it). Lori responded quickly if we had a question. We for sure will be back. Thank you! Karin
Had a wonderful time. Really enjoyed  my stay the view is to die for. A must stay !!
This is a beautiful place and location. It is nicely decorated, very peaceful, and located close to lots of restaurants and the pier. I would definitely stay again.
Stayed for the second time and it was amazing again! Views, surroundigs, peace, beaches, nice and clean room, great and inspiring hosts. Would go back anytime again!
This was a wonderful experience... lovely stay and lovely host. I would recommend to anyone.

I'm from NYC and my writing partner lives in LA - we stayed in the main house for 2 weeks. This place is like a rustic lake house cottage/cabin in a lot of ways, bring slippers in the fall or winter. The 50s kitchen is super cool and the appliances work perfectly. 

1st let's start with the good... The house is on a very quiet block with almost zero traffic, the park nearby was a nice day hike and the local area is up'n'coming & walkable. We found a few awesome spots nearby, like Gloria's Cafe and a superb taco truck. There are more bars, cafes, etc about 15-25mins walking distance. Mark's house is somewhat like a nostalgic flea market which helped boost our creativity for sure but be ready to live among a lot of stuff. We didn't really get to know Mark at all, our encounters were super brief -  he seemed very nice & down to earth though - reminiscent of "The Dude" from Big Lebowski. 
I say "main house" because there are 3 other rentals on the property - 1 VW van and 2 RV Campers (along with multiple other old cars). This wasn't an issue for us bc those rentals are fairly separated (by a fence) from the main house but we were often greeting the new renters before Mark. Everyone seemed cool enough but it would have been nice to have known about this beforehand. Like I said - Mark is a man of very few words. I wouldn't consider the property exactly 'secure'  - the front gate is always open to allow the RV renters to come/go and the door to the main house is an old, simple glass pane door. This didn't bother us too much but I could see it bothering some. The worst thing I can say is that place was very dusty (I wouldn't say dirty or grimey but very dusty)- we ended up doing cleaning session or 2 while we were there. This rental is def for people that are easy-going and adaptable. 

Overall it was great for the price.
A great place to stay. Terri made everything so easy for check in and check out.
Location! Location! Location!
Perfect location. Spacious and nice studio. Bikes available which made it easy to discover anything from Venice to Santa Monica beachstyle. Easy checkin and checkout.

The place was exactly as described. No frills,  comfortable room. Enough space for two people to sleep. The back patio visible in the cover photo is great for a relaxing evening drink after a long day of sight seeing and/ or before heading out for some more drinks ))

I purchased a new house in Austin, TX and came to LA to do some furniture shopping and catch up with friends.  Ali's apartment was great: very welcoming, homey, and the location was spot on for  shopping and dining.  While parking was available, we used Uber/Lyft to get around which turned out to be a great choice given LA's famous traffic.

Would come back and stay again!

This is a beautiful space, decorated exceptionally well with Jenny's design expertise and art. The location was excellent as well and Jenny was available at check in with a full welcome and instructions.
Maxim’s place is exactly what it purports to be—pics, description, advice about parking. Everything is as it states! No surprises!

Kristine and Barry are super thoughtful and kind hosts and my stay was fantastic. The Airbnb is gorgeous, quiet, relaxing and had everything I needed in a remarkably spacious small space. The sauna was so easy to use and made my stay extra special. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

Der Aufenthalt bei Alison war echt super und Sie ist eine total gastfreundliche Frau.
Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder.

Lauren was one of the best hosts I've had. She was attentive and answered any questions I had 100%. The place was perfect too. Great location right in the mix of things in Hollywood. Definitely a great place to stay!!

Jeff's place was great! perfect location to see downtown LA.
the lounge area was upper class and the bedroom was comfy!
The extra roof top pool was a great addition and really rate Jeff's place, along with his communication that helped me on the first day and also all his tips on where to visit.
Great place to stay. Nice scenic view. Comfortable and efficient place to stay. Great location. Definitely recommend staying here. Great host.

Lucy and George were great hosts. We booked last minute and they needed a few minutes to get everything set up, which was very nice of them to keep us informed. Their house was very clean and comfortable.  They made sure we were welcomed and showed us around their place. Their kids were also very kind and not loud. It was a very safe and quiet neighborhood. We really enjoyed our stay and would pick this place again.  We would 100% recommend to everyone!
Nice quiet neighborhood property. Short drive  to the beach. Bike scooters are a lot of fun to check out.

Ryan is really a great guy - super responsive. The place just happened to not have been cleaned when we got there. Also communication with his co-host was not the best in our experience.  The location is great. The common areas are cute and super comfortable.
Great place, very central, and Ryan was very attentive..

I was in long beach for work and spent two nights at Peter's place. The house was clean and the bed was comfortable. There was even a washer and dryer in his bathroom which was big a plus. 
Peter was a great host and also very helpful with suggestions on restaurants and places to go. I would definitely stay at his place if I'm ever back in the area.

The was very nice place, my daughter's went to the Anime Expo and this place was perfect.
They want to rent this place next year for the next Anime Expo 2018.

my friend and me was very happy. The apartment is very good place and good located. close to the metro 5 min walking. and the metro goes to the principal sights. I recommend this place. And diego was very nice
We were pleasantly surprised with this studio. So much bigger then we expected, well maintained, had all the essentials and very clean. Alix was the perfect host. I highly recommend this studio.
Beautiful place and the perfect spot! Peaceful and beautifully decorated! Definitely going to come back and stay again! Thanks :)

This is a great house in a great location. Lots of natural light, it was clean and well designed. The laundry room, parking, and close proximity to everything was awesome. Sam was also very responsive and easy to communicate with.
Large loft in DT area. Expect lots of noise.  Lots of restaurants and clubs and grocery within walking distance. Parking facilities very safe.
Great location for popular, tourist areas in LA (access to freeway convenient).
Appartement très propre et bien situé, qui nous a permis de profiter pleinement de notre séjour à Los Angeles.

The room was nice and the facilities were well kept.  The area is definitely very loud at night, so it was nice to have ear plugs provided.  I greatly appreciated the cleanliness of the accommodations, and my partner enjoyed the space as well.  Mary was very helpful, friendly, and quick to respond.

Chrissy's house was a perfect base for our family's week in LA. A short drive from everywhere (the lovely beaches at Malibu, the studios at Burbank, the theme parks etc.) and in a great neighbourhood. The place was clean, well-equipped and everything we had hoped for. If we make it back to LA, we'll try to stay there again.

Very nice host... everything about this place is so nice ... even though we had to check out at 10am they asked if we would like to keep our belongings stored there until we caught our flight.... very good host .... definitely would stay here again
Great place, great location, amazing hosts.
Great light and airy space, conveniently located near everything I needed to access on the west side of LA. I would definitely return.
Gabby was very nice and the place did the job for the night . I am happy with it .

Sharon is an incredible host!  She went out of her way again and again to make sure we were taken care of, comfortable & content.  This is no apartment AirBnB, she has a beautiful 3 bedroom house, which made us feel like we were staying at a friend or family member's place. The space is very relaxing, with a giant outdoor backyard, spacious bedrooms and a lovely eat-in kitchen. We were welcome to use her washer/dryer, living room, kitchen and even to help ourselves to the food in her fridge! She made us feel so at home. Also, the place is immaculate which is nice. She's willing to chat and hang out if you want to, or leave you alone if you're not feeling talkative. Overall she was just great, a super interesting person who made us feel super comfortable and was willing to go out of her way to accommodate our requests. Would definitely recommend!
John’s spot is in a great location. There’s no privacy but he’s a great host. For the price you can’t beat it.

Cathy was a fabulous host. Very helpful and accommodating. The cottage was very comfortable and made for a relaxing get away. Everything was clean and in great shape. 
When we need an extra parking permit, Cathy lent one to us. All in all, a really sweet place with a wonderful vibe.

Leslie's let's use take advantage of his spices and side ingredients for cooking, is furnished for a whole family (although there is only one sofa bad that you convert into a bed), is centrally located in a somewhat poor neighgorhood. Nice guy. Responsive. Needs a fresh paint in an old building. Top floor so no one is stepping on your ceiling.

Monica's apartment is a gem, it was spotless when I arrived and in an amazing location. The parking spot was great (its not gated, but you feel really safe in this neighborhood). Bed was very comfortable. Honestly the only thing for me that I would change is the couch (its totally fine for the most part, but not comfortable enough to sink into and watch football all Sunday, if that's something you plan on doing). Incredible value and Monica was a fantastic host. Would love to stay at her place again!
her place is fantastic!  really  worth it.Zhou was very friendly and helpful.The place is spacious and clean.

Lovely modestly-priced, nicely decorated one bedroom studio. Great location offering neighborhood ambience and easy access to all the top spots. Terrific value and exceptional hospitality! Super value.
it is a lovely place,nice host!这个房子在的街区干净安全,附近也有挺多吃的,走路能到,房东很热心给我们推荐她觉得不错的餐厅｡房子的风格经典,后院晚上坐着喝茶也舒服｡洗手间很干净,用品很全｡
Excellent! Great location and this place had everything for us. Would use again.

I will definitely book this place again.  Communication was good and just as indicated.  The place was clean and spacious with thoughtfully added touches.  I slept well which is normally an issue when I'm away from home.  Everything I needed was within walking distance.  We were at the Convention Center.  I don't know how you can get any closer.  If you are staying in Long Beach, its a great location and I will be doing it again.  Great host!!

The room was amazing & had a really nice view from the balcony & even though it was right next to the freeway if you keep the doors closed it wasn’t too noisy but finding this place was like doing a mission on GTA lol we had to pick up the key at a deli market & after picking it up we ended up at the wrong parking structure because all the buildings around looked like the same one, so after paying a fee for going into the wrong structure we were able to find the location through following the directions since we didn’t have an address that could have made it a whole lot more simple for me to just put the address into my maps & have the gps take us there, this was really frustrating & also getting around the building was a complete maze it was like every floor was the exact same thing & there were so many doors that took you through different hallways, after discovering that there was 2 different elevators we were finally able to get on track but that was after about 25 min of walking in & out different doors & floor levels, also would’ve helped if the host gave us clear instructions on what elevator we should take & just explaining that there’s 2 elevators but not to take the one we did. It was literally the worst going up & down different floors & ending up in the same place, all while being “discrete” because apparently after you pick up the key, your host explains that the people that live in these buildings have no idea that some of the rooms are being used for Air Bnb so the host explains that if anyone asks you must say that you are just visiting a friend, weird right? So yeah getting to & around the building is probably the worst part of this Air Bnb besides that everything else was pretty spot on.
Amazing location,  beautiful apartment and very clean!
The place is really good, just as pictured! Super clean, tastefully decorated. I absolutely recommend this place!

This place is a great location. I was really nervous at first since I didn’t know the area but an Uber pool ride is about $5-8 to a lot of the popular places. It is about a 40 min drive to Venice Beach and Santa Monica but other then that, great great spot! Very clean and private as well. I loved it!
Nice place, convenient to Venice Beach. Reasonable price. Would stay here again. Several excellent restaurants on nearby Abbot Kinney Blvd.
Nice hosts, great place right next to LAX. Thanks again Blanca!

Beverly went above and beyond my expectations in being accommodating and hospitable when I booked a room for my Uncle's stay. 

My Uncle said the room was quiet and peaceful. The bed was very comfortable and the overall accommodations were very clean. It was nice to also have access to a private bathroom as well as a shared space to be able to do some laundry.
Super clean and easy to find. Communication was clear and quick! Cute little place :-)

Very thoughtful host, I liked the welcome sign with my name on it when we first got in the house. The communication was great and the host was super friendly. The house looked and smelled super clean. The only part I didn’t like was the bed was small and uncomfortable but other than that everything was excellent.
Die Unterkunft ist in der besten Lage um zu Fuß den Hollywood Boulevard zu erkunden. Das Be Hive ist cool eingerichtet und man trifft auf interessante Leute.
Good place with great location and fancy appartment, definitely would recommend it
Very nice place and a few steps away from Melrose av. Michael was a great host.

Our stay at Venice retreat and relax was simply brilliant.
Our hostess Xiou could not do enough to make our stay one of the best we have had and one of the most memorable.

Xiou went out of her way to make us feel at home. Coffee was present as was a lovely bottle of wine when we arrived.

The accommodation lives up to its pictures,  its modern contemporary yet comfortable and functional. By candle light in the evening it was also very relaxing.

The property has everything you could need from a BBQ and outdoor table and bed to a washing machine and dryer. All cups cutlery and utensils present - we could not have wanted for more.

If we needed anything like directions or recommendations for places to go and places to eat, Xiou would respond within minutes and assist without delay.

Location wise, it is central to all things LA and even outside LA, only minutes from the PCH, all beaches were easily accessed from Venice to El Matador, Leo Carrilo, Malibu and more. For more nearby activities, you cant really beat it as its far enough from the beach to be relaxing in a family residential area giving you the real feeling of living in Venice, yet being close enough to the beach and all food places. Abbot Kinney only 5 minutes, Rose Ave and Lincoln also minutes away for somewhere to eat.

Would we stay again ? We wouldn't hesitate !

Exceptional Propery
Exceptional Location
Explicable Host.
5 Stars.
Beautiful scenery & clean space. Would definitely come back
lovely apartment with all equipments and comfort. ideally located.

Mike and Debi were such great hosts, good easy communication and very friendly. The guesthouse is great and spacious with everything you can need. It's very private with its own walkway to the entrance, it was also very clean and I liked having a washer dryer for sure. This was a good temporary home for us while we waited for our house to get ready for move in up in Oregon. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting LA!  Safe area, easy parking ( free! )
this place was much better than I thought it would be

Todd was an incredibly kind and gracious host and the guest house was great.  Really well equipped, very clean, conveniently located in weho, and spacious, Todd's house provided a great place for us to stay for 5 days.
Thanks so much for having us!
Lauren and Sean have a beautiful home. The space was very clean, modern and well decorated. Hosts were very responsive and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

In general , the location, place and the property it self is superb . Though , we mostly appreciate the kind , hospitable , approachable, accommodating and efficiency of both Mr David  the host and Ms Zoe his assistant !  Thank you and I'm happy to refer your business to my friends and others .

She’s super chill and very accommodating! There’s a private entrance in the back so you don’t have to bother anyone in the house! She had decorated the place with cute touches and loads of candles (which I adored) !!
Chris maintains an extremely clean and comfortable place. The views from this place are pretty amazing. He truly is a wonderful host. You cannot be disappointed staying here.
This was a great experience. Very clean. Nicely decorated. Could tell it was newly remodeled. Great location, friendly host. A+
Alix was great, she was extremely responsive and helpful and made us feel very welcome. Their place is at a great location and very spacious.
A wonderful clean, spacious, and modern home. Everything was exactly as described and TE is very prompt with communication. Highly recommend!
Mariano was very communicative and wanted to make sure we had a great stay. Thank you!

This is the perfect place to stay in LA. It is in a smart, clean and safe neighbourhood.
Bat-Sheva has created an amazing place to stay. The facilities are all excellent and the place is open, light and spacious. The air con was a massive plus during the hot summer stay!! It was great to have the use of the pool too!! 
Bat-Sheva also thoughtfully added some finishing touches, such as snacks and fresh flowers for our arrival.
Everything exceeded our expectations.
We would definitely love to stay again and would highly recommend this place to anybody looking to stay in LA.

Nelly was an amazing host, she awaited our arrival and checked us in quick to give us our space. She also provided some great local tips and recommendations which we tested and loved. The space is a amazing location in WEHO and parking was a breeze. Anyone who stays here will enjoy their time and we will defiantly be returning!
Great location and quick response! We all love our stay in LA!!!

Aaron and his wife had a nice home in a quite neighborhood. He gave some outstanding tips on places to visit while on vacation. Wish we weren’t so busy so we could’ve enjoyed his pool, but overall a great stay and great people.

There’s a reason Kathryn is a superhost—from the second we booked her guest house, she was hosting us even from afar. Her communication is incredible, and her space is even more so. We loved the high ceilings, gorgeous back yard, and all the above-and-beyond touches she added (we had everything from chocolates on the bed to a little mini bar!). We’d love to stay here again and would recommend it to anyone.

5 out of 5 stars! Amazing hospitality and an excellent apartment with great amenities including a pool, gym, and secure indoor parking. Joshua (host) is super friendly and helpful! He definitely made us feel right at home. The apartment, located in downtown L.A., allows you easy access to all the shops, restaurants, and public transportation. It is a fully furnished apartment; having a washer and dryer within the apartment was really convenient for us since we were staying for multiple nights. Overall, this place is a better alternative to most expensive hotels in the downtown area. If I return to downtown LA, I would book this place in a heart beat.

It was great to stay at Ivan’s place! It’s located only a few minutes on foot from the walk of fame. It was great that Ivan kept a parking spot for us and waited until we got there! The room was very comfortable. We’d come again!

L'appartement de Beth est très bien. Très bonne position géographique, vous aurez le plaisir d'admirer le Hollywood sign à quelques pas de la maison et de déguster les meilleurs tacos de L.A au Cactus Tacos !! 
Beth est très accueillante et disponible. L'appartement est propre et ne manque de rien. 

Il y a une place de parking qui vous ai réservé si vous êtes en voiture, et le quartier est très calme. 

Merci encore Beth :)

I had an awesome stay at Guillaume’s place! All of the instructions for check-in, directions to get in the house, use of bathroom, kitchen etc were super clear. Everything was very clean, the bed was so comfortable (I was spending my days diving and I slept very well), and it was a perfect location as most of this trip I was at Redondo Beach. He was also very friendly and always available for any questions (even though I didn’t have many because everything was already going great). I would definitely stay at his place again. Thanks Guillaume!
This studio was perfect, exactly what I needed. It is exceptionally clean, modern, everything seemed new, location perfect to Claremont colleges ... loved my stay.

Susan and Pat worked with our schedule to make sure we found the place alright. The place itself was cozy and definitely close to all the restaurants and bars of Koreatown. A great quick trip before New Year's!

La casa era tal y como se anunciaba, y cumplió perfectamente con lo que necesitábamos y esperábamos de ella. Sharri respondió siempre muy rápido a nuestros correos, y sus instrucciones para la estancia fueron claras y útiles. Sin duda muy recomendable.
This was comfortable, with some special amenities in the kitchen!  A pleasant patio area made the outdoors accessible.
Quiet but convenient to food and beaches!  The place is exactly as it says!  The bed is so comfortable and the host is just friendly and super responsive!  Good choice for us.

Sheila was a wonderful host and I had a great stay in Westwood. The studio is conveniently located in a central location, and is close to public transportation and within walking distance to a lot of restaurants and shops. The studio was very clean and spacious. The amenities provided were fantastic. And the check-in and check-out process was seamless.
Great times
Tracy’s place is in a great location and is very clean. It was close to all the action in West Hollywood. Tracy was very accommodating and was quick to respond to all of our questions.
Great location! Apartment was great for a quick overnight! Stephanie was really flexible and responsive.
Ute is a very nice person and the house location is perfect. Strongly recommended.
Jason was so so so nice and a cool guy. The home is super cool and modern, and accessible to everything we needed (WeHo). It was an easy checkin and checkout; would recommend this to everyone!
The place was better than expected and they were very accommodating and were great hosts!

Celeste and her husband Chad had a great home in a great location. We fell in love with echo park. You can walk to just about anything you need. Parking was easy. The home was beautiful and we had plenty of space to ourselves and got to utilize the amazing balcony.

We didn't have much interaction with Celeste bc our schedules were different but we did get to enjoy chad's company. He was very kind and helpful. Great couple, great home, great location.

Great deal for the location but as always with LA be prepared to find parking far away as this is close to downtown! The other guests were friendly and everyone respected quiet hours. We had a great time in LA, thank you Constance for being a wonderful host and providing us a place to stay for such a good deal!
Great place, great location, lovely host!
This is a good place to crash for a night, the A/C works very well especially in these summer months. For the price it’s a good place to stay in N. Hollywood

Dianne was not at home but the key delivery succeeded. She had a nice co-host but she was rarely at home. The house is 20-min away from the sea by bike. The next time I would have chosen an acc. closer to the sea. It was sad that Dianne was on holidays during my stay.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
great communication with the host and very charming place on the hills of SB. Would stay again.
A great place to stay - convenient location and the private parking space is superb. We would highly recommend!

My husband and I stayed for one night and it was a perfect crashing place. Both hosts were very nice. We had our own room and bathroom and definitely had our space. They recommended some lunch and breakfast places for us that were great. We felt very comfortable in their home!

Stephan's place was exactly as advertised and he is a communicative, gracious host. We were welcomed with a bottle of wine and when it comes to convenience, Stephan's airbnb serves as a great central hub for LA. Highly recommend.
Brenna and Mark are outstanding. The space is perfect for 2-3 people. Everything is as advertised. Would definitely recommend and would be honored to visit again! Thank you, Brenna and Mark!

I was very happy to stay at this place. The bed was cleanly made with towels - and chocolate - beside it. The house is located in a nice quiet suburb of LA. 
I wish I stayed longer..

Staying with Tara and Michael was my first experience at an air b@b . The directions of where and how to get in to the house were smooth sailing . Tara and michael were terrific hosts  welcoming, and extremely helpful with ideas of what to see and what to do . Their home was extremely nurturing for me , it was comfortable and relaxing .  At the end of my stay michael was kind enough to drop me off at the airport, thank you !  I would definitely stay in their beautiful home again when I'm back in LA .
Made it awkward with the surveillance, phone calls to turn off lights, close door, and standing outside when checking out...a bit too nosy but a beautiful place...

Very Clean, alot of parking,
Easy check in and check out its was a nice stay!

My boyfriend and I arrived and was welcomed by the host's wife Tara. We choose to stay here because of how close it was to the Smog Shoppe and the cute pictures of the property. Tara was very nice and very welcoming to our arrival. She was very helpful in showing us around the room and letting us know the closest cafes and attractions. The neighborhood was very quaint and cute and very centrally located in the heart of Los Angeles. 

While she was showing us around, it looked like the main house was going through renovation, which we were not warned about. Although there was no actual construction going on while we we were there, there was a lot of random items sprawled throughout the property including the front and back yard. Compared to the pictures that are online, it seemed to look a little different, but the essentials were all there (bed, bathroom, etc.) But it doesn't seem like this property is being maintained at the highest level. There were several cob webs throughout the room, the carpet seemed dirty with several stains, the couch had the stuffy spilling out of it, and the linens did not smell fresh. Also, I got a received a few bug bites from our one night stay. 

The morning that we left, we locked up the room and rang the bell of the main house as requested. I told the host that were leaving before 10AM and I rang the bell around 9AM. I rang the bell 3 times with no answer. Finally on the last ring, the host's housekeeper answered the doorbell. I asked if the host was available because I wanted to return the keys and check out. The housekeeper stated that she was still asleep. So I gave the housekeeper the keys and messaged the host that I had checked out and returned the keys to housekeeper. I didn't receive a respond back until a few house later. 

Overall, I was a little disappointed in this AirBnB experience because of the maintenance of the property and the fact that I had to check out to the host's housekeeper instead of the actual host.  The location of the property is amazing though. This property has a lot of potential to be an amazing home base for travelers traveling in Los Angeles.

The house was very beautiful and comfortable! We really felt like home and did not encounter any problems during our stay.
The DVD collection was amazing, and so we were never bored at night.
It is a shame that we did not have a chance to use the back yard and the BBQ as it was too cold outside those nights, I think it would be great to barbecue there.
We would definitely choose to stay here again!

Christian’s apartment was perfect for our weekend getaway. The bed is comfy and the patio is nice for enjoying the morning Venice air while still in your PJs. A short walk to Rose Cafe (yum!) and perfect for wandering the neighborhood without a car. Would certainly stay at this place again.
Loved desk, closet space and those adorable dogs!

As a forst timer on AirBnb I have to say Raul and Jenn were great hosts. The unit is very cozy, clean and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. They even provided laundry detergent and dryer towels and a fully stocked kitchen. Great experience and would highly recomend them.
Karen was so helpful and her place is clean and comfortable. I love it!!
Wonderful house, my own bathroom, and frig in the room! Harold was a kind, class act.
This place was very spacious and in a great neighborhood

Matt & Danna are great host. The place was everything you can ask for and also very close to shops and restaurants. 10 min or less (depending on the time of the day) to get to universal studios and Hollywood Blvd. check in and out process was easy, matt & Danna are very quick in responding. The bungalow itself is located in a nice quiet neighborhood. I would definitely be returning next trip to the area again. Thank you both for such a great first time experience.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is as described. The location was perfect for me, and it's an easy walk down to the beach, shops and restaurants. It's a self-contained unit, and although it's quite small, it has all you need. The bunk bed is a bit of an odd choice and isn't really comfortable.
Quite spacious and very clean.

Anuja & Rafi are awesome hosts. Very communicative and proactive regarding treasures of the neighborhood. The place was spotless and well curated. The Hollywood sign right off the balcony was the coup de grâce.

I would definitely stay again.
Great place in a nice gated community. Not far from all the go to places either. Would definitely stay again!
We had a wonderful time at Kathy and Bob's place. Lovely room with charming outside patio!  It was a quick walk to the beach and cute downtown shops.
Paul is a helpful man and his house is nice and clean. Very suitable for family to stay.
A great host with an amazing place, lovely touches to the place and stylish. Offered food and had excellent communication. Would visit again.
Everything was perfect! Ronald and Kevin were amazing hosts who ensured we were well looked after. I will definitely recommend for future colleagues/friends travelling to LA
Amazing location and loft! Easy check in and check out, great customer service, prompt responses- overall a fantastic experience!

Amazing house and backyard! Great location and easy to navigate to different areas of the city. If only my visit was longer than just one night -- Johnny & Mark are super helpful and accommodating. Couldn't have asked for anything better!

An easy access apartment in the heart of Hollywood. walking distance to shops, restaurants, movies, post office, groceries. this apartment was move in ready with fashionable furnishings, Roku TV with Netflix at your fingertips, soft towels, comfy linens and privacy. The gas stove is a chef's dream in a small, but more than adequate kitchen. The complex was quiet with only a few yappy dogs during the day. I felt safe and protected.
This was a really fun place to stay in LA. It was super clean and Paul was a great host. Very close to restaurants in Eagle Rock but also a quick drive to Pasadena. Would stay here again.
awesome spot right by the beach
Very comfortable apartment, everything was clean and new.  The complex is very nice, very close to everything.  Larissa was very helpful, pleasure to deal with.

My experience at Henry and Robert retreat was very nice.
They were very warm and friendly.
The location is at a perfect spot, very quiet but also at 10 mn of restaurant club etc...
I definitly recommand this retreat, and i will definitly come back! :)
Laurie is a great host and makes sure I am comfortable. Her Airbnb is a quiet home with fresh breezes flowing through her house. I am a return guest and always enjoy my stay.
Great host, good location

Fantastic. Darren was able to accommodating with our late check-in since we didn't factor in LA traffic when driving out. Super informative host, laid everything out, nothing  was left to question and the guest house was indeed sexy. A must-book if thats a thing, would no doubt book again.
Raymond’s place was a comfy and easy access to travel outside to LA area. Great room!

Great location near Muscle Beach - steps to the sand.  Nice to have private parking in the garage, however, be sure to bring a smaller car. Our Nissan Altima just fit.  Very cute apartment with lots of space.  Jonathan was super responsive and upgraded us to this apartment when my original apartment canceled on me.  My only negatives were the dirty hand towel (covered in toothpaste) when we arrived and floors felt dirty in bare feet.  Also, neighbors had parties both nights while were there, so it was tough getting to sleep, but I think that's might be true at any place in Venice Beach.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay!
quiet neighborhood.

Ana's place is located very close to Koreatown and Downtown LA. The apartment was clean & cozy for two and had all the amenities we needed for our stay. Having your own designated parking spot made coming and going easy. Ana was a great host and was very responsive to all my requests. I would stay here again!

I stayed with Joy for quite sometime and had a lovely experience with her. She is a very warm and friendly host, always happy to help! I had never been to LA before and Joy made me feel at home. I did not have a car - and LA is a very car orientated place, but this location was very central and I was able to use the buses as the stop was within a 5 minute walk. It was also close to lots of cafes and the neighbourhood felt very safe. The house is cute and the 2 kittys are very loving and adorable. This is a lovely place to stay.
George is a superb host and the scenic view of the ocean is top. Stay here if you can! Walking distance to the convention center. The apartment is on the beach.

Ana Maria and her husband were very kind. They were wonderful hosts and we would definitely stay with them again. Everything was kept clean and exceeded out expectations. Their welcoming attitudes made it a great stay for me and my girlfriend.
Angie responds quickly and had a garage clicker waiting for us inside which made coming in and out simple with the car. Overall satisfied with my stay.
Fabulous location and spotless accommodation. James was a wonderful host and we would be keen to return in the future.

Safe and spacious parking on the property instead of parking in the road. Clean, spacious area with new kitchen utensils and plates. Bed sheets felt new and clean. Hopefully some seating and a dining table can be implemented, but that almost feels trivial to mention, as the space was so affordable and clean.
Excelente lugar y excelente anfitrión!

I booked this for a friend who was out of town and he loved it! Walking distance from a lot of great locations and places to eat, would highly recommend! This is the area you want to stay in if you want to stay in Silverlake.
Close to Hollywood.  Nice layout and off street parking.  Great view off the back deck. Close to the street,  so you hear the traffic.

The place was awesome. When we walked in everything was spotless and hotel-esque. I would totally recommend to anyone traveling in the LA area. It’s pretty close to the freeways, and shops like CVS for supplies. Juan was super hospitable and continually checked up via message to see how everything was going.

Large clean one bedroom  in a quiet section of Manhattan Beach. A very large living room - we had 10 people over and it was quite comfortable. Walkable to some eateries. Across the street from a mall. Drive to the beach. Super quiet neighborhood.
Very clean, bed super comfortable. Would recommend to anyone in this area looking for a place to stay. A wonderful experience.
Pleasant and comfortable stay. Apartment is spacious and has a well-equipped kitchen. Water pressure leaves a bit to be desired but a very minor issue.

BEAUTIFUL home!  Great experience.  I brought 12 college students and we were able to stay comfortably.  For those who are considering something similar I'll add some details:
Positives:
- Comfortable beds
- nice living room for gatherings and TV watching
- beautiful view of hills
- nice kitchen, hot tub, master bathroom.
Challenges that aren't anything wrong but should be considered:  
- our rental mini-van scraped at the end of the driveway.  The SUVs did not.  It would take some work to park 10 cars.
- Guest rooms 2 - 5 are all connected and you must either walk through the other bedrooms or outside to get to a bathroom.  
- It is less than a mile from the Hollywood Strip but it is downhill so it is not an easy walk back.  Uber rides were about $5.
- the furniture and dishes are newer (e.g. IKEA) but the house and hardware are definitely classic Hollywood so the quirks of being in an older home (e.g. guest 1 shower sometimes turned off) are present.

Angela was quick to respond and attend to any issues though.  I enjoyed working with her.
Stylish place in a good location.  Erica was very nice
Great place! So convenient having the bikes to ride to the canals or boardwalk. Would stay again!

Doug has a lovely house in Lawndale. Very well located close to the shops and the beaches. We haven't met Doug in person but he gave us the instructions for check in. Everything was perfect a very nice room with private bathroom. The view on the pool is just stunning. We will stay again at Doug's place next time we're in town!

We had a great time at Stefanie's property. The space was very well decorated and made the place feel like a "home." We were looking for a relaxing place to come back to each night after exploring LA, so it was perfect for what we were looking for. A couple of the nights, we decided to stay in and it was the perfect space - cozy, warm, and with Netflix! We also had no problems with the wifi, as some other reviewers have noted.

It was chilly when we were in LA, so the central air system with heating was much appreciated. We also asked for extra bath towels since we were staying for 5 days, and Stefanie was super responsive and had them on our bed by the time we got home that day.

We had the pleasure of meeting the hosts during our stay and they were responsive before and during our stay. I really appreciated their prompt responses and warm welcome. We would definitely stay here again next time we're in LA.
This place is truly an oasis! Perfect place to get away for a couple of days.
This place is perfect for large group. It is specious and have all the amenities that you can think of.

Do not think twice if Will&Florent's room is available at the dates you are looking for. The appartement is very welcoming, very clean and so well located. Will and Florent are very thoughtful hosts they really made my stay wayyy better. I truly recommend this airbnb room.
A quiet and laid back atmosphere

Cute and comfortable! This bungalow was just as adorable as the pictures promised. Loved sitting out in the back patio and loved the style of this bungalow. Central location was close to everything! Definitely recommend.
ﾎｽﾄさん､ﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰでした!場所もﾋﾞｰﾁからすぐですし､ｻﾝﾀﾓﾆｶまで歩けます｡とってものんびりできて過ごしやすかったです!

Location was great! 10 minute drive  to Universal Studios. House was nice and clean with two full bathrooms; although a bit smaller than expected. 4 people would be comfortable, 6 was a little tight. Overall a nice place to stay!
It was great. Wonderful Tiki hideaway. Martin was very gracious and thoughtful. Couldn't have been a better experience.

My experience was far better than what I could've imagined. Shahar is indeed a "Super Host" with better hospitality than any hotel you've been to. Although this is my first time using Airbnb, It will not be my last time using this service and requesting one Shahar's available rooms. Great customer service and Hospitality!

The place was super clean and very quiet. The other people were respectful and it was easy to cook in the kitchen, which we did a lot. Check in was the easiest thing ever and the location is very close to public transportation and grocery stores. We would totally stay here again

Jennifer was super nice and we could communicate with her very quickly. Also the location was perfect to go everywhere easily. 
This was my first time using sharing Airbnb and there was no problem until the last day. We came back home a little late and I was hearing REALLY loud TV music on the hallway and when I entered I was shocked. Two guys were watching TV with (guess with maximum volume) and the living room was sooooo messy.  We had to ask them to lower the volume and kindly, they did right away. 
However, the day we were leaving, in the morning, those two guys (still very loud) were smoking marijuana at the balcony which our room was located. I could smell EVERYTHING but couldn’t really tell them anything since it’s legal in California. 
I just really have to say that the house is perfect and Jennifer is super super nice but if you are a non-smoker nor not familiar with those kinds of stuff, I think you should reconsider since its a sharing Airbnb.

Thank you again Ori for letting us stay here ! It’s very well located, clean and nice place & easy to park just in front of the house (for free, which is great !)
I do recommend it !

I was down visiting the area and had another AirBnB space reserved that, upon arrival,  turned out to be very dirty and unwelcoming.  It was early evening and there I was in a strange city with nowhere to go!  AirBnB helped me find Annabelle's place and she responded promptly and welcomed me in.  Her place was a safe, peaceful haven after a stressful day!  It is a sweet, clean, welcoming space in a nice neighborhood.  I highly recommend it!
We didn't meet the hosts as keys were left in a secure location, however our stay was pleasant and the location is nice. We also didn't have any problem finding parking on the street - a bonus :)
Amazing place A++

The Beach House was very clean and spacious and offered everything as described. The location is great, just a few blocks from Abbot Kinney and the beach. It is not a charming personal home but a good, practical vacation rental.
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great 2 day stay .
Alexa was very prompt in replying to my inquiry. Unfortunately I was in a real bind and needed to cancel. She was understanding and gracious.

Super nice private bedrooms! We spent 3 nights at Lily’s place and it exceeded our expectations(nice, clean and quiet) . Lily was very responsive and welcoming, she’s always there when we needed help while respecting our privacy. 

The location is also great especially if you plan to visit Disneyland. For future Disneyland visits I’d come back without second thought.
Jay's place was perfect for an employee at my place of work. Clean, tidy, and ideal for a business traveler! Definitely renting again!!
Great place very cozy
We had a great stay in Chris and Marion 's house. They are so lovely and helpful. I am sure that when I come back to LA, I will definitely stay in their house :)

Our stay with Dean was great. His home is a fascinating collection of photography and rock & roll memorabilia and was fun to explore. We enjoyed the pin ball machines too. Dean is a wonderful host and interesting to talk with over coffee in the morning. He was very responsive in communications and kept us posted on activities at the house. Check-in was very easy. Our room was clean and very comfortable. We look forward to another stay with Dean in the future.

Excellent location! We went to the Hollywood Bowl, Hollywood Farmers Market and Universal Studios (all within a 15 minute drive). Julie and Alicia were lovely and the place is very organized – it has everything you need. The hideaway is clean and very Scandi.
Place is good as expected

Really enjoyed the place and it's exactly as pictured!!!  Close to things without being on top of things!  Plenty of room for a family with a nice kitchen, walkable to the beach or pier and close to some great things in MDR/Venice!

Very organized stay, everything was in order and well kept and clean. Joani was very easy to contact and keep in touch with. If I ever visit Hollywood again I will make sure to book another room with her.
Such a nice place to stay, designed with exquisite taste. The floors and bathroom are especially beautiful and we loved sitting outside here.
Todo esta bien, aunque puede mejorar

Sergio's place is great. Everything I needed was in the studio apartment. Wifi was very fast. Never had a problem. The location is super central to all the different places I need to be, so that made everything easy as well. Sergio was very communicative and hospitable. I would definitely stay again :)
Stayed here for the second time and everything was perfect <3

If you want a hip place with lively environment, this is the place for you. The staff was super friendly, close proximity to tacos, coffee, bars, and central location to be twenty to thirty minutes to anywhere you want to go in LA. You can't beat this location and amazing price for an upscale and friendly environment.  Thank you and much love from Chicago.
Pleasant, artistic surroundings, clean, spacious - it was very comfortable.

The BF and I were looking for a quick and easy staycation in LA, and John's place fit the bill perfectly! Appropriately priced given the amenities and location — boardwalk is literally a 3-minute walk away. PARKING, I'm putting this high up since this is crucial for LA, we found a spot per John's advice in the neighborhood directly north of Main St., specifically on the corner of Riviera and Windward. No hour restrictions, just street cleaning (our block was Mondays). Luckily for us it was Memorial Day so the parking enforcement guys got the day off too :) The listing is just as described: bright, cozy, lofty. The upper bed area was a little hot when we first arrived, but after a few minutes with the skylight open, the place had a nice breeze. Bed was comfy. We didn't cook, but the downstairs cabinet was stocked with everything you would need. Bathroom was spotless, though trickier to access at night since you have to climb down the ladder each time. Thanks John!
Everything was better than expected!
A great place to stay! :-)
Enjoyed my stay
Très bon séjour, chambre agréable dans un appartement joliment décoré.
Great place to stay

This is our favorite airbnb ever! It's a beautiful, tranquil setting, a comfortable and immaculate room and bath with private entrance, and extremely accommodating and friendly hosts. We are always treated like special friends and love chatting over relaxed breakfasts and interacting with the 3 dogs and Ethyl the turtle. On our most recent visit I even got to pick a bag of lemons from their tree to take home!  In all, staying here is a thoroughly enjoyable experience.
Nice location, accurate description, easy check in and out, washer and dryer, Netflix and a full kitchen.  We didn't use everything but nice to have.
Friendly couple with an adorable baby and cute dog.  Wish we would have had more time to use the private pool and hot tub during our whirlwind visit to L.A.

The apartment was in a great location and was a very good value.  Alba was prompt in replying to inquiries and attentive to some very minor concerns. If there is anything you findo you need she was ready to help.  

The apartment seems to be used exclusively for Airbnb so it's more like a hotel suite than a private home.
Calvins place, was as mentioned in the posting, it was perfect for a quick trip to LA and nice and close to Santa Monica. the room was nice and cosy and it has everything that is needed.
The place and host is great. Will be back again.

타운하우스는 매우좋아여 한적하고 잘 조성되어있음 :)
실내는 낫밷 인데 화장실이 한 셰명이상 공유하는듯하곰 그댝 꺠끗하진않음뮤..

Brooke is a really lovely host who made me feel super comfortable and was very easy to talk to. 
I really enjoyed my stay there - the private room with bathroom really made it easy to do my own stuff and there was alot to do within walkable distance, including a really good yoga studio, trader joe's and various asian restaurants. The only thing that bothered me slightly was that the pricing was a little high for the state of the complex (it's a little old) and that it doesn't come with a parking spot so I had to park 3 blocks away several times when I got back late. Another than that it was a really good stay.
Alex was a great host, which always replied quickly and was as helpful as possible. The place itself was alright but located at a great location.
Perfect place to stay! Best bang for your buck! Booking it again!
The location was absolutely great to universal studios. Communication with Sarah was also very fast. She was a great host.

I stayed here for several weeks and enjoyed my stay very much. She keeps her house very clean and and makes you feel like home. In the backyard she has a nice garden where you can play with the dogs, admire the view of the mountains or simply enjoy the sun. The dogs are nice. The bark a bit. But the only want attention and to be petted.
Overall I liked it very much and thanks again for the hospitality.

loved this location. It is just as described and perfect place for anyone wanting a central spot to explore all that West LA has to offer. I really liked the neighborhood also. it's very clean, friendly, and safe. There are some great restaurants and little cafes around this part of town and wish I could have tried more of them! Daniel was a great host and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for somewhere central to the beaches, Beverly hills, and west Hollywood.
Vivian and Cuyler's place is very clean and cozy, with an awesome TOTO Washlet :) Will definitely return next time when traveling to LA. Highly recommend!
Perfect place to stay DT LA. I will book again for sure!

Audrey's place was great, and so was Audrey! She even picked me up from the metro station when it was raining. I stayed here for two months (short-term fellowship), and it couldn't have been more perfect!

Great place to stay! Jayne was very welcoming and accommodating, even though our arrival time kept getting pushed back due to traffic. The cabin is at the base of a property with two more cabins on it but we had no interaction with any other guests or neighbors. Cabin very clean, great private patio area. Can't park right next to it so had to shlep bag up hill (no big deal). Restaurant around the corner (Froggy's) was awesome I highly recommend it. Only complaint was that the bed is in a loft-type space and is therefore close to the ceiling and is not ideal for getting intimate. Even so would definitely stay here again!

Host was really responsive and helped with the check in process answering quickly to any questions that I may have. 

Space was clean and spacious and just as the pictures show.
Really close to different restaurants and the beach. 

Neighborhood was really nice, quiet and gated. Just note that parking may get a little complicated but plenty of street parking and not even a minute away, completely accessible. 

Would stay again if in the area again!

BEN,

YOU ARE THE BEST !!! THANK YOU FOR YOUR HOSPITALITY :)

Deborah is a perfect host, nice warm and beautiful, the room is cozy and quiet, the bed is comfortable. Especially I love the location, you can  only walk 5 to 10 minuets to get wonderful coffee and tea or have a nice breakfast｡everything is perfect.

Just as advertised, small room and not meant to stay in all day. Otherwise, it was a great stay and you get you own private entrance! The location is amazing, right in between Burbank and Glendale, accessible to everything. I would recommend to anyone who doesn't need much and looking for great scenery!

Private entrance and bathroom made leaving early/arriving late easy because it felt like I wasn’t disturbing anyone. Place was clean and the surrounding area is very safe to walk. Self check-in and out was easy. Good for independent travelers who don’t mind whether or not they interact with host.

My experience for my stay was just alright. It started of with a spoilt air cond. So we had to sleep with the windows open. Although the room was located at the top, but it was at the back. The back of the apartment is a club, so throughout the night there were people screaming and talking really loud. Even after the air cond is fixed on the second day, the outdoor noise can still be heard clearly. (my stay was on tuesday to thursday)
Great location.

Great value , cool
Vibe , good location great hosts

Akiko is a gracious and accommodating host. The room is clean and comfortable and it was easy to check in and out. Akiko's dog is friendly and greets you at the gate with a gentle wag of the tail. This location is great if you are used to communal living and sharing a bathroom with others. The entrance is through another bedroom, which wasn't a problem since I don't stay out late.
