this place is great! and room is nice and spacious. all in all I truly enjoyed my stay!
Julie was an amazing and very friendly host. The place was great. Beach meters away. Sunset was beautiful. We had a few requests which were actioned very promptly.

Always a treat to stay in this great solo apartment! Of my dozens of AirBnB stays across the U.S., Mel & Tony's is definitely my favorite and I look forward each time to my little home away from home.

Je recommande vivement l'appartement de Kevin ! Il est comme sur les photos : propre et agréable ! Le lit est confortable, la cuisine est équipée, la salle de bain fonctionnelle. Et en prime, une petite terrasse agréable est à disposition.
 Le quartier est tranquille, une voiture vous sera nécessaire, et vous pourrez la garer facilement dans la rue. 
La communication avec Kevin & Pamela a été super ! Nous avons eu besoin d'imprimer nos tickets pour un match de basket, il nous les a imprimé avec gentillesse. Bref, une super adresse.
Nice place
房东夫妇人非常好,房间很干净,也很安静,离着海滩也很近,期待入住

AMAZING! It was a great place to come back to after a long day! We looked forward to going back each day because of how beautiful and comfortable it was :) Super clean and everything was ready for us. We got everything we expected and so much more. Thanks for a great stay. I would recommend this place to anyone!

Jiyune's place was in a great location and the room was simple and clean. The bed was comfortable and clean.  The place was close to restaurants and shops and there was a lot of street parking. Her dogs were lovely and friendly.  I would recommend.

We had a great time staying in Betty's house. She is a wonderful hosts. The place is clan including public sharing area and private bathroom. The location is very good for public transportation to metro station and it is very near downtown. It takes less than 10 minutes walk to downtown and bus station. We will book Betty's room if we come again next time.

Very easy going and nice hostess. Location is great and you can use the pool area which is large and relaxing. Bedroom is close to a busy street so you will hear a little bit of traffic but else everything is really nice with this place.

Romina and Dany are just amazing, nice end very kind people. The arrival day unfortunately we had a problem with the car and we and up arriving at the house around midnight, very late. Romina understood the situation and welcome us without any problems. The house is beautiful, everywhere clean and tidy. They was happy to give us a lot of suggestions for place to go in the area. A really luxury 5 stars staying, even better than the photos. Nice area as well,highly recommended! Plus you can relax in the pool as well,which is like everything else beautiful!
Great space to stay in. Lots of places to eat around the area. Would recommend to others. And it’s an overall nice community.
so so

Tony's bungalow was the perfect getaway for my daughter and me. Cute, clean, comfy and cozy. Nestled perfectly amongst the crazy and the now chic heart of Venice. They (and their 2 little dogs) were very helpful and welcoming to us and we loved having our own private back yard to while away the hours on those hot summer days. A creative little oasis in the middle of it all. Thanks.

William was a great host. Check in was easy and got our own parking spot in front of his house. When we got there, he gave us a tour of the bottom floor (which you have to yourself) and offered his kitchen for us to use. The bedroom was very cozy and clean, plus the bathroom which was also very clean was right next to the bedroom. Overall a great stay! Definitely recommend to stay with William.

Tony and Sigita were great hosts, helpful and friendly. The apartment superb with a lovely swimming pool and terrace. For a father and son from Iceland, the location was ideal for visiting places like Hollywood, the Griffith Observatory, the Space and Science Center and downtown Los Angeles. Would definitely stay with them again. - Kristjan and Siggi.
Warm welcome and a comfortable stay!

Roger is a super host and his home is amazing. A gorgeous California Craftsman straight out of a movie! It was the perfect base for past five days with our family. We enjoyed the hot tub, eating in the beautiful and peaceful backyard and going on runs up Hill Ave right behind the house. 

Roger was laid back and an excellent communicator. He met us when we arrived and gave great overview of house and area. We walked a few blocks to eat and shop at Sprout Market. 

Highly recommend.

Very nice and spacious apartment in the heart of Venice. The communication was flawless and we enjoyed the sweet apartment with a nice kitchen, balcony, big living room, comfortable bed and nice little attic. Would definitely live there again. Thanks, Shaun!
Very well designed with great ambiance.

Helen was absolutely wonderful - so kind, accommodating, helpful, and makes great breakfast. Our room was sparkling clean and tidy, even had a blow dryer and straightener. The parking was our only complaint - we got in late the second night so we had to park across the street from the complex in a store parking lot that says no overnight parking. The house, host, location and amenities were great!
Such a beautiful space. Neighborhood was beautiful and the hosts were so friendly and accommodating.

Accidentally missed the part where there was no A/C and totally my fault! but the weather was so beautiful that it wasn’t a problem at all! They also offered multiple fans which helped keep us fresh. Everything was absolutely beautiful, and Sheva and JT were great hosts. Would totally come back!
Great place in a cool area.  Bianca was great host; I'd stay here again.
I really enjoyed my stay at Bart's. Great place, and Bart is a great and communicative host. I will book with him again next time I'm in town if his place is available.

Pas de wifi. Bienqu il soit decrit qu il y a un wifi, il n y en a pas.sinon a part de la poussière partout, et des sols moyennement propre, l interieur correspond a la description. C est assez agreable: cour table chaises a l exterieur, le citronnier. C est agreable! Je recommande cet endroit. Le prix est acceptable.

Great location, few mins walk to UCLA, restaurants, supermarkets 
Appt is very clean, comfortable and had all needed amenities

Kedje answered all my questions promptly. He provided clear directions as to how to get to the address and access to the house. The room is exactly as pictured, clean and spacious. Definately hotel quality at a fraction of the cost. Kedje is a great host. I immediately felt comfortable with him and enjoyed our conversation. I would definately come back.

Please be aware, this place is listed for a very affordable rate, which may raise some concerns. I will be the first to warn you, this place has a roach infestation. The owners of the place seem to already have previous knowledge of this, I will explain. To start, the place seems to be very clean, with 2 decent size bedrooms, along with 2 bathrooms. And a laundry; washer and dryer. After arriving at the place in the evening, we quickly showered, freshened up and went out to enjoy Los Angeles. A few hours after being out for the night, we returned to the home to an unexpected surprise of roaches. Flying roaches, crawling roaches, talking roaches, you name it. The whole apartment had roaches in different vicinities; in the bathrooms, the bedrooms, the kitchen and also the living room. We immediately packed up our belongings and contacted Airbnb in regards to getting an immediate refund, and searching for a new place to stay. The process was lengthy as it did happen at 1AM. We also contacted the host to alert them of the scenario and letting them know that we will no longer be staying there. The host did not seem to get back to us until hours later, and it was almost in a tone that was defensive as if their place possibly couldn't have roaches. In the morning, in an attempt to get us to stop canceling, the host sent a maintenance worker to come and rectify the roach situation. There were a few problems I had with that. For one, we were not notified that someone would be coming into the apartment, which brings up my next issue of the maintenance worker letting himself in the door with the key passcode that was on the door while I was half dressed standing in the living room. I felt very violated and uncomfortable, and definitely not at ease with the host and the whole situation. As the maintenance worker arrived, he immediately began doing his work, already aware of where the roach infestation started. At no point, did we discuss with the worker where the roaches were coming from, he seemed to just know right off the bat as if this has happened before. As I watched the worker complete his tasks, and leave roach traps around the kitchen, under the sink, and wherever else he placed the traps, I noticed that these traps had already been placed throughout the apartment, and they were now just being replaced with new roach traps. We as guests, unfortunately, were unaware of the roach traps and had no previous knowledge of what those were, as none of us have had roaches in our own homes, which made us extremely uncomfortable. After taking a look at what work the worker had done, after he had left we had noticed that this work has seemed to be done already, as under the kitchen sink and bedroom bathroom sink, there was what looked...
Good value for money

Great place, near the park, and very quiet neighborhood. I liked the house very much and it was pretty comfortable. Jeffery was great with communicating and everything went smoothly from check in, stay, and check out.
Tips: 
-If you decide to sleep on the outside bed, bring some ear plugs. The fridge can get a little noisy. 
-If you're bathroom shy, keep in mind the bathroom doorway is only enclosed with a curtain. I made the mistake of sleeping outside and letting my friend (a boy) sleep in the  inside room and I was too shy to use the bathroom when he was in the bedroom. I had to wake him up to step out so I could use the bathroom in peace. Haha.

I'd definitely stay here again and recommend the place. Thumbs!

The location is wonderful!  This is a designer house, very tastefully beautifully with everything you need to dine in and prepare your food (great kitchen!!).  The view of the canal on the patio is wonderful--we LOVED the open fire pit at night--very relaxing, with a large seating area, and a perfect view of an enchanting canal.   The home is large and has many seating areas, which we appreciated.  The only downside is beds need to have a second mattress (or foam topper) to make them more comfortable (we could feel the wires in the mattress).   All in all, we loved staying here, and if the bed situation is improved,  we would love to stay again. I should mention the location is just a few blocks from the beach and also the famous Abbott Kinney Boulevard with great shops and restaurants --my favorites are 3 Square  and Tom's cafe)
No complaints here. Responsive host, great location just a stones throw from the beach, clean place, was exactly what I hoped it would be

House is located in a quiet neighborhood. Stay away from lower Polk (Website hidden by Airbnb) gets ugly and if you go to the nearest Vons, don't go alone! 
The house did the job, for the most part. Our stay was very brief so we didn't really spend too much time there. It was a bit on the dirty side, the floors and the bathroom walls specifically. The bathroom fan didn't work, not sure if it was permanent or just our bad luck-did not bother asking host.
Wish there was more family friendly viewing variety as far as the satellite  channel programing-but now I'm just getting picky. 
Will most likely not stay in Sylmar again because of the overall town experience.

Scott's place is perfectly sized for a single or couple in need of a great location in Echo Park. It's literally steps from the main stretch of Sunset, and a quick walk to the Park.

Unfortunately during my stay the Wifi wasn't working, and I didn't receive a response at all until my last day at the apartment. Scott seemed to place a lot of the blame on me for not fiddling with it myself (I didn't want to mess with his things, as it is his residence which he mentions in his description - I was trying to be polite). This issue means more or less to certain people, but WiFi is a necessity for me and we seemed to disagree on what that issue was worth in the end. If this issue hadn't happened, it would have been a great spot to stay.
Mario's place was perfect. Very clean and stylish. Super comfortable beds and lots of clean towels. Great location. Highly recommend!
Great place to crash, roommates were cool! Definitely satisfied!
Peter was a great host. Fast response and thoughtful. The place is pretty clean with great location.

The house was awesome! And the location was perfect for getting around town easily :) both Anya and Peter were friendly, respectful, and gracious. The bed was nice and comfy and the view from the back yard is super cool if you've never seen the Hollywood sign

It was for my parents who needed to stay close to my place, but did not want to stay in my small apartment. It was perfect, because it's so close to my place as well as grocery stores, restaurants, and the park.  The rooms are clean, and have all the necessities. My father was very happy with the coffee maker and the TV. Mila was friendly, and very quick to respond to my questions and requests. I totally recommend this place!

It was definitely a dorm-style place! So perfect for my situation and most of the people there are all going to school or in-between places. The people were all pretty nice but it's quite crowded so if you don't like people or have never stayed in a dorm kind of place it might not be for you. No stealing or lost items and Emily and Kris were so friendly.

Tim and Jen's house is wonderful.  We received an email about a week before our arrival with a ton of information about the house, neighborhood, beach and restaurants which was very helpful.  The few random questions I did have during the week were quickly answered via text.   The house was very clean and comfortable (pots, pans, towels, soap, tp and paper towel all stocked) and the beach which really is close (just 5 min walk) was so pretty.  We rented wet suits and our kids spent days in the ocean with boogie boards.  The hall closet was filled with board games so we did have a game night with the kids.  Wifi was fast and because we remembered to bring our own apple TV, we were able to hook it up to one of many TVs in the house and watch our shows without any hassle.  They do have cable TV but I am glad we thought to bring it.

Vicki is a great host. Everything was nice and clean. They leave the guests so many beverages, snacks, tea and coffee. Very spacious as well. And so many movie selections. Also very private. Loved it and I will definitely stay there again.

Sara's place was the perfect location to eat through and explore Koreatown in LA. It was conveniently located, and Sara did everything she could to make our stay comfortable. The place is ideal for two people, and it was a very interesting layout. The only downside was trying to find parking, which is common in most parts of the neighborhood. I'd highly recommend her place.
The garden lounge was lovely and the location was fantastic for us. We really enjoyed our stay.

The house is perfect for us six people and is close to many bus stops. Chris is really nice and helpful, who helped us out with our luggages. I'll definitely recommend this house to a small group of people traveling in LA.
It is a nice and clean place to stay. We probably will stay there again if we make another trip to this area.

Lin’s place was lovely and convienient to most Weho spots by foot. Parking was a breeze on the street with her parking pass and the pool was a great touch. Don’t plan on using the kitchen it is small and has the minimal ammount of utensils needed but the food in the area is so great - you won’t care.we stayed in multiple airbnb’s in different neighborhoods and this was by far our favorite. Lin was very responsive, kind, and flexible with our needs. Hope to stay again. Can’t recommend enough!!!!

We had an amazing stay whilst visiting the city and the accommodation is in a great location to get to all the key/tourist destinations in LA. Elizabeth was very friendly and extremely helpful with recommendations whilst we stayed and I would highly recommend staying here.

It was a pleasure staying at Denise's place. They were a very friendly family and gave us a warm welcome. We only stayed for a night so we didn't expect too much and the price fit into our short budget. The room was a good size for two people and they even provided us with snacks, beverages, and extra toiletries. The only thing I would advise other guests is that it can get a little stuffy in the room, but if you don't mind having the windows open a bit - that shouldn't be too much of a problem. Thank you again Denise!
Best place to stay in NoHo! Near great Mexican food, train stations, etc

Fantastic location and pad - very close to the beach and was awesome having access to bikes. Place was clean and secure. Buz was very helpful and easy to get in contact with. Would 100% stay here again and highly recommend.

The house is great for a conscious traveler. It doesn't have any toxic smells or items. It is very clean and cozy. 
The bed is comfortable, more on the medium (firmness) side. 
We could feel some European touch to the place that's why we felt very comfortable. 
We had only one thing that we could think of might be bothersome for light sleepers: it's an opened space room so you are exposed to the fridge noise all the time.
The house has all the necessities you need for your stay, very much like home.
We enjoyed our stay and this is probably the only place we would come back to in all our airbnb history.
Thomas is the nicest guy and everything was absolutely perfect!
Great place, great location! Located in a nice and quiet neighborhood.

El lugar fue perfecto para nosotros, muy cómodo y limpio, el lugar tiene muchos restaurantes cerca y hasta lugares para beber algo y divertirse, el sector es muy tranquilo y seguro. El apartamento de Cuyler y Vivian es muy lindo y acogedor, la cama es supremamente cómoda y el baño es un lujo! Fueron unas lindas vacaciones en los Ángeles, una pequeña luna de miel :). Sitio muy recomendado para estar tranquilo mientras se conoce la ciudad de LA. Cuyler es un tipo muy especial, siempre nos dejo café fresco en las mañanas y fue muy amable en prestarme un cinturón para salir elegante. Ellos siempre están trabajando así que no los ves mucho lo cual es lindo se quieres algo de privacidad. Definitivamente si regreso a Los Angeles pronto, mi primera opción será Cuyler and Vivian's home 😃 THANK YOU SO MUCH GUY. I'll never forget my time in L.A It was loads of fun and a lovely trip. ❤

Kate is very friendly host! And the apartment is clean and nice, exactly same as picture shows! And the location is very very convenient, full of restaurants and shops on Hollywood street. I'm highly recommend this apartment to my friends! :)

It's a small room with an air mattress and single bed. The place gets the job done but was pretty small for three people. The shower had no water pressure at all. I don't know about prices in LA but it seemed a little steep. The host was absolutely wonderful and very accommodating. That alone may have made it worth the price.

The room was just what me and my boyfriend needed. We spent more time going out than being in the room. But it fit our needs perfectly. And is close to downtown. Looks exactly like pictures and was cute and clean. The security gate was also a huge plus for parking. I had no worries about the safety of my car knowing it was in close proximity instead of the worry that comes with street parking. Will definitely be staying again

Jeff was excellent!  Very friendly and helpful.

The location is perfect, in the downtown area. Lots going on in the evening. Relatively close to bars in neighborhood and via train to Hollywood area.

Would definitely recommend!
Deborah was a wonderful host. Her house is very cozy and located in a great part of town. Very close to the main concourse. She made getting in and out very easy. Would definitely stay again.
Great hosts, great family. Very warm and friendly.
Great location. Great accommodations. All around excellent place to stay.

Roxy's place is in a convenient location with walking distance to all main attractions. Only 2 blocks to the metro station that takes you to Universal Studios, Downtown LA, Santa Monica etc. Pre-arranged parking was also conveniently located. Great restaurants and stores nearby. Highly recommended.

We had such an amazing experience at Kevin's place.  It is spacious and very fun.  There were four of us and there was ample space with everything we needed.  We saw a show at the Hollywood Bowl and walked there, very easily.  The only downside was the amount of parking.  This is true of the entire area, and was not a product of the house.  Kevin was great on getting back to us very quickly on the questions we had.  I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it.
房东接待很热情，房屋干净整洁。有两点小问题:1、洗澡的热水需要很长时间才能放热；2、2楼的房间没有窗帘，只有百叶窗，遮光很差，一大早不到6的就醒了，希望改进。

Easy parking, great communication, good location, comfortable beds, special touches, beautiful bathroom...all are part of staying at Tal and Lauren’s. They are great hosts. We hope we have opportunity to come back. 
Judy & Tina
Very cute bungalow, well appointed and cozy. Even better than described!

Matt was a really nice host, respectful and kind. He even invited me out to see his band play, which was a really nice thing to do. The room was perfect for my needs, and the place itself was really nice. The bathroom was kept in clean condition.  The place is in a great spot in Silverlake and close to Sunset, which helped me get to places I was visiting during my time in L.A.
Definitely stay with this place if we visit LA again! Super clean, very nice place and great host.

Nice and responsive host.
The building outside overall was undergoing construction so not so nice to look at, but the inside the apt was without any issues.

My husband and I have booked the room for 2 weeks of our vacation in LA. We looked for an inexpensive yet cozy and clean place with convenient public transportation access, as we were not going to rent a car.
The location is fine, as the house is located right in the middle between the coast and the downtown. The metro station is in walking distance.
However, we have to admit the house itself disappointed us. We didn't expected anything fancy, we appreciate airbnb for opportunity to safely rent affordable accomodation in expensive cities such as LA. But there are some basic requirements such as clean bathtub, decent heating in the room, clean windows, overall tidyness of the common areas. Instead, we found dark buildup in the bathtub, cobweb on ceiling, a small portable heater (very noisy and not effective), a blanket in holes, etc. It's all the stuff you can't find in description, so it is tricky to learn about these in advance, and you even won't discuss that with the host. On our first day, we even thought about cancelling the booking and moving somewhere else, but finally decided that we are not ready to loose significant amount of money, a whole day of our vacation, and risking to get even bigger troubles - the place is bearable still. We didn't spend any time but to sleep in the house, and stayed till the end of our vacation.
We are very sorry to leave a negative feedback, but honest reviews is what airbnb is about. We also have unforgettable experience at other superhosts places. Deeply respecting their efforts and  hospitality, we have to be honest and not to leave a good review when the place doesn't deserve it. We believe Ali has everything to make his house a great option for LA visitors, and eagerly hope our review could work as a bitter pill.
Great place and location. NadIa was quick with responses and so friendly and would stay here again.

I stayed at Laura's condo with four other family members. Although it is only a 1br we never felt cramped or like we were living on top of each other. The place was very clean, and all of the linens were fresh. 

The location is perfect; in walking distance to a bunch of locally owned restaurants, cafes and shops - it was really easy to get around the neighborhood by car or walking! 

The neighborhood itself was very hip and low key; we really enjoyed the vibe and all of the cool restaurants and dives in the area. 

Laura was a very generous and available host; she responded fast and made the checkin/checkout process a breeze. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Laura !

Theo and Daria have a lovely home. A perfect place to stay if you are looking for somewhere quiet to relax in Silverlake. It is situated in a peaceful neighborhood. The house is tastefully furnished and is really close to bars restaurants, supermarkets and the reservoir. The kitchen is bright and lovely, it has everything you could possibly need. Theo was very easy to get in touch and quickly responded to any questions we had. We would highly recommend this cozy home.
Great place.

We loved our stay at Elyse and Barry's Airbnb! The location by the reservoir is scenic, quiet, and completely serene. Their converted pool house was the perfect size for my husband and me, and was very clean and comfortable. Elyse and Barry really went above and beyond on communication, and were so helpful with recommendations and tips on things to do in LA and the neighborhood. Would highly recommend their place! Thanks for a great stay.

I've stayed many times at the Westwood Dome and I always have a great time. The place & neighborhood are great, a no brainer in the Westside!
And Amir is a great host, very responsive!
awesome

Andrea is a wonderful host and her home and yard are as beautiful as the photos. Neighborhood is beautiful and quiet. Loved waking up to birds chirping and the mountain view out the back window. She is very welcoming and we enjoyed great conversation over a glass of wine. We definitely plan to stay here again for a relaxing weekend getaway.
Pleasant stay. Slept like a baby and had a wonderful canine roommate!
The place was very quaint and cozy. It was small but was just perfect for what we wanted. The hosts were very friendly and accommodating. We had a great stay.

Mathilda is amazing and so sweet and accommodating, I was sick my first day of our trip and our flight got in early so she let us check in early as well. The place is clean and beautiful and everything we wanted to do was within 15-25 mins of the house which was perfect! Amazing place to stay!

Carolyn and Robert are amazing hosts, extremely friendly, helpful and accommodating. The location is perfect, nice and quiet with stunning views over Studio City and just a few minutes walk from all the shops, cafes, bars and restaurants on Ventura Blvd. The apartment is modern, clean and spacious with everything we needed and more. I've now stayed there twice and hope to be back again soon. I can't recommend this place highly enough, I just hope it's available for my next trip!
We had a great stay at Jenny's place!
I enjoyed my short stay - quiet and clean home, nice hosts!
Very nice place and very clean. Close to attraction places. Great host!
Anna is a great host. Everything was very clean and cozy. Highly recommend!
Communication easy and efficient. The apartment looked like in the pics. Very well located in a quiet neighborhood. Overall we had a very good stay.

We had a great stay at the Poolhouse. This place exceeded our expectations. It was truly amazing! Dorothy and Jeremy were very nice hosts and they will give you all the privacy you want. A quiet and beautiful neighborhood with only 10 minute walking to restaurants and food stores. Take a cab or car and you'll be in downtown in 10 minutes. We would definately come back! Thank you for everything! Emil and Lovis fron Sweden.
We had a very enjoyable stay at John's place. It was nice and tidy, comfortable bed, parking was no problem and John replied back almost instantly when we had questions.
Location 3 mins from beach, nice small appt. Great host, recommend to all !

We love love this beautiful home! The house is beautifully furnished with a super well equipped kitchen and charming rooms.  Kenneth is a wonderful host that is super helpful and responsive. It is a stone throw away from 2 groceries and is a short walk to Rodeo Drive. The house made our trip more memorable and we would stay there again the next time we visit. Highly recommended!

Daniel is a excellent host. Very responsive and helpful. The house is decorated modern and with all the appliances needed and more. The beds are great and outdoor area is impressive. To be able to stay in LA in such a calm area is very rare and worth the price. Would stay here again.
Awesome little gem in Hollywood. Place was close to everything! We would definitely stay here again.

Everything was perfect. No complaints from my side. The studio was clean as in a hotel and had a very good bed! Bathroom were equipped with everything you need (towels, shampoo, soap etc). This is my best Airbnb experience so far and I would choose the same host next time in Venice. Highly recommended.

Yamini is a very gracious host and made our visit to LA for a family funeral very comfortable. Our room, and her whole home, was very clean. She was attentive to our requests of coffee and toast in the mornings and we enjoyed our morning conversations.
Nichola Ellis' home was lovely, and Nichola was a gracious host.  The bedroom and bathroom were large and sufficient for my purposes.  The dogs were also friendly.  I recommend this place highly.
Would stay again and will recommend to others! Michelle responded quickly to questions. Privacy was a great and all neighbors seemed pleasant. Nice place for a decent price.
Robert was very friendly and accommodating.  The place was very nice and clean, and as described. I would definitely recommend this space to others.

About a 15min walk to the convention center with a starbucks next door.  The place provided a washer and dryer if you ever needed to wash your clothes.  Fast internet to check your emails or need to do some work. Everything was great overall!
The best House I've stayed in! Great rooms & really clean! Loved it!
Awesome place, truly a hidden gem.

What an amazing place! And Colette was so flexible with my late night arrival!

The pictures don't do justice to this spacious studio and beautiful design. The bed was comfy and the gorgeous tub was clean and luxurious. I will only stay here when I'm LA! It's amazing

I stayed at Susie's place for 2 months during my internship at JPL. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!

Pros: 
- Susie was extremely hospitable and very nice
- Walking distance from both JPL and the nearest grocery stores (Ralphs and Trader Joes), all about 1 mile away
- Very nice neighborhood. I walked to work everyday and felt safe at all times
- My own personal bathroom
- The room was open and cozy

Cons:
- One of the permanent residents is a smoker (sometimes the smell would drift into the room)
- Not much noise privacy (I could hear anything said in the living room / kitchen from my room and they could hear me). I'd recommend bringing ear plugs if you are a light sleeper
- The room did not have an external door lock

Overall, I very much enjoyed my stay. The convenience of the location and Susie's warm hospitality made up for most of the cons on the list above. Once, she cooked some fried dumplings for me; they were amazing!

James and Renee were so generous and flexible! My boyfriend and I had planned to stay with his dad during our time in San Pedro, but after the first night with the three cats, my allergies had decided otherwise. I requested to book for the same day and within a few hours James and Renee approved me. The studio was very spacious and in a safe neighborhood. The bed was super comfortable and they had everything we needed during our stay.
Amazing host . Very helpful and accommodating.  We ask for food places to eat and he was more than willing to help. He had the keys waiting on us and the house very clean.  Would stay there again .

We stayed at Johana's place for 1 night. You will get a clean comfy room with all the amenities you'd need, in an ideal location for seeing LA, great for a short stay. 
Johana's dogs were absolutely lovely, we are dog people and so they were a highlight. The one downside is that it was a bit sad to see the dogs in their small pen for so long (We did not see them out throughout our stay), and they clearly had a lot of pent-up energy as they were quite noisy during the night. Although we were admittedly only there for a short while and there was someone there to look after the dogs, we had to give them water on several occasions as they had no access to any in the middle of summer. 
Other than this, Johana was pleasant, easily contactable through the app, and the place was ideal.

Nous sommes restés une nuit dans l'une des chambres et malgré les bruits extérieurs nous avons trouver ce logement très bien. Prix raisonnable et proche du centre d'Hollywood Boulevard a 10-15 min a pied du metro. La chambre et les pièces communes étaient propres.
Great Pad. This is one of the highlights of my parents visit to So Cal! Do not let this go by if you are considering this place :-)
Vera was an amazing host! She was easy to communicate with & very friendly. The place was fantastic & the pictures do not do it justice. My family & I had a great stay!
Great place

Awesome host we had the whole house to ourselves.  Perfect for my family and pet very spacious area. They had a laundry room available to us in case we wanted to use. Area was quiet friendly neighbors
Great spot close to all downtown LA has to offer

Excellent apartments, it was very confortable. We enjoyed our time, and highly recommend the apartment. 
Nick & Ale were very attentive and helpful.
Thank you
Great place—on a quiet removed  street but close to main area of Hollywood. Easy check-in and everything was clean. Definitely recommend.
We had a very pleasant stay, the place is comfortable, modern, quiet and very close to UCLA

Great location and amazing host. I felt like at home. Close to everything using the bikes : Abbot Kinney's restaurants, the Venice Pier, and the beach. The best you can get from Venice! Thank you Vicky!
Clean, beautiful room and very comfortable bed. Easy check in and out.

Great hosts! 
A tranquil little oasis in LA.  We loved  hanging out in the backyard. 
Wonderful  collection of pets to see only if you want to.
 We'll stay there again when we're in the area .
Great host, fantastic area.  Thanks!

This was our second time staying at Martine and Adam's guest cottage, and we enjoyed the peaceful and quiet sanctuary in the midst of a hectic few days of family celebrations and crazy LA traffic!  We were able to relax and get some much needed rest. We look forward to staying here again, next time we are in town. Many thanks once again for your hospitality!
Great communication at inquiry and thereafter.

Perfect space for a couple who will be busy exploring Venice beach/ Santa Monica/ LA area. Exactly as described and pictured. Not the most convenient that the bathroom is not in the studio but it’s only a few steps away and even having to make a bathroom trip in the middle of the night was totally fine — it’s so close and in the private backyard that I didn’t even worry about putting on shoes. Nice location and quiet neighborhood close to all the action.

Me and my friends enjoyed our stay there. It was very clean. They provide free coffee and tea. Although finding a spot to park your car in the street maybe a problem if you check in late at 10pm. Overall I would definitely stay there again.

Harry and Russ's home was one of the most beautiful places I have ever stayed at. Everything from the furniture to the art to the bathroom appliances were first class. The location was also unreal as the home is 1 block from Abbott Kinney. 

On top of that, they communicated well and were waiting for me when I arrived to show me around. I would recommend anyone stay here that is looking for a great place to stay in Venice.
What a great place, stay here and you will find out for yourself.

This place was perfect and convenient. First off, Morena and her family were very welcoming and warm, couldn't ask for better host. My family and I (2  couples and 1 brother) stayed at this wonderful cozy home comfortably. We had everything we needed. We did have a small request of adding another fan to the rooms and Morena immediately brought us what we needed. I don't know the California area at all, but somehow, every place we traveled to was not far from this house. Oh, and parking and safety is NOT an issue at all. The patio is very secluded so you really get that privacy you are looking for at night, while enjoying that beautiful weather. If you are looking for something affordable, cozy, convenient. This is the place for you!!! 

Thank you Morena again for great hospitality! As I said, we will be back here again!
Very good location. Clean and comfortable.
Camille's home was immaculate and we were grateful for the excellent location in the heart of Silverlake.

Suzan’s place was perfect for a tranquil escape! 
The space is simple with great touches of design throughout.  Shower was amazing!!! The outdoor space and the ability to open all the doors for an airy feeling was a perfect combination.  The fancy electronic shades provide complete privacy + allow the balancing of light coming in as desired.
Suzan is a brilliant host and person.  Total privacy if that is your preference or a lovely cocktail and conversation if you desire.  Cannot wait to return.

Quite a gem of a place in Toluca Lake/Burbank area! Very quiet neighborhood and beautiful for taking walks! Our hosts were awesome - always checking in on us. Quaint, cozy, clean cottage. Close to everything - Trader Joe’s, Starbucks, etc.  Nicely decorated with all the comforts of home. Highly recommend staying here!

Jason's house was great.  We had a two adults, a 3 and 5 year old and an 18 year old exchange student.  The space was a little tough at night with two kids that go to bed early and a teenager, but that would have been the case no matter where we are. Loved the location, the front porch, the Silver Lake area. We loved Echo Lake Park.  Jason even let us use beach toys to spend a day, which was so awesome.

Huge, open space - great for a large group of folks. We held a group retreat here so it was nice to have the full working kitchen, several long tables, and a large space for folks. Joe was great at communicating and was able to answer all of my questions immediately. Thank you!

Adam's place is by far one of the best places I have stayed. If you want location. This is it. The place is big and spacious and close to everything. I would not hesitate to stay here again. Thanks Adam for a great stay.
Anytime I'm in long beach this is this place I would be
Very hotel-like + separate entrance makes great for privacy. It was cozy and great for our week stay. We enjoyed staying very much!!

Kevin's place is at a great location in a nice residential neighbourhood. The apartment itself is also nice, everything is as described in the listing. Kevin is an amazing host, very helpful and responds quickly.
Perfect location. There are many supermarkets and a farm market nearby. Also close to many hit brand shops. Calos is nice and willing to help.
We had a great time! The house was clean, and Michael is a very kind host. Always there to help. We would definately come back.

Ruben and Amber are the most amazing hosts ever. My stay experience at their beautiful home was super pleasant and I feel grateful to meet such a great people. Thank you both for hosting me, and I would like to highlight everything--from complimentary shower supplies to comfortable living room space--has surpassed my expectation :) I would love to come back and stay here if I had a chance. Thanks again. Yours truly, -Kosuke

Great place to stay near Beverly Hills! Everything was very comfortable, the owners were very communicative with us, I would definitely recommend this place for anyone who wants a great place in California.
We totally enjoyed our little stay in Hollywood. Herbert is an excellent host and is there for any questions or concerns. We hope to return to this cozy little studio soon.

Staying with Brendan & Stina was just perfect. The location was great, we wanted somewhere close to the Hollywood Forever Cinema, it took about 30 minutes to walk there. There was lots of food, coffee icecream within a walking distance as well. Finding parking was easy right near the apartment. I will also verify that they do like board games and have an excellent collection. We played two rounds of Carcasonne with Brendan before going to bed. The room was as described and comfy. I will look them up next time I am staying in LA.

Staying with Matt was a great experience. The house was well laid out and the bedroom was gigantic. Since the house is right near downtown, some street noise was present, but the window fan was able to drown much of it out, while keeping us cool at the same time. I would love to stay with Matt again, and recommend you do too!
Great experience!

Lizzies place is perfect. Even better than you see in pictures! The place has everything you need and more. We went with our 9 months baby and she took care of getting us a crib! The location is the best in L.A. close to everywhere but quiet at night and for walks! We would repeat the place immediately!!!!

Daryl’s place has lots of nice rooms, an old building with many stairs, and quite a lot of character. Our bed was really comfy and there were yummy snacks in our room. The dogs barked at us initially then came to visit all ‘let’s be friends’. We didn’t socialise much because we were out but the potential is there. Thanks again Daryl

They were friendly and provided fresh fruits and drinks on our first day.  They also called us ahead of time to let us know they would be waiting outside for us and provided great and easy directions.

The view is outstanding.  Guests who have limited mobility may have issues with the bed which is tucked in a nook 5' off floor with about 36" headroom.  Bed was comfortable though and there is a small bed in the living room.  The kitchen is well stocked and the view is a 10.  We had no need to interface with the hosts so I cannot comment on that.

Heidi's apartment is located in a quiet, convenient and safe community. It is close to the LAX. The apartment is new, clean and very good for 2 couples. Heidi is very responsive and prepared all the things we would need. The beach is in a short distance. Supermarket is in 5 minutes away. Definitely a great place for short stay.

Pam's Santa Monica bungalow was cozy and comfortable. My husband and I were visiting our daughter and it was perfect for the two of us. When our daughter stopped over to hang out with us, the living room was perfectly comfortable. We had a whole house to ourselves (one bedroom) which was so much better than a hotel room. Nicely decorated, comfortable and clean, Pam left us coffee and cinnamon bread for our first day. Location was great as it was close to downtown Santa Monica and beach, and an easy drive to Malibu and hiking. Bella the cat was sweet and no problem (and my husband doesn't like cats!). We fed her in the morning and she was out in the yard all day. Would stay here again!

I did not get to interact with the hosts, but the place itself was exactly what was needed.   It was very clean and accommodating.   The only issue (which the hosts had no power over) is that parking can be very troublesome.
The was one of my best airbnb experiences. So clean. So cute and so close to everything. Also the bed is so incredibly comfortable.

We spent 2 weeks in Keller's home. Great house reminiscent of the Hollywood of the 1930's Upstairs patio deck over looking the hills was a bonus. Had many a cocktail there in the evening after a hard day being a tourist.  Situated within walking distance to Hollywood Blvd, the home was perfectly located. Attended a couple of concerts at the Hollywood Bowl which was within walking distance. Keller was a great host keeping in contact and always contactable should the need arise.

Susan was very friendly and was always available for any questions, however the house can benefit from some thorough cleaning and the garden and patio are in need of some upkeep if they are to be used by guests.

If you are looking for a getaway. Lydia’s place is the best. It is away from the hustle and bustle of LA, yet only a 15 minute drive to town. Be prepared for a quiet, camping style if you come here. Excellent
Great place! Very clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend

great place, very helpful host.  clean, lots of space, and everything works perfectly.   I had no problem from inquiry to booking through checking out.   this is a large apartment that would satisfy most business travelers as well as family vacation.  the balcony is a nice added touch.    the floor plan provides some privacy for people using the on-suite from the guests using the separate bedrooms / loft.   building seems safe (I was out walking about quite late and quite early in the morning).   Everything seems new.   The rooms feel bigger to me than from looking at the pictures online.  
 
I had an overall positive experience.

Our stay in this picturesque beach house was one for the books. The bedroom was a beautiful retreat that felt very “LA”—bright, clean, and filled with plants and homey touches. The location could not have been more perfect, as we were mere steps from the beach and Venice boardwalk, where we caught the sunset. Sadie was an excellent host, and provided us with amazing local tips on where to eat, explore and park. These suggestions really made our experience memorable, as we tried out many of her recommendations to great success.  It instantly felt like a home-base that we would happily recommend to others, and return to on our next visit. Thanks Sadie!

Leslie's place was just like in pictures and he was very helpful and giving good advise on what to do and where to go in LA. He even offered to pick us from metro station with his car since it was raining when we arrived.
We were using public transportation during our stay and the place was really well located with bus stops and metro station in short walking distance. 
There was three of us staying and I think it wasn't ideal for three persons. The futon was too small for all of us (in the description only the futon was mentioned) and Leslie gave us air mattress too but with that the spacious apartment was not that spacious anymore. 
Still the futon and the air mattress were comfortable enough to sleep in! :)

The room is great, has a big space and private. 
The shower is just a little bit hard to open, but is not a big issue. I didn't meet Keene and I didn't stay long but was very comfortable. I recomend for other people for sure.
We enjoyed our stay at the Malibu cottage. The location was perfect for us when we visited our grandchildren.  Jeff was accommodating and helpful.
Place was clean and a great value! Kevin was a great host.
We really enjoyed our stay. The place was extremely clean and cozy. The location was awesome due to being close to the Beach; Hollywood; Restaurants etc. We would recommend to anyone!

Sandy is a fantastic host. From the minute that I booked the stay she made sure to make us feel welcome. She communicated everything that was important on our check in and we felt prepared arriving. Her home was lovely, from the architecture to the decorations. We felt safe and our pups really enjoyed being outside in the yard. This was our first time using airbnb. It was such a great experience and we're very thankful that we chose Sandy's home for our first stay. Will definitely stay again when the opportunity arises.

Ceren , our host , was the best , she was fantastic , as a great roommate  , she took care of me and my girlfriend perfectly . The room was very charming and the apartment has a really cute hollywood 30's charm . Location is also the best next to the grove and everything . Great week . We didn't want to leave .

All I can say is Wow. My daughters were beaming for one week straight!!  Bradley's Father was such an incredible and remarkable man. He hosted the girls who had just graduated college and made sure they were safe and knew where everything was. He took them on their own personal little tour and even bought them an ice cream.  The girls called every day and said over and over again how amazing the place was, they wanted for nothing. They felt so at home. WE WILL BE BACK for sure... Thanks for being such wonderful hosts!

Stephynie
Nice stay. You get what you pay for.
Nice apartment and host was very helpful and clear with instructions.

Upon our arrival, Perla was very accomidating as we booked the same day of our arrival. She was very flexible in the time we could check in since we were not planning on getting to her place until late in the night. The bedrooms were huge with tons of space and room to spread out and sleep. Beautiful spanish style home. Would recommend to anyone looking for some R&R for a weekend getaway.
环境很棒

I loved staying in Sue and Gideon's guesthouse. It's quiet, modern, and has a comfy bed. I didn't get to spend much time there because I was on the go a lot, but it was the perfect sanctuary to come back to.

Very warm welcome by Carrie & Paul. Glad to stay with this wonderful family for a couple of weeks. Very quiet and safe neighborhood. Will go back there again if need to. Thank you for your hospitality,
Maryam & Abraham

Tatiana's place was as described it was teeny but really nice, clean, comfortable and quiet. Quite a nice suburb with some good bars and cafes nearby. Subway to West Hollywood a close walk if you want a little more of that sortof thing. Tatiana was a friendly and helpful host who made me feel very welcome. I would definitely recommend staying there.

Haley's place is very clean and in a great location. Everything there is pretty basic/vintage, but all in good condition. As a frequent traveler to the area for work, this has pretty much everything I need for my trip.  I would stay again.

Mark is an excellent communicator.  He gave clear directions how to get to his beautiful studio and what to do upon our arrival.  He was also available at anytime for recommendations on where the best yoga studio is, the best pho, the best Mexican food, the best beaches. 
 
The studio is just as it looks in the photos and better!  The kitchen is amazing!  I had everything I needed to cook just about anything!  The studio is CLEAN!  I loved this.  It was one of my main criteria for selecting this accommodation!  We also felt extremely safe in this home.  And, parking is simple…which I learned is a big bonus in LA!

The location was fantastic…3 miles to the Santa Monica Pier.  It is walking distance to several good restaurants and to Trader Joe's, Walgreens and a large supermarket.

Mark and his family are kind and generous people.  We are happy to have met them.  We would happily rent this studio again!
Very Nice owner!

Alice's place is a perfect choice for staying in West Hollywood. Great location with parking! The room, kitchen and bathroom has all you need to rest and feel at home. The neighbourhood is fantastic. Definitely recommend this.
Azin was wonderful and very welcoming. The listing was clean and comfortably decorated, and the breakfast was a nice added touch. I would happily stay here again.

Nelda is a wonderful host.
She communicates very well.
Room was clean with all the comforts of home. Coffee too if you want it.
Will come back when in the area again.

I recently enjoyed my second visit to Romy and Marshall' guest cottage in the heart of west Hollywood.  What wonderful hosts they are! The guest cottage is also divine--spacious and meticulously clean, fully equipped, as well aa very stylish with little personal touches added by these thoughtful people designed to make guests feel at home.  The location is excellent--close to restaurants shops and other places of interest. A gem.

The indoor/outdoor living space is stunning, modern and simple. It was great coming back to the apartment after busy (Website hidden by Airbnb) peaceful. Bea & Henning were friendly, accommodating and helpful. Absolutely will try to come back sometime.

I have just came back from Linda and her family house after staying there for 10 nights.

It was a pleasure staying in this cozy lovely room, located in the heart of everything without loosing its quite athmosphere.

Linda and Gershon were very nice to me and made me feel at home.

I will definetly come back again. I found my home in LA for my frequent visits there.

Here's a sentence you'd never expect to read:  welcome to the bucolic, serene, tranquil, beautiful, and silent world of....Melrose in Hollywood.  Yes, it's true - you can find soft and gentle in the rough and tumble.  You can find a beautiful refuge in Los Angeles, and it's in the convenient location of West Hollywood.  Cyan and Anthn are gracious and caring hosts, and at the Urban Farm you'll make friends with Michelle the tortoise, Bucky the miniature horse, Root Beer the goat, and so many more animal friends.  It's like stumbling into the movie set of Babe or visiting a real-life wonderland.  The room was charming, offering everything you'll need.  We recommend the Urban Farm with enthusiasm.  We stayed upstairs, by the way.  One of our sons stayed downstairs -  a perfect arrangement.
Thank you so much for this stay ! It was perfect, super nice and clean.
David was fantastic at giving me all the information I needed pre check in. He made himself available when I wanted to chat. The place is so cute and clean! I would definitely go back!

The location of the apartment is great, not far from anywhere we wanted to visit. The apartment is very clean and fully stocked with everything we needed. The team was extremely communicative, you can expect response for any question within a few minutes 24/7. The only thing is that parking space can be a little tight if you are driving a large-sized vehicle. Thank you for being an awesome host! Will stay again!

We had a great time in Long Beach this last weekend! The apartment exceeded our expectations not only because of the cleanliness and "homey" feeling it possessed but also due to the surrounding neighborhood - you're within walking distance of the beach and some laid-back nightlife (pubs, sports bar, etc.). Ferrara is a great host! She was consistently responsive and available and she leaves very simple and clear instructions. I definitely recommend staying at this apartment.

Patrick was terrific. I arrived on his doorstep in a bit of a panic due to a situation on the ground in a previous booking and, on making the reservation through Airbnb's customer assistance, he actually left work to let me in to the house. It was perfect for my stay. The home is spacious and the kitchen fully equipped to cook (or just microwave) a meal. The view from my room was awesome, as well - beautiful, downtown LA. Very good stay, highly recommend.

Great space for a weekend getaway as a couple! There were so many great places to eat near by and a very safe neighborhood. The hosts were lovely and it was unexpected to have a fridge full of wholesome food and a bottle of wine waiting for us upon arrival. We've stayed in quite a few Airbnbs and Jan and Dale really went above and beyond to make it feel homey. Couldn't ask for anything more

Wir hatten einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in Matt's Appartement. Die Lage ist perfekt . Man kann vieles sogar zu Fuß erreichen. Was ja für LA ziemlich untypisch ist.  Das Appartement ist groß, sauber und sehr ruhig. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

Ricardo is a very helpful host. He replies immediately when you need any information and he is always ready to solve all your requests.
The apartment is very nice and fully-furnished.

ZACK was a very friendly and very patient person. We received warm hospitality and considerate arrangement from him . Thr pool was surrounded by a fence to prevent children from accidentally falling into the water, which was also very considerate. The facilities in the house were very easy to use. We've spent a very memorable time here. Thank you ZACK!

Amber and PJ's home is relaxed and chic, and they are genuinely nice people to be around, chill but kind. I slept very well in the large bed and couldn't resist a bubble bath in the deep tub! The neighborhood is quiet and nice, but close enough for a short walk to the beach.

Kevin's spacious apartment in Hollywood was a delight. Walking distance to Grauman's Chinese Theatre, Musso & Frank's and Yamashiro, I rarely used my car. The place was clean, and Kevin quickly answered any questions I might have. The apartment was lovely, and I plan to return on my next trip to Los Angeles.

Kurt is a great person, he was able to help me to stay and modify a couple of things at the last minute with the reservation. He always is willing to help and genuinely cares about his hosts. I appreciate all his recommendations and tips to navigate the city.

I had a wonderful 3 night stay in this condo just off the sunset strip. Very nice decor, comfortable apartment and the host was very helpful and the location is to die for. I heavily recommend this place and would definitely stay there again. 5 stars from me.

Beautiful, clean, modern place in a secluded part of SILVERLAKE.  Very private, very quiet.  Host is gracious and quick to respond.  Place is very lovely.  Pay attention to the listing though - the shower is not super warm and the place does not have AC.  It's spelled out in the listing but we missed it and were a bit taken aback by the cold - so just something to keep in mind.  The property itself is lovely and very well done.  In middle of a quiet, secluded garden with a view. The pictures are very accurate.
Excellent location

Great host.  Josh is a very kind man and very open and friendly if that's what you like.  Dog-friendly was a big plus for me!

Charming house, safe neighborhood.  I learned not to judge the city because K-town is pretty cool and very walkable.   

Bring your fav toiletries, filtered water, coffee- especially if you're particular, like me!  Also, it's LA but it's a little chilly at night.

My sister and I had a lovely time staying at this charming airbnb. It was exactly as the pictures depicted and was very, very clean and tidy! It was located in a perfect spot; a short walk to the beach and close to the bus stop that takes you down to the beach, which was especially nice for late evenings out! We had a wonderful time and would definitely stay here again upon our next visit to the West coast.
Christiane is a lovely host! Very communicative. We also loved the modern kitchen and all of the amenities (bubbly and snacks on arrival for our NYE stay)!

Beautiful home, clean, and comfortable beds. The location is also fabulous - one block away from everything. Will definitely use it again in the future. Vince was very kind and responded quickly to any question I had.
Tony's room is really well equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. He was also very accommodating to my last minute booking. The check-in procedure was the simplest.

Fran place was so perfect and exactly what we needed for our stay on the island, a clean comfortable place to shower and sleep. Super close to all the restaurants and getting to the activities Catalina has to offer. I will be back! Thank you and your.
Super cool location and great accommodations. I loved it

Audrey's place is definitely a special getaway in Claremont. The place was super peaceful and clean and it feels like home. Audrey, herself, is amazing and has a great personality to help make guest feel welcomed.
Cute, private, leafy place, good for hanging out on the little front porch.
LOVED this place. Very clean. Just as pictured in a super safe location. My party of 4 appreciated the brand new amenities. My husband and I are already planning a return trip!

This spot is a gem. Literally a 45 second walk from the beach, plenty of space and very cosy. The area is very nice with restaurants and stores close by. John's hospitality was awesome and added a nice touch, he recommended great places to eat and visit and also offered bikes, beach chairs and surf boards for use.  Had a really awesome time, location and hospitality can't be beat.
Nick was very friendly and the place was nice and clean.

Michelle was very understanding about check in and out times. She made sure we were able to check in smoothly and was very responsive to all questions we had. The place was very clean and had everything you may need. As a bonus the bed was very comfortable and made the stay even better.
Kat was a fantastic host. Very communicative, super flexible to address my check in schedule and shared some great mango with me to welcome me into her home to top it all off! Thanks Kat. 5 stars.

Really good place for a stay over when arriving/departing from LAX. Despite not meeting the host, check-in was easy with the provided instructions and communication was quick and effective.

The rooms a are clean with attention to detail such as water, tissues, slippers being provided.
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
住在这里非常方便，超巿就在不远处，还有车位放置车辆，离好莱坞星光大道也很近，渡过一段美好时光。非常非常感谢房东。
Great landing pad. Did not meet Jessy as I was having phone problems but she was easy to communicate with and the apartment was clean and cozy. Perfect landing pad for a short trip!

Sonya was very responsive and clear on answering all my questions. She was very friendly. Checking in and checking out were smooth. I like that she even provided slippers, towels/toiletries, blanket, pillow, and light breakfast for the guest. The place was very homely, plus the couch was very comfortable. Lastly, the location was perfect. Overall, the stay was worth the price. Since this was my first time using airbnb I didn't know what to expect, so Sonya made a good first impression for me.

Beth and Erlend are really fantastic host and made us feel at home in this beautifully designed space! We loved the location in Exho Park, Silver Lake around the corner and so close to Downtown! Just fantastic!! We'll be back!

Great place at the center of Los Angeles. The apartment was very clean and taken care of. Lots of amenities in the unit such as irons, shampoo, etc. Jeremy was an amazing host. He was very on top of things and was constantly updating me about the situation of the unit (ready for early checkin). He was very accessible, and responded very quickly to questions. Had a fantastic stay here.

Juli is one of the best hostesses we met. Her place was sparkling clean, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. And what's most important she and her husband are very nice people always there for you and happy to help. Definitely recommend the place!
It was nice to be secluded and comfortable yet so close to everything

Great location.  Loved the decor.  Clean, comfortable.  Centrally located.  Quiet, residential neighborhood.  Neighbors were friendly.  Peggy gave impeccable directions in how to access her place.  We'd definitely stay here again.  Thank you Peggy for being such a great host.

The hosts were very welcoming and responsive throughout our stay. The house was spacious and full of creativity with breathtaking views.  We were there for our sons wedding and it was wonderful to come back to the house to relax and wind down.  Would highly recommend staying there.
Great unit for our short stay in LA for our needs! Private parking also was provided which was stress free. Was perfect for us as we needed to be close to Cedar Sinai hospital. Would stay again.
Bre was welcoming and made my stay in L.A. enjoyable. The place was small but clean and I would recommend it to friends.
Deborah's place was magnificent and she was a wonderful host, I hope to stay again in the future =)

Sage Hill cabin is perfect, if you're looking for peace and quiet, romance, or just a lovely relaxing place in Malibu, this is it.   The cabin was perfect for us;  a cozy, comfy bed, a sleeper sofa, kitchenette (with microwave and electric cooking plate), pot belly fireplace, nice bathroom, and gorgeous outdoor space, including a deck, jacuzzi, and horse ranch which you can explore.   The property is beautiful.   Serene.  Our host, Gabrielle, is just wonderful.   She treated us to a bottle of wine from the Sage Hill estate, and it was quite good.  The cabin is truly a wonderful getaway.  We will return, but next time we will plan for more time!    Bring a picnic or some dinner, you won't want to go out... true rest & relaxation here!

We loved our hostess, Nay, and her place felt like home to us.  We were really sorry to leave!  The location is great--cool ocean breeze, great restaurants nearby, as well as close to the Culver City bus route.   Nay is such a warm, caring, and fun person.   We talked a lot, and now really feel like we have a new close friend.  The bed and room were very clean and comfortable, with plenty of  room in the closet to hang our clothes.  We were able to keep food in the refrigerator and cook, which was a big help.  We would definitely like to stay with Nay again.
Clean and comfortable, with a cute puppy to play with. What more do you need?

Me and my friends loved staying here. The place was clean, convenient to travel to and from, spacious. The only thing is that I wish there was another bathroom. It was 8 of us staying there and it gets difficult to get ready when there is only one bathroom. However, we knew that coming in. 

Nonetheless, the place was a great stay! I would recommend!

Sam's house was great!  Plenty of room with a nice yard and a great view.  Sam couldn't have been a better host- there was fruit, nuts, coffee,  milk,  juice, and more. We were told to help ourselves to anything. All the comforts of home!
Staying at Diana's was amazing! The rooms are reasonable spacious and super comfortable. Thank you for letting us staying at yours Diana! (... and also for saving our lives) Highly recommended.
Kristy had endless snacks and ramen for us! Beautiful balcony view and super comfy bed. :-)

This was a 5-minute walk to the beach and so was a great location to be in if you want to be in that area! We were able to rent bikes nearby (seemed quite a bit cheaper than the places that were on the beach just a couple of blocks away) and cycle along to Santa Monica and beyond. It was also only a 15-20 minute drive to the airport and so that made life very easy.

Because of the nature of the apartment complex, we had to meet in the parking lot nearby to pick up the key and parking pass but this was very easy and communication was great!

The apartment is perfectly comfortable and clean and there's a kitchen too if you want to use it although we spent most of our time exploring LA and the nearby areas. We would highly recommend it!
This place felt like home.  Very comfortable.  Dora was extremely responsive to our needs and even accommodated us last minute.  I am grateful and would stay here again!

Allison's place was great. Communication was very clear which made check in and check out a breeze. The apartment building was one of the nicest I've ever seen. I would definitely recommend this place to other travelers.

We really enjoyed staying at Tatiana's place.  It has a ton of character and it's obvious that she puts a lot of love and care into her home.   The backyard is beautiful with multiple spaces to enjoy coffee or a chat.  The cats are friendly and make the home especially appropriate for cat lovers.
Alles wie beschrieben. Besonders gut waren sie kostenlosen Fahrräder, mit denen man in 10 Minuten am Strand ist. Carly hat super Tipps und ist im Haus nebenan immer zu erreichen. Sehr gerne wieder!
Great place, great hosts! Looking forward to my next stay.

The pictures do not do this place justice. The new renovated place is great! The view out the windows is top notch as it over looks the beach, reminding you that you just have to walk out the front door to enjoy it!

I definitely recommend this place. I paid to get the parking pass from the host and it worked out great to park my rental car.
Luca is a wonderful host. He communicated well with us and checked in to be sure that all was going well. His home is immaculate and very very comfortable. We had an excellent experience!
Great house with awesome views of LA. Perfect spot for anyone wanting a more authentic LA experience

Vikki is a super nice host!
The location is perfect.Easy access to restaurants and market. The room is clean and warm. Everything needed has been provided.
Highly recommended!
Everything was exactly as described.  Ciuin, reached out prior to my arrival several times to make sure I had all the correct info.
Beautiful stylish apartment. Really great host very responsive to your needs. Quiet rooms, very clean. We will stay here next time we are in Los Angeles.

Everything was perfect. An easy self check in. Everythig what we needed was there. The aprtment is nice decorated and we felt home from the start on. Juri our little son liked it also. 
The location was perfect for us. 

We do not need anything from Jen, but we know that she would be accesebul if we need her. 

We will stay again at Jen's hous, when we are back in LA.
Greg and Travis have a lovely space. We felt very welcome and the accommodations were beyond our expectations. We had a great stay and would definitely go again!
Todo muy perfecto. La comunicación fue excelente.  Lo recomiendo totalmente.
Alison was a wonderful hostess! The room and bathroom were clean and spacious. Wish we could have stayed longer and explored the area a bit. Thanks again, Alison!

The host Armin, is a great dude that will help you find great places to eat, drink, or party. This Airbnb is an artist loft located in the center of the arts district. Great area and place if your young, like to party a bit, and overall down with some grunge here and there as the location is very similar to the revitalization of mid town Detroit.  The area once was decayed. Now it’s filled with art’s lifts and creative spaces, thus bringing the area to a new found look and use. Great food in every direction of the Airbnb too. Try urth cafee, eighty two bar, and chairman .

The one positive point I can think of is that this home has a good location and is near some tourist attractions.

However, there were a series of events that explain my rating.
The hosts did not feel very cordial and made us feel uncomfortable during our stay. Before the trip started they emailed stating that they were very busy and asked us to delay our arrival and checkout earlier! We had 2 extra last-minute members in our group. We had to accommodate them which we did without troubling the hosts or making the home untidy. They didn't seem to like this and one day when we were not home, they entered the home for inspection and complained to Airbnb that there was some "unusual behavior" on our side! On the day we were leaving they came home to count the number of people and inspected the home again. We left the home in a great condition. It was an unpleasant experience staying here and I wouldn't recommend staying with the hosts again. Here're some additional points:

1. No Dishwasher.
2. They have 2 bathrooms but only one of them is useful. The other bathroom is of the size of an airplane bathroom and is too difficult to use.
3. Thermostat was not working properly.
4. Clothes Dryer and washer is very old and dryer was not working well.
Great communication with host, apartment as described, very clean and great location. Host gave good, clear instructions and everything was a breeze. We'd definitely stay again.
William is a great host and provided lots of help for me! Will definitely come again if I ever get back to LA!

Very good location.
Walk to Chinese theater.

The location is perfect! Right next to Hollywood Blvd and that is exactly what I wanted. The parking is pretty scarce so i would recommend the parking if you have a rental car. 

The apartment was nice, definitely a crash pad, i didn't expect too much and it was perfect in terms of style. The owners do have very specific instructions so make sure you pay attention. I did however find the check in process very odd however the host was able to accommodate me very quickly.

I was there two nights and I would definitely go back. The place is pretty small so i would not recommend more than 2 people 3 max!
A must stay if you are looking for a great place close to Universal Studios. Juli is friendly, helpful and very welcoming.

Spent a week at Amir's place in Westwood. Everything was exactly as described, and the apartment was clean upon arrival. The location is great and safe in a very quiet complex. Private parking with a designated spot was nice. Check in and check out were super easy as well. Can't say enough about this AirBnB!

I only stayed for 4nights at Patrick's place. He was very nice, welcoming and helpful by giving me recommendations. My room was just perfect for these few days; I could get ready in the morning without waiting for the bathroom and come back at night to sleep. The place is on a very convenient location since there are bus stops 1-2blocks away and I used only public transportation to go downtown, Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, etc. Note that public transportation takes over an hour to get to BH or SM, but it was not a problem for me because I left early in the morning. I warmly recommend anyone to stay at Patrick's place, I had a great overall experience!

A convenient place to stay. I had a week-long class at Fuller Seminary and was pleased with Tosha's place. It was clean and had everything that I needed. She is a great host and attentive to my needs. The house is close to the Lake street and Colorado street which have ample shopping, theater, and restaurants.

Steph and Corrine were fantastic hosts, just as all the other reviews said. They were home throughout the duration of our stay and were wonderfully hospitable, accommodating, and had some  great conversation. Really enjoyed our time here and would highly recommend staying here - especially if you are attending an event at the Fairplex, it was a great location. Thanks again!

Albert's place worked wonderfully! I only stayed one night, but it was a great place to rest. He made it very easy to check in, and was clear on instructions.

Just do better at reading check in/check out times than I did. There is not much flexibility because of his cleaning schedule.

The room and bathroom I stayed in was large and roomy. Comfy bed with great (safe) windows to open for cool nights. Beautiful access to the refreshing pool. Walkable to many things including area stores, restaurants and Manhattan Beach, shops and Pier. Precious and safe neighborhood to get out and about in. I walked to my office each day while there. Large TV available in living area versus room (too great of an area to sit still anyway!) Didn't use the kitchen but was fully equipped. Rita left a few nice snacks too, one of which is now my new fav treat! Truly great area, home and host!!

Liping was more than a gracious host! She was friendly and welcoming from the beginning. She made sure I had fresh towels, sheets, and blankets. The room was very spacious and clean. 
She's super quick at responding and is always available if you need anything. I will definitely be staying again.
Great place to sleep and explore the city

We loved it. Out of all the other guests who came to the wedding we had the nicest house. Having  breakfast in the garden was a lovely way of starting the day.
The only thing I missed was a hair dryer.
A BIENTOT
Suzanne Clayton
Really enjoyed my quick stay at Thomas's apartment. Parking was much appreciated, location was great, and communication was extremely clear and prompt. Apartment had all the amenities I needed.

This was our first air bnb stay and it went great! Andy was great at accommodating our check in time!! Very friendly and allowed us to park in his driveway. He always responded right away making us feel at ease.

This was my first Airbnb experience ever. 
Glecy was very helpful and communication with her was no problem at all. Sadly we couldnt meet her because she wasnt in the city meanwhile our stay. 
Our stay was pretty comfortable and other guests were very nice. What I should also mention is that we quite expected it to be actuall Glecy's house and that we will be living there with her. Until the very last moment when we entered the house, we had no idea that this is guest only house as it seems. It was nowhere clearly stated or maybe I am just not seeing it. We did not really mind, but just saying it might be useful to someone. 
House was cleaned and room was beautifull, comfortable and spacious. Looked like in a perfect hotel, we had towels and shower gels available for our use.
I would be expecting a little bit more of equipment in the kitchen, especially table knives. There was just one for 5 people in a house, what is quite funny.
What I've really appreciated was close shopping centre with big cheap groceries like smart & final and awesome restaurants just like Pei Wei and others - 5 minutes walk. Also if you are using public transport, there is metro bus stop just in front of the house.
Thank you Glecy once more and maybe see you next time?
Host responds with lightning speed and is a good person. Cool guy and nice place. Bed is comfy and it's a nice place.
Convenient in Pasadena. Great hosts. Good value. Recommended.

Jen's place is very well situated. I was able to get around the city and the beaches with ease. The neighborhood is very scenic and walkable. The room was comfortable and clean. Jen provided a lot of travel essentials and the fridge with drinks was a bonus! I would definitely stay there again.

Randi and George are a wonderfully charming couple and couldn't  have been any more hospitable
Their apt in Malibu is what we were exactly looking for, Secluded, woodsy and clean.   Close to all points in Malibu, hiking trials, mountains and the ocean with restaurants and shops all within a close car ride.  We plan on returning sometime in the future with the rest of our clan 


Matt & Jodi

I liked my stay there but few key details would have made it so much better: 
- check in not facilitated , poor communication
- I though I was going to an apartment while I realized when I arrived it was a hostel with many rooms not one actually lives there
- no soap or shampoo in 1 of the 2 bathroom , no handsoap anywhere for 3 DAYS!!! I told the girl at the Reception , she could just ansmer me : I don't know, I'll pass the message. But nothing has been made...
- they give you ear plugs and sleeping mask, if you are a light sleeper like me you will need them.

Good points :
- peaceful and very minimalist design
- Other guest were quiet and nice
- Location
- Coffee bar downstairs
