The miscommunication and the complete abscence of anyone responsable on site made my stay "ok" instead of good or great
Chris' house is really fantastic. Close to the best places in Silverlake and still very quiet and surrounded by beautiful nature. Go for it!

Thank you to you and Molly for making me feel so welcome. I had a great time staying with you and appreciate your genuine hospitality, I felt like I was staying with good friends.
Olivia

Three words, wow, wow, wow! Our stay at HollywoodHome Suite was amazing. My wife and I enjoyed every bit of our experience in this remarkable place. The entire home was as shown in the photos, beautiful and clean. We were only about 10 minutes walkingdistance from the Hollywood sign and to Hollywood blvd. Our trip in LA could'nt have been any better. On our first day after we settled in our suite, just outside as we are about to jump into our our vehical I come accross a celebrity, CLIFF CURTIS, walking down the same street. He was so kind to take pictures with us and then asked us for a lift to his car parked a couple blocks down.... it was awesome. So who knows what encounters you may come across in ur stay at this memorable habitat. Thank you Mariam and ur sweet mother for your outstanding hospitality and beautiful home you provided us. Hope to see you soon again.
Amazing location for beach lovers. Best deal to be found in walking distance to so many beaches, restaurants, etc.

The apartment was comfortable and really well located.  The kids enjoyed the pool and other facilities.  It is a little tricky to find your way around, so be sure to ask for specific directions.  Emi and Oscar were really fast at responding and very responsive to our changing arrival time.  Check-out was equally easy.  Great to have the secure parking.  Walking distance from the staples center, Chinatown, Olvera St etc.
Clean, comfortable & in an exceptional area of Studio City. Great for a single woman who wants to feel very safe in the big city of LA. Unique!
Great apartment. Having private parking space is a definite advantage.
Place was great!!!! Hope to come back soon!!!!!

I stayed for 2days and Emilee was nice and friendly! The apartment is super close to Hollywood(just one minute walk) and hollywood metro was super close so it is easy to take metro to universal studio! (next station from hollywood) Also, everything was comfortable and clean. I really thank to Emilee for everything because I really enjoyed and safe while I was staying at Emilee's apartment!
I would like to book again for my next trip to LA!

First time in Downtown LA and this was the perfect place to stay. I didn't have a lot of time to spend in LA, so I really appreciated the efficiency of finding the place, getting inside, and having everything I needed. I was able to make the most of my time, and had a comfortable, central place to use as a home base. Thanks Adrian!
If you know L.A this house is in perfect location and looks amazing

Steve's place is exactly as described. It is calm, serene and a zen. From the moment I arrived, to the moment I left, I felt so comfortable and relaxed.  I highly recommend staying with him. You will walk in being an airbnb guest and walk out being friends! An amazing house and an amazing host!!!
Everything was great!!!A small cute place that makes you feel like 'real home'.

Great house. I had wonderful time to stay here :) I really recommended if you have a car. They are so friendly and like to do activities. 
If I visit at LA again, absolutely reserve it.

Very nice and spacious apartment. Clean and had everything we needed. Comfortable bed. 
Perfectly located in Hollywood, just a few minutes from the walk of fame... Also highway entrance is right around the corner, however the traffic wasn't disturbing at all. Also the building is nice (Pop Physique on the ground floor is recommendable for sporty girls :-D)
Rose is a very nice and friendly host, very helpful and always available.
Any time again!

Heather's house was very beautiful and tidy. The store room and her cute dog Scout were much more impressive. Even though Heather was a little bit busy but she still make us feel her friendliness and hospitality. We like her kitchen and dinning room. Also the lovely dog is so cute that made us very relax and happy.

Hope that we will come back again someday in the future. This is definately a good choice and unforgettable experience.

Thanks Heather!

Zike & Elaine

Chris's place was great, in a great location (we had a rental car), and suited our needs.  He left us a couple waters in the mini fridge and a welcome snack, beach/bath & hand towels to use, allowed use of washer/dryer, and refilled hand towels and toilet paper sometime around second day, which was unexpected and nice.  

Overall the place and bed sheets etc were clean, and the back yard with fire pit was very nice (though we didn't use the fire pit, it was ready with wood and would have been great if we were home enough to have time to use it)  

Admittedly, though, one thing was I forgot there was no ac, so it was just a little warmer than I expected (there is a fan inside, and also a window fan which helped).  During the day it was a little toasty but we weren't home much in the daytime anyway so it wasn't so bad.  In the evening of course Cali weather cools down enough it was much more comfortable - I personally was mostly fine since I usually run cold, but my husband and daughter seemed a just a little warm.

Chris was responsive to a few questions I had for him during the stay as well.  We didn't run into the home owners at all during the stay so it was quite private (not to say I would have minded meeting them), and check in was flexible and easy peasy.  

The flexibility was really great, and was one of the main reasons I booked here, since our flight arrived in the morning, and we had our 13mo old, so we wanted to get settled as soon as we got in.

Nice quiet neighborhood, the street parking in front of the house was fine - plenty of spots, and free.  Location was great- less than 10 mins drive from Venice beach and Santa Monica, maybe 25 mins from LAX.  Many good places to eat in the area.  Would recommend, and would stay again if the opportunity arose.

Thank you, Chris!
Brielle was an excellent host.
Erika's place is super cute and at an unbeatable location. Communication and key exchange couldn't have been smoother. A great stay.

Nice place, great location. Check in was easy, and street parking was fine (didn't have to use garage). Eric was super nice and responsive. Dropped a star due to some shabby furnishings (bedding, couch), but otherwise a good experience, would stay again. Thanks!
I wish I own it😂
The place was great! Very clean and quiet and well decorated. Sara, Stephen and Dave are very friendly and even checked up on me during my stay. I'd love to stay with them again in the future.

I spent one night for next day's flight. Stephen's place is close to LAX, several minutes' driving distance in a quiet and convenient district.
I have to say he has a really big and well decorated bathroom! Perfect for a hot shower and relax. Both front door and guest room need digital code for entry. I felt safe in his place.
Besides Stephen is really considerate. Clean and tidy room prepared for guests, well equipped kitchen if needed. Recommend!
Great host, great communication, gave us ideas to go visit and gave us privacy.

The house is newly decorated. Though there is a little bit smell of new decoration, it disappears when open the window. Everything is good, easy  check in, with tidy kitchen, cozy bed, bright shower room and enough space for luagges.  And the place locates nearby the Korean town which super convenient access to delicious food. The garage is functional and the area looks quite safe. It's a delightful experience in LA. THANK YOU.
We loved it so much that we came back :)

Our hosts made us feel very welcome, there was lots of useful information and the house was very well equipped, clean and comfortable. It was easy to use all the appliances. The area was lovely and it was nice and quiet at night. It was great to have a yard with comfortable seating and also the parking space was a bonus. We would recommend this property to anyone looking to stay in the Venice area as it is perfectly located and a great place to stay. Thanks Kevin and Carrie for making our Christmas break fantastic.
Great location and a welcoming host. Thanks Christina!

Location location location - about a 1/2 mile walk to Abbot Kinney for restaurants, shopping etc. We also used the bikes to get to the beach. Charming small space for a couple. Functional kitchen and bathroom.
Nice area with easy access to Venice Beach area. Great apartment with plenty of room and a nice service minded host.

Rose Ann's place is exactly as described. Upon arriving, I realized I hadn't received check-in instructions, but Rose Ann quickly sent those over and we got settled in shortly after. The studio unit is private enough for 2 people and getting in and out of the property was a breeze.
Good place to stay for big family
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Everything you see in the pictures is what you get. It is super clean and is very nice and private.
Great place with character. Always stay there while visiting LA
Excellent location, great neighborhood and very communicative owners.  House manager also very helpful for check in or questions.

I booked Rozina's place for my parents, who were visiting from Brazil, and they had the most wonderful time!! The guesthouse is spacious, the bed is super comfortable and the shower is great. My parents don't speak much English, but still Rozina went above and beyond to make them feel welcomed - she was simply a wonderful guest!
Ellen was very accomodating and made our check-in as flexible as possible. Her home-made banana bread, yogurt and granola were really nice to start our morning with. The dogs were really adorable.
It was cool

I don't recommend this "room". On arriving I was not at all well welcomed by Melodie. She wasn't glad to host me. She didn't showed her apartment. About the so  tiny "room" where I slept, the ceiling is so low that I felt really oppressed, it was a very very bad experience. the pillowcase was yellow, smelling of perfume, certainly the previous traveler. the bathroom was not clean, the trash was overflowing with waste, the light is so weak that I had to use the light from my phone at night to shower. This service is overpriced  for the prestation. I advise you to pay a little more and to feel comfortable. At avoid ! I was so happy to leave this place after 3 nights...

Lovely apartment in a great location. Once we parked the car, we didn't need to use it again. Easy walk to iconic venues in Hollywood. A really lovely place to come home to after busy days. Communication with T.C was easy at all times. We had a great experience and would recommend this to anyone visiting Hollywood.

The place was just as described in the description. Great location with many walkable options to drink and eat!. The host was very communicative and straight forward. He always responded quickly. In addition, the place is clean! I'm very appreciative of the host hospitality.
Clean, quiet, affordable. Thanks! (Bring your own towels)
good

Jason's place is very clean and comfortable. I am long time Airbnb user and Jason's house was a very positive one! Jason was very friendly and accommodating. The location was perfect, I would recommend Jason's place to anyone traveling to LA area!

Super nice experience, our second airbnb we usually host people more than being guest and we loved it! The apartment, and the rooms are very clean, all is new, loved the situation in the art district and Café Gratitude is the best just down the street :)
Thank you Jeremiah, we will come back for our next California trip!!
Freyda was a great host, and I very much enjoyed my stayed. Her place was large, clean, and comfortable.
David and Tona's place is a charming and well-located flat! You will definitely have an amazing trip if you stay here and listen to their local-insider tips :)
A solid stay for my wife and I for four nights. Very convenient to the stores and restaurants on Abbot Kinney.

We had a large group (9 people) come down for a gaming tournament at Staples Center. When I first arrived I was thrilled at the space and the layout - plenty of beds and lots of room for us to hang out. The open concept living/dining room area made it perfect for watching TV together without being too crowded. The house is in a great neighborhood, with close access to a Vons and other amenities. Lyft/Uber services were able to get us with no issue as well. Overall, a fantastic choice for large groups going to LA - we're planning on booking this place again for Anime Expo next year!
Wendy非常热情,有活力,给了我们很多帮助。虽然英语不好,交流有限,但她家两只可爱的宠物也带给我们家的感觉。房间正如图片看到的,非常宽敞,干净。地理位置也很理想,有私人地下停车场,非常好。
Esteban was so wonderful and sweet! He communicated very well and made sure everything was clean and in order. Excellent location!

Upon arrival, Roger kindly invited us in and gave us a brief tour. He then described the multitude of dining options and things to do in the neighborhood. The home was lovely and the private bathroom was extremely convenient. We were looking for a quiet, secluded place to rest for the last leg of our trip, and Roger and his family provided the level of solitude that we were looking for. We also loved that it was within walking distance of Universal Studios. The hot tub was a nice perk, as well. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would happily recommend it.

Well the location of good, the house is large enough for 2 people and we really appreciated all the instructions provided. Another good feature is very good shower pressure, Netflix Hulu etc.
I am absolutely satisfied with our stay and wish we could Boone it for a longer period.

Great place to stay. Excellent communication from booking to check in. Room was clean and tidy. The host is very knowledgeable of the immediate surrounding area as well as downtown LA. Would really recommend for anybody visiting the area.
Great stay! Would return and stay again, hosts were super friendly as well.

I felt very welcomed and I enjoyed staying here. I was a bit disappointed that I wasn't able to cook during my stay, but it's no big deal. They're very sweet people and if I have a chance I will be coming back here!

I want to say the Host was the best hostess I've ever had doing Airbnb.  I would recommend him to anyone of my freinds and family.  I needed to get into the property early to make an appointment and he was so nice to give me what i needed but I accidently went in before time running into a current resident.  I apologized to the host and the people being hosted.  It was entirely my fault for the confusion and he was very professional with the mix up.  So if your looking for a great place and a hostess who will accomodate you even in a tight bind this is your place.

We had a decent stay for a week at this place. The description matches the unit but it is kind of tight on space and lacks privacy if you open the drapes/windows. We had a couple of issues (heater and wifi) which the host resolved in some time. Location is good for exploring Venice/Santa Monica but closest beach is  ~20 mins walk. I expected better value for money for this place.
Super end suite space walking distance from SM shops and shore. Sterling was a great host
Great Location!  Great Host!
One of my favorite places I've stayed in La so far, very close to everything!
Great location, neighboorhood was quiet. Room and attached bathroom both clean and convenient.
Really nice big room with couch and desk and private bath and private entrance. Very quiet too.

Betty and T are friendly, lovely hosts. The private room, bath, and walk-in closet were all clean and spacious, and worked well for a business trip to downtown LA. Linens and towels are basic and perfectly adequate; bed was comfortable, the apartment complex surprisingly quiet (week nights) and I slept well. Hair dryer provided.

John was a good host. There were some hiccups with the stay but John was accommodating. The room was minimalistic; there was a bed, a nightstand/drawer, a fan, and a chair. It's plenty if you just need a place to sleep during your trip. You also have access to a full kitchen. Just don't expect bells and whistles. In the end, we enjoyed our stay.
Armando made our first stay with Airbnb easy and stress-free! We had a complete understanding of how to check-in and out. As for the place itself, it was very clean & a feeling of being at home!
the appartment was large and very clean, well furnished, as advertised; and the staff extremely considerate and responsive

This is a great location, walking distance, to east hollywood walk of fame, wax museums, restaurants, etc. short drive to west Hollywood and Beverly Hills area. Also 15 minutes to Universal. In a city this large to be close located is time wise. Place was confortable and clean, modern and quite. Place was warm when we got there as the AC was off so it take some time to have the rooms really cool. We were 6 people and fit perfectly, our family really enjoy the stay.

Melanie's place was super cute, quiet and cozy. Their communication was great & they were very helpful with any questions I had. The location was superb and the backyard was a great little area to hang out in.
Great location. No air conditioner, no coffee maker, no beach towels. Close to everything.
This was our second stay at Natali's place. It's an amazing place and we will be back for sure.
Perfect place to stay! The apartment was beautiful and clean. Communication was easy and they always responded quickly. If you're looking at staying downtown this is the place to do it!
Kristen's beach cottage was absolutely perfect! Kristen was super accommodating, would highly recommend! Thanks for the great stay.
Ea war soweit top, Noel und Abril waren sehr nett und kommunikativ. Wir haben alle Informationen für die Region zeitnah erhalten. Danke es war ne tolle Zeit in Californien

For us this was both a wonderful facility and also in a great location.  The unit was clean, freshly appointed and quite comfortable.   The bed was a delight and the shower equally enjoyable.  The kitchen was well appointed for the ambitious, and for those not so ambitious there was cable TV, Wi-Fi, and a cozy couch.  The patio was my favorite, and even though we were there during very cold weather for LA, I enjoyed coffee and reading on it every morning.  The patio is private and secluded with a view a garden that is a few steps down, and also of the iconic LA hillside neighborhood where this is located.  A great coffee shop and other amenities were within easy walking distance.  We had appointments in Pasadena and Burbank, and both were a short drive with only moderate traffic.  Our hosts were congenial and wanted to make sure we had a relaxing stay.

Jake's place is located conveniently close to downtown Long Beach, with a parking very reasonably priced which is a big plus for staying in Long Beach. The place is clean with some nice decorations. Jake left us bottled water and snacks, which we enjoyed very much!

Very relaxing in a beautiful and tranquil setting. It was the perfect location in the Malibu hills for relaxing a bit off the grid. Well maintained with lovely original mid-century modern style, I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Malibu.
The pictures do not do the house justice, it was a beautiful house hidden in a quiet neighborhood. I will definitely book this place whenever I come out to LA again.

Quiet and characterful in my favourite part of LA. Close to Hillhurst (Jeni's Ice Cream), Vermont (The Dresden) and Griffith Park and Observatory. Comfortable bed, fast WiFi, good water pressure in the shower, quiet neighbours, and a very welcoming and accommodating host. Cheers Ben

I thought the staff was really welcoming and kind. However, I was disappointed to find out there was a club right next door that was really loud and playing music until 2am ish on a Tuesday night. It was the last thing I wanted to hear after a long flight. Most of the people there were travelers and nice people. I'm not sure I would stay there again, but other than the club I thought they were pretty transparent for what you were getting.
很不错的位置
The space is beautiful, with everything you need to have a great time. Lily was a great host and everything went exceptionally well.

Nem's apartment was wonderful, and had everything one needs; i felt like i had my own home in LA!
The apartment is a ten minute walk from the red line train which takes you everywhere you need to go, and only 4 stops to the Hollywood walk of fame, there are also buses at the top of his street that take you everywhere, whether it be to santa monica or griffith observatory.
Nem was a sweetheart and i recommend his place for your vacation in LA!

Anita's place was just as it was in the photos, very clean, comfortable, beautiful and pleasant.  Also, its location is incredibly convenient and close to the Grove, shops and grocery stores. It was in a safe gated community. Anita was a wonderful host although we never met. She contacted us many times on the first day to make sure that we had settled in comfortably. She was extremely responsive and made all necessary arrangements for our access to her place simple and easy. I would definitely stay at Anita's place again the next time I visit LA.
The host canceled this reservation 65 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

For the price, location and purpose of our stay the room was fine. We basically needed a central place to sleep. The shower was pretty small however, I'm 5'5 and 145-150 lbs and had a hard time fitting without accidentally touching the walls. Bring your own shower flip flops, soap, hand towel and bath towels. You will be provided with one towel each which wasn't enough for me but is probably enough for most. There is shampoo, conditioner & body wash available in the shower but no bar soap. Luckily there is a CVS a few blocks away. A short uber ride away from many popular Hollywood restaurants & entertainment. I didn't see a wifi password I'm guessing the room didn't have wifi because it wasn't in our welcome binder. Lastly parking is kind of annoying as there is no overnight parking on Beverly OR on the street the house is on, only across the street which can be a little inconvenient. The host was very helpful upon check in and very quick to respond to messages.
Had a great time! The place is really nice and clean and located within minutes of the great scenic locations.
Patrick is a great dude! he was very helpful during my stay there. Room and over all house was clean.
Dennis's place was very clean and he was very easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend it to budget travelers who want to be close to the amenities of Koreatown.

The location of the apartment is perfect: 10 min walk to the metro station in a calm neighborhood. The room was big and also the bathroom, the last one a little bit dirty as the kitchen that actually we didn't use. However blankets and towels were fresh clean and Panya is very kind and available.

The Country Cabin was amazing - we had a terrific stay! The woodburning stove heated the space well and added charming ambiance to the room. The nights were a bit cooler (January) and two additional space heaters more than did the trick. 
The cabin was clean and bright and the location was perfect. 
The shower proved tricky to get just right when it came to temperature and there wasn't much pressure but the view from the bathroom (funny I know) more than compensated!
I would highly recommend staying here.

Phill and Clayo were very welcoming. I sincerely enjoyed the atmosphere of their home, which offered wonderful art, lovely jazz music and a sweet pup. The breakfast set-up featured foods I usually eat for breakfast (cereals, fruit and toast, etc. with tea or coffee) and, importantly, stimulating conversation. Although I didn't walk around too much during my short visit, I felt very safe in their neighbourhood. The room was clean and comfortable.

JK's place is beyond what I expected at first. The house is very nicely decorated with pictures. The kitchen is very well-equipped so I saved a lot of money by cooking at home. Bedroom and shower room are clean too. The hot shower is functioning well. Overall, we really enjoy our stay in this place.
Marie was very helpful and nice. It was an overall seamless experience and talk about a perfect location in West Hollywood!

Melissa was a wonderful host. She responded promptly to all communication and made everything about our stay easy to arrange. The space is nicely furnished and comfortable with plenty of room. It was conveniently located near many attractions in Hollywood as well as Los Feliz.

This was the perfect place to be for a long layover from LAX. I was in walking distance to a ton of restaurants, bike and foot paths along the beach, and less than $15 Uber to the airport. Eva was thoughtful and made the garage available to me even though I didn't have a car, kept out a coffee pot on the desk and shampoo in the shower, and made sure that the accommodations were perfectly spotless before I arrived. I also appreciated her warm welcome.
It was great time staying here, wonderful locate near beach. Nice
The room was very spacious, extremely clean, and well decorated. Hachy and her husband were very accommodating. The location was really convenient as well. I would definitely stay there again!

Daniel has been an outstanding host. I am not an easy person to please because i have high standards but he replied to me and made things happen. I truly had a great stay. The cottage was as described and felt very comfortable. The place is very quite and all interiors are new. If you like the hollywood area this is the best place you can get to. The outdoor patio is wonderful and gives you that extra space. Daniel made everything perfect and he is a great human being and believe me i have traveled in many 5 star hotels around the world and accustomed to great service...well the difference for my stay was Daniel. You will be very happy if you stay here.
Thank you Daniel for your magnificent hospitality.
Pietro

Great place to stay...very prompt to help and answer questions or problems. Love the area, not sure what the other reviewer experienced but I've stayed here several times and it's close to a bus stop and no one in the neighborhood bothered me but to say hello! It's only one bathroom but that's ok if the house isn't full! Lovely friendly lady!!!!!

Check in was easy and well set up with lock boxes and gate codes. The little studio/cabin was comfortable and well stocked with most necessities. The bed was comfortable, excellent water pressure. The location is prime for walking or biking around Venice! 
Em is very sweet and I had a chance to meet her lovely family. She was easy to communicate with and great to share a quick chat.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Satya's place is exactly as advertised ... If your single traveler looking for a bed to simply spend a night or two while around USC

Jo-Ann is the best host you can hope for. We had some flight delays and she took care of my daughter arriving earlier than me. The guest cottage is beautiful and clean , scandinavian style. Good shower.
Fantastic location ,  short walking distance to Abbot Kinney and the beach. Also found parking easily. This is a lovely place  to stay in.

You get what you paid for. There is no wifi, she said to go outside the house to get someones wifi signal. The bathroom's door it is broken really bad (falling apart), she can fix that in 1 hour but I guess she rather to save that money. There is dust everywhere. The bathtub wasn't clean. The location is not that bad, but not walkable at all. Good luck!
非常幸运的选择了Victoria的家,一进门就给了我们莫大的惊喜,浓郁美式家居风格,家里布满了藏书,所有的摆设都极具特色,大气干净整洁的房间。停车方便,地理位置优越。主人特别热情细心,让我们找到了家的感觉,非常感谢!

Es un anfitrión que ayuda bastante a la hora de guiarte. Cuando llegué estaba un poco perdido pero él logró que me sintiera como en casa. Le encanta recomendar buenos restaurantes y en mi caso, me presentó a sus amigos: hicieron que me sintiera como uno más.

This is a comfortable one-bedroom apartment in Pasadena. The description fit the place quite accurately, I believe. I spent a lot of time in the Pasadena area growing up, and I enjoyed visiting while staying in this apartment. Walkability is very good, and grocery stores are a very short drive away. Easy access to gold line. Pretty much everything you'd need. 

I'd like to add that we came across one snag in our stay, but the hosts were quick to respond and were extremely accommodating. Thank you!
The house is nice and it is on a good location. House is clean and gives good impression. The pool area is nice. Pool table had problems as all the sticks were broken.
The house is quite and comfy!

Camille was a great host. She was super welcoming and gracious. We were pleasantly surprised to find a well-stocked kitchen, full of snacks, fresh muffins and an abundance of fresh fruit. The guesthouse is in a lovely location, with a fantastic view, close to great restaurants, and super quiet.
Thanks Steven

Suzan made us feel very welcomed
The house is very well equipped; we felt like home
Neighborhood is very quiet, safe, clean, and the full neighborhood is new
Location is excellent, in the middle of leisure locations
Nice location, nice decoration, nice host.

An excellent place to stay - a lovely historic LA neighborhood with coffee shops that are a short walking distance away and easy access to major freeways.  Henry's place is cozy with excellent heating, very comfortable bed and great furniture.  The tv was set up with his Netflix account and that definitely pleased our toddler :)

The room was very good and met my needs.  The neighborhood was in the center of Los Angeles making it an easy ride to the downtown and westside locations.  Irene was a charming host and interesting to talk with; as we shared several conversations and insights.
The place was just what we wanted and as advertised. Had a great time hanging at the place as we did taking advantage of the location! Literally steps from the beach!

Last year i was at the appartment of Brian and everything was very fine so this year no surprise Brian is the same an amazing hoste and his appartment and the room so perfect.
I feel like at home. Brian helped me when i need something. We had chat very friendly.
Brian is very nice, very clean and his appartment is the best location very central everywhere in LA.
Definitely my place when i'm LA
Cottage was as enchanting as described, wonderful neighborhood and helpful hints left by the host.
Hola la estadia fue buena. Tuvimos dos inconvenientes q ambos fueron resultos rapido y bien. Solo como sugerencia deberian dejar algo para ljmpiar pisos y baños. Gracias

Our stay at Kevin's house has been for us one of our greatest Air Bnb experience. The house is located in a nice area of Venice Beach, 10 min on foot from the beach. It is very spacious and very beautifully decorated with wide bedrooms and two gorgeous bathrooms (one with shower and another with tube). The kitchen is very modern and wonderful with all the needed utensils to cook. The house has a wonderful garden with beautiful tables where it is very pleasant to have meals during the day and in the evening. There is even a barbecue. Kevin has made also available things you might need for the beach: additional towel, beach umbrella, freeze bag.  You can also rent the bikes if you are interested. There is also Wi-Fi, and it works very well. Kevin has been very kind and very receptive, making sure that we were fine at the house. We strongly recommend to rent his house: you will love it.

Tracy was a lovely host. She sent very detailed instructions about the arrival that gave me the flexibility to arrive at any point after the check in time.  She has built a beautiful home and it was a pleasure to explore the nooks and crannies of the shared space.  I would happily return to stay there again.

Julia was a great hostess. There was cold water in the fridge and helpful information about the neighborhood when we arrived. She is really sweet and made sure we had everything we needed. The bungalow was really comfortable and cozy. It is in a very nice neighborhood where you can feel safe walking at night or during the day. Being walking distance to Abbot Kinney was definitely a plus!  We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Valeria was very nice and accommodating, we arrived really late and she even stayed up late to greet us and ensure we were comfortable.  The room was neat and clean and had everything we needed.  Great location.  Thanks for having us!

Michelle was super nice, but MY OH MY what a fantastic place!

Super cute front patio with pretty pink flowered bushes on a closed off street, so very little traffic.  I loved her Thai antique decor and well appointed rooms.  She even left little amenity packs for us in the bathrooms!  

But wait, there's more!

There is about the cutest patio ever in the backyard with an amazing view.  The pictures do not do it justice.  It rained when we were there, but I definitely spent a little time admiring the view and relaxing in the patio furniture.

Couldn't have been happier.  :)

Very wonderful experience in LA, Stephen is a polite and handsome warm-hearted guy, he had help us a lot during the days. The apartment has a very good location and very convenient for travelers, famous attractions and Metro are just a few steps around. Apartment is spacious and newly decorated,  it is very cozy to lie in the sofa watching 55' TV. My girl friend appreciated the Raph Laren bedding in the living room, so that we can have a wonderful sleep after all day tiredness. I will recommend Stephen's apartment to all of you.

What a great place to stay. Great location for our stay. The guest house is perfect size & super cute. The parking is fairly easy just make sure you remember to leave the pass (we almost forgot & it's a 100$ replacement fee). We can't say enough about the place. Austin was a great guy to run into as well. Very nice. Thank you!

Sarah & Tim's place is truly a heavenly gem tucked away in the hills and yet walking distance from everything- and you will not find lovelier, more accommodating hosts. The flat is exactly like photos- bright, cosy, classy and well-equipped. You cannot beat the views and the deck is spectacular- whether it's morning coffee as the sun comes up, or staring out at the stars at night. I have been staying here while I relocate from London to LA, and I think wherever I end up long term is going to be s bit of a letdown. Highly highly recommend (as much as I would like to keep it secret so I could return here myself!)

Barbery place is great and super cute. Great location, comfortable and welcoming.
Very close to melrose.
We recommend this place to anyone wishing  to stay in west Hollywood.
Just can't beat this location. The apartment block is secure and quiet also. Cynthia is friendly and we had a lovely stay in Hollywood!

Wendy welcomed us in to this perfect studio when we arrived!
The studio is wonderfully located and appointed.  Very relaxing and comfortable.
Host checked in regularly with us and sent us on our way with a lovely card and treat.  A perfect experience!
Great location with complete amenities down to bikes for transportation. All in all really fun!

What a great stay, communication with the host was superb. The view was amazing! The space was super clean and well managed. The building was packed with amenities and centrally located in walking distance to LA Live.
Great stay, would highly recommend staying here.

Der Aufenthalt in  Le Petit Coquillage war sehr angenehm und auch die Anreise verlief reibungslos. Olivier hatte uns zuvor genaue Angaben gesendet, die es uns ermöglichten, die Unterkunft zu finden und eigenständig zu betreten. Die Angaben des Zimmers entsprechen zu 100% dem, was man vorfindet. Das Zimmer ist sauber und beinhaltet alles, was man benötigt. Die Lage ist super, vor allem mit dem Auto. Parkmöglichkeiten sind direkt vor der Haustür zu finden. Die Gegend ist ruhig aber dennoch nah an Einkaufsläden, Restaurants und dem Strand gelegen. 
Während des gesamten Aufenthalts war Olivier sehr hilfsbereit und bemüht. 
Wir würden sofort wieder in Oliviers Unterkunft übernachten!

This is an amazing place to stay with a great host! Fantastic view, a lot of privacy, even on the terrace and beautiful sunset to watch everyday. Beds are big and comfortable, bathroom and kitchen has everything you need. After a noisy day around the city, this is a nice shelter to come back to. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

They arranged an airport transfer for me and when I got to the place, it was exactly as described.  Location is ideal -- very close to everything, but not directly on Hollywood Blvd., so no street noise.  The place is air conditioned and exceptionally well maintained and clean.  It's always a crapshoot with these things and they obviously put a lot of work into keeping it very clean which I appreciated.

The hosts helped get me set up and were only a text away, which I also appreciated.  The bed was comfortable.  The kitchen is small, but well appointed and could totally be used as a vacation kitchen if you wanted to prep food for yourself; they even left me some light breakfast fare and bottled water.

It really was an idyllic experience.

We really enjoyed our stay at Sophie's! She provided us with a pass so we could park right outside the loft, and gave us great insight on the must-do's around her beautiful place. Communication was great, and she really went the extra mile to ensure we enjoyed our stay. When we checked in, the apartment hadn't been cleaned, but Sophie corrected the situation so we could settle the next day. 
The location is great, right over a palm tree-lined street in the Hollywood Hills, so close to the action yet remote from all the noise - the best of both worlds!

Liya is a really friendly and nice host! The room is really cozy, the bed is comfortable! The area is safe and quiet, easy to reach to the restaurant. Overall, is perfect for everyone who travel in LA.

Everything worked like clockwork and made our stay super easy and enjoyable. The place itself is amazingly well-located and quirky with nice touches that anticipated our every need. Would recommend to travellers wanting a non-cookie cutter experience :)

This place is perfect when you are a young traveller on budget! It's a shared apartment and the guys living there are very nice and helpful! The inventory is very basic (no aircon) but it's enough if you are just looking for a good and cheap place to rest after an exhausting day in the city. Very close to the red metro line which takes you to North Hollywood, Universal City etc. 
Zuke is a very nice and caring host who made sure we had everything we needed and even drove us to the car rental station at LAX. Thanks Zuke!
House was very clean and had everything that a hotel would- towels, hair dryer, extra bedding. Kitchen was also fully stocked. Location was great- easy access to everything and very close to highway.
The apartment is perfectly located in a quiet neighborhood very close to downtown and beach. Brian is communicating really great, fast and effective!

This place is perfect for someone who wants privacy and comfort. Its location is in a nice, quiet street and Thomas was great at answering any concerns during my stay. It was clean, well-mainatianed, and they provided some delicious snacks as well. I definitely recommend this location!

Chad and Lara are completely gracious and welcoming hosts. Their cabin has everything you could need for a productive yet relaxed getaway, and their design aesthetic is drool-worthy. It's the perfect escape from LA's insanity. Loved everything about the stay!

My friend and I love his place. Its spacious, quiet and close to places that I go to. He's a lovely person, he insures that you have everything you needed and we definitely enjoyed his company.. Need a place to stay? I highly recommend you to book his flat.. :-)

I thorougly enjoyed staying in this studio. The furniture was nice and we took full advantage of the Wi-Fi and entertainment available on the TV. All of the necessary ammenities are available and Michael is more than willing to help if you need anything! We were super close to the LA Convention Center, which is where we spent most of our trip. Overall, it was a really comfortable place to stay and I would highly recommend it!

My family spent wonderful time in Lisa's house. It is so easy to drive everywhere. Lisa is a very nice host. She replied our questions quickly all the time. We felt Lisa's house just liked as our second home. Look forward to live again when we visit LA next time.
Amazing stay!

Joy has been a terrific host.  From the beginning she has amazed me with her lightning responses to inquiries.  The unit was very clean and well represented.  The neighborhood right off the freeway making it very convenient for getting around, not to mention, walking distance from several restaurants and a Starbucks ; )
Thanks, Joy, for making our stay a great one!

This place is a hidden gem, one of my best airbnb experiences so far. S.D. is a very welcoming host: she helped me to check in and park my car, told about the hidden stairs around the corner leading to the Hollywood Bowl, we enjoyed a lot chatting with S.D. during my stay. I had a good rest on a super comfy mattress and felt like home. The neighborhood (Hollywood Heights) is very nice and quiet, it has an interesting history and a long list of notable residents, you can read about it on wikipedia. The cat that lives there is very friendly and well behaved, if you are a cat person, this listing is for you. :)
We loved staying here. It is the perfect little apartment equipped with everything that you need in the kitchen, bathroom, and living room.

Betrand and Tony are both very friendly and thoughtful hosts. 
The room looks exactly like the picture. It's very clean and includes a fridge, desk and microwave. (The fridge cools quietly, so you can let in on). You got your Bathroom right by your room, so you don't have to cross the whole flat.
What I mostly appriciated the most is that as soon as I went to bed the Volume of TV and discussions was immediatly down and I could have a good night sleep. They both gave me rides to grocery stores, cause I had no car. I recommend everybody to rent a car as it simplyfies transportation manyfold.
I recommend you to check out their home as they will assure your stay will be as comfortable as possible.
Thank

- Cyril

Friendly neighbourhood, charming and kind hosts (they even brought us some freshly squeezed orange juice and éclairs) and a wonderful location.

10/10 would book there again. :)

- Iain / Fox.
Heather's place was homely and looked exactly as it is in the pictures. Very good location and it also had sufficient heating during the winter. Enjoyed my stay!

Very astounding location. We had enjoyed our stay very much, not only due to the condo's great view and classy decor, but also due to our host's and her assistant's open communication with us, attention to our comfort, and willingness to accommodate their guests' needs.

About the Condo:
1) very tasteful decor and near fully furnished (we could've used a bathroom scale and coffeemaker, but we didn't ask and am certain would be accommodated if we did), functional kitchen (cookware, large modern fridge with freezer, stove, microwave, toaster, dishwasher and garbage disposal all provided), very spacious living and dining areas (with great selection of books and artwork for casual perusal, if tired of all the digital entertainment that was also present), surprisingly large balcony with a gorgeous view of the city and mountains, well insulated from noise and weather... you would be inclined to stay indoors and just enjoy the peace within the condo itself.
2) the neighborhood is very accessible to all needs, from groceries to fine dining; just a quick glance thru (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps of the area would leave you impressed with the variety and density of stores and attractions in near proximity.
3) the building complex is adequately secure and tidy, with courteous concierge, and easy access to and from your parking and street level.

About the Host:
Shannon and her helper, Jay, are very professional and friendly, always approachable and accommodating. We had been communicating to them either directly, or from the convenience of the AirBnB app, weeks before our actual booking date, and they were always timely to respond; excellent hosts that will respect your privacy but are just on the edge of your periphery, in that you know you can count on getting issues resolved with them, should anything ever arise before or during your stay. I had been left very satisfied and thankful that Shannon shared her home and time with us.

Julie nous a très bien accueilli. Elle nous a expliqué le fonctionnement de son appartement avant de nous laisser les clés. L'appart est situé au 1er étage d'un petit immeuble. On gare la voiture sur une place de parking reservé. L'intérieur salon, cuisine, chambre, sldb est propre. Il y a un colocataire (étudiant)qui vit également dans l'appartement (sympa).
she was fine

Loved Leslie's pied-a-terre! Easy walk to the beach, great access to the Santa Monica Stairs (they're next door!), well appointed place to stay. She provides some excellent hiking guides and tours of the immediate area. Definitely going to stay there again!
nice place
Simply perfect! Fantastic setting. Extremely comfortable. Highly recommended.
Perfect and impeccable service, clean, modern and spacious unit, awesome view, convenient location, what else can a traveler ask for?

I'm certain we'll return again. Linda was always available & very personable.  The location was perfect for the concert at the Hollywood Bowl and so convenient to other areas via the 101 freeway. The suite suited our needs very well, the snacks, drinks and the banana bread were much appreciated.  Thanks for a lovely stay!

We had a GREAT time in Venice Beach. This bungalow was the perfect place to stay - quiet, relaxing, scenic - and you can't beat the location. It's a ~5 minute walk to the boardwalk, and ~10 minutes to the shops along Abbot Kinney - no car necessary. Our host was extremely accommodating - even printed out some event tickets for us in a pinch. Couldn't ask for a better experience!

Dale et Paul nous ont chaleureusement accueilli, nous faisant visiter l'espace de la maison dans lequel nous pouvions évoluer (chambre et salle de bain privée, autres pièces communes telles que la cuisine, le séjour, le jardin avec possibilité d'utiliser le jacuzzi).
Tout correspondait à la description et aux photos vues sur le site.
Le confort du lit est exceptionnel, salle de bain très pratique avec autant de serviettes et produits que nécessaire.
Nos hôtes étaient très disponibles pour nous donner des informations sur les bonnes adresses aux alentours (restaurants, bars...) ainsi que sur des itinéraires pour rejoindre des points éloignés sur LA.
La maison est très bien placée, à proximité à pied de la plage et rue animée de Santa Monica. Facilité pour se garer près de la maison. Quartier très agréable.
Dorothy and Gary are VERY nice hosts. Their house is really comfy and clean. Also, I really enjoyed her breakfast. I highly recommend her house!
Everything you'd want in a hollywood experience is in this apt.  It's a huge beautiful space gives you a front row view to all the  great and interesting things hollywood has to offer.
Beautiful house. Modern and clean. Great views and location. Hope to stay again soon.
Ron and Chase are great hosts. It is a nice, private room in a good location with all the amenities you would need. The apartment is very clean. Highly recommended!
Great location and it's a very comfortable apartment. I would definitely stay again.

I highly recommend staying at Olga's place.  The place is very clean and organized with clear instructions on everything to use in the house.  Olga emailed check-in procedures and communicated with me about other important information.  It was truly a pleasure staying at her place.

Vores ophold i havehuset hos Dan var alt det vi havde håbet på, plus en hel del mere! Dan var den perfekte vært fra først til sidst. Huset var meget charmerende, velfungerende og rent. Haven var utrolig - tænk at have sit eget lille hus og private, smukke have midt inde i et af verdens største byer! Kvarteret var hyggeligt og passede perfekt til os som ville køre i alle retninger; Malibu, Passadena, Hollywood osv.. Indkøbsmuligheder er mangfoldige og i nærheden, ikke mindste L.A.´s fineste center: The Grove &  Farmers Market. 
Vi har kun lovord for Dan og hans hus. 
Vi vil aldrig bo noget andet sted i L.A. i fremtiden.
John & Henrik

Lovely stay! Easy to find and very kind hosts! The room was lovely, comfortable & they even included a generous basket with anything you might have forgotten or would be in need of. Would definitely recommend!

Will's place was my clean, peaceful (extremely well-decorated) haven while I was moving! Will was accommodating with check-in and provided ample instruction via text and printout inside the bungalow.  Finding parking was super easy across the street so my friend and I were able to stay parked where we were and walk to restaurants/bars in Hollywood. If I ever need to, I would definitely stay here again!

The house was beautiful! Miguel was a very gracious and responsive host. He even helped us out in a jam on Friday night when my colleagues and I misplaced the house key after our work event was over, and drove straight to the house to let us in. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Good place!

Super emplacement pour un séjour à los Angeles. Le logement est parfaitement situé et très bien équipé. Il est également facile de se garer. Anne laisse à disposition des plans et guide de la ville pour aider à préparer votre séjour. Tout était parfait !
We really enjoyed our stay at Nicks apartment, he was easy to reach when we had questions and the apartment was more than big enough for 7 adults.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Holly's place. This was our first air bnb experience. The bugalow is comfortable and clean with every facility you could want. The location was convenient to everything. 
Holly is brilliant, she is a wonderful host and very knowledgeable on things to do in LA.
The community was quiet and the room was clean and cozy. Amina is very patient and responsive to our needs.
房东在入住之前热情和我们联系,房间很温馨舒适,地点就在蒙特雷海边很方便,周围吃饭买东西很方便,是一个非常好的旅行中的家
很好的地方,主人和宠物都很友好。推荐给要去LA的人。

I'm kind of a private person so I was a bit nervous about staying with a family I had never met in a private home. I came away from my stay feeling like I had just visited with my sister and her family who I don't get to see very often but am very close to. In other words, after we broke the ice, it was a warm,happy, interesting and totally pleasurable experience. Comfortable accommodations, great location and best of all, really super family!
Liliana is a great host and has an awesome place.  Great experience all around.

I had a wonderful stay here with my friends from san francisco.  It was very close to all the sight seeing locations and having a parking spot in hollywood was the best part. Very clean and convenient. Thank you for the wonderful stay.

Thanks so much Ceyda, we had a great visit! We loved this fantastic location, so close to the beach and restaurants, but quiet and easy to find parking (a huge feat by the beach). Can't wait to come back!

Linda was easily accessible before we arrived and answered all our questions, then went above and beyond to accommodate our unscheduled late arrival. The room and bathroom were very clean and well kept. We throughly enjoyed waking up to the chirping of mountain birds in this hidden lakeside valley retreat.

Great location. The unit is hotel-like in that they offer shampoo, soaps, towels, etc. There is cleaning service daily. The apt is centrally located and has a great view of the pier and beach. Amazing value. I will definitely be trying to come back.

We were a party of three: Mom, Dad and daughter. We highly recommend this place.

The apartment has a  “one bedroom” with a queen size bed. I say a “bedroom” because it is a loft style apartment with 12 ‘ feet or higher ceilings. However the ‘bedroom’ has a low wall- like partition. That is, if someone is sleeping in the living room they could hear you . 
If you want privacy this place is suitable for a couple. However, if privacy is not a concern you can have two people in the “bedroom” and may be two in the living room.
They provided us with a memory mattress, which was comfortable. The couch is not a sleeper so it may be uncomfortable to sleep in. I assume if you want a fourth person in this place you may need an inflatable mattress.
It is ideal for two people. It may be OK for three or more.
The bathroom was clean and spacious.
I did not use the kitchen, but it is new and modern. If you want to eat in you can buy groceries at the Ralph’s store near by and have meals at home. The building has a large BBQ grill  so that is also an option. 
The pool and the Gym look nice. I did not use them due to time constraints.
. 
The communication with Sidney and her assistant was very smooth; they were readily available and responsive.
I was able to get the apt keys as soon as I arrived at the building and it was easy to coordinate the time to return the keys.
The place was nice and in a great location, close to everything. The parking space was very convenient.
This apartment is 1/2 block from a very large, modern, Ralph supermarket. I even had beers on tap at the Ralph's. I have not seen a supermarket with a bar and a TV before. It was fun and inexpensive having some beers and a roasted chicken while chatting with local people by the bar. 
Downtown LA has been getting a transformation and this building is new, modern and close to everything in Downtown LA (DTLA).

We recommend waling for lunch, to Pitchoun Bakery @ café
At  545 S Olive St, Los Angeles, CA 90013. IT has great pastries, soups, salads etc. Moderate prices. We saw this place on TV and we had a great lunch here.

This is such a great, quiet location. The apartment was very well maintained with great artwork with a really well curated selection of books and magazines. Edward was a great, communicative host, and check-in/check-out was such a breeze! I highly recommend this listing!

Emilee was a fantastic host. We booked the place on very short notice but she was ready & waiting to accommodate us. The place is nice, clean and located in a prime location right next to everything, it's all exactly as described.

On top of that, I forgot some of my personal belongings in the room (glasses & some clothes) and Emilee is nice enough to ship them over.

Overall I had a great stay and I would definitely come back next time I'm in LA.

We stayed two nights at the La Brea apt.  When we got there, it took us a while to find a parking lot with numbered spaces, but when we realized it was behind the building and not the spaces in front of the building, it made sense.  Thank goodness, I read in another rating that Nadia's apartment is in Tower 41 and the parking lot is Lot F off of Fuller Ave. However we used Hauser Blvd.  Had I not read the reviews, I would not have known what building or parking lot.

When we got there in the middle of the day on Friday, the gates were open, so we were able to drive right in.  We left in the evening and came back after 10pm, so we were unable to get back through the gate.  We had to drive around and look for an open gate.  The next day, when we left and came back, (both times were during the day) the gate would not open—luckily we had someone behind us with a clicker who let us in.  Wish we had one.

It's an old building, but the apartment was clean.  It is located on the 2nd floor, right above the front door of the building.  It was loud apt living.  There were a bunch of teens hanging out in the front at night being a bit rowdy.  In the middle of the night there was a knock on our front door.  We didn't open the door—but it was someone who was drunk and obviously lost.  That was not cool.

The furnishings were as the pictures depicted--however, the kitchen and bathroom ARE NOT what the pictures look like. A few special touches could have made it a little nicer such as the shampoo, conditioner and body wash were almost empty and there was a used bar of soap in the shower.  A new bar of soap would have been nice.  The vertical blinds in the bedroom were missing a couple slats, so it was not completely private.  

There was a large walk in closet and enough towels for my family of 3.  The best part was that it was walking distance to shopping, and restaurants!

Overall we had a nice two-day stay at Nadia's apartment.
Was perfect

Aaron is a great host! The space is actually really big like a mini suite.Even though I didn't see him much during my stay I felt comfortable and Aaron was always working earshot if I needed anything!
Thank you Debbie for being so helpful and everything! I appreciate the stay so much.  The house is more than fantastic.

I highly recommend John and his amazing rental.  We spent only one night and my friend and are found John to be extremely warm and friendly, hospitable and a great host.  His place was clean, fresh towels and all the necessary to really make you experience a home away from home in his place.  The neighborhood had what we needed and we were in a business trip we enjoyed our time there. We were also just 20 min. from the airport and the beach. We will rent the place again in our way to So Cal.

Very easy check in, parking was close by, place was easy to check into, beautiful and clean inside, loved the touch of jazz playing when I walked in. Outside the place was a little bit sketchy, but still very close to everything!

Absolutely loved it! So helpful in setting the RV up and making sure everything was good for our stay. Cute little RV park with friendly people around. If you're looking for camping without the tent hassle this is amazing!
Something just right, affordable and comfortable.
Dennis place was really good, the house was super tidy and clean, the location is also near lots of places and easy access to really great parts of L.A. Will be back soon :)

Fantastic location, three well sized rooms, someone to welcome us upon arrival. Car spot was super handy but note being LA it is a bit tight: we just managed to squeeze a mid sized SUV in with the rear view mirrors folded back. Overall was a nice place to stay.

Both the location and quality of accommodations were wonderful. The street was beautiful, safe and with lots of excellent shopping and food choices just around the corner.
The room was very spacious, super clean and wonderfully appointed with lots of clean towels, beach towels, extra blankets.
There is a large closet and a desk which was a cozy place if you need to work. The suite has large bathroom en suite and a direct access to a shared large deck ( even though we never saw Harry and Russ actually use it ). The deck has a jacuzzi and a fire pit which are both super relaxing and wonderful.
The hosts are really nice, polite yet 
unobtrusive. We felt bad that Harry was mostly laying on the sofa because he broke his ankle. get better soon , Harry!
Overall, this is definitely a place we would go back to when in LA.
Absolutely amazing! 110% recommend Alex as a host. Great neighborhood, very nice property, and wonderful hosts!

We were so fortunate!  Shawn and Scott had a cancellation and my 8-year old daughter and I were able to stay with them very last minute.  We live in North Orange County but needed to stay near Pasadena where my daughter was involved in a project that week. Our stay could not have been more perfect! Shawn and Scott were extremely welcoming and we immediately felt comfortable in their home. We were able to come and go as we pleased. The house was extremely clean, spacious and inviting. The pool was a bonus for us and Dash and Elmo (the cats) made us feel right at home. To top it off...Scott made waffles for us for breakfast!!!!  I felt so spoiled and did not want to return home.  We are grateful to have been so lucky with the booking. Scott and Shawn are amazing people and I hope we will cross paths again!  Thanks for everything!

Sols place was exactly like the pictures, even better. Everything was clean and nice, even the bedsheets smelled fresh. At the place he had complementary water, chips, drinks. Me and my husband stayed there for four nights and it was perfectly situated in Venice, in a quiet street just a two minute walk from the beach. Sol lives close by and was flexible about check in and check out, and he was easy to communicate with. We would definitely stay again and recommend to others.
Fantastic stay, easy communication and a lovely apartment in a great part of town.  Slightly off the main drag area so nice and leafy. Recommended!
Unfortunately I didn't get to stay with Peter - change of plan from my end - but he was a dream to deal with.

I truly enjoyed my home away from home!  I stayed with Lane for a month and she was a fantastic host.  She continuously went out of her way to help me with questions, or provide me with great suggestions for things to do with my time.  She is a very welcoming host and I found her to be approachable, honest, generous and considerate.  Lane has a beautiful home and I have very fond memories that have been enriched by my stay with her.

It is my first time using Airbnb and I am lucky to be able to stay at Raphael's apartment. A perfect place for a group of 6-8 people. This place has 3 bedrooms + 1 bathroom, open space (combined kitchen+dining+living). All 3 bedrooms are nice and spacious.
The check in process is very smooth and easy. The instructions from Raphael are precise and easy to follow. Apartment is conveniently located near downtown and rest of LA. 
Raphael is a great host, he provided us with much needed stuffs like bottled water and wine. He made us feel like at home away from home. I would definitely stay at this place again if I'm in LA.

Me and my friends had 3 perfect days.
It was clean, quiet and the only place that had food. 
Hosts were really friendly and ready to help us in any moment. (We had some problems with the air bed and they changed it next day).

I would totally recomand it!
B-E-A-Utifu!!
host was great. nice place. great stay.
Le logement est idéalement situé, en plein coeur de Hollywood et à deux pas de Hollywood blvd. Le logement était propre et l'accueil était très professionnel. Le logement était aussi bien équipé.

Beautiful room. Loved the neighborhood. although the bathroom is adjoining,  theres a lock on both sidez (great for peace of mind). had heater and AC. if you love fluffy soft beds this may not be ideal for you. the bed waa uber firm. like seriously firm. bring pillows if you can to create the perfect balance.
We had a great stay and felt very welcome and comfortable. The house is very relaxing, clean and well designed. We enjoyed using the bikes and checking out Venice beach. We would stay here again!

The apartment is equipped with anything you can think of. The area is residential and really quiet. We didn't rent a car and just made use of Uber. Within 2 mins, you 'll have a taxi waiting for you and it's really cheap :) Supermarkets are within a few minutes walk. The host was always helpful and replied to our messages instantly.
I had a great stay with Carlos. Very cozy accommodations and overall a great place to relax at the end of the day. Highly recommend.

This was by far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in! Lovely, secluded, idyllic, and comfortable. We were displaced last minute from our home in LA, and Sarah and Chris let us check in within an hour of our booking! I have never had such great service. Both were nice and nearby if I had any issues, which I didn't as the place is perfect.

The bedroom being upstairs was such a nice touch and really made the bungalow seem spacious. The kitchen was well-equipped for not having a stove/oven, with all utensils, dishware, microwave, and griddle. There was even plenty of snacks for guests to enjoy. My dog really enjoyed having a backyard for a few days, and there is a great hammock room in the backyard that I enjoyed sitting in while getting some work done. There is no TV, but that led to me getting a LOT of work done :-) It was a lovely retreat; I've been calling it my "staycation". Sidenote - best shower water pressure, better than my own home! Shower is stocked with shampoo, conditioner, etc.

Thank you for a wonderful stay!

I had such a great time with Alex and Samantha, they were wonderful hosts. The room is amazing, really big, clean and comfortable. The house is so nice and really central located. Easy access to everywhere.

The time that I spent at the Durán home was simply marvelous! The great hospitality started even before I arrived: when I had informed Christian that I would be arriving on the train, he immediately offered to pick me up from train station and I couldn't have appreciated that more. Upon arriving at their home I was promptly extended the warmest welcoming I've ever had: Christian and his mother Heidi showed me around the house, offered me drinks and food, and showed me to my room. Salvador, Christian's father, however, went beyond out of his way to not only make me feel welcomed in his home, but also to guide me around the city and show me exactly how to get to wherever I needed. He also took me to go rent my car and drop it off (and waited for me both times). All three of them were very solicitous, but they never overstepped their boundaries nor did they make me feel smothered. 

If you're looking for a place where you'll feel like family and not just a guest in a hotel, this is the right place for you. This was my first time using Airbnb and I was very apprehensive at first, but the Duráns made me feel very comfortable.

P.S. Mr. Durán makes the best pineapple smoothy around!
房间很宽敞,屋子里的设施也很齐全。地段距离比佛利购物中心,梅西百货,农夫市场简直太近了,去环球影城开车也仅需半小时。小区环境干净,还会有很多小松鼠,太适合居住了!so nice and comfortable to living, my friend and I give 5 stars!!!

Nice, quiet guest house centrally located in Claremont with easy access to the 5Cs, the village and freeways.  George was a great communicator and everything was as described.  Hope to come back on a future visit!
Beautiful place, everything excellent! Thank you.
Good
The house is great and we were super welcomed by everyone who made us feel at home !
Once again, a fantastic stay in Silvio's studio! Great location, ocean view.  l highly recommend staying in one of Silvio's apartments, he's a great host!
Very good, everything was accurately as shown in the picture

L'accoglienza di Dorothy è stata superlativa. Non ho una lunga esperienza di Airbnb, ma ho una lunga esperienza di viaggio e affitto stanze e appartamenti per lavoro e piacere.
La descrizione del luogo è perfetta e non posso che dire bene del quartiere, di Dorothy e di suo marito, dell'appartamento, dell'accoglienza, della gentilezza, pulizia e vista mozzafiato che si gode dalla collina.
Torno periodicamente a Los Angeles per lavoro e questa esperienza mi ha convinto decisamente ad affidarmi a Dorothy per qualsiasi mio prossimo viaggio. 5 Stelle? Non abbastanza per me! Facciamo 6!

This home, location and hostess were all awesome.  Room was clean, newly remodeled and very comfortable.  Very nice hiking trail is a 5 minute walk away.  Neighborhood is quiet and safe.  Christine was very hospitable and I plan to stay here again when my travels take me back to Sierra Madre.

Everything was just perfect. Location 10 points, room clean and a super comfy bed. Spotless bathroom. The price is great and the neighborhood safe. All the interesting sites in Santa Monica and Venice in walking distance. Recommended for women traveling on their own! John was very accomodating, friendly and easy to contact. I will definitely stay with him again next time I will be in Santa Monica.
good sta

This was the perfect place for a nice getaway . Ralph was so nice and attentive to our needs . He was always there if we need anything and he always provided snacks and coffee which was very nice thoughtful . Also the place was super clean and smelt nice and fresh . The pool was so big and beautiful but due to the weather and it being so cold we weren't able to use it but we will definitely be back soon for those hot days ! Thank you for having us and welcoming us into your home.
My host gave me a tour of the space and made himself readily available to address any concerns I had.
The location is better than imagined, the house is fabulous, a very lovely adult gettaway!

This property exceeds the advertisement. The guest house was stunning, exactly as pictured, but twice as large in size, and immaculately CLEAN. The location is fantastic, as it was cozy and homey, and yet you are in the very heart of Beverly Hills. Sicilia and her family are fantastic hosts -- very warm, inviting and genuine. They are lovely people.

The reception by Jerry was impeccable 
. before the trip
. at arrival
. during the stay
She even prepared a fine breakfast every day.

The house was astonishingly decorated, very clean and the location above the cliffs could not have been better, with beaches, nice local shopping and restaurants in the neighborhood and the Getty museum just a drive of 20 minute away (our reason to stay in Santa Monica)
We really enjoyed staying in Michelles place. It was very clean and had an amazing kitchen! We would definitly recommandeer this place if you want to go to six flags. It is 10min drive.
Really good stay! We arrived late in night and Ana was very thoughtful and warm in welcoming us and even offered us dinner (@midnight!). Really recommend!

Manhattan beach is very close, very nice experience!
Friendly Heather~Thanks so much!Happy new year!

Thanks for Carolyn and Jan letting us to stay in their lovely and cosy place for 5 nights. We are a family of 6 from NZ. The apartment is everything that you want and more! Both of my boys didn't want to leave as they were in love with the balcony! The apartment is clean, spacious and sunny with elegant decorations. Carolyn was very welcoming and show us everything.

Most importantly is its location - located in a quiet and safe residential area, kids friendly. Great spot in West Hollywood, with car minutes away from The Grove, Universal Studio and even downtown LA. 

We all had our best air bnb experience in Carolyn's and highly recommended to anyone who would love to visit LA to taste a bit of the local live! PS sorry for the noise that we made with the little ones as we would like to see more in LA so came back home very late every night:( 

Carolyn的家绝对是五星级民宿的选择。家里布置得非常的精致和有品位,跟图片上描述的一模一样。我们一家6口住的非常舒适,不会拥挤。步行就可以到达The Grove农夫市场,开车去环球影城,洛杉矶down town 只需要15到20分钟。最主要是周围的很安静,很安全,非常适合带着小孩子的家庭。绝对是五星级的推荐!
Great hosts, great spot, would highly recommend!

The bedroom was nice and everything was clean. 
Her pets are adorable.
It was also OK to use her kitchen and all of her equipment.
Super easy, friendly and helpful.
Our flight was super delayed and Kelly was there at 130 am ready for us to check in. The location was perfect for what we were doing, and the price was unbeatable.
Eddie was a fantastic, thoughtful host. He responded quickly and was eager to help.

I stayed here for a weekend escape, I was very surprised and pleased by the location. Very cool back yard area, quiet neighborhood. And Jake has done some upgrades to the room from the pictures posted at the time of this review. It's a nice place to stay especially if you'd like to venture into nearby Hollywood. This place has very sweet amenities, nice tv, ac, they even had ginger ale. Can you believe that?

Great get-away house and alternative to a hotel in LA. The place is one of the nicest designed properties I've stayed on and has a serene, relaxed feel to it. Great view as well.  Micael was very communicative and easy to deal with.

Ali was a great host and the house is located at a central location in LA that makes travelling very convenient.  A lot of good coffee shops with walking distance.  I would definitely stay here again.
This place is awesome.

Everything was just as the pictures show, nice and clean! The check-in was easy as John sent us instructions to follow. The location was great, close to a lot of restaurants and bars, and only 10 mins (or less) from Universal Studios. It was a great stay for two.

It was a bit tricky to reach the place but Buz has warned before arriving that Gps is hearing you to a wrong street ;-) 

Very convinient to visit Venice and walk distance to the beach is very small

Sheryl was amazing and answered me right away when my boyfriend and I needed an emergency place to stay for 2 nights after we had a bad experience the night before. She completely saved our trip to LA and even helped me to avoid some traffic all before I even met her in person! Her house and the bed were so comfortable and she herself was the sweetest! She made us breakfast and coffee before we had to start our busy days even at 7am!! Overall we are so lucky we found her! Thank you so much Sheryl!
The place was just as amazing as the pictures show. We had a great, quiet night in their home which was close enough to anything you needed, while being just far away enough from the noise.

Situation idéale au coeur d hollywood mise à disposition de serviettes d équipement (frigo micro ondes etc. ) mais cela dit le mot vintage est faible pas d eau chaude pour la douche et bain interdit par le règlement ,simple vitrage à côté d un boulevard super passant boulles quies obligatoire hôte invisible ou fuyante préfère faire semblant de ne pas nous voir que de nous saluer mais à ce tarif la on ne peut tout avoir
The house is amazing! The room is very cozy and private. Hosts are helpful when we needed help around the house. Will come for a second stay if I ever get to visit LA!

We had a wonderful time during our stay in they beautiful hillside home.  Patricia and her husband greeted us upon arrival and made sure to give us a very thorough walkthrough to ensure that we felt comfortable,  After that, they gave us the privacy that you would expect but were still kind enough to checkin a few times via text to make sure all was well.  The home is very clean and comfortable with a great view.  As for amenities, the central A/C, washer & dryer, and water pressure were all great.  The kitchen is a bit dated (retro) but we aren't really the cooking types so no issue.  The only TV is in the 3rd room, so because the room was being occupied by someone in our group, it made witching TV a bit inconvenient.  The driveway was great for parking, although a bit steep.  Overall we were very pleased and would certainly consider staying here again in the future. Thank you for hosting us!
Seamless stay. Loved it, had a great time. Everything we needed was there it was easy. Host was great!
The listing was very accurate. It was a great location is a very quiet neighborhood within walking distance of shopping/eating and the beach/boardwalk.

Venice beach apartment was absolutely awesome! The spaces were as described and very spacious for the four of us staying.  There are small touches throughout the apartment that really make this apartment such as the built in sound, air-con in each room, full utility and fantastic cooking facilities.  We made good use of the beach bikes and explored the area with the assistance of the host who provided emailed information but also a really helpful set of info in the apartment.
The location is ideal being about five min walk from Venice beach and twenty min cycle from Santa Monica.
We would stay again and recommend to friends.

The villa is amazing!! Pictures provided do not even do it justice. It was a last minute booking which can usually be a little stressful, but John was very quick with his response. Thank you for accepting our stay, we had a fantastic time!

An amazing property and home, as well as a fantastic host with great communication. 

Kids loved it for the guest house and amazing toys and yard,  we loved it for the interior design,  yard and comfort. 

The ultimate review from us is if we would stay there again. This is one of 3 homes we would happily go back to. In fact,  we can't wait to come back to Venice and stay at Ana's house.

Rudy was a great host with excellent communication from beginning to end. 
Unfortunately due to a cancelled flight, I only got to stay one night instead of the two originally planned, but would have loved to stay longer. 
I would recommend Rudy and his property for a well placed, comfortable stay in LA.

My first impression wasn't great. The bright, tree lined lane leading to the yurt depicted in the photo isn't accurate. It is actually very narrow, hard to navigate and flanked by sheds housing farm equipment.
Bibi was personable and gave good suggestions on places to eat and things to see. The yurt was spacious and neat but the bathroom and kitchen are in serious need of a thorough cleaning. The refrigerator was not cold. We had no choice but to put our perishable food in the freezer where it as frozen stiff . Our host was difficult to get a hold of. I told her several times that the TV wasn't working but she only got back to me on the morning my friends and I left.
The nights were very quiet but we were woken up by a chainsaw at 10 am.

Cat was a wonderful host and lovely to talk to.  Our room was large, spacious and airy.  The bed was big and very comfortable to sleep in.  I loved sitting at her island and hanging out.  We would definitely stay with her again!

Stayed at Lucas' place for a month while getting myself established in LA. The apartment is well located and is walking distance to pretty much everything you need. The place itself was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The kitchen was stocked with everything you might need to have a bite at home. Thanks!!
Excellent place. Maryam is such a great host. Location is unbeatable. 5 stars

Beautiful site on a ridge with great walking and views. The host made arrangements so that I could "check in" at a time that was convenient to me, and I was shown the ins and outs of the room and bath areas.
The place was good and Shirley was very friendly only thing is that the room was very hot
Wonderful stay in Venice! The house is cozy and welcoming, and we could not have asked for a more perfect location.
It was awesome
Very good place to stay!

Schon als ich ins Zimmer trat, war ich begeistert! Die Beschreibung und die Fotos sind genau so wie beschrieben. Sehr sauber und gemütlich! Die Nachbarschaft ist auch unglaublich! Hatte kein Auto, was in Burbank aber auch nicht nötig ist. Shoppingcenter und Supermarkt in 5 Minuten zu Fuss erreichbar. Mir wurde von vielen Leuten gesagt, die Nachbarschaft sei sicher, habe mich auch stets sicher gefühlt!
