Charlotte ist eine wunderbare, freundliche und herzliche Gastgeberin, die ich jederzeit um Hilfe bitten konnte! Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und würde das Zimmer jederzeit wieder buchen. Habe mich wie zu Hause gefühlt. ;-)

Special place.  Special people.  Hollie and Brian are awesome and incredibly welcoming.  The cottage is peaceful and the neighborhood is super quiet.  A great place for a getaway.  Can't say enough good things about this place.

This studio apartment is beautifully constructed and furnished as the pictures depict.  The service from Brooke (Sammy's Assistant) and Lucy, the Housekeeper, was absolutely excellent.  My only cautions deal with the outside environment.  Venice is an eclectic place; this is a very mixed neighborhood.  This unit is situated on a four way stop corner.  When cars accelerate after reaching the stop sign, it is fairly noisy.  Luckily Venice is quiet after 11pm and up to 8 am in the morning, even on weekdays.  Street parking is not a problem at all.  The outdoor space is ok, but not not really an inviting place to hang out.
The place was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. Two thumbs up.
Great location. Helpful host. She was right about the noise, but I sleep like a rock so it didn't bother me . Make sure to say hi to Zoltar  :)

Everything is great, Thank you! What I want to ask is to warn everyone regarding parking entrance, you'de better enter it alone with no passengers, it's very sharp and you don't want to put car on the ground like he had :(

But anyway, thank you for hosting!

We had a fantastic stay at Carrie's house. The location has a remarkable combination of convenience and charm - short walk to the beach, shops, and restaurants, and super close to the airport and freeways. Quiet neighborhood. We couldn't be happier with the accommodations. And Carrie is the nicest and most thoughtful host we could imagine. It was great meeting her and having her take care of our needs. If there were six star ratings, she'd get it.

We live in a rural area so we wanted someplace safe, quiet and private but with easy access to attractions in the L.A. area. We were pleasantly surprised with how safe and quiet the neighborhood is at this location and how much there is to do in the surrounding areas. Additionally, we also had the privacy of our own place.  
Betty greeted us as we first arrived and let us know she was there to help us if we needed assistance. She is friendly and always available by phone or text. 
 The cottage is as advertised, clean and comfortable. It does have a window air conditioner which cools the cottage quickly. We really liked the addition of the washer and dryer in the cottage. It helped us pack much lighter than we normally would have had to. The full kitchen is updated and has enough cooking equipment for a quick meal. The bathroom also appears to be recently updated. 
We feel we got a very good value for the cost of our stay and Betty's cottage would be our first choice for our next stay in L.A.

Yoad was very kind and accommodating. My boyfriend and I were looking for a place last min on new years eve so we were very grateful Yoad accepted our request. All in all, we had a great time. The room was cozy, clean and very reasonably priced. Yoad was also a great host-- checking in to make sure everything was going well but never intrusive. Would definitely recommend. Thanks again Yoad!
Dane condo was great! Nice and cozy. The communication with him was easy and smooth. Location is good and allow easy access to all LA famous spots.
Great location - walking distance to both Abbot Kinney and Venice beach. Very clean apartment!

Lou Lou is amazing!!! 

We had a fantastic stay with her. She is so welcoming and friendly it was just like staying with someone we'd known for years! 
We were absolutely spoiled with a lovely breakfast each morning and beautiful room / decking area to ourselves. 

If you're looking to stay in Venice then 100% stay with Lou Lou... and Elvis!!

Beautiful apartment exactly as described and shown in the pictures, incredible location! Suzan was very nice and responsive to all our needs. We would definitely recommend this place, thank you Suzan!
the host is fine and quiet. however the lady live inthe other room is so rude. she was knocking at my Door at 7am to wake me up and to move my car!Crazy!

It was our first Airbnb experience, and everything was so easy and perfect!
Check in, very easy, Jessica always answers in just few minutes.
When you arrive, after a long long trip, you see that cute house, with all this yummy snacks that she left in the kitchen and automatically you feel at home :-)
The house is super cute and clean.
The neighborhood is great! And in less than 5min drive you are in sunset junction which is full of cool and cute places.
Jessica also left us a list with all the best places / restaurants / bars of Silver Lake.
Definitely, if I have the chance to travel again to L.A, for sure I would love to stay here again.
Great hosts, great location, and great lodging. Would definitely stay again. Very accommodating and affordable.

Staying at Rivergate was an absolute dream! Cannot wait to go back. Amy was a fantastic host, the property was amazing, and the location fantastic as well. Went to find solitude and recharge - got exactly that!

Arthur was very helpful and accommodating. The apartment is his own home, so filled with his things but he did a great job making it feel like we weren't intruding. The kitchen was pretty sparse, only one pan made cooking a lengthy process. However, he was very flexible with letting us check at different times. Overall, a pleasant experience.

Lovely apartment in a great location! Matthew was quick to respond to any questions and left clear instructions for when we arrived. The apartment was as pictured and clean and comfortable. I'd stay here again.

I had a really nice stay with Rebekah.  I was moving to LA and needed a place that was central and affordable while I hunted for an apartment. She is a very friendly host and her place is full of positive energy and a great place to relax. I would definitely return!
В доме прибрано, уютно. Район понравился, достаточно тихо и спокойно.
Great location and price!! Prompt and friendly communications!! Late checkout was allowed !! Thanks Gina
The apartment was brilliant - had everything you needed and it's in a great neighbourhood. I would definitely visit again.

Kaveh was a very helpful host--he reached out a few days before with updates and the day of check-in to ensure everything was fine.  The house was very charming, fit our family of four comfortably, and was properly stocked for cooking, laundry, etc.  Fantastic neighborhood, great location next to WholeFoods/Starbucks and a cheap Uber ride away from Hollywood and other great restaurants (i.e., Animal).  We would book again.

Another lovely and relxing holiday in Glendale. 
Fe and John are all you can dream of a host when you are in holiday.
The place is immaculate,  help and good tips for making the most of your stay is just a question away.
We are sure this is not the last time we are using this listing.
We can not recommend this place highly enough.
Dear Fe and John thank you for another memorable holiday.
Saro, Tamar, Sipan and Arevik.

Chase and his family are excellent hosts.  Their house is beautiful, in a scenic, safe, quiet and somewhat secluded area just off Mulholland Drive in the Santa Monica Mountains.  Our room was clean and nicely furnished (as was our private bathroom), though we really didn't use it for anything besides sleeping.

There is a wine bar and a bar & grill within walking distance yet far enough away to not be noisy; I didn't hear them at all when I stayed home one night though my friend who went both nights said they were just as lively.  There are a few other restaurants at Kanan/101.

I will gladly stay here again in the future!  My buddy and I are in fact already thinking about possible days/dates that'll work. :)

Crissy was a super cool host and made my first night in LA warm and comfortable. The apartment was easy to find and fit the description. Also, the place was conveniently located to a lot of key places in Downtown LA. Was a bit sketch at night, but had zero safety issues. I will for sure miss the sweet Mookie. If I come back to LA, I'll probably stay here again. Thanks, Crissy!!
Great place.  Nicely remodled, so none of that old or run down feel.  Everything was very nicely done.  Bed was very comfortable.  Lisa was easy to work with.  Highly recommend!!

This home was a perfect retreat and Eric was a perfect host. He was there to greet me, gave a thorough tour and remained available if I had any questions. The home is very private and serene and I would most certainly stay there again.

Thanks so much Adam! I received a warm welcome and simple walk through. My little dog was quite happy as was I. Clean, organized, and comfortable-like staying at your best frien's house.
I hope to stay again soon.

This was my first time using Air BnB, and my first time in USA coming from London. I can not really justify in words how amazing my experience was staying with these amazing people, but I will try, and do my best. They picked me up from the local bus station when I landed, and drove me to their location (which they didn't have to), which was a nice thing to do. Alziras home is immaculately clean, and the room I stayed in was spotless, along with bath room and other rooms in their home. Breakfast was available to me everyday, and they told me I could use the kitchen as I pleased if I wanted to make anything during the day. The location is in one of the nicest, and safest parts of Long Beach. 2 min walk from beach,bus stops,bars,restaurants, and other local supermarkets. Alzira, and her husband are absolutely amazing people, they offered to help in any way they can, but also give you the desired privacy you need when staying in their home. To be honest, they made me feel like family which was such an nice experience. I couldn't recommend them enough if you're looking to stay in LA, this is the place to stay. They also dropped me off to the Bus Station on my last day there which again, they didn't have to do, but did, out of the goodness of their hearts. This experience was truly amazing, and I thank them personally for making my stay with them an experience I will never forget. If/when I ever come back to LA. I will 100% be staying with Alzira, and her husband again. Amazing home, Amazing place, but most of all, Amazing people.

Aina was a great host and very responsive. Her place is in the heart of Santa Monica, walking distance to the beach, pier, third street promenade, and other amenities. I would definitely recommend her place for anyone looking to stay in the Santa Monica area.

This was one of the best places I stayed. It was my first time visiting LA and my buddy and I lived in Long Beach and some other friends lived down the block. She welcomed my other friends as well. She gives out positive energy and would love to stay again!
The listing was exactly as described. The cats, whom I named Elvis, Georgey, and Casper, where a great addition and kept me company throughout my stay. Would definitely book again.

This unit has many great features including location (in a safe, easy to park neighborhood), clear instructions on how to use all appliances/windows, a great shower, and a very comfortable pool.  The best feature by far was the bikes, which were in great condition, had strong locks, and were our ticket to fun and convenient rides around the area.  The unit was very clean, and larger than I expected based on the pictures and description.
Area recommendations for restaurants, etc. were helpful and much appreciated.  The host (whom I never met in person) was quite helpful via text messaging during my stay.  I would stay here again, and also recommend this house to friends.

My wife and I were enjoyed during our trip in LA. This apartment is clean and cozy, and the location is very good, it close to everywhere in the Hollywood. The most important part is the host is very friendly and helpful. Our luggage was delayed and he helped us a lot on that. We appreciated it very much.

The experience has been comfortable and easy. From the codes on the doors (no keys to lose) to the centralized location of the apartment, the whole trip has been made easier by having this place. The bed, while not exactly spacious for a couple both over 5'11", was comfortable none-the-less. The kitchen was clean and usable and the storage space so we could unpack was much needed and appreciated. All in all, we couldn't be more satisfied with our stay here.
Very welcoming. Great location.
The house was absolutely beautiful not to mention the views. I would recommend this spot! The only downfalls I can think of might be the parking and the steepness of the driveway.
Very nice place to stay in Long Beach

Irene was the ideal host. She was very warm, welcoming, and really respected my personal space. She kept a lovely home, which was always clean, open to guests, and had an abundance of beautiful antique pieces. The room was very comfortable, cosy, spacious with heaps of closet space. Parking is a breeze for those driving a car, however the location is so central so it is easy enough to get around by foot, bus or Uber. I would highly recommend Irene's home for anyone who is staying in LA either short or long term and needs to be central.

Shonna made us feel very welcome and waited patiently for us even though we were delayed. It is clean, cozy, and the bed is comfortable. The apartment has everything you need. I would recommend booking her place if you are looking for a small spaced room only for two people.
The host was amazing. Everything went seamlessly and their plan of execution is fast and effective for getting in and out. Everything was better than advertised.

Lisa was a great host and the house was terrific.  She was very responsive to questions and encouraged us to call with questions.  Overall I was very happy with the entire experience and would certainly recommend her to others.

We travelled as a couple, and had a great stay at Lindsay's place. Lindsay was a very welcoming and pleasent host, and she even provided us with some basic food and beverages "to get us started" at the beginning of our stay. Everything was clean and well-kept, and our room was nice and spacious. Depending on your preferences, it could be noted that the bed is on the softer side. The property was perfect for our use, with a saltwater pool, gym and bbq-opportunities. The drive to LA took us between 40 - 60 min, depending on traffic and location. We can gladly recommend a stay with Lindsay!

Amazing, amazing, amazing. Would move in here tomorrow. The furniture is really unique with some very well selected vintage pieces. Some bits could do with updating like carpets, bedding and bathroom suite but these really were minor things that didn't effect my stay and it is clear they are constantly improving. 
The whole vibe of the place is amazing. I spent my nights sat on the porch in the rocking chair watching the coyote cubs play in the garden opposite. Also a hummingbird comes to the window (URL HIDDEN) cool as I had never seen one before. All in all it is a really quiet and cool neighbourhood. Also its in very easy access of Hollywood if you have a car; it takes 5-10 mins even in traffic. Despite being this close it is a total escape from the madness of LA.  
Kiran was great too. Wished we could have hung out more as we realised that we had a lot of things and people in common. Easy going chap, puts you at ease instantly and always available to answer questions.
I would recommend this property to anyone and would definitely stay again. Thank you Kiran.

We enjoyed a pleasant week at Richard's guest house.  He and his wife were most accommodating, providing a daily L.A. Times and extra supplies as the week progressed.  The house is bright and peaceful, with all the amenities one would
need.  This listing is especially appropriate for guests with pets, as the hosts have
3 well behaved dogs and 2 cats !  We would stay here again when visiting L.A.

Everything was great! He is a really nice, flexible and reliable host, who did everything to make us feel home. We arrived earlier than the official check-in time, but he was there and helped us with everything. The room itself is beautiful, too - as in the pictures. Although we haven't spent too much time with him, I'm sure he is a great guy. Thanks for everything!

The bungalow was perfect for our needs. The location was good with walking distance to Abbot Kinney and Superba Food and Bread (great meals).  We had to drive to visit UCLA and family in the area and all was a reasonable driving distance.  The bungalow was cozy.  The walking street was nice and made you feel you were in an oasis in the city.  The host was responsive to minor questions during the stay.  The kitchen and bathroom was updated and clean.  I would stay there again.
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing as always. This can easily become my home away from home. Any time I have business in Topanga or need a quick urban detox, Airstream with Gordon is my go-to!

Meredith was lovely!! Though we didn't get to meet Christian.  The room is very private and very cozy. Kudos to the decorations. The view of the Hollywood sign and the overlook of the city were breath taking. You will have enough supply of coffee and tea. The only issue we had was with the shower knob which was loose and fell on my toe and I had a swollen toe for a couple of hours. If only that was fixed!
Wonderful place. Wonderful hosts. I'd stay there again in a heartbeat. Better than any hotel. Everything I needed and more. Lovely house and neighborhood. I highly recommend!!
Great stylish place. Clean and extremely comfy.

Brie and Andrew were wonderful hosts for my first Airbnb experience.  I booked for a week while visiting family who live close to them.  I was greeted warmly and felt very welcome in their home.  The room was actually much nicer than the picture, had a good amount of closet space and everything was immaculate.  The set up of their home allows for maximum privacy and the separate air conditioner made it very comfortable as I am so hot natured.  There are two power strips in the room for all of your electronic needs along with wifi.  The neighborhood is safe and I walked to and from my son's house at all hours.  I will try to book with Brie and Andrew every time that I am in the LA area, though I fear that when word gets out they'll never have a vacancy.

Before arriving, Carlos was extremely tentative and responsive to my concerns since this was my first time staying at an airbnb. Even though I showed up an hour late cause of "Friday traffic" someone was still there to welcome me into the house/room. It was exactly in pictures. He made me feel really welcome and it was just like being at home.  The toiletries were also very nice and made sure I had everything.  This experience was a great one and I would definitely stay here again if Carlos would let us stay.

Staying at Johnny and Mark's was perfect for me. Using one of their beach bikes let me explore The Strand cycle path which took me along Venice and Santa Monica Beaches, great photo taking territory. Mark was very helpful with suggestions of places to go and how to get there and I really enjoyed all the fresh fruit at breakfast he served, good energy for cycling. The directions they have to find them from the airport really helped, even the taxi driver used them!
Bruno's place was amazing and he was so helpful!! We had a great time and enjoyed our stay. Would recommend to anyone visit LA!
Good location, easy to access, clean room, nice neighbourhood & neighbours :) I was completely happy with staying here, 5/5 and highly recommend this place!
Lisa and Joe made me feel at home! Great accommodations, and served breakfast every AM as well as cooked certain goodies during the day. A great stay and highly recommend.

Great place to stay in LA! Sandy & Derek are both very nice and very welcoming. Their dogs are adorable to boot. The room is spacious with a big work area and a good sized private bathroom. Clean, comfy, nicely decorated. Derek made breakfast both mornings - an nice extra touch.  Thanks for a great stay!

This is my second time staying at Jan's place.  It truly becomes a home away from home.  Jan is a great host, warm, friendly, and ready to help.  The room is clean, neat and cozy.  I enjoyed the stay very much.  Thank you, Jan, for offering such a nice place!
Very clean and nice studio! It is also well located in a nice neighbourhood.
Great Experience! Thanks Denis

It's our first Airbnb experience, and we enjoyed our staying at Xixi's home soooo much. Xixi and her husband are very kind and helpful. We felt very comfortable. It's also very convenient to go to universal studio if you drive.
Great place.  Five minute walk to bars and the ultra cool Abbot Kinney Blvd.  Comfy environment and cozy.  I would stay again.

One word: Anazing!!
Casa del arte is a braiti fil cozy apartment in a very quiet area of pasadena . Nice neighborhood and good location also for those who are travelling around and want a base in Los Angeles out of traffic jams. We spent one month there that turned into a holiday. On top of everything there is Gale. She is super kind host, always present when needed and very discrete at mean time. She is the reason why I chosed the apartment: we had a great communication since the beginning and she was always nice, available and professional. Highly suggested+++

This house is great! It has a lot of character. Each time you get out to the yard, you discover something new. The location is great if you want to stay close to the beach. Buddy was such a great host, provided us with everything we needed and gave us bunch of tips on where to go and what to do. We were also able to prepare light meals and coffee and relax in the house. The room was also great. We were staying in LA when weather was really cold, but the room had nice thick blankets and heater. I would stay there again when I visit LA .

I really enjoyed staying at Julia Lee's Venice Bungalow.  I felt very welcome, and the bungalow had everything I needed for a comfortable stay.  It's clean, nicely decorated, and in a very convenient location - to the beach, shops, and anywhere else you would want to go.  I would definitely stay here again, and recommend this to my friends as a great place to stay when you're in LA.

A very pleasant stay! We were there for 3 nights and amina is very accommodating. We had a late night checkin and she welcomed us with a smile at 2 am. The room is cosy and comfortable and the best part is location, it is really 10 mins away from hollywood and universal and other famous attractions. The parking is inside a garage and outside it, both are in the ally behind the house which has its entrance on the vine street besides the cactus eatery. We had to park outside as another resident had taken the garage, a little troublesome but fine.
Lovely space, clean, bright. Great location.

Excellent Host, a team of daughter/Father with 2-3 properties, they will accommodate any price point and will help you every day or leave you alone every day, whatever you prefer. AMAZING REPRESENTATION OF AIRBNB!!

I stayed for 3 weeks and have to say its a great place to spend your days in venice. The house is so cozy and room offers its own bathroom! It was also great to have the chance to take the bike and to enjoy the backyard! Its located perfectly near the beach and closely to Abbott Kiney, which is a great area with outstanding restaurants and small unique boutiques. Thank you for this great experience.
Nice apartment with good location in Culver City, Lisa and Justin were considerate and helpful hosts.

The apartment was perfect size for a friend and I when we stayed here for two nights. It would have been comfortable for two more people to stay if people don't mind sharing beds. It was clean and the sheets and towels and bathroom were all clean which is very important to me! It was within walking distance to a bunch of bars and restaurants. Andy met my friend right away at the agreed meeting time (I was parking) and gave us keys and some info on the area. The only thing I would say isn't awesome about this place is parking can be difficult but to be fair that is stated in the description. Would recommend to a friend.
loved it! it was a great place to stay and exactly as advertised
This was my first stop upon landing in US. Lovely place..bed was a little high for my height

Patrick was a great host, despite not being able to physically greet us upon arrival. The cabin is perfect as a home base for a visit to LA. It was well-stocked, cozy and has access to a backyard with a view.

It's like staying in the woods, in the middle of Los Angeles!

This was our 1st Airbnb rental & we found it worked out very well -- everything was exactly as it was portrayed. The accommodations were clean, roomy, uncluttered, and decently comfortable and appointed. Chris was an exceptionally responsive and helpful host -- typically got back to a txt or e-mail w/in minutes and was pleasant, courteous & flexible at our check-in. Location to Hollywood/LA was great for our needs - a bit noisy (as expected, right off LaBrea) but we appreciated Ralph's grocery store & several good restaurants w/in easy walking distance (Otus Thai, Salt Cure). We had a great 5 day stay - thank you, Chris!
Patrick was a great host.

Olya returned our literally last minute call very fast. We spent 2 days in her studio and it was exactly the same as pictures. It's a nice, secure building. You can reach to center of Hollywood by walking in 15-20 minutes.

Freeway is right outside the building so if you're a light sleeper like I am, you may not like it. Most of the TV channels are not in English, other than that it was an OK experience:)

This was a great find.  It was very orderly and clean and the sleeping area was private and secure.  The neighborhood was very cute with lots of little shops and the beach was a short walk away. Not to mention the airport was only 10 minutes away.  Also the keyless entry made coming and going a breeze. I would recommend bringing an extra pillow if one isn't enough.  And I wouldn't recommend staying here if you're the social type. It's very quiet and has strict rules about no noise or guests after 9pm, even from TV.

James was a great host, we were very busy during our stay but he was always available should we need help with anything. The apartment is stunning with amazing views, great location and privacy, Thankyou so much for a lovely stay, will definitely recommend to friends and family, Hannah and Stuart x

If traveling to Venice, Breeze Court is  perfect to stay. Location couldn't be better.  Right close to boardwalk, great coffee, & shops. My daughter and I rented a bike. Unit comes with with one which was a bonus. Rode all around taking in the sites, canals, marina del mar...
Unit is quaint. Very clean!!  If you have never been to Venice keep in mind it's a busy beachy, bummy area but something you have to see. Coming from a quiet community in South FL, not use to neighbors so close and with windows open you hear everything but that what makes the experience/memories. Gary is an amazing host. Very informative and helpful anytime. Unit had a parking space which most do not have. Great Air BNB experience.
It is in a very calm and nice neighborhood. It was walking distance to Santa Monica Blvd, where there are some nice restaurants. Nikola was very responsive to all my questions and stocked water!
This place was amazing! I loved the privacy, comfort, convenience and the outdoor shower was a great touch. Would love to stay again next time I'm in the area.
Really neat place.  Clean, comfortable room.
Great location, great place, great host!
The room was great along with the private patio.  Very comfortable and even had laundry access which I wasn't expecting.  The other guests were friendly and there was plenty of parking.

Jay's Silverlake apartment was exactly as advertised. It is large and spacious with 2 bedrooms and a bathroom, plus all the amenities you should need (the washer and dryer came in very handy!). We had no trouble finding available street parking arriving mid afternoon, however when we returned later that night we had some difficulty in finding a space.

Excellent Location, very nice place and homely. Great beds and showers, great lounge area and kitchen, walking distance to Hollywood Blvd, lots of food and supermarkets around. Host was good and communicated well. Very accurate pictures, would stay again 4 sure! Recommend! Thanks
Accommodations could not have been better.  Location was central to all our needs.  Great studio and would rent again.

Vasanti's rental is a very happy place! My Husband and I arrived after dark and had a little trouble finding the front door. I called Vasanti, and she immediately came out to find us and show us around. The place is darling! It is filled with original art, hand made tiles, and is newly redone. The beds were very comfortable and the atmosphere quiet and welcoming. Vasanti had a fully stocked kitchen and wonderful toiletries. It is a short way from Sunset Blvd, so we enjoyed walking and visiting the shops and restaurants close by. We had a lovely time lounging on the deck enjoying the view.
The cottage was enjoyed to its fullest!  Thank you Angie.
Michele is a wonderful hostess, and the studio made for a relaxing stay in Venice. I really enjoyed the visit and would stay again!

This was my first time using AirBnB and this listing was just as described. The location was great. It was near everything I wanted to visit. Marcia was great. She made some great suggestions and answered any question or concern very quickly. The apartment was very clean and she provided an abundance of toiletries and towels.
Ran's place was great. Very clean, spacious and comfortable and perfect location. I would love to stay here again.
It was very comfortable experience! The hosts were very friendly and helpful. Thanks again!

We had a great time staying at Jamil's home. He was very welcoming and thorough in giving us a tour of the house, even including recommendations for local restaurants, grocery stores, etc. The home was as described and perfect for our family of five (2 Adults and 3 children). It includes two extremely comfortable beds, a nice private outdoor patio area, and good sized living room with two large couches. The house was as advertised and reasonably priced (we stayed during the Rose Bowl). It is well located, very close to Colorado Avenue (Old Town) and the Rose Bowl. I highly recommend this rental.
Ken is a legend! Super chilled out guy who made me feel very welcome. House was clean and had a very relaxed vibe to it. It was a shame I could not stay longer. Highly recommended.

Very Clean and spacious. Hotel quality sheets and setup. Great location if you want to stay in a neighborhood feel but close to all the big attractions. We were laying over for the night so we loved being 20 min from the airport. The backyard was great to hang out in to relax. It was very quite and comfortable! We can't wait to stay again.
Great place, great host. The host made sure I was accommodated and stayed back and waited for me to arrive . Will stay here again
Amazing spot! We really enjoyed our stay - the place was updated, clean, and beautifully decorated. Would definitely stay here again!

Our stay at Cesca's property was a wonderful experience! We didn't get a chance to meet her (except for a brief wave one morning!), but she was very good about communicating with us to make sure we had everything we needed. The guest house was perfect for our group of three, with one sleeping on the fold-down futon. It was clean, secure, and located in a lovely, quiet Burbank neighborhood that was close to everything! We will definitely stay here again, thanks again Cesca!

Staying with Lea and Sean was so comfortable and easy. It was my first time living on my own and they made my extended stay a worthwhile experience. The space was clean and had all of the amenities promised in the description. On nights when it was cooler, Sean and Lea were more than happy to provide more blankets and a heater.  Although the wireless sometimes cut out, Lea and Sean were both prompt at fixing the problem. Overall I would highly recommend Lea and Sean's place, they are great hosts!
Excellent location and host. Give us a lot of helpful advices and stand by online always. Thx. Will choose to stay here again next time!

We had a perfect two-night stay here. The rooms were immaculately clean and comfortably furnished, with a well-equipped kitchen that made dinner prep easy. Check-in was a breeze. Even though the location is convenient to busy Sunset Junction, the house is far enough from Santa Monica that it is restful and quiet. I had a very productive afternoon working on my computer in the breakfast nook. It was definitely spacious enough for two adults and one child (but any more than that would probably be pushing it). Our hosts were welcoming and responsive, and we felt very taken care of. My only complaint would be that the cookies in the very generous welcome bag were too good and utterly undid everything I'd done at the gym that day. For anyone looking for a cute, quiet place in the Silver Lake/Los Feliz area, I can't recommend this highly enough.

Nina is the best hostess I've had so far! Her place is perfectly made up and has everything I needed. I also accidentally locked things in the partner but she was there within minutes to help - she lives down the street which is super convenient. A+

We had a very pleasant stay at Doug and Jhoiey's appartment! Although they couldn't be there themselves, everything was perfectly organised. The appartment is as beautiful and clean as on the pictures.
We would definitely like to stay there again, if we come back to LA.

We have stayed at Wayland house for a long week.
Brett and Alex have always answered quickly via email, they are kind and attentive hosts.
The house is very nice and peaceful, and we have highly appreciated the LA view from the window.
The house is very comfortable with large couch, beds, garden... It's really warm just like home :)
There are everything you need with some eco cleaning products.
Even a lot of toys for kids and babies !
Sincerely, we recommend it and we hope coming back again.

Both Adriana and Leslie are very friendly. We were greeted when we arrived, given a brief but comprehensive tour. Accommodations were pristine and ready for guests as soon as we arrived. The room and experience were wonderful and extremely unique, and as advertised according to the airbnb page. We were located conveniently to hiking and the beach. We love this place and wish we could have stayed longer.
Never met Eugene but the room was nice and clean. There were many other people in the apartment and it felt kind of isolating, but for the price and location- I highly recommend it.

Vi hade ett par fantastiska nätter hos Victoria och hennes man. Det är en helt fantastiskt drömsk atmosfär i tältet och en härlig känsla att vakna upp på morgonen och dricka kaffe med utsikt över centrala Los Angeles. Från takterrassen kan man bort till Hollywood hills med den berömda skylten. Huset ligger i ett lugnt och trevligt område väldigt nära Sunset Boulevard och det går ganska bra bussar till Hollywood. Däremot är det ganska långt till stranden.

In one word, Bart's house was perfect for me. There was perfectly ready for traveler so you can just bring yourself and enjoy your trip. In Bart's house I felt that I was in my home. House location is also good, just 15 - 20 minutes to union station which is in the middle of LA by bus. 
 About host, Bart was very kind and friendly host and he also respected my privacy. He was thoughtful person and I could enjoy my trip owing to his consideration. 
 You can enjoy your trip when you along with this house.

We had a very sweet, uncomplicated stay 
@ Jessica's place. Jessica was very caring & accommodating!

3 notti in agosto, famiglia di 4 persone, 2 adulti e due ragazzi.
Ottimo appartamento, al primo piano di una grande villetta,  pulitissimo,  due camere matrimoniali e un grande bagno a nostra disposizione esclusiva, cucina condivisa con i proprietari che dormono in una stanza vicina.
Free wifi ottima, aria condizionata
L'appartamento è all'interno di una zona residenziale chiusa ai non residenti e sorvegliata H24, per entrare all'ingresso vi rilasciano un pass dopo aver controllato patente e nome di chi vi ospita. Si parcheggia in strada, nessun problema di parcheggio, spazi abbondanti.
Vicinissimo e comodissimo per l'aeroporto, sopra passano gli aerei che atterrano, ma dalle 23 alle 7 divieto di atterraggio, per cui silenzio assoluto.
Katja e Patrick simpaticissimi, disponibilissimi, hanno un grande cane giocherellone e buonissimo che vi inviterà a giocare con lui, non abbiate paura.
Katja vi mette a disposizione una colazione ottima e abbondante, vi lascia le chiavi di casa e si ferma a parlare con voi volentieri, insomma un'amica.
La prima sera siamo arrivati tardi, ma nessun problema katja ci ha aspettato pazientemente.
Sembra di abitare da amici, Katja e Patrick sanno consigliare molto bene su cosa fare e dove mangiare a LAX.
Consiglio vivamente a tutti.

Absolutely loved this sheek condo in west Hollywood. The room is modern and clean. The building is really cool and in a great location. They also have a parking space if you need it. Also, Eric and Nicole are extremely gracious, wonderful hosts. Nicole sent us several recommendations for things to do all across the city! I would highly recommend this listing :)

Lindsay was great at keeping in touch and being flexible with check-in times! She was a very pleasant person. With that said, we thought the room was perfect for our stay. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the bathroom was just classy, clean, and had a wonderfully spacious shower! Also, perfect location! Highly recommend this place to anyone.
Ben was a great host. The space was very clean and big and the gated parking spot was an extreme convenience. Would love to stay there again!

Darrell is an absolutely delightful host, and his home and the room on this listing are even more lovely than the photos.  I had a fabulous stay.  Darrell has thought of everything to make you feel welcome and well cared for including an in-room single serve coffee maker and wine/ water refrigerator.  The deck attached to this room is fantastic with iconic Los Angeles views.  I look forward to returning.  Thank you, Darrell!

Our family of 8 stayed in Villa Cielo for a week. Jesse greeted us at the house and showed us around. She remained reachable and very responsive in answering questions and addressing issues during our stay.  The location of the house is unbeatable. Just one block from the beach with no worry about crossing any road with busy traffic. Our kids enjoyed the beach almost every day. That made a hugh difference.  The house has a unique decor and reminded us of an old European church house full of antiques. It is equipped with everything we needed, even chopticks (we cooked a lot).  There were also serveral bikes, surf boards, and a lot of beach towels.  Each of the 3 decks has comfortable coaches and chairs, but we like the one attached to the bedroom and kitchen most as we could eat outside. The only drawback of the house is that there is no air conditioning, so the summer days could get pretty hot and uncomfortable even with ceiling fans, especially upstairs.  Finally, the main bathroom has a big jacuzzi. The kids and us had some fun time there after a beach stay.  Overall we had a great time in Villa Cielo and would definately consider coming back again should we visit the LA area again in the future.
The place was perfectly located and easy to get to. It was clean and quiet. Would definitely recommend :)

The 'sanctuary' was indeed one. While just 30 meters away from all you need and some of the most exciting bits of santa monica and Venice, Denise's was sheltered in its own bubble of quiet and peace. 

The property is airy and spacious, both inside and outdoors. There is also plenty of storage place which was a plus for travellers coming from far like us. 

The kitchen was fully equipped (even though we did not get a chance to eat at home we were seriously tempted) as was the overall home (we did use washing machine and drier and they were better than those back home!). 

Denise herself gave us a very warm welcome which set the right mood for the stay, and we did not see her for the rest of the stay but knew were to find her if needed. She was very flexible in terms of check in and check out times and very informative about the property etc. The property seemed to reflect her personality which helped it feel like a temporary home rather than just lodging. 

Would go back there in a heartbeat next time in the LA area.
I stayed there 1 week and found them both friendly and nice. Listing is as described. Bed is small but okay for 1 person. Valerie also responded instantly by email.
Very very very nice place! !

The apartment was well equipped with lovely views and an extremely comfortable bed and settee. We spent two nights there and had a great time. The area is good and driving through it was no problem. Directions to the apartment and parking were clear and concise. 
Caroline  was prompt with her replies to our queries and had left leaflets on suggested eateries locally. We walked to the Local Lighthouse Cafe and had some fab food. The local provisions shop had a good selection. 
The beach was easy to get to from the apartment and very clean. 
It is the only place I have stayed were I could lay on the bed, listen to the waves and surf breaking and get a suntan ;)
If we were returning to San Pedro LA we would like definitely return to this little oasis - a place with a great view :)))))
neighborhood and price were nice, the host was also helpful, thanks...

Saam provided all the needed information for a seamless stay. The condo was in a great location: there was a coffee shop less than a block away, and LA Fitness (were I happen to be a member) was across the street. Off street parking was convenient. The condo was comfortable and the photos were accurate depictions of the property. I would certainly stay again.

This was my second time at the apartment and I absolutely loved it. Very clean, spacious and located in a great area of downtown LA. Alex was very good at communicating and made our stay comfortable. I would definitely recommend this place and am staying again soon! Thanks Alex!

Roger was very friendly and provided a great list of things to do and places to see! The room & bathroom were very nice, everything was clean and prepared for my visit! & it was very easy to come and go from the apartment! I didn't get to spend much time there (wish i was able to chat with Roger & Lydia more! & use the pool! :) but it was perfect for my trip! I highly recommend staying here!

Working with Todd was great. We really enjoyed being right on the beach and close to all shops and restaurants! Todd had a great response time and was able to answer any questions we had very quickly!
We've stayed in this apartment many times.  It is our home-away-from-home when we visit LA.

Awesome place to stay! Thank you Katherine! It was the first time I used Airbnb, and host Katherine gave me a lot of information. You don't need to spend time to find something. There were some info books in the house. Evrthing was convenient, and clean, location was also good. Less than 10min you can reach the Metro station by walking.

Our host Kelly was very welcoming. She even contacted me before the visit to check on our bedding needs. When we arrived she had the mini fridge stocked on an honor system - coffee, cream, beverages, etc. The place is just as lovely as the photos. A charming little oasis on the East outskirts of LA.
The house is nice and clean, Anna was great, welcoming, and gave us some great advice to go out !

The studio was great! It was the perfect size for two, and its location made getting around Venice really easy. Sarah was friendly and available if we needed anything. The next time I go to Venice Beach, I will definitely try to stay at the studio again!

We loved our stay at Maison Blanc 916!  It was spotless, fresh and beautifully decorated.
We were provided all the comforts of home.  
The two sets of french doors opening to the front yard with a fountain is a bonus.
In addition, the ladies were wonderful hosts providing us with a warm welcome and ensuring we had all the necessities throughout our stay.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Awesome space-- description is very accurate. Elie is super kind and was very helpful. Just 2 short blocks away from the infamous Los Angeles Blvd and a 10-minute walk to Runyon Canyon. Definitely enjoyed my stay in LA because of Elie's apartment! Would absolutely recommend and stay again, next time my husband and I are in the LA area!

Sigal was really helpful and replied very quickly to our request. We were in LA and our hotel was too small for our family of 5 so we looked for a place with more space. Great space for us. We all had a fabulous time. It was nice to find a residential space not too far from LA and so close to Universal and Warner Bros! Thank you!

Connie y su esposo  son  excelentes anfitriones, realmente nos sentimos como en casa .
- El apartamento es muy lindo, organizado, excelente  limpieza y una habitación muy  cómoda. 
- La ubicación  es espectacular  para visitar  los sitios  turísticos  y ellos viven  en un barrio  muy tranquilo. 
- Ellos nos dieron para nuestro desayuno un delicioso  café  todos los días  acompañado  de tostadas. 
- Desde nuestra  llegada  a los Ángeles  y regreso, estuvieron muy pendientes de nosotros. 
En general, muy muy  recomendado  para hospedarse en los Ángeles, los anfitriones  son personas  muy  amables y tambien fue muy bonito poder hablar y compartir  con ellos nuestras experiencias.
Nice, minimalist, close to downtown, walked to Chinatown.
Nice and clean motel. Service provided was superb! Thanks Nikki!

I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a base to explore LA. It's a couple of minutes walk to the Chinese theatre, sunset boulevard etc and in easy reach of other attractions (universal studios, Hollywood hills and griffith observatory are only a couple of minutes drive and it takes about 15-20minutes to walk to Runyon canyon which is beautiful for an early morning run or hike)

The apartment itself is fantastic. It's small but has everything you need and W.C. and Elly have gone out of their way to ensure that; even leaving chocolates, beer, wine and other treats for guests. Having cold filtered water in the fridge after a long day of travelling and walking was very welcome. 

We met Elly on our first day and she was lovely and helpful and she checked in by text the following day and to let us know to ask if we needed anything. 

Overall, a great stay. Don't hesitate to book.

If you are staying in LA, stay at this house! You won't regret it. Catia left out detailed instructions and made sure our stay was as nice as can be. She texted several times throughout our stay to make sure everything was perfect. Super nice. Amazing house. Great location! Couldn't have asked for a better place to call home for the weekend.

Mike & Ilda were gracious and very nice. The 1BR pool house is clean and private and in a very nice/safe neighborhood. Their property is beautiful and smells like a floral garden. Highly recommend booking.

Cool California living perfectly described this accommodation. It had great location and was only a short walk to public transport taking you into downtown LA and Hollywood. Being a few blocks from Venice beach the bikes that Rob had offered to us came in incredibly handy and made getting to restaurants, entertainment on the beach and places like Santa Monica quick, easy and fun. The actual accomodation itself was very clean with comfortable beds and furniture, the tv was very big (perfect for watching sport) and all the kitchen appliances you could need for an extended stay. Only met rob on our last night unfortunately, but was a great guy and answered all questions we still had about LA. Thanks for having us!
La 에서 좋은 추억을 만들수잇었다

I loved staying at Casa Jondy. Joni and her husband John were really welcoming. The house is beautiful, peaceful and relaxing. I love the green in the surrounds and specially the big rocks, which made great spots for meditation. I'm definitely going to comeback here when I have a chance and recommend this place to anyone looking for a beautiful and peaceful experience.
Best place in Los angeles, so welcoming and kind
Guy was great and so was his apartment! The listing says spacious and it definitely is. Location is great and Guy was very communicative.

Katie was an excellent host, friendly and hospitable to the extent of even offering a very tasty breakfast. The room was clean and comfortable, with a spacious wardrobe and plenty of space, and the apartment itself is in a quiet yet easily accessible part of Koreatown close to the Metro. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!

The hospitality of Bibi and Bruce was first class and their attention to details was perfect.  My stay at Bibi's yurt was exactly what I needed to prepare for the next chapter in my life. Thank you for providing a space for me to retreat.  I am looking forward to visiting again!
Had a nice stay and the apartment was pretty quiet.
Great location. The room was as described and Zhanna was a great welcoming host.

The home is beautiful, and most important (in my book), CLEAN! Our room had two power strips, which made charging our electronics economically efficient and quick! :) The shelving in the room, provided lots of space for us to place belongings!  The bed was comfortable! THE BATHROOM WAS CLEAN! :D Not only is the room very pleasantly clean, it smells wonderfully. That, AND the bedroom. There's something in the rooms giving off the scent, I noticed, but didn't recognize it! My sister and I both enjoyed and raved about it! The neighborhood is very good and feels SAFE. :) Vickie is extremely nice and hospitable! She was concerned about my sister and I, and offered sound advice on helping us find our next place of residence! Whenever we had questions or needed help with anything, she was there! The kitchen could be cleaner, but that's hardly a factor, when everything else is so wonderful! I'd definitely stay here again. :)
Host is really friendly and nice, house is really clean and cute
perfect as always.  thanks Abtin!
convenient location, nice stay.  The host is super nice. I would stay there again next time in LA.
Loved two days in the Suite! So close to the beach, groceries, restaurants...And John and Charlotte were the best in terms of responsiveness.  The place is very clean and cozy.
Kiki is awesome. She was helpful throughout the whole process and super responsive. Her house is clean, spacious, and in a perfect location.

Diana is amazing hostess and very interesting person! She's so very helpful and could give you any advice about the city you may ever need! And she's ready to give you a lift if she have enough time! It was great pleasure for me to talk to her (I wish I had more time:). I'm very glad that I decided to stay in her house:) There's a lot of lovely pictures in the apartment and I'm especially love Star track pics in the bedroom❤ I would highly recommend her place and will be glad to stay here next time I come to Hollywood!:)))

The property was clean and tidy, and just a few steps around the corner from the beach. It provided a very reasonable accommodation for my time in Hermosa Beach. Roxanne was very responsive when I called her. I recommend the property.
This is the 2nd of One of Elizabeths locations I have stayed at, everything's consistent clean, straightforward and solid host A+!

Since this is a newer listing, I figured that I'd put a little bit of effort into this review as I was very impressed with the overall experience.

First off, the host, Kevin, was amazing! Everything was as described in the listing and for the price it was well worth it!  He had an answer for all of my questions and was quick to respond, especially on short notice.

Notes:
-The rooms were terrific! There was plenty of space to sprawl out and relax, plus a number of great amenities too including RELIABLE Wifi, a full kitchen, and a decent sized flat screen TV in the living room.  

-The walk to Geoffrey's restaurant was VERY short (it's literally right across the street at the top of the hill) 

-The beach was BEAUTIFUL!!! Definitely one, if not the best beach in Malibu.  There was a hidden access under the road that you can walk to get there, which was very convenient as well.

-Kevin mentioned that there is a website for this listing called "(URL HIDDEN) that wasn't shown on the Airbnb website, but has a lot of good information and recommendations for things to do, places to see, and pictures of all of the other listings etc.  I found this to be an excellent resource.

-Overall, I give this place an A+++ review.  I will definitely be coming back soon for this price and location!
WE loved our stay at Serena's place it was quiet, clean and everything that we were hoping for. Convenient location and perfect for a homy alternative to hotel rooms. Do recommend!
This is actually the third time I've booked this place now. It's close to everything, it's safe and it's clean. I would book again anytime.
Wonderful location and close to the beach.

Cigi was a wonderful host.  Very quick to respond to questions and made everything very seamless.  The apartment was wonderful.  Very spacious and incredibly cozy.  The view of the beach/ocean is fantastic.  It is a little noisy during the day from the shops below, but that didn't really bother us.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to experience venice beach for exactly what it is!

I had a good stay with Jonathon. He is friendly, kind and accomodating. This Airbnb is a room share in a very basic artist space. Bring whatever you need with you except bedding and towels. There is a basic kitchen for your use. The best thing is being able to do laundry while there. Within walking distance from Vons and Echo Park Lake.

My friend and I spent the weekend in Johnathan's apartment and it was awesome! the place is beautiful just like in the pictures, clean and with everything we needed and more. Easy to find and the location was perfect for our plans in L.A. If you are thinking about renting it, go ahead, is perfect!. Also fast wifi and it was great to have the parking spot!..but the bet of all were the great views from the apartment, we loved al the windows and never closed the blinds no even at night time :)

Overall good location, and very nice place. Safe neighborhood and close to everything you would need or want during you're stay. Very attentive cleaning service and host. Thank you, will stay here again if the opportunity presents itself : )

Gloria was the perfect host, considerate, quick to respond, and incredibly hospitable. Her 2 bedroom 2 bath home was beautiful, clean and perfect for me and my 3 friends. We spent the night in the garden grilling and enjoying the large backyard. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this place.

Antony was very flexible and had excellent communication.  The guest house is a great place and is everything you see in the photos - a very quiet and safe neighborhood, well equipped place.  Would highly recommend.

Shemori was readily available via phone for any questions I had. The neighborhood was very safe and beautiful.  Sweet details such as a glass of water beside the bed and shampoo and conditioner readily available if needed were nice touches. I never saw anyone else who lived in the house so it felt very private.

We would stay here again in a heart beat! Lovely surroundings, beautifully decorated, well stocked kitchen with coffee, cream, tea, spices, breakfast sandwiches, flat screen TV with variety of DVD's, lovely outdoor space. I can't gush enough about this place. You will love it.

I stayed two nights, and I wanted to stay longer! Beard, Mysti, and Mr Jingles were super friendly and excellent hosts. They also respected my space when I needed it. The room exceeded my expectations; I thought it was going to be smaller, but there were plenty of spaces and spots to store luggage, clothing, etc. The bed was comfy and cozy! The room was spotless, and the kitchen and bathroom were clean. If you are looking for a place to recharge your batteries or a base to explore LA I thoroughly recommend the vocal booth!
Wonderful host, great location so close to bars and restaurants. Brad made us feel very welcome and we were even lucky enough to go out for a meal with him. Thanks Brad!
Amazing host!  Would love to use him again.
Great house with cool guys. Everything is clean and they are very accommodating. Definitely would stay again.
Great stay, great location. Place was clean and comfortable, highly recommend. Kevin is great to work with. I would stay again.

Нам очень понравилось наше пребывание у Penny и Deanna! Ребята очень гостеприимные и приветливые.  Квартира прекрасная: уютная, милая и очень чистая! Мы чувствовали себя как дома! Находится в очень приятном для жизни районе La Brea. Котики Clover и Shadow очаровательны:)

Dave was a fantastic host and made us feel right at home.  He helped us with our bags and showed us around the building and room.  Overall it's a quiet building, we never ran in to the other tenants.  We knew we would only mainly be sleeping there, so we didn't need anything too large or fancy and this was the perfect fit.  Would definitely stay here again!
Nice host, good communication and clean room and private bathroom. We stayed there for one night and it was perfect. Good location, close to everything!

The room was really clean, the neighbourhood was safe and it was really close to the subway. I had a really nice stay. The property manager was really nice and convenient. She answer our question and help me. i highly recommend this place. 
Thank you so much.

Avis au Français : Si vous restez à Los Angeles, la maison de Ryan est parfaite. Vraiment proche du métro, et vous pouvez aller partout. Je le conseil vivement.
The house is clean, environment is nice, the location is perfect for Chinese/Taiwanese cuisines. It was a good experience there.

Everything went very well. The room and house were as described - clean, comfortable and safe - and you really can't beat this location with its proximity to the beach, and Bulletproof Coffee. E.J. was a great host. Very friendly and accommodating. I hope to stay here again!
Nice place in a great location.  Exactly as advertised.  Very easy to find and get into thanks to the video Wesley sent.

Had a GREAT stay at this beach apartment - perfect location and the bikes were a big plus for us. Emily was very responsive and made sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again. Thanks!
Masha was a fantastic host! I would recommend anyone to stay at her place.

Great location and easily accessible.
Very clean, my roommate (a longer term resident) was very friendly & welcoming!

Our stay met most of our expectations. Great location for what we needed, walking distance to most amenities and the apartment was clean and appeared as expected. However, there were a few hiccups. We did not have a parking spot, which is fine, it was just advertised as if we did. We also ran out of Toilet Paper, and there was a Fire incident in the apartment that caused two loud Fire Trucks to come late at night which were quite loud and intrusive. Overall, a good stay, we just had a slew of difficulties that were seemingly a one time thing.

We spent two beautiful nights at their home , we felt comfortable since we arrived.

Their home was so clean and they were so so nice and respectful with us .

***** five stars for them *****

The stay was perfect!  Thank you Debbie for being such a gracious host.  We had everything we needed - even chocolate & coffee!  Most of all it allowed us to spend lots of time with our daughter since you were within walking distance of her home.
Great vacation!
Best Regards,
Frances & Steve
The reservation was canceled 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Basel is an incredible host, has has a great attention and he's very friendly, we loved Lulu! The location is excellent, very close to everything, a little difficult the stairs at the entrance, and would loved a day of cleaning during our stay. Highly recommend this place! Thanks Basel we really enjoyed our stay!

second time I have stayed at the Schneider guest house. It is really comfortable, easy parking, nicer than some hotels I have stayed in. Julie has a coffee maker for the morning. The bed is super comfortable.  The place is clean and quiet. It is like home away from home.  Can't say enough.

Jeff is a great host. I had a short trip to LA to meet with my friend and my cousin, and needed a simple private room with reasonable price.  And Jeff's was exactly what I wanted.  Jeff even provided some bottle water and some fruit in the kitchen.  The room was cozy and clean.  Even though there were four vehicles in the parking space, not that big, Jeff could still arrange it well, and met everybody's need.  Strongly recommend Jeff's place.

AMAZING! - The first word that comes to mind when I think of Davids' place. The Loft far exceeded expectations I had from the pictures. As Will Ferrel would say, "Theres so much room for activities!" Communicating with david was very easy, he even allowed a friend staying with me to check - in in my place. I would definitely suggest this place to anyone looking to stay in the area!

We had a fabulous NYE staying with Michelle at her residence. She was so attentive, organized, welcoming, considerate and very kind. She went out of her way to ensure we had the most pleasant stay and I wish we lived closer because she is definitely someone you can easily get along with on so many levels. Amazing host, awesome person, great location to nearby restaurants and bars... This was by far our best experience on Airbnb to date. Thanks again Michelle! Keep in touch!

Good location and view!
Clean and beautiful place!
Bedroom and kitchen is well decorated and comprehensive facility.
It's a pity to stay only one night, better spend for a whole day in the lovely place.

Stayed at walk street cottage for 2 nights at the start of our trip to California. The cottage is gorgeous with so many extras and the attention to detail in everything is impressive. Location is fantastic, we walked to most sites close by. Maddy and John were really helpful in recommending places to eat and things to see but also completely respected our privacy. 
If we are lucky enough to return we will definitely come and stay again.
Many thanks to both of you.
John
We had another great stay at Mary Ann's! I highly recommend staying here.

Helen was by far the best host I've ever stayed  with. Everything about her description was on point and accurate, but once you get here it's even better than that. She's friendly, welcoming and even provides breakfast and snacks. I'll definitely stay here again when I'm in town.

There is excellent energy in this place.

My parents came back into town for a visit, and I booked a place with Jeanette again, since we'd had such an effortless experience last time. I hung out with them a bit at the home, and the place is fantastic! Better than advertised. The building is an older style, but the modern decorating has been done in a way that fits seamlessly. It feels both homey and stylish. There was plenty of space, and the neighborhood seemed quite peaceful for being so central to much of Los Angeles. We were able to hit the beach, return to change clothes, and go downtown for a nice dinner. It seemed a shame to not take advantage of being so close to Restaurant Row and the Beverly Center, but that wasn't in our schedule this time. My parents regretted that they didn't have more time to stay to enjoy it more, with the pool and deck in the back, the full kitchen, and the great location. And once again, Jeanette was a fantastic host, completely on top of everything! We had no issues, but I'm sure she would have solved any problems for us in a snap.

The Hidden spot and the Vargas family have a wonderful place in Reseda! The mini house is very comfortable and provides ease of come and go as it's separate from the house, AC was a live saver this weekend as our stay had easy 100 degree days. Highly recommend staying here if in the area!

The house was very cozy a lot of personal touch and details. Had a private entrance and the easiest way to get in and get out when you want. For a very great price location is also very convenient close to the beaches and downtown LA Looking for staying there again

The appartment was a lovely place to stay. We stayed there for 3 nights and it was perfect. Cindy left snacks and beverages for us, which was really appreciated! Very close to Venice beach, Santa Monica, Beverly Hills, Hollywood and downtown LA by car! I would absolutely recommend this place and would return if I have to go back to LA!! Thanks again Cindy!!

My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Pepita's modern cabin. The property and accommodations were excellent and relaxing. The cabin is as cool and unique as photographed and offers all the amenities you'd need for your stay. Wifi, apple TV, and equiped kitchen allowed us to fully enjoy cooking a large meal and having a relaxing night in after a day spent hiking and at the beach. Highly, highly recommend this rental to anyone looking in the area.
Great location, great apartment with really nice views. Comfortable and convenient. Would definitely stay here again.
Easy parking, nice place and the best non-my-home shower ever. Seriously.

This was a fantastic place to stay in Los Angeles! Kelly made us feel very welcome, and was very accommodating and flexible with our schedule! The suite is also great! It is very welcoming, clean, and it is located in a great neighborhood! I would definitely recommend this location for a stay in LA!

I can't speak highly enough of Chad and his apartment. Sunset strip charmer is an unreal place to stay in West Hollywood. The location is sensational (you can actually walk to lots of restaurants and bars - in LA!) and the apartment itself is very clean and extremely comfortable. Chad himself is an exception host and a pleasure to deal with. Would definitely stay here again.

Maiana's studio is absolutely, unspeakably adorable. It was recently renovated and furnished with top notch finishes and features. I honestly wanted to move in, it's that nice. The garden she keeps is absolutely splendid. Her cats are both ridiculously friendly, and her medium size mixed-breed dog is really nice though she barked at us the first couple times she met us. I love animals, so I didn't take offense. This place is a little piece of heaven, in what I'd politely describe as a neighborhood in transition. Easy walking distance to several restaurants and shops. On street parking was easy for us to find near the house. Maiana is a splendid hostess. She is very friendly and accommodating, and she gave me some plants for my garden!  Yay!  :)

I love this home! It really is this peaceful oasis tucked away near the beach. Neva was a wonderfully kind and responsive host.  the whole place is exactly as described- airy and beachy. My son especially loved having the sweet koi pond and being able to feed the fishies.  The location was great too, walking distance to the beach and some cool little restaurants and a quick ride to a really great whole foods. I was a little concerned about the street parking but I rarely had a problem finding a spot out right out front. I cant wait to return. Thank you Neva!
Lovely place and very easygoing hostess

I loved loved loved Julia's apartment. It was perfectly located right off the Santa Monica strip. Apartment looked exactly like in the pics and the bed was to die for!

Julia was great in communicating and getting back to me promptly with any questions I had. A little hiccup with the wifi internet, and Julia had it fixed in no time.

I would highly recommend this apartment if you're looking at being centrally located in West Hollywood! :)

Barbara was incredibly responsive and accommodating! The studio was as described and what I was hoping for in my stay. Comfy, quiet, and with (off-street) parking (yay!), too. I'd definitely consider staying again! Thanks!
Great host,, great communication ! Made sure me and my guest had a great time!

I can strongly recommend anyone to rent a room in this wonderful house. Not only is the neighbourhood calm and quite (but still close to the city), the rooms large and very well furnished; but the host Kathy does all she can to make you feel at home and make the most of your stay.

I've stayed with Barbara multiple times when I have stopped in L.A.  Her home now feels like my home, away from home.  She always makes me feel welcomed. Her home is in a safe and quiet neighborhood.  The room is always as advertised and the furniture is comfortable/relaxing.  I will definitely be back.

It was very nice and spacious. We were provided with little things that one would often forget while traveling (toothbrushes, shampoo, soap, etc) which was incredibly thoughtful. Though I never met Alex face to face, he was very responsive when needed. All in all, I definitely enjoyed my stay there.

Alex did a wonderful job of meeting us and directing us to the apartment, which is not easy in downtown LA. She gave us an excellent layout of the neighborhood and where things are. Downtown LA is a mix of old and new and the apartment was brand new and well appointed with modern amenities in a very old building. We walked a lot in the area and never felt unsafe in this neighborhood which is well on its way to a wonderful revival. The parking pass that comes with the apartment was very helpful since parking is at a premium.

We loved staying in this studio! We were pretty surprised and amazed to see that the space is even more beautiful in person. The studio was spotless, the bathroom was sparkling, and the bed was extremely comfortable. The outdoor patio was just what we needed after a busy day. 

The studio is close enough to the beach for a walk, or you can use the cruiser bikes. We had a busy schedule and opted to park down near Abbot-Kinney, a cool main drag of boutiques and cafes (mmm, Intelligentsia coffee!) so we could walk around the Venice canals before meeting friends at the beach.

Seriously, I can't say enough good things about Lisa's space, or Lisa herself. Although we didn't meet in person, she was extremely responsive via phone & messages. My partner and I felt like we had our own house for two days in a gorgeous little neighborhood. I would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Great location as it is a straight shot down the street to the beach! Just as pictured in her posting. Teresa was a great, friendly host. She had everything we needed if we forgot, which I thought was awesome!
Great location, flat was cute.  Having the kettle and microwave was handy.

Had a great time with Ed & Sharon. Everything is clean, there is a lot of space to just hang out and the view over LA is amazing! Only met Sharon once, but she's super sweet and helpful. Will definitely go back here next time.

I must say I had an amazing experience staying with Gary. I have stayed in his house for almost a month and I felt home from the very first day I've arrived.
Gary is very well known an respected in the Venice community and he has an amazing personality .

As I had a ticket for burning man but I had no transportation, tent or a camp to stay in, Gary introduced me to all the LA burners and all of them had helped me to have probably the most amazing experience of my life- I made it to Burning Man!!! Gary had lend me his cooler boxes and some stuff that I needed for camping in the desert.
Gary constantly supported me with all the things I needed- a bicycle or a ride to the rent a car offices. Gary gave me tips on where to eat , where to go and how to spend less as a tourist. 
He took me on a nice ride to Malibu on his Harley.
I really felt a part of the house , of the community . I really felt home. 
And not looking forward to leave.
Will miss all that good energy. Will miss home.
Oh, and I almost forgot ! The most incredible sunset over Venice !

The PERFECT place to stay for our one night in transit at LAX. Coming from NZ, we were thrilled to get such a beautiful night sleep in this quiet and cool studio, plus a good quality bed. We hope to stay again with you!!

I saw Leslie when I was about to leave, but she has been very kind to me. The place was good, there were a lot of restaurants, stores close to the house. Everything has been nice, and my staying as well!

Laurie is an awesome host. She was very informative about the area.The room was nice and clean. The bed was comfortable. Enjoyed the pond and the flowers in the backyard.Will definitely recommend stay at her place.

It was our second time at Deirdre's guest house which we like as much as the first time. Deirdre is a very welcoming host and the house itself is very convenient and clean. Neighborhood has some very good spots to eat and drink
What a great location! We walked to a few great coffee shops and restaurants, which all are very close.

What a lovely, hip urban oasis Michelle and Barry have! My mom, my sister, and I had a blast in the neighborhood and then were able to easily relax and hang out at the cottage. Great amenities and treats, easy access and parking. Michelle even rescued an earring my mom left behind! Easily my current favorite LA home away from home! Thanks, Michelle and Barry

Alexis was wonderful. Very accomodating of my last minute reservation, she had the room ready for me and was very pleasant and helpful. Mine was a short stay, but the room is spacious and nice in a good neighborhood. Happy to have stayed there.

Our last-minute request to stay at the Spidey Pad was accepted. The communication was fast and clear. We arrived by car and later then expected due to traffic but fortunately a self-checkin was possible so everything was stress-free and went smoothly. The place is very nice and private. It was great to have a cosy yet spacey apartment to ourselves. Great location! We met Ilia at the check out, she was very friendly! Oh and so much was thought of to make your stay pleasant (like detergent and small drugstore items)!! I can go on and on..:)
Clean, simple, very nice host. We had everything we needed and were comfortable during our stay. Thanks!

I had a most wonderful time at Ryan's and experience in L.A.
I was welcomed and my needs as a guest were all excellently attended to. Ryan - thank you a bunch!
Highly recommended to other AirBnb  members.

This was the perfect place for our family to stay in LA. The neighborhood was quiet and nestled in the mountains but easily accessible and great to come home to after a day of exploring the LA area. Dashiel and her family were more than accommodating and went out of their way to make sure our visit was perfect. She really takes the bnb hospitality of airbnb seriously. We had delicious breakfast every morning and things for our young kids to play with. She even offered sand toys for our two year old when we went to the beach. We highly recommend staying here, especially if you have a family.

Audrey's gracious and warm welcome is a plus.  Her accommodations are extremely tasteful and immaculate.  From her listing I assumed the room had a private bath but learned on arrival that it was a shared bath.  I stayed one night but deleted my reservation for the 2nd night due to I would be sharing the bath with another guest.  Audrey was helpful in my making this change on my reservation.

I stayed with my girlfriend at Shereens place 2 nights in December. The host was really friendly and we felt very welcome.
Our room was stuffed with towels and we had our own bathroom.
The rooms were really clean and nice decorated. 
We were allowed to use the wifi for free. We could rent two bikes for free and spent one day cruising around at Venice Beach. 
The location is really close to Venice Beach and Santa Monica. Futhermore we could park our car for free on the street close to the house.
We can really recommend this place.

Loved the location, it was close to a lot of different places. The apartment was really cool inside and was on the first floor(very convenient). Kate responded to all my emails which helped. Sometimes the scan key wouldnt work but you just have to dial in and youll be fine. Roof access if you want fresh air and a good look at the hollywood sign.

Stephanie was a fantastic host. The home was very clean, beautiful and in great condition. The communication was clear and detailed. We had a great experience staying here and would definitely stay here again!

Our host, Anndrea was right there to meet us and helped us with our luggage too! Very easy check in, low key and non obtrusive. The unit is as described, it was clean and had that rustic cabin charm I like. Not for everyone, but I LOVE It. Lots of wood and nice windows that have been well maintained. It looks like the bathroom is getting ready to be updated, but it is functional.  The neighborhood is super safe and peaceful with an ocean view that made my jaw drop. Lots of awesome plants growing everywhere. My friend and I spent lots of time on the swing outside the unit and I felt as if we had been gone for a week instead of two days. Thank you for making it a great experience!

We really enjoyed our stay in Venice. The bungalow is perfect, good location in the venice canal, 10 min away from the beach and really easy to park with a car.
Missie is very welcoming, helpful and flexible.
I really recommend this place !
Super helpful during my stay. Amazing experience
Al was extremely flexible regarding check-in and check-out times. He was readily available by text and went out of his way to welcome us!
Coralie & her husband were very nice! It is close to downtown, a lot of places to eat just right around the corner.

It was perfectly smooth. The place is as advertized and mentioned.
Convenient and located smack in the centre. The free parking is at the back of the building. No problems. I didnt even need to meet the host. Was able to handle and manage everything via email itself. 
Place was clean and spotless for us.  I was satisfied with the stay.

This was my 3rd stay with Mabel & Robert. I was greeted warmly by my hosts and the guest house was clean and cozy, as usual. I'm hoping that I'm lucky enough to stay here for all my future trips to LA.
Quiet, comfortable, convenient with good parking.
Excellent location, good apartment but maintenance needs improvement.  Good choice for a family looking for a place in Santa Monica.
