It was my first time in LA and it was very important for me to find a pleasant place.
When i have seen Mel’s house on Air Bnb I found it very cute and when I arrived I had a very good surprise. The house is even more beautiful than on the photos. It is a very pleasant place, well decorated, sunny, very clean and my bedroom was so confortable.
But what makes a house a home is the person who lives there. And Mel is one of these persons. She is a generous person, helpful and cheerful. She made my stay very pleasant.
I really enjoyed the time I spent there, I will keep good memories of my stay and particularly of the backyard behind my room which was definitely my favorite place in the house.

Brian and Rebecca were brilliant, they couldn't have been more welcoming and helpful when staying with them. The room itself is lovely, has a very comfortable sofa as well as the double bed which makes it feel more than just a bedroom. Would definitely recommend staying here!

An overall excellent experience. My first ever AirBnB booking, and along with that was a small learning experience - I had a couple drop out at the last minute, and rather than try to update my reservation through AirBnB I called Chantal, and she gave me the impression that my rate could be adjusted if my friends didn't show. That was dumb of me, and I of course ended up paying what I had booked. Not Chantal's fault, just a reminder to use the proper channels for those sorts of things. 

Otherwise the house was a wonderful place to stay - lots and lots of dishes and cutlery is a bonus, beds were very comfortable, some wonderful hikes in the area. House was very well stocked with towels, which was key with hiking/beach/hottub all on the itinerary. You should bring dish towels or paper towels if you plan to cook.
Everything was clean and comfy and Lara is a great host and lovely person.
La casa estaba bien y el barrio era bueno.

These 3 days were amazing ! My friends and I thank Frances and her husband really much for their beautiful modern and functionnal house and their kindness too ! 
All of us are totally satisfied by the service and we have nothing bad to say ! The place is well located, the neighborhood really quiet ! 
We really enjoyed this trip and we advise everybody to experience this house too ! 
Thank you again ! 
Johan

Had an amazing time in the Zen Retreat, it was just what we needed! Beautiful area, COMFORTABLE bed in a perfectly sized room. So restful and relaxing. Highly recommend for anyone and everyone in the area.

This unit was even better than pictured and perfect for our group of four.   Ash is a meticulous host; his response to our needs was immediate, his communication excellent, and his restaurant recommendations spot-on.   This artsy/upcoming area is filled with non-corporate type shops, restaurants, and bars, and is safe to walk day or night.  Parking is gated and off the street, and even had room for a second car when we had company.  Everything was spotless and extremely well-maintained; it is obvious that Ash takes personal pride in offering the best for his quests.  We enjoyed our stay here and highly recommend it to others.

Great experience here. The place is clean and has everything you need for a few days in Los Angeles. The location is great, a short walk to Hollywood blvd. And it was surprisingly quiet. Apple & Chompoo respond quickly to e-mails and did a great job problem solving. (locked ourselves out at 7:30 in the morning but they had the manager there in 10 minutes to open the door for us).

It was a fabulous experience staying at Keller’s place. The communication I had with Keller both prior to and during our stay was excellent. He made sure all details were taken care of and was on hand for any questions we had about the house and LA in general. Everything was as described in the listing text and photographs.

The house is divine - full of ‘old Hollywood’ atmosphere, every space (of which there are many) a pleasure to luxuriate in, including the garden and the rooftop patio where you can enjoy the sights and sounds of birds and the neighbourhood. The grand piano is beautiful. The king bed in the master bedroom is super comfortable. It was difficult to leave the house to go sight-seeing as it is just perfect for lazy, indulgent holiday days. The neighbourhood is full of beautiful houses and gardens, a very relaxed, easy-going feel and quiet, considering it's so close to the buzz of Hollywood Boulevard.

It is a 15 minute walk to Hollywood Boulevard, including the metro station and buses. It’s set on a hill so if you don’t have your own car, bear in mind you will need to either take a taxi or walk up hill to return to the house. We found a Fresh and Easy supermarket on Hollywood Boulevard which had a good range of healthy salads and organic foods and fruit and veg.

All in all it was the perfect place to really relax in and it felt so comfortable, just like your own home. We highly recommend staying here, it's a unique experience.
Thank you Keller for a memorable stay.
Everything was as described. Parking was always available even if we had to walk 2 blocks. Comfortable beds and facilities. Would reserve again!

The Ella House is lovely. It's cozy and relaxing. Everything you need is there! Quiet neighborhood and convenient to travel to beach and Hollywood etc. Close to stores for stuff you need too. All the common house properties are great. Our travel favorite. Having a garage makes life easy too
We stayed at Keller's place and found it to be everything we wanted. The place was clean, great layout and you couldn't beat the location. We had a lot of fun there and would recommend it to anyone

This place is awesome!  Al is an awesome host!  The place is loft style modern apartment downtown LA.  There's a great outdoor pool, theater, weight room in the building, and an outdoor rooftop patio, that is very cool.   There's a good market on the corner and a bunch of restaurants and bars close by.  Downtown LA is growing rapidly.  The apartment is close to convention center as well.  

As for the place, there's all the amenities you would want.  High speed internet, netflix, hbo go, hulu, coffee machine.  Al is the absolute excellent host.  He's only a phone call away and always standing by.  

I had a great couple days at the apartment and highly recommend renting anything Al is a part of.
Marcella was extremely accommodating, friendly, and provided a great landing place for our large group of 8. It was perfect for what we needed. Thank you!!!
Great host

I needed a place to stay on the way from San Diego to Monterrey and wasn't sure where I'd stop. This was an 11th hour booking and Caroline was extremely accommodating.  The place is as described and good location of the freeway. Right next to the street so does get a bit noisy but earplugs are provided and work a treat.

Nan and Dan were accommodating, friendly, and helpful. Casa Periwinkle was just what we needed. We felt welcomed and comfortable for our entire stay. The location is fantastic, and Nan and Dan provide some great recommendations for travelers. The welcome refreshments and supplies in the kitchen and bathroom were a thoughtful touch that we greatly appreciated. I highly recommend Casa Periwinkle!

Kate's apartment was in a convenient location for my needs, easy to find and use.  The hair dryer, TV, coffee, and other items met my needs.  I was comfortable.

It is located on a busy street, however, and gets noisy in the early morning.

Both Monica and Steve made me feel very welcome. They are truly a special pair. There are not enough accolades in the dictionary to describe them. They are the best!!
The listing was entirely accurate. Great neighborhood. Very close to The Strand, across the street from the world-famous vegetarian restaurant (The Spot), and walking distance to everything!
Perfect for big groups. Very comfortable and cosy. Thanks for everything.

We were pretty disappointed by our stay in Silvio's appartment for a number of reasons!
Firstly someone had obviously vomited in the apartment prior to our arrival as the smell was appalling and didn't go away for the entire 3 days of our stay even though Silvio had it cleaned a second time. 
Also when we first arrived the apartment was not ready for us to check in even though we had let him know what time we were arriving. 
There was no duvet cover on the bed which we let Silvio know but we did not receive one after a number of attempts to contact him about it.
We never met Silvio and there was no information left about the apartment - therefore we didn't know how to use the cooker or know the wifi access code and had to pay international fees to message Silvio for basic info. 
The noise from the bar downstairs on weekends is incredibly loud and goes on until 2am - lucky we went out although they are also very loud at 9am on a Sunday!

The only good thing we can say is that the apartment has a very good location.

This was my first experience with airbnb and I was a little hesitant in the beginning... I can say without a doubt however that it was the right decision! The place was just as advertised, a private urban oasis! I really enjoyed my stay... and it is really close to downtown Culver City and I10 so getting around was really easy. 

On the other hand, Neha, the host, was great... When I asked her where to run close by she actually sent me a complete list of routes around the area... Also, I realized the last day of my trip that I was flying back in the red eye to Miami, the check out was planned for 10 AM but I had nothing to do, and a bunch of bags, till 10 PM. She was really nice and actually let me stay at her place for the evening. For that I am very grateful and wouldn´t hesitate recomending this listing to anyone. I will certainly come back if I visit LA in the future!

Staying at Ali's was very convenient, close to most places. Very quiet environment and the place is very neat. Ali is so friendly and always offer her help to you if needed. Highly recommended to everyone who wants to visit LA.

Virginia and Jason were so warm and welcoming to their home. We arrived at night to a path of tiki lights leading us to the back guest house—it really felt like a sanctuary. We woke the next morning to the sun streaming in the windows, and the sliding door cracked open to let the breeze seep in. It was perfect and we'll definitely be back.

I have been to many attraction places and did many activities in Los Angeles. However, staying 25 nights at Todd's guest house was the best experience I did in LA. The houses in the neighborhood were so beautiful including Todd's house. The area was very very very CLEAN, SAFE, and QUIET. In regards to the house itself, I lived in a separate room with its own entrance which is much more convenient for Todd and me. The room was so clean. Everything was like new. A Small refrigerator, Microwave, small oven, silverware sets were included in a private section in the room. 
When we moved in, Todd asked us what other things we need? When he knew that I like rice, he brought a rice cooker and other small oven down stairs in the basement. Todd was very nice, polite, clean, quiet, and respectful gentleman. He helped me moving my stuff in. He let me used his own barbecue grill in the back yard. OMG! The back yard was gorgeous. I love spending mornings there. I have back door, which open right to the yard. Look at the picture that Todd provided to see what I mean. The pictures cannot describe the real place, which is even better.
He advised me valuable information when I sold my car at that time. When I asked him about shipping companies to send my stuff to another state, he offered me to send it through his business that I can get a great discount.

Patcy (if I spell it right) is a female dog lives with Todd. My wife and I are afraid of dogs in general. However, Patcy changed my attitude towards dogs. Patcy is different. She was so friendly and beautiful. When we got along together, she was trying to protect me from other dogs in the neighborhood in case they bark at me. I couldn’t spend a day without seeing Patcy. If I spend much time out of the house, I asked my wife to go back home to see Patcy and play with her. If I will visit LA again for any reason, Todd’s house will be my first destination. 

Thank you so much Todd for having us at your great house. I already miss you and Patcy.

The place worked out very well for my stay. Everything was clean and in great shape upon my arrival. The location was great and I was pleasantly surprised with how quiet it was. Also, very nice to be able to walk to so many conveniences. 

I would definitely stay here again and have no hesitation to recommend it to friends and family.

The place was great and JW was super helpful and accommodating. I loved it. I will totally stay here again. 

Awesome spot.

l' acceuil a été tres symphatique de la part de walter .
Le quartier de silver lake est agreable et bien situé dans LA .
nous avons pu y passe un ecxellent sejour

I enjoyed my stay in this very spacious private basement. The space was described accurately and was very comfortable. The host was very accommodating with my arrival and departure schedule. I spent most of my time working during my visit so I only saw the host in passing, but she seemed very kind and respected my privacy during my visit.
Perfect! Clean! With a great view

I had a really good week long stay here! The guest house is nice and cozy. I never even needed the extra fan they provided. The mini fridge is really great as well! Our hosts were great! Although one was not able to be there John was awesome and was very helpful and super open to helping us out with anything. We didn't get to talk much but my hubby and I had a good conversation with him when we did. We are very happy with out stay. All I could say negative is maybe the futon is maybe harder for two people to sleep on but personally my husband and I had no problem and were fine with it the whole time. The parking was always easy. We never had to look. Although if for some reason there wasn't any they said we may park in their personal parking but there was no need. Easier to park on the road which is great if you have a car! Would love to come back and stay!

Isabelle's loft provided my wife and me just the location and convenience we wanted during our LA beach vacation. The loft is located a few steps from Venice's trendiest boulevard, which is loaded with boutiques, cafes, and delicious restaurants, and a mere ten-minute walk (7-minute bike ride) from the beach. Isabelle was extremely accommodating, greeting us with treats and decorating the loft with pretty flowers. She made herself available to us for any questions we might have. For those nights you come home spent from a great day swimming, riding your bikes through Venice's great neighborhoods, and eating a fabulous dinner in a world-class restaurant, you will find the loft itself is bright and stocked with interesting books and magazines, many of local interest. Overall, a great stay at the Artist Loft in the Heart of Venice!
Very nice, big room. Excellent walk-in closet and bathroom.
Very comfortable few days with Rodney as our host. He is very friendly and welcoming. Everything in the room was as advertised. Great experience!

Although Agnes wasn't there when we stayed at her place she was very helpful throughout the entire time. The place actually right off the pages of a design magazine and is almost unbelievably stylish. It was clean, bright and beautiful. Her roommate was very welcoming and although we only met him once. 
The house is very well located of you have a car. You even get free parking in front of the house. We kind of had a struggle because we had to uber and take a bus all the time. The next metro is in Koreatown. At night the house was kind of cold during the night but that is just California houses in winter, that's typical. 
We had a great stay and I would recommend her house to anyone going to LA (if you have a car ;))

Fantastic! Every aspect of this stay was as perfect as it can get. Easy confirmation of the reservation, great communication in the days leading up to the stay, easy check-in, a fabulous, clean, spacious apartment in an impeccable location and a flawless check-out. M.J. is possibly the most responsive host I've ever encountered on (website hidden) with responses rarely taking more than a couple of minutes.

Beautifully furnished apartment! Made it feel very homely and had all the little personal touches that make it so different from a sterile hotel room!! Also a fully equipped kitchen with some top-notch appliances made the few times we cooked very pleasurable!

And the location really is hard to beat - just minutes off the freeway and minutes (traffic notwithstanding) from a lot of Hollywood area attractions. Lots of restaurants in the vicinity too!

I recommend this heartily and it will for sure be my to-go place when I'm in LA next :)

Thanks M.J.!!

Excellent Apartment! Even with some last-minute changes, Alex was on top of everything and went out of her way to make our stay great. Amazing apartment and great service. Will definitely stay there again soon!

We had a lovely stay, and found everything to be really neat and tidy and kid friendly, except having the house a duplex I wouldn't recommend with toddler kids, as I think with them running up and down the hall way was a bit loud for the guests staying next door, but they loved it otherwise.
Heaps of room and was good to come home to a home away from home and cook a lovely family meal.

I live in LA and a friend and I decided to get away for the weekend. Todd's place was perfect. Prime location right on the beach, great parking space in the back and even was walking distance from Dudley Market and Cafe Gratitude. 

Since we live in LA we just simply got the keys, let ourselves into the apartment and were able to stay and do our own thing. 

When I had a slight issue with the wifi and contacted Todd, it was fixed immediately. 

Definitely will be back staying here soon. HIGHLY recommend
Fast responses and brand new sets leave us a great experience.
Host was very flexible and easy to work with. Very Responsive via phone and email. Property is in a good tucked away location. Great place to get away for peace and quiteness.

My host and hostess were great! They were very warm and welcoming. I had Turkish coffee and a cheese and tomato tostada in the morning. I was free to do my own thing and felt very at ease.  Very charming and fun loving people. I was entertained with their practicing as well.
Clean, local, and awesome Studio.

I stayed at Amina's house for three days. I had a wonderful time getting to know her and also her daughter and son who were visiting. They were all very kind and helpful. It was great and so interesting talking to them. The apartment is beautifully furnished as shown in the pictures and Amina's two dogs are adorable and quiet and won't bother you, because they are outside of the house. But still you can ask to kuddle them, which I did :). The place is close to Sunset and Hollywood Blvd. - very good location! I higly recommend this place!
Would highly recommend anyone to come here again. Had a really great time!
Very nice and clean apartment. Easy check in and check out. Recommend this place to everyone

Very nice and clean bathroom and room, we had a great week in LA.
We can recommend to anyone!

The place was great! Apartment was just as pictured. Parking was easy and there were lots of restaurants and bars nearby.  I would definitely stay again. It was kind of loud at night,  but it wasn't a big deal for us. Host left earplugs just in case.

My friend and I had a wonderful stay here. The studio was very comfortable and included everything we needed to make ourselves at home. Tor was a great host and I would definitely stay here again! If you're looking for privacy, convenience, and comfort, this studio is perfect for you.
The apartment is so well located!  Your instructions were good and everything we needed was available.

This was my first Airbnb experience in Venice and it definitely won't be my last. Thea's place was incredible and was exactly as described. The house itself is perfect and couldn't be in a better location. 

I will be recommending Thea's place to anyone traveling to Venice in the future.

Wes is most certainly the host with the most! The listing is exactly as described and the apartment is charming, spacious, clean and very comfy. I was there for over 2 weeks while working a stressful gig and Wes went above and beyond with anything I needed. I was so grateful to know that I could count on him for everything from extra blankets to help with parking. You are in good hands!!!
It was just perfect. Millie is such a friendly person and she was helping wherever she could. I would def. book Noah's Beach Condo again.  Thank you very much again.

Lisa and Kim were great! My flight came in late (midnight) and Kim welcomed me with a smile and still gave me a tour of the house even though it was late. Everything was very clean and comfortable. I'm definitely coming back.
Real nice unit in a great location. I enjoyed my stay. Denise is a wonderful host.
This is a really nice place. It's much more worth than the price! And the host is very nice to us. We really had a great time here!

We stayed in Doug and Jhoiey's house for 4 nights with a group of 8 other friends ( 4 couples and 2 single friends in total) The two duplexes were absolutely perfect for us and we really enjoyed staying. Each duplex had two double beds in seperate rooms and Doug and Jhoiey were happy to set up inflatable mattresses in each duplex for our single friends, which were set up in the large dinning / lounge areas. The duplex was a great size for our group of 10 as it had 2 bathrooms in each and ajoining courtyards. 

The communication with Doug and Jhoiey in the lead up to our stay was fantastic! They were very accommodating with our early morning check in and Jhoiey went above and beyond on the morning of check in to show us around and make  sure everything was ready. We really appreciated the complementary wine, coffee flavors, condiments, soap, shampoo and conditioner and ample towels and wifi. 

The location in west hollywood was perfect as we were able to walk to a number of restaurants and bars and cabs always showed up very quickly. There was also a secure place to off the street to park the hire car. The tall hedge around the property made it feel very secure and private. 
Overall everyone really loved two duplexes - it was perfect for our group and we highly recommend this property to other travelers looking to accommodate a large group.

Rita provides a warm welcome, is full of energy and a kind and generous host.  LA can be tricky to a new comer or solo traveller and Rita has great suggestions and will help where possible.  The house is immaculate as is this room and bathroom.  The bed is very comfortable and a great shower.  The pool is a real treat in the heat of LA and guests may use it.  As always its best to check house rules on use of kitchen and pool before assuming anything and keep noise levels low for everyone's benefit. Location wise it's a lovely residential street with cafes a stones throw away on Melrose.  Bear in mind LA is more spread out than maps suggest so signing up for uber app for car rides works well.  Its about $5-$10 by uber to the main places on that side of town i.e. The grove/farmers market, third ave, Beverly hills/rodeo drive etc. Better value than a hotel any day.

So gorgeous! Thanks Roisin and Tao for the experience of the airstream, it was really cute and cosy, just like the photos. It is a little cramped inside, if you aren't used to  caravanning, and I wouldn't recommend it for people who are going to have huge suitcases, but perfectly fine for 4 nights. The 'outhouse' if you could even call it that - a beautiful separate room with a shower over claw foot bath was really something, and I was glad to have the alternative to the airstream bathroom! Pretty well situated in Venice, close to the beach but also to supermarkets and buses. And a 2 blocks from the Bicycle Whisperer - I highly recommend going to him to hire bikes for the day. $25 with a 10pm return time. Yelp him!

We were pleasantly surprised with how large the rooms were and how nice the apartment was. Our wonderful hosts greeted us with wine, chocolate, bagels, etc! The beds were comfortable and it was great to have a washer and dryer in the unit. The location is central to anywhere you might want to visit in Santa Monica or LA. It's an older building , but the unit is updated and very clean. We were happy to have 2 secure underground parking places. We will definite use Jeff and Shannon's place again!!

We never did see Nancy, but her father in law was friendly and accommodating. The accommodation was as described and had much more space than we required (8+ could fit). The neighborhood was fine (working class) with a full supermarket only a block away and easy access to freeways.  The people in the neighborhood were friendly.  Loud party next door one evening, but they quieted down well around bed time so no real issue.
What a gorgeous scenic property!  Directly on the beach with a huge deck to gaze at the ocean.

Silver Lake Oasis is aptly named. It is a great escape after a day running around LA. To be able to start one's day with a cup of coffee listening to the water fall from a little fountain and end the day with a glass of wine sitting around around the gas fire pit was a real treat.

Silver Lake itself is a cool neighborhood with lots  of little California bungalows hidden behind the busy thoroughfares that quickly connect you to the many different areas of LA.

We came to the Mission as a four piece project from Seattle with a huge work load ahead of us.  We needed to check in early and the staff was extremely helpful and accommodating, they even waved the extra $10 to make an early accommodation. 

I love what the Mission stands; for an extremely affordable place for like minded artist types. It's an interesting building with people of the same caliber. 

The room was a touch small for four grown adults but it was well cleaned and cared for.  Plenty of fresh linens were also provided. 

It's important to keep in mind to expect the unexpected, where it's clearly detailed in their description - noise can be an issue if you're staying in town for business.  Under normal circumstances, we'd jump straight in to an after hours party on a Monday night but we had early call times and couldn't afford to be unrested. 
We had to cancel the remainder of our reservation and move to a conventional hotel for the remainder of our stay. Again, Derek and Farrah were more than accommodating and understanding. 

I would 100% stay at Mission again, just not with such a strenuous work load ahead of me.

MY ten year old daughter and I had a great stay at Dale and Paul's lovely house in Santa Monica. They were great hosts, promptly responding to our pre-trip questions, and being great company throughout the stay - even helping Lily get ready for Halloween. The house is great, with loads of space and everything you need for comfort, and a nice touch is that the guest bedroom (with TV) and bathroom is screened off in its own area. There's a delightful small garden area, that you can enjoy from the comfort of the jacuzzi, and Doug the dog is perfectly cute and friendly. Would recommend this place to anyone.

I'm not one for leaving bad reviews but in this case I thought I'd have too. Didn't have a very good experience at all. I contacted roseman stating that my check in would be at 930am and he replied with okay. Never once telling me someone was going to be there until 1pm. So we waited around for 3 hours and after an international flight this was not what we felt like doing. For 6 nights and 7 days we got 2 towels between us and 1 toilet roll...FOR 6 NIGHTS. Only thing good about this accomodation is its location and wifi.

Great neighborhood, beautiful house, very charming family.  I felt equally comfortable getting some work done in my room or chatting with the host family and some of the other guests.  One evening, we ordered pizza and had a lot of fun watching the hockey game on TV together.  I would definitely repeat -- in fact, I probably will in about a month.
The place was very cosy and clean, it was close to the beach so it was nice to go for run at the ocean shore)). Thanks to Christopher and Tony for their care & attention!

The description can be done more accurately in my opinion - it states:  "Our guesthouse has it's own private entrance and exit to a top floor bedroom as well as a bottom floor lounge and bathroom both seperate from main house." In reality, you must go outside to get to the bathroom.  Maybe state that you must go outside to get to the other area of the guest house would be better represented.  

Other than that, there aren't many windows so it's quite dark.  The pictures depict it in a light space but the windows are covered by fabric and you can't see outside in the bedroom area.  

Other than that, it served it's purpose for I was hardly there except to sleep.

By far one of the most amazing places I've ever stayed! Our host really went out of his way to let us know what was going on in town and where the good local food was to be found. Coffee in the morning and reminders of what time I could catch a beautiful sunset from the pool were just a couple of neat bonuses! Absolutely breathtaking views and such a neat property with so many different hang out spots. I felt at home and among friends the entire stay! I can't wait to go back!
Neighbourhood was great, interesting Hispanic street culture, food and market style sellers, people were nice and if your planning to hit west hollywood...get uber on your phone..cabs are killer.
Bernardo and Paula was great hosts. They were very attentive , polite and outgoing people. Everything was perfect . We spent a wonderful week in their place. We will be back definitely!

We loved staying at Bobby's! The apartment is newly remodeled, with beautiful hardwood floors, a brand new shower and bathroom, and plenty of space for a couple or small family. Bobby was so easy to work with! He answered our questions quickly and did everything he could to make sure we were comfortable. He and his wife even left snacks, magazines, books, and toiletries for us, which was wonderful! We would definitely like to stay here again in the future!

The cottage is amazing! The location is very convenient, less than 10 minutes  driving  from Santa Monica Boardwalk and Venice Beach. It's also close to a lot of attraction in LA. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. The cottage has everything you need, is tastefully furnished and feels like home!! Jacqui and Howard are friendly, lovely and willing to help in any possible way. It was nice talking with them and they were super responsive. The sofa bed in the living room is comfortable, the cottage accommodates  well 6 people. I highly recommend the Zen Cottage! My family and I had a great time there!

David was super nice and very helpful. The place is amazing with a beautiful view.

Thank you so much David for your help!
Vadim
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Just got back from celebrating the 4th of July at Linda's place.  Linda was very nice, the room and sitting area were beautiful and comfortable and looked just as they appeared in photos.  The neighborhood is gorgeous and we had a great time! 

Even though the room is attached to Linda's studio and living space, she was very courteous and considerate, ensuring we had plenty of privacy.  The location was nicely removed from the tourist traps of Hollywood but close enough to allow those interested to take a short walk if they wanted to be in the mix of things.  

And walk we did.  We walked over to the entrance of Runyon Canyon Park for some hiking, great views, and exercise.  The entire way we were grateful we weren't the folks trying to find a place for their car outside the park.  Linda's home was close enough it was just 10 minutes of walking until we arrived.

On the 3rd of July we took the short walk from Linda's over to the Hollywood Bowl, passing along the way scores of cars that were trying to park or were stuck in traffic.  Very convenient and allowed us to enjoy the show and the fireworks stress free.

Her recommendations for dining were great.  Linda suggested we walk up the hill to Yamashiro for the amazing view of L.A. and urged us to make a reservation at the delicious Mozza Pizzeria which was just a short uber ride away.  We enjoyed both, the first for the view the second for the amazing food.

While we mainly walked or used Uber to get to our destinations, we did drive to Pasadena to see family.  Linda's home is just a few minutes away from the entrance to the 101, so it was a very quick trip and we avoided most traffic.

So, all in all - this was a great place.  If you are visiting the Hollywood area, we recommend staying here!
Very nice place. My family was comfortable and had no issues. Also, he was very understanding when we accidentally took his gate remote which we returned as soon as we could.

L'accueil chez Mike fut des plus agréables! Les photos de la maison étaient fidèles à la réalité, le quartier tranquille et sécuritaire. C'est la plus belle chambre que nous avons eu jusqu'à date, avec plein de petites pensées utiles: assiette de fruits, choix de breuvages, kit de toilette format voyage, carte des environs, café à volonté, bref, la perfection! C'était 100 fois mieux qu'un hôtel! C'est que Mike sait recevoir et qu'il prend ça très au sérieux, tout en était hyper accessible et sympathique. On a même eu droit à son fameux BBQ avec ses amis et voisins, tout aussi sympathiques que lui soit dit en passant.
Je recommande sans hésiter la Mike Gillett's LAdera Lounge!!!
Cheers!

A very enjoyable and relaxed stay at Cortland's! Cortland was a fantastic host, responding to texts/emails promptly. He was there to welcome us and show us round his cosy and calming apartment, which looks just like the photos! We had full use of everything including Apple TV, lovely fresh linen, chess set and even a bat and ball for the beach!
The apartment itself is in a perfect location-walking distance to the beach and 3rd Street Promenade for shops and eateries. We really enjoyed our stay and Cortland is the perfect host!
Host was very accommodating. Made us feel comfortable and we enjoyed our stay. It was perfect for the two nights we needed in LA
Marie was very friendly and helpful. The location of the apartment is great. Close to bars and restaurants. The apartment is small and not flashy, but it was comfortable and had everything we needed.

The house was great, is like the photos. The situation was perfect, 20 minutes to Santa Monica. The proprietaries are very attentives and there isn´t any problem with them. We went to the house late, at 10 pm and there is not problem. The Wi-Fi was good. You have some extras, like water to drink, towels for bathroom and swimming pool too. The room can by looked by key.

I want to thank Solay & Blanca so much for their hospitality.  They have a beautiful home & I would recommend them to anyone wanting or needing to stay somewhere so close to evetything in Beverly Hills. I would definitely stay with them again if i am needing to stay in the area.
Host was very welcoming. Great neighborhood & sweet house!

I was the first guest staying in the downstairs apartment and it was a great experience. The pictures online are exactly how the apartment is. It is very nice and I was comfortable staying there. I definitely would stay here again. Chris is a great host.

This place is incredible and Rose Ann has everything stocked just right, she is very responsive and knows all the local spots and has that all explained in her manual.  Very private and elegantly decorated.  The location was good - close to restaurants in Culver City,  biking and cabs are easily accessible to get to the Abbot Kinney area, Venice Beach and Santa Monica.  I would recommend this place to anyone interested in staying off the beat and path in the LA area.

Guy & Karen were great. The apartment was just as described and made everyone feel really at home. Great location, easy communication, and they went out of their way to accommodate us. Highly recommended!
Really beautiful houses, Robin and assistant are very kind, and give clear orientation when checking in, have wonderful three days with family.

I had a wonderful time during my stay at Stephanie's lovely home. She is a very caring and thoughtful host! The apartment is conveniently located near the Grove and LACMA and both Ralph's and Trader Joe's are within 5-10 minutes walking distance. The neighborhood is very safe and all major attractions are within driving distance. Her apartment has everything you will need during your stay and more. I had a great experience and I'm sure you will, too!
Fin lägenhet i en lugn och trivsam omgivning. Värdparet mycket trevliga och mycket måna om att gästerna skall trivas. Rekommenderas varmt.
Richard was great, place was great, location was great. Will stay there again.

Lisa and Joe were amazing hosts, their beautiful home in Venice beach was the perfect spot for our first airbnb experience. The robot room is spacious with an Incredibly comfortable bed, it has air conditioning and next door is a very good bathroom! Lisa's delicious breakfasts set us up well to explore Venice and nearby Santa Monica and Marina Del Ray. We Loved renting their bikes for the day to head down Marina Del Ray on the amazing bike track they recommended. They gave us great suggestions for where to go and what to eat. Would definitely stay again! They even kindly sent our iPod down to our accom in San Diego when we left it behind.  Thank you so much Lisa and Joe! From M & F -NewZealand

David是好客、友善、健谈（虽然我英文很烂）的好房东，他的公寓非常漂亮、干净，周围风景如画，是此行最满意的房东。
David在我们出发前就开始和我们保持联系，并让我们住在主人房，房间非常舒服，而且让我们的车停在他的车位上，并且用他的卡去楼下洗衣服洗衣服，实在是非常贴心。
下次去洛杉矶希望你还有空房间。
David is hospitable, friendly, talkative (although my English is very bad) good host. His apartment is very beautiful and clean. The picturesque surroundings of the house. David is the best host for my trip.
Before we set out David began to keep in touch with us and let us live in the master room. The room is very comfortable and let our car parked in his parking space and used his card to go downstairs washroom to wash the clothes. David  is  nice man.
Next time I go to Los Angeles. I hope you live here again.

My friends and I had a great experience staying in this beautiful home.  We were greeted at our arrival with a warm welcome.  The host thoughtfully labeled things around the house to help guide us and help us feel more at home.  The backyard is beautiful, the neighborhood quiet, and the house immaculate.

We had a wonderful few days staying at Lisa's place in Los Feliz. 

The location is amazing, right in the heart of the Los Feliz neighbourhood. Skylight books is literally minutes away with great restaurants on your door step and the farmers market at the end of the street. 

Lisa was amazingly helpful and lightning quick to get back to all our questions. It was a shame we didn't get to meet in person as she has been super awesome on all our correspondence.

Oh and the bed is soooo comfy - we slept super well.

it was amazing! I would hope I can spend more time to stay in. to visit the whole place, to swim in that pool, to play with the animals.Gary who help to manage the house was live near, you can call him if every thing need to help. the private way to get the house is really a hard way, but to us it was a part of our trip filled with adventure!

Great location! Check in process was easy and having free parking for two cars was also very convenient. Apartment had plenty of space for all 6 guests and our luggage. Communications with the host were mostly quick and professional. 
Apartment itself was tidy although does have a musty smell and unfortunately we weren't provided with enough towels for all our guests. 
Overall we did enjoy our stay.

Eric was a wonderful host! Very welcoming and accommodating. He had a list of recommended places, a copy of the rules, and fresh oranges waiting for us. It was the perfect! The neighborhood was great, we felt very safe, and would recommend it to anyone looking for an LA adventure.
This room is awesome! Parking, water bottles, HUGE Bed! Close to restaurants, TJ's (to pick up some relaxants), WIFI, AHHHMAZING! I would definitely stay here again!

Tre was an awesome host, the place was quiet yet in an nice location that was easy to get around from, walkable or a short cab to many places to eat/drink/see, yet not in the midst of the madness. Clean place and very comfortable, way more so than previous stops on this trip where work put me in hotels. Would be up to stay here next time I'm passing through LA.
Mako was a great host! Very easy to work with and was more than generous with his time. Highly recommend staying here.
Had a great experience staying at Kevin's!  The house was in a great location, perfect for our needs, easy to check in/out of and was very clean.  Would highly recommend!

The house was located on Mount Washington.  Mount Washington had a great view at night of Dodgers stadium.  The home was very charming.  When we arrived, the toilet was broken but Matulka was nice enough to buy parts and leave it in the mailbox for us to repair ourselves.  Unfortunately we didn't have time to do it. 

One thing I'd like to note is that this place does not have Air Conditioning.  I should have noticed that when booking but I didn't so it was a bit uncomfortable since that weekend was over 100 degrees in LA.  We had all the windows open but the windows did not have screen doors and thus there were bugs flying all over the place.

Deborah was a great host. We didn't bother her much during our stay, but she was more than accommodating with early check in and ensuring the apartment was ready for our stay given the early arrival after a long 14 hour flight.
Cottage was lovely enough, but be warned of the aggressive and easily agitated neighbour next door. Deborah clearly notes this on her listing. We were whisper quiet throughout our stay but he still managed to yell at us from his house for talking too loud in the cottage in the middle of the day.
Otherwise, the location is great. You definitely need a car in LA. Literally a 20 minute drive from everything and everywhere you want to be. Thanks again Deb!

Leta is friendly.child very cute. If I had no business,I wanted to talk more.
Thank you.
Loved this place. Super cute and great location. Looks just like the pictures! Thanks for letting me stay!

Advice: Book at your own risk

The room itself was spacious. The toilet was filthy, and residents are not taught how to lock the door. On a few occasions, we came home to an unlocked apartment. 

The location is within walking distance to Chinatown but it is a 15-20 minute walk. It is a good location if you drive, otherwise, it is not as desirable. The neighborhood is quiet and relatively safe but it can be rather daunting for 3 girls to walk home along the deserted dimly lit streets.

My stay with Laura (and Matilda the cat) was excellent! A very clean home and conveniently located to everything in Pasadena and the 210 freeway. The room is spacious and the private bathroom was perfect! Laura was a great host. Matilda came around every once in awhile to say "Hi" and other than that, she kept to herself. I had a very pleasant stay in Laura's home!!

This was our second time using Airbnb - however we are also hosts in Romeo, Michigan.

Great place in a wonderful location.  You can see the Hollywood sign from her backyard!

Helen is very welcoming and knowledgeable about the area.  She really helped us out with many questions about what to do and how to get there.

The place is close to everything, which really helped as we were  attending a taping of the sitcom "Mom" at the WB studios.

The bed was comfortable and the room was large.

If ever in the area, I would highly suggest staying with Helen in her clean and comfy home.

Amazing place with an amazing host! :) thank you so much Ben for your good addresses.
You should definitly go in this place. Everything is fine.

Michelle was a wonderful hostess. She was incredibly welcoming and check-in was a breeze. When I arrived in my sparkling clean room (gorgeous - like a 5 star hotel) there was a beautiful tray of food and a bottle of wine waiting for me. She also provided all the amenities like soaps, shampoo, etc. I can't say enough about how gorgeous the room and backyard with pool and jacuzzi is.  And the bed was one of the comfiest I've slept in. Michelle and her daughter were both extremely helpful and informative about the neighborhood and helped make my stay even better. I'll definitely be back!
Very easy stay, room was exactly as described. Akiko is very welcoming. Loved her dog too!

Our experience with the hosts Was very positive.  They we're helpful when needed.  The location of their back house was perfect for us--a five minute walk to both Glendale and Los Feliz Blvd.  also important for us is this section of the l.a. River--really beautiful and another five minute walk. The location is quiet and convenient.  The unit itself has everything needed and a very comfortable bed.  We'll be back again, I'm sure.

Great location, we were in town for a conference and were able to walk to Old Town and the conference center easily. Andrew is available quickly and is very responsive to messages. Our only complaint was that there was a random pot of oil left on the kitchen stove. Overall we had a fantastic stay, thanks Andrew!

This was my 2nd time staying with Peter and Patrick. Obviously there are many great reasons to go back. It almost felt like coming back home in L.A.... I love being able to use their kitchen and make my fav breakfast food. Patrick, I realize I forgot my Espresso coffee pot - enjoy it!
My second stay at Christina's place. Fantastic as usual.  Highly recommended!
Great place ... fabulous location ... gracious host!!! Terrific stay!

Our stay at the Heart of Hollywood was amazing. Anne was very easy to communicate with from and beginning and she provided very detailed information right before our stay about the location of her apartment. Also, she responded very quickly to any of our questions.

The location of this apartment was perfect. It was literally a 10 minute walk to Hollywood Blvd./Shopping and you can also walk to local grocery stores in the area as well. There are also a lot of good eating places if you just walk down the street. It's also a close drive to Warner Brothers Studio, Hollywood sign, Griffith's Observatory/Park/Mulholland Drive etc. It was about a hour drive to Malibu/Dodger's Stadium/Grammy Museum/Santa Monica Pier/Venice Beach/LAX etc. with traffic. 

The apartment itself looks exactly like the pictures online. The place was very clean, spacious, and well updated. The people in the building were very friendly and helpful when we asked any questions too. 

Initially, we had difficulty finding finding the right parking garage but we just made a phone call to Anne and she stayed on the phone with us until we found the right one. Anne was very friendly and easy to get in touch with. 

Another plus was that we were able to do our laundry which really worked in our favour, since we were doing a multiple city tour. Anne said that she didn't provide laundry detergent; but when we got there, there was already fabric softener and tide pods, so thank you to whoever left that for us!

Overall, I think this was a great location and I would definitely recommend staying here, since it was close to most things we wanted to see.
Great apartment location in Santa Monica. Small well furnished apartment. Very nice and responsive host.
Was as described. I was pleased with the design of the pod and the price. I would stay here again.
Very nice place to stay. Close to Venice Beach and Santa Monica. Accommodation is neat and cosy with small touches such as wine and cheese which help in settling in.
Great stay! The place is simple, quirky, and affordable. Exactly what we were looking for. The main highlight is Topenga Canyon itself, the beach, and the nearby food.

Rosemary was an excellent hostess and the house was clean and charming! I was fortunate to have the downstairs bedroom, which gave me access to the entire downstairs, washer & dryer and a bathroom all to myself...there's fantastic lighting in the bathroom! I also enjoyed having coffee outside on the back patio every morning. I would love to stay here again if the opportunity arises. It was extremely convenient for my daughter's graduation from Occidental College. Great selection of books to read from Rosemary and Ronnie's library, too!

Marco's place is really spacious, neat and clean and has absolutely everything you could need. I never got to meet Marco in person, but we spoke on the phone and he's a super nice guy. I had a few problems when I arrived, mostly to do with me being jet lagged and not having my head on right, but Marco was really quick to help me out and went to great lengths to ensure that I had a good stay at his place. I'd definitely recommend and would definitely return. Thanks Marco!

Patrick's place is great - perfect location near the beach, restaurants, shopping, etc. - and he was quick to respond whenever I needed anything.  The private, gated front yard area is also a major asset.  Overall, a great, comfortable experience.

My friend and I were travelling from Australia and Matt 'saved' us from some terrible accommodation (with Ginosi Apartments) we were in when first arriving in LA. He replied promptly and was able to get us to in his apartment the following day. He was friendly, accommodating and helped us with our 4 large suitcases to our room! The apartment was beautiful and had an amazing view of LA with perfect sight of the Hollywood sign. He answered all enquires fast and promptly which made our stay so much easier. We have decided to stay with Matt again in LA and would definitely do so again!

Maya and Jason were the most welcoming and gracious hosts I could ask for. I felt completely comfortable and at home in their space which was very clean, tidy and filled with good vibes. Maya and Jason were super accommodating with my request to bring my own food and had cleared space for me in the refrigerator and cupboards making me really feel at home in their kitchen. Additionally, they gave me one of their coveted parking spots in the garage when I asked about parking even though there was street parking less than a block away!!

The room was spacious with a comfortable bed, walk-in closet and plenty of space to spread out. I had my own bathroom just across the hall which was very clean and adorned with fresh cut flowers. The room was quiet, comfortable and I was entertained by my bedroom view of a certain "secret" recording studio they just might tell you about. ;-)  Maya was attentive to little extra touches like roses on the night stand and a vegan treat for my dietary needs. The neighborhood is beautiful, ideally placed near Santa Monica Blvd, 5 mins drive to the beach and close to many restaurants and cafes. I enjoyed walking through the neighborhood to a nearby yoga studio a couple mornings.

I can't say enough how much I enjoyed getting to know Maya and Jason during my stay. I took them up on their offer to come along for a meal out 2 nights of my stay and it felt like I had always been great friends with them. They are that awesome! They are both so laid back, easy to be around and fun to talk to. They had great recommendations for things to do in the area. I was there for a training more than vacationing so it was the perfect amount of downtime and connecting for me. I will definitely come back and stay with them when next I get a chance. I highly recommend staying with Maya and Jason!
Nice place! Highly recommended
I had another great stay at Julian's place. It is the perfect Palisades location and he makes everything very easy and accommodating. I'm sure I will be back soon.

Cassia's appartment is awesome : nicely decorated, spacious and very well located in Beverly Hills. It is the perfect place to stay to visit Los Angeles. On top of it, Cassia gave us some precious advice to find out the best places to visit.

Apartment was quite nice; clean, new, and in a great neighborhood, right down the street from everything we were doing in Santa Monica that day. 

Big problem was that we got zero responses/directions from Monika or her assistant the day before, upon arrival or any time after. We figured it out, but...

Our flight was delayed and therefore we were in a rush to find a place to stay, Alex responded so quickly and helped out. This guys a pro, the place was exactly as expected, we even got lucky and had parking right outside the patio door. Everything was clean, simple and setup to perfection. There is every single thing possible available for us as well as it was in a great location. The private parking garage was also awesome when we needed it. Thanks for making our delay worth it.

Mark's canal cottage is simply stunning! We couldn't stop smiling from the moment we arrived.. such a lovely place, with the most amazing view and the surroundings are delightfully pretty and tranquil. We had no idea that the Venice Canals would be such a relaxing haven and a lovely place to retreat to after the lively buzz of Venice Beach (only a 7min walk or 3min cycle) The cottage itself is bright, clean, spacious and has all the amenities you could want. We often sat with a refreshing drink in the seating area out the front.. and simply soaked up the surroundings. Whilst it was the photographs on the website that drew us to make the booking, it is even more impressive in person! 
Mark was so very responsive and helpful, always on hand to assist us.. and even popped round to see us before we left. We had a delightful stay and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place to anyone!
Clean, quiet, and lovely. Our guests really enjoyed it!
The apartment was nice and clean and in a great location.

We stayed at Gene's apartment for four nights as our first airbnb experience and couldn't have had a better one. The location cannot be beat, we had great communication from Gene and a very clean and comfortable stay all at a great price. We highly recommend this apartment for anyone wanting to be in the middle of all the Hollywood action. We also used the public transit system and had no troubles getting to downtown and to Santa Monica.

Nader was a fantastic host who did more than enough to accomedate me and my friends. His apartment is very lovely, spacious and most importantly is in a very amazing location that can get you anywhere within 20 minutes

The Coach House was such an amazing and relaxing place to call home for 3 nights! The backyard surrounding the place has this piney-mountain scent but you're just a two minute walk to places like Vita Coffee and Malo for gourmet street tacos and cocktails. Walk in the other direction or toward the Franklin Hills and you're seeing some of the coolest bungalows in LA. The appliances and everything functioned wonderfully, and the built-in speaker system in the couch room has some punch to it! Perfect stay overall, and Diane couldn't be nicer. I'll be back to the Coach House - this place it too cool.

Nicole was very friendly and gave great advice about local places.  The room is exactly like in the photo, very clean.  Felt safe there.  Great to have access to a bike - short ride down to the beach.  Abbot Kinney Ave just a few minutes walk away with expensive shops and restaurants.  Short drive back to the airport.  Santa Monica Pier about 4km away.  All up a very nice place to stay!

This was a perfect location! And Dali and David were so gracious to book me within a 15 minute reply after I had an early emergency arrival to the airport. 
They took extra care to be sure that the space was clean and ready for me and that I could get in and knew how to use everything. 
It is a very safe, very quiet and cute and quaint unit with a great back patio. And I loved that I had my own washer/dryer access and parking spot literally RIGHT outside my door. 
I would definitely love to stay there again. They were wonderful hosts.

We had a wonderful experience with Virginia and her guesthouse.  She was easy to communicate and responded quickly with any questions.  Her place is very conveniently located, ease of street parking, and just loved the historic neighborhood.   The place is very upgraded and we were very comfortable there even with our 2 young boys.  We truly enjoyed our stay there and would definitely stay again!

Casa Hermosa is the perfect place to just kick back from the rush of LA. Situated walking distance from the beach, bars and a good time. This place is perfect for the travellers wanting to stay near by LAX. The place is also set up if you just want to relax. It easily sleeps 4 adults.

We had such a wonderful time. The cottage was lovely and it's proximity to venice beach was fantastic. 
Sewit was a gracious host who was extremely accommodating. 
We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay or host. 
Thanks so much. 
Craig and caroline

the room is in an old house near USC campus where all the rooms are separate tenants with a communal kitchen and bathroom. 

SAFETY Each door, including the front door has a keypad with a keycode to get in. Very safe.

PARKING is available but you might have to walk a block because spots in the neighborhood fill quickly (also parking enforcement is very strict in LA so always look at the signs. I was written a ticket for "obstructing the street sweeper" even though it never came because the sign says no parking between 10am-3pm on wednesday. The street was filled with cars but mine was just the only out-of-state license plate so I got the ticket. It's what cities call "Tourist Tax" :) )

ROOM was small but accomodating. Clean sheets. Carpet could use a vacuum and the shelves a dusting.

BATHROOM/KITCHEN were very nice. Bathroom/Shower has lots of space and was very clean. Kitchen was clean, wood floor, table, chairs, microwave, refrigerator.

HOST I only met Elisabeth once the day after I arrived. She was friendly and contact via call/text was clear.

Overall if you're coming to LA and need a temporary place to stay and have a car or going to USC its fine here. Easy drive anywhere in the city, cheap gas is up vermont near santa monica blvd (literally 30c to a dollar cheaper per g). Host is easy to communicate with, house guests are clean and polite.

Jannessa & Helmut's place was truly indeed such a nice Cozy hollywood cottage. We loved the design. Their place was clean, spacious and comfortable as accurately described in their listing. The location was also great, only a couple of blocks away from hollywood boulevard. They greeted us with a warm welcome and gave the tour of their place. 

We would definitely stay again when we are back in town. 

Regards,

Irawan Family

We are happy to spend the last day of 2012 with Donna. She is nice and considerate, and even invited us to join the new year party. My husband and I are her first airbnb guests. She tried to make us feel comfortable like at home. Her apartment is near Montana Ave. which is quite fancy. It takes about 25 minutes from the apartment to the beach, but it is quite a nice walking. It is an artist's home, the room is cozy. Thanks Donna, it is very nice to meet you.

Absolutely stellar AirBnB experience.  First off the host was simply amazing in his patience with our check in.  We were many hours late and checked in at 3am - this is above and beyond the call of duty and Al took it in stride.

The space itself is amazing location in a brand new building literally across the street from the LA convention center.  The unit is immaculately clean and the pictures do not convey how great it looks in person.  Smartly decorated and well stocked with lots of amazing snacks :)  A welcome treat on our arrival.

The beds and pillows are memory foam with high threadcount sheets - this coupled with a very quiet building make for the best sleep we'd had a long while.  

If you are looking for a space in downtown LA this is the one you want.  Absolutely superb.
We had a great time staying here! Would recommend it!

The apartment is close to hollywood downtown and finding parking is not difficult. The host left us privacy needed. The amenities however are quite old. The dish washer need to be fixed. Overall I would recommend this place for family or group who want to explore the city

El departamento está muy bien ubicado aunque está en una cuadra muy tranquila. Dusan contesta muy rápido los mensajes, aunque no lo conocimos. Todo estaba listo para cuando llegamos. Limpio y cómodo, cocina completa. El baño se comparte.

Thank you so much.  The listing description was very accurate, and Paul and Aimee were both prompt in corresponding with me.  We look forward to booking with you again. 

Westlake Concrete
Laurie is great!  Beautiful home, lovely family.  All good!

Keller was very easy to work with and our communication was very straight forward and informative.  The apartment was very nice and as advertised.  The location was perfect as well. We could not have been happier the entire experience.

Karen was a wonderful host- she greeted us and remained nearby if we had any questions or concerns.The listing is exactly how it appears online: quaint and beautiful. The neighborhood is quiet and cozy, only thirty minutes from the beach and walking distance from a few hikes. We had a great two-night stay.

Claudia and Ben's place was the perfect home base for our LA vacation. It's clean and cozy inside and the private deck is awesome for an afternoon nap. They're two blocks from Elysian Park where our dog loved to romp around. Claudia and Ben are right next door if you need anything but give you plenty of space and privacy. Definitely would stay here again. Thanks!
Pretty peaceful spacious and private! And around the corner from Starbucks and great Thai place, as well as 7-11 which was super convenient. Thank you!

Amanda's place is perfect for an LA getaway. The place is stocked with amenities and the location is perfect for visiting LA. We had a great time and will definitely be staying again if possible. A great host, on time, communicative, and generous.
Great! We needed a last minute place to stay and KayAli was super accommodating. Really saved us! Thank you!!

Kerri and Jeff's apartment was beyond accommodating. Located near shops, beach, restaurants, it was extremely easy to hop around the west side of LA, as well as get on the highway pretty quickly. The apartment itself was adorable- I felt like I was tucked away in a cozy bungalow. It was clean, quiet, and very comfortable. I would definitely stay there again!

Nancy was there to greet us and checked in regularly.  Having not slept for days prior to our visit, we welcomed the peaceful surrounding and long nights of sleep in the cozy bed!
Restaurants nearby were within walking distance and were fun (and delicious) to visit.
Great place, only complaint was the TV not working.

Spoke with Ellen over the Phone and she made my wife and I feel welcome right from the get go. The place was absolutely charming, from the sounds of the fountain as we walked from the driveway to our own private entrance to the fresh picked fruit on the table. Inside was absolutely clean, with all the amenities we could want. The grounds were kept up very nicely as was the entire neighborhood. We plan on returning to this area often and will plan future stays here.

We arrived in the late afternoon after a rainstorm. The sun was shinning and the place is one block from the pier. The parking is right on the street, which can be difficult to find a space. Luckily Luanne helped me get a space and she welcomed my son and I with open arms. The house was very warm and the bedroom is right next to the front door. The neighborhood is busy so I brought earplugs, which came in handy when the police would roll out of the station down the block. The bed was comfortable and plenty big. The only real issue was the neighbors next door have a bright light that shines in one of the windows. There was no way to block the light out. In the morning breakfast was wonderful and we quickly made our way to LAX. Long story short I would stay again if I was in the area.

Pray was nice enough to let us book last minute. He was attentive and gracious.   The hot water wasn't working the first morning we stayed, so the cold shower was an invigorating experience.  Pray didn't tell us this when booking, but it was fixed after our first night.

I needed to arrange a place to stay in LA at short notice and Katie was able to accommodate me.   She replied to my inquiries quickly.  I did not get to meet Katie in person but she and Cyrus, her friend managing the apartment for her, were very responsive as well as accommodating.  They made sure to check in on me if i needed anything.  My booking was for 1 week and found the room to be as shown in her posted pictures though the room/bath were older, more well-worn.    
Since I don't drive, the apartment is in a great location.  It's close to public transportation.  There were restaurants/bars as well as a supermarket within 1-2 blocks from the apartment.  In addition, the Walk of Fame and Trader Joe's is a reasonable walk way (appx 10-15min). 
Overall my stay was good and Katie's place is great for traveler that will spend the majority of the day out and needs a nice place to sleep.

Great place for the money.  Bed was comfy and the room was clean.   The bed is a futon type mattress but I liked it.   The house was clean and tidy.   

I had a bit of a problem finding the place but once I did it was cool.   Aron was great to deal with.
Great location just a block from the beach. The place is really cute and is good value for your money - however, to be honest, it needs a thorough cleaning.
The House was perfect.  Clean, beautifully appointed, plenty of room and in a fantastic position. What more can you ask for? Highly recommended!

Pretty accurate description and pictures of the place. The neighborhood, although centric, is not necessarily the best in LA, but nothing too bad. The building was safe and a little tucked away from the Hollywood Boulevard madness, which was nice.

We had a wonderful time staying at Felicias for two nights. The area was perfect walking distance to great restaurants and cafes. It was also easy to park and access the Cottage. We would stay there any time.

Great little poolhouse with room for 2,3, or 4!  excellent location in a neat neat neighborhood in central Long Beach! Gives a great flavor of California living! Loved the separate entry with lots of privacy! Great hosts!  crazy value!  Easy Parking! Would love to stay again! john and kimsan

Marsha and her husband were wonderful hosts! Upon arriving, it was a bit unexpected that they lived on the same property as the cottage studio but it worked out completely fine, they are fantastic people and there is no question that the studio was ours and private while we were there. Great location near the beach, quiet neighborhood, nice pool.
Really good place very clean and comfortable

Perfect location on the beautiful venice canals, big house with many sleeping options. 
Easy and fast communication with host. A very good experience in L.A!

We stayed with Nitin for one night and he was a very warm, welcoming host. The room was as stated in the listing, clean and comfortable. Nitin was nice enough to allow us to check in early and also provided us with towels. There are a couple places to eat nearby that you can walk to and overall it is a very nice neighborhood! We'd stay here again next time we're in Glendale!

Nikkia was very accommodating and a very friendly host. She made sure all my needs were met, which weren't much. Her futon was very comfortable, and how she designed it made it seem that I was sleeping on a luxurious pad rather than a futon. Her friend Vanessa cooks a mean scrambled eggs, too. Would definitely come back if I need to.

The guest house was clean, comfortable and accurate to the description. The location is close to I10 as well as walking distance to restaurants.  We had no difficulty parking during the day except the streets can fill up late at night.  We enjoyed our stay and would recommend it.

Great pad!
Great host! Really interesting guy.
Great price!
Who could ask for anything more?

My husband and I stayed here while touring LA and it was a great location!! We were able to walk to Hollywood and the attractions. The unit was clean and we had no problems during our stay! Iz was very thorough with instructions on getting into the place as well as great communication! The parking spot was an added bonus for us! This was my first Airbnb experience and it definitely met my expectations!!
It was a good stay. Kelly was very kind and quickly responded.

Emily's place was absolutely amazing, as was she, Stacey and Lucas. They helped us recover or our lost luggage and were always there to help us with any other needs. The place was amazing for me and my 2 friends. Spacious, cozy and a perfect location to explore LA from. We will definitely visit this place again if we return to Venice!
Such an incredible place with so many different areas to enjoy. John has beautiful taste. It is truly an oasis!
The house was AAAAMMMAAAZZZIIIINNNGGG ! We loved it there and woke up to a beautiful view and playing dolphins in sight. John was fantastic and I would stay in this house again in a heart beat!
Wonderful host - very accommodating to some special needs we had.  Location cannot be beat.  Easy check in and meeting to get the keys.  Lovely apartment.

Everything went off without a hitch. Debora was easy to work with, the place was cozy and just what I expected given the description. The neighborhood was great too, quiet yet close to many good places to eat or shop. The place fell very private. I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this little oasis in LA and would happily stay again. Thank you Debora!

Absolutely loved this place, really tastefully decorated, great outdoor area with lovely view and really comfy bed. Perfect for a couple or someone on their own.
Location great with cool places to eat nearby and Patrick gave us some great recommendations that we really appreciated.
Would definitely come back here next time we're in LA and would recommend to anyone.

I had a wonderful stay at Bill and Yumi's. The view is great but, more importantly, Yumi and Bill made the experience. They even were so sweet as to pick me up from the airport. I enjoyed chatting with them and felt a warm welcome into their home.

It was very relaxing, comfy and beautiful place to stay. Great view from the house and cool friendly cats. The house owner responded very quickly via email or message. Thank you again for the hospitality!

Staying at William's place was great! It was far better than the price I paid. Essentials such as shampoo and toothpaste were provided as well as various snacks with water bottles. I also loved how close it is from Redondo Beach. It's only about 10 minutes away. We did not have a single problem there, thank you William!

communicating with Kristin is great!  the location and house are perfect, the bed comfy, everything is clean and the dogs are super cute and friendly.  We didnt really spend too much time there as it was a quick overnight trip and we were taking advantage of the location for a lot of looking around.  But being able to run in for a few minutes in the evening after a hot day and take a fabulous shower and run back out for dinner was really important for us and that worked out great!

Paula and Eva were the most wonderful hosts. They were easy to get in touch with at all times and treated us like family. The house is in a wonderful area and is fully equipped with everything we needed. We enjoyed our stay greatly and would book again in a heart beat. If you're looking for something in The Hollywood Hills, this place comes with a high recommendation from us. Thanks again !! Xx

It was an appealing and cozy apartment, perfekt for two or tree. The couch was okay to sleep on. The backyard was enchanting. The host was very kommunikative and serviceminded. We enjoyed our stay very much and would not hesitate to come again some time.
Very clean place, central location. Paul was a great host - staying up til 1am when we arrived. Provided breakfast for us. Very pleasant stay.

Stephen et Charlotte sont des personnes très chaleureuses, accueillantes et soucieuses du bien être de leurs hôtes.

Le studio était parfait, très bien équipé et décoré. Le petit plus: le magnifique patio, et les 2 vélos mis à disposition.

Le quartier est très calme et très bien situé.

Rien à re-dire, à conseiller!!!!!!

Megans place was clean, comfortable walking distance to the beach, Rose Ave and the boardwalk...but also very quiet and private which was lovely. Megan went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed to enjoy our stay she was always available to answer our (email hidden)ank you Megan for all the delicious snacks you left us also..a real pleasure to meet you and cant wait to return ! I recommend anyone to stay at Megans, you wont be disappointed ! :)
The location was perfect and the house was very comfortable. We had a great stay!

What a great experience. My whole family felt very warm welcomed and hosted by Denise and we really enjoyed the entire stay!
The house is beautiful and four adults and a baby fitted very well. 
The outside bathtub is a must after the beach on a warm evening. 
Thank you Denise and we would definitely book again!

The house is really charming and unique and the hosts Dave and Rebecca are great. They put out all the stops for their guests, leaving information about the neighborhoods local eats and treats. Don't stay at some morning cookie cutter spot in LA, and opt instead for this unique location in the heart of it.

John's loft was a perfect option for our quick trip to LA. Amazing design, clean, and in a cool neighborhood. John went the extra mile and got the place ready for us early so that we didn't have to wait to unload our bags. It was a perfect location to meet up with friends staying in Santa Monica and had everything we needed plus some other nice amenities: hairdryer, wifi, great book with tips for where to go around the area. It made for the perfect LA holiday and would definitely stay there again on another trip!

Kevin's place is exactly as described - a 10mins walk or 5 min run to the beach (a good way to start the day by the way). The kitchen is fully equipped and Kevin also prepared several amenities such as shampoo, washing powder, etc. The beds sleep two if you need to too much space. Kevin is also a very responsive and nice host.
Great spot! One block from the beach, super clean and comfortable.  Antoinette was really accommodating, she even left us snacks and wine! Overall a fantastic stay in the madness of Venice beach!
Just as promised! Bright, cheerful, very clean, spacious, very conveniently located and quiet. Great accommodating hosts. Looking forward to return visit.

We had a fantastic stay. The apartment is beautifully decorated, quiet, and in a great location. Josh and Anka were excellent hosts. They made us feel welcome from the start, offered tips on the neighborhood and navigating traffic, and made us delicious coffee and breakfast. We really enjoyed our stay!

Aaron went way above and beyond as a host for me, making me feel like a top priority and friend. He's very generous with his place, his knowledge, and his time. His place is in a great spot in Hollywood and is neat and convenient in a lot of ways. I got to meet some of his friends and got a priceless tour of Hollywood on his motorcycle, just to name a couple things. I would definitely recommend Aaron's place as a no-brainer place to stay while in LA!
Venice is always a fun city. Very lovely setting and great neighborhood.

This was our first airbnb experience and it exceeded our expectations by far! Molly, Brian and the kids were such great hosts and were there for us whenever we had a question and gave us great tips on how to explore Venice and L.A. in general. We arrived completely exhausted from a 13h flight with two little children and were surprised by an extremly warm welcome - and a fridge and two hampers full of goodies to help ease the jetlag. This truly is a home away from home! 
There was not a single thing we missed from home. Molly provided us with everything we needed and went out of here way to make us feel comfortable. The toys, the bikes, the food, the location, the friendliness... and the list could go on forever. 
If we should return to Los Angeles we would definetly stay here again.
Thank you Molly and Family for making our stay a perfect one!

Jan's cottage is a delight! Conveniently located within minutes of Abbot Kinney and Venice Beach. The room was light, bright and very spacious with access to a clean private bathroom.

Jan is an amazing host! She was very welcoming and made us feel right at home straight away, even letting us leave our luggage with her during our last day as our flights were not until late in the evening.

I would love to stay with Jan again in the not to distant future.
Sofia was a great host. We didn't cross paths much while I was in town, but she made sure I had everything I needed. Very friendly and welcoming.

Our stay at Julio's was amazing.  The house is in a great location, easy to get to many places around LA.  It's also located within walking distance of several little restaurants which we enjoyed (great kabobs and pupusas are both nearby).  The cottage is very comfortable and we enjoyed its privacy.  The park across the street was also really nice.  We would love to stay here again on our next trip to LA.

Our experience was really great at the house of Wendy and Zach. They were both very helpful and very klnd. Everything was really easy. the house is as described, very cool and very well located. The pool is nice and warm. The lay out of the house makes it a great place to stay and very functional but also charming. In one word, a perfect stay! And perfect for families with kids. Frederic.

La maison de Elaine est jolie et situee dans un quartier agréable. Ce qui nous a déplu c est l'odeur vraiment pénible qui régnait au rez de chaussee de la maison mais Elaine revenait de vacances, c'était peut être du à cela. Nous estimons avoir paye trop cher par rapport à la qualité de la chambre et de la literie.
It is a sweet place, I love there. Sheila and Kellie are very nice and kind:) it makes my trip in LA with a wonderful time! I will definitely choose to stay there if I visit LA again.

Comfy bed. 
Sweet bikes.
Great hosts.

Although we didn't get a chance to meet Sarah during our stay, the place was very clean and was the perfect size for a couple. The location is great, close to lots or boutiques and cafes and the boardwalk is walking distance. 

We enjoyed our short but sweet stay at Sarah's studio and she even provided us with a small mini bar on arrival!!!
