There is no kitchen sink, so make sure you buy bottled water.
非常非常好的房东，女主人热情、细致，家里非常干净、温馨，这是我此次最好的住处

It was really cool staying at Kellie ´s place. 
Near to hollywood and buses. 
Clean, big and very pretty house.
Thank you Sheila and Kellie
Really enjoy the time live here. Jeff is a kind and nice host!!!

We stayed with Shawn and Scott while visiting family in Tujunga. It was the perfect place to stay since it was so close to our relatives and we would certainly stay there again. Shawn and Scott were great hosts and made us feel very welcomed. The photos are accurate. The home is older, but quaint and clean. The fresh flowers in the bathrooms, fresh fruit and pastries at breakfast were appreciated. The view was lovely. We enjoyed our stay and felt it was a good value.

Everything was great!! Tony thought of everything for a one night accommodation. Great host and cute dogs. Also great location and ample privacy. Everything we needed to know was laid out all inside the room. Very patient when we had trouble with getting to the house. Thanks again!
Easy and quick communication. Very cute apartment in a great neighborhood! Would definitely come again.

I had a great time staying with Shadman, her house is very neat & tidy and it was good to have my own bathroom / shower. Its located in a nice quiet part of LA, but close to the beaches, santa monica boulevard etc, with lots of shops, sushi bars and other restaurants.  Shadman was a wonderful host, very friendly and suggested some great hikes around Parker Mesa (at which point I realised she is a lot fitter than me!!) Recommended.
James' place was perfect. Very accurate pictures, perfect location and James was a very helpful host. We felt at home immediately and will definitely return.

Rebekah was perfect in communicating with me along the way. I was greeted and the studio was exactly what I was looking for. Quiet, clean, secure behind the entry gate, in a quiet neighborhood and I slept very well there. The location was away from traffic in a quiet spot but easy to drive out to my business meetings. I hope to stay there again and will recommend it, 
Thank you Rebekah!

Rebekah was a great host! Her home is really comfortable and cozy and her family was incredibly hospitable. They were all really nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend staying at her's if you have the chance. I personally would stay there again when I do visit LA.

Also Rebekah makes some amazing scrambled eggs!

Suzy's place is as pictured and was perfect for 2 people to stay. The bed was extremely comfortable! It is in a good location with easy foot access to shops, restaurants and bars on La Brea. The building had very friendly neighbors.  Suzy was very helpful in allowing my husband (who traveled separate from me) to check in early. She also help us find a place that was open on New Years day to print event tickets.

Andy was great!  The rooms are way better than we expected and smell great!  You might think staying near or around Compton would be scary but it's not bad at all!  It's located between downtown LA and Culver city which is only a 15 min drive.  The hotel is safe and VERY affordable for what you will pay anywhere else!
BOOK THIS PLACE!

Had a wonderful stay at Ali's apartment. The location is perfect, one minute walking from Melrose Place and many great stores, cafés and restaurants. 
The check-in was super convenient and the bed and pillows really comfortable. 

Would absolutely recommend Ali's apartment and would gladly stay there again! :)

My stay was wonderful.  Kerri was an amazing host.  Lovely, comfortable and quiet with easy access to most everything in Pasadena.  The neighborhood is one of safest and nicest.  Thank you again for everything!
Juan was a great host. The apartment was nice and clean. I can recommend this place.
Very nice/ clean /quiet/ safe place to stay and Penny is a nice host to consider your schedule. BTW, I enjoyed a wonderful Thanksgiving dinner, thank you Penny! Will come again if I travel to LA.

Audrey's place was exactly as listed. Beautiful home. Room was very spacious and perfect for my boyfriend and I's needs. We were in town for a wedding so we didn't spend much time at the home. But Audrey was very attentive and responded to messages very quickly. She gave us as much privacy as we needed but was there to interact as much or as little as we liked. All in all I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the Pasadena/LA area. I would definitely use her place again. Thanks Audrey for making us feel at home!
Sam was super helpful and the house was very lovely,spacious and close to great places to eat and shop. Would stay there again for sure.
Absolutely beautiful, spacious 2nd floor apartment in a centrally located WeHo area. Clean as whistle with great decor and all the tools you need to have a very enjoyable stay. Highly recommended. ️.

The place was clean, cozy and conveniently located. Mary was always so quick in response and was very accommodating despite some last minute changes. My trip to LA got so much better by staying at Mary's place.

Mannys communication was brilliant- he met us very promptly after I called to say we parked up. 
The space was excellent- get a lot of space for the money in downtown LA. The bed was so comfortable we both had such a good sleep even though the area was busy- it didn't effect us.
Great location, brilliant flat and very helpful host- even messaged us to offer tips on 4th July celebrations.

Wir haben ein paar wunderschöne Tage in Marys Apartment verbracht.
Der Knaller war für uns die Lage, 50 Meter vom Strand entfernt. Wenn man durch die Forte zur Strasse ging, lag schon der Sand vom Strand davor. 
Ein super Ausgangspunkt für Radtouren!
Die Wohnung ist leider sehr dunkel, aber wer will, wenn er in LA ist, schon seine Zeit in der Wohnung verbringen. Die Ausstattung ist schon amerikanisch,
und auch speziell. Es hat uns sehr gefallen.

I did not meet Ahmed but he was very accommodating as i was arriving early. He gave me very good, easy to follow instructions on how to get in to the building and retrieve the key to the apartment.  The place it self was great everything worked perfectly (internet, tv, A/C...) and is in a nice quite neighborhood with a 7/11 in walking distance.

Extremely accommodating host! Cottage was beyond charming. We spent 3 nights here, two after full days at Disneyland. Was just what we needed.  We're keeping this on our favorite list and will be sure to check availability on our next trip. The little details like snacks and toiletries is icing on the cake.

I stayed with Jeannine for 2 weeks before my house was ready- she was amazing! The property is a sanctuary! Although there is no kitchen, the hostess and the property made it all worth it! Definitely recommend !!

Amazing 8 day stay at Aimee's beautiful apartment.  Unit was as described, incredibly clean, spacious and conveniently located in Hollywood.  Comfortable beds, huge kitchen with dishwasher and any necessary cooking tools allowed for some meal flexibility. Private parking spot and in-unit washer/dryer was very convenient and made our stay much better.  Paul, the on-site manager was very friendly, available, and responsive to any needs we had. Will definitely stay again the next time we are in LA, fantastic host!

Location, location! This Marina del Rey home was close to many attractions and a fine alternative to costly hotels nearby. The room was different from the one pictured but our room had its own bath and served us well for one night. In the morning, we recommend that you skip the cold cereal breakfast offered and walk down to Washington Boulevard for more ambitious grub.

Kendall, Kelly, and Stephanie were a pleasure to stay with.  They made me feel very welcome and at home.  The bedroom is pleasant and the bed is comfy!  I liked sitting out in the back yard to have breakfast once in a while.  It was very pleasant and peaceful.  I look forward to staying with them again.

Wonderful adorable guest studio with great light fixtures- clean, modern, but cozy and loved the extra touches like a mini fridge full of waters and sodas as well as snacks and wine (I don't drink but it's pretty nevertheless!) and a new coffee brewer.  Perfect little Hollywood Hills getaway for a quiet afternoon and evening, thank you!

The neighbourhood was a very convenient walk to a lot of places worth seeing in Venice. The cottage was very cute and Jan was also very helpful in terms of helping me figure out how to navigate the area. I really enjoyed my stay here and would highly recommend it to other people visiting Venice, CA.

We had a great stay in Pamela's apartment. Plenty of space and great place to stay. Easy walking distance to Farmer's market and The Grove. Pamela was a great host and the special welcome package's was an excellent treat. Also great to have a selection of tea, coffee and hot chocolate available in the kitchen as we arrived late and no time to shop on the first day. Thank you for sharing your home with us. Will stay here again next time in LA.
This was the most amazing place with the most amazing hosts! I will definitely be visiting again as my stay was cut short by work but I know I made some friends for life.

kay is nice guy. His loft is just like what he posted in airbnb. It is my first time using airbnb. He is soho working. There are only 2 bedrooms in his loft. Most of times he lives alone in master bedroom. The guestroom is big with queen size bed. Free parking is secured yard. With his offered free earplugs I had good sleep in his place. The location is closed to downtown and Chinatown. You had better to drive a car there. Young people you donot find a better pricewise choice.
Darren is awesome and, believe it or not, he's pretty funny for a stand-up. West Hollywood was a great area.
Joseph's place was a perfect little stay. Well decorated, clean and good central location.  He was easy to communicate with and super accommodating. Would definitely stay again.

Jessie and Ricky were great hosts. I was treated like a family the moment we met.
The place is clean, spacious and they made sure I was comfortable there. The house is situated in a nice location close to the freeway with many food and shopping options nearby. I was visiting the Claremont Colleges and it was very close and convenient. Jessie is quick to respond to emails, and I was glad the dates worked out for me to stay there.
Picturesque room right on the beach, shared bathroom. Short walk to restaurants, relaxed neighbourhood and very helpful host.
Nice experience, everything as described, Mary is a great host!

Every review prior to this one is spot on.  We stayed last week of July; me, my husband and 6 year old son. The complex is incredible.  Our host Al was like dealing with a friend, somebody you felt you knew for a long time.  The unit was spotless with high end upgrades and so so comfortable, felt like a home away from home.  Easy to get anywhere, main roads connect to the city of Glendale as well as freeways (plus Gina's tacos on the corner, and if you pass that up you're missing out).  The view from the balcony is incredible as well.  You won't know what you want to do first once you get in.  You can BBQ in the garden or by the pool, hang by any one of multiple fire pits, or watch your choice of outdoor big screen TVs that that are protected from the elements.  The building is ultra secure and parking is a no-brainer.  Your host Al really knows the business of guest services and you'll want to come back here to stay any time you're in the LA area. Stay with Al!!
The reservation was canceled 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Icee is such a sweet heart. She would provide you with lists of the local restaurants and famous attractions. The place is absolutely nice and clean. The location is on the safe neighborhood and close to the main street of Hollywood. I would come here again on my next visit to LA.

Did not actually meet Shawn but the check-in and check-out instructions and process was smooth and straight forward. The location was great and the parking spot was very valuable. As others mentioned, the room is directly behind a busy street so earplugs would be a good idea to bring if you're a light sleeper but this is probably the case for anywhere in LA.

Had a blast at Joseph's - he was very welcoming and invited me to treat the place as my own.  We even played some music together one evening, which was a great diversion from the conference I had been in town for.  Would definitely go back if I was in the area.

It was a great pleasure to stay with Irene! She is a very interesting person who has many things to tell. We loved the house.. really creative! The room was clean and the neighborhood quite nice and safe.

Alles Gute für dich, Irene!
Great host. Great place. Great neighborhood. I just can't say enough great things about Gerry and his place.

Beaucoup d'attention, de bienveillance, pour faciliter l'arrivée, le séjour. confort cHaleureux, jardin reposant avec le bruit de l'eau en permanence. oranger magnifique offrant des fruits succulents. Je quitte avec regret.
Jackie and Corey are lovely, and so is their home.  Had a beautiful, restful stay with everything I needed, except the love of my life.
Nice host and apartment! Clean, big room and kitchen, there's all you need!
The room wasnt ready but he was quick to find a hotel at no extra cost.

Steven's apartment is in the most ideal location you could ever think of. The view of the pier and the beach from the wrap-around balcony is absolutely breathtaking and we were just a short walk away from the Promenade and other restaurants and bars. We really were in the middle of everything. The apartment was great, elegant and beautifully decorated with flatscreens in every room - just wondering why the floors were so dirty for such a beautiful, high-end apartment (walking around the place barefoot for even just a little bit left your feet black so hopefully this is paid more attention to for future visitors). Other than that, we had a great stay and Steven and his brother who met us at the apartment when we checked in were very accommodating and very easy to work with. Steven answers any questions you may have right away. Perfect location, great apartment and overall really great experience.

We were warmly greeted by our host who gave us a thorough tour of the bungalow. It was a comfortable place for us to stay with our two young children. Fairly well child-proofed, a good place to stay with busy hands. And a super comfy bed! 

Very close to the beach and walkable to many great shops and eateries. Easy access to the 10 too which gets you to other freeways quickly. Our hosts were great in ensuring that we had a comfortable stay. 

Thank you, Kristen and Cristian!
This place was so cute and charming - very spacious, homely and incredibly close to Abbott Kinney!! Bed was also super comfy! Definitely recommend!

The listing was just as described, the apartment was clean and cute and we loved the table outside!  Got groceries at Whole Foods and made eggs and coffee and ate breakfast at the blue table outside.  There was a bunch of spices in the place and kitchenware to use.  Met Courtney once, and she was very pleasant and accommodating.  Parking was easy--definitely recommend getting a car.  Courtney was also very responsive to my emails/messages when I booked and prior to coming.
Amazing place and amazing host and very polite and understanding to renters need and very easy to communicate with
Great location close to Abbot Kinney and Windward Circle. That the bedrooms are on a different floor than the living room gives extra privacy. Well-equipped kitchen. A great stay overall.
Guy was great and place was really cozy

Koy made me feel welcome in his home by presenting a clean, well-organized space. He was very attentive to questions and made it easy to access his place. I would recommend this place to anyone staying in the Santa Monica area. I have an annual trip and I will make sure to request this space again next year.

Heather and Derin were not in town the weekend we stayed at their house. We just met Heather briefly and got a very good impression.

In other words we had the place to ourselves. It served as a great base for exploring Silverlake and Echo Park.

The place was as well kept and designed as Stephen shows in the pictures. Him and his wife Catarina (congratulations, you two!!)
were both incredible hosts. When it came to places to eat, shop, or see--- they had all the right answers. They made sure I was comfortable and had all the amenities I needed. Not only was it a very accommodating stay, I've made like family with Stephen and Catarina and will definitely be coming back and staying as long as I can. 
The bed was incredibly comfortable, the house was clean, the area is conveniently located and had places to relax and or celebrate.
They're professional, respectful, talented, thoughtful---a joy to be around, and as far as I'm concerned one of the best things about my stay in Los Angeles!

As Arnold would say,
I'll be back.

Bill and Yumi are such wonderful and gracious hosts.  I stayed there for two nights and they did everything they could to make me feel comfortable and at home.  Yumi even made me coffee in the mornings and offered to take me to the airport when I left.  

Everything is exactly as listed.  Their home is very cool and has an amazing view!

This is a great place to stay.  It is super clean, super quiet, has all of the amenities that you need for a pleasant stay and is located in a great part of town.  I would highly recommend staying at Erika's place.

Accurate listing. Marla is a great host who will go far and beyond to make you comfortable. 

You shall find a friend in her!!!

Comfy little place in a super convenient neighborhood. I was just crashing for the night, but Victoria was pleasant, understanding, and accommodating. And Guera the golden retriever is the best welcoming committee you could ask for! I would definitely stay here again and I highly recommend it.
Bill and Carrie were wonderful hosts and have beautiful, clean house. Definitely the best place to stay in Whittier.

Bilen is a great person! Smart, and very engaged to make your stay as nice as possible.

The place itself is great and in a very nice neighbourhood. Vinyl shops and good breakfast possibilities are in a near surrounding.

Especially for the first time a good place to explore LA by walking the city.

That's indeed not possible in all parts of the city.
You won't see many people walking arround. It makes sense to rent a car - also to explore other parts of LA and the US.

I just can recommend this place!

Jack was great!  He was very friendly and met me as soon as I was ready to get into the place.  The apartment was well appointed and spotless, not to mention just a few blocks from Sunset and many great Silver Lake restaurants and bars!  It's in a walkable neighborhood and it's right off the 110, which makes getting around to other parts of LA very easy.  A great place to stay if you've never been to LA or if, like me, you used to live here!  Overall, a great place to stay!

It was such an easy stay. Jeff was waiting for us at the gate, showed us our room, which was simple but clean. Just what we needed. We had water bottles and chocolates on the table. The house is close to everything, a 15 minute walk to the Walk of Fame. Parking available.

Chris's place in Westwood was beautiful! Very clean, nice furniture, great sunlight, and perfect location. Within walking distance of restaurants, shops and bars in Westwood. Chris was very friendly and helpful with great restaurant recommendations.

the place was great, well decorated and clean. Denise was lovely and really helpful with directions etc. She was able to help accommodate us when we had problems with flight times. Would definitely stay here again

Beautiful gated community and nice room
Comfortable and quiet for sleep. 
I've nothing bad to say about home and host
Magda is a lovely person and logical.
Very simple to contact and understand
I miss the little dog :)

This was our first Airbnb experience and a great one at that!  This Marina Del Rey location is a great way to get a little beach and Venice experience in one trip.  The unit is well appointed, with well suited decor and amenities.  Perfect for a family with all age groups from young to young at heart.  Would definitely recommend and would consider staying here again.

Jesse's place allowed me to enjoy my weekend trip to LA easily and affordably. Biggest pro for me was the parking. The complex has a gated garage beneath it so it made it easy to go in and out at my discretion without having to worry about searching for parking.

The apartment itself was nice; it looks just like the pics, no bait and switch sneakiness. It's also pretty spacious (full kitchen, huge bathroom) which was a pleasant surprise. I think the mattress/pillows are made out of that memory foam stuff so it made for relaxing sleep plus the couch was pretty comfy too.

Jesse was a wonderful host. I didn't interact with him in person, which worked for me as I was in and out doing my own thing. Nevertheless, he was quick and responsive through Airbnb message whenever I needed anything and was always courteous in his messages. Speaking of courteous, did I mention I was greeted with  candy on the kitchen counter? What a sweet gesture (no pun intended). Another plus, he was understanding of me wanting to do a late checkout. I was in the area for National Dance Day and was taking a few classes that Sunday before heading back to NorCal. His flexibility meant that I didn't have to tote around my bags while going to take classes and after I was finished I was able to eat and nap before making that 6 hour drive back.

Moral of the story, anytime I go to the LA area Jesse's place will be the first listing I look up! If all Airbnb experiences are like this I may never stay in a hotel again.
This is a great apartment close to everything you want in Hollywood Logan was very easy to communicate with and a great host

Los Angeles Hillside guesthouse has an amazing view! It is also very well located, close to Sunset boulevard and different good restaurants. The flat is very functional and you can enjoy the view and the sunset on the sun deck!

Henry was a great host! He was extremely friendly, the house was even better than expected, and the location is amazing. I would highly recommend Henry, and would rent from him again. He makes traveling much easier for all of his guests.

Excellent communication leading up to the rental so I knew exactly what to expect. Being my first Airbnb rental, this was especially helpful. Private entrance made it easy to come and go, comfortable room, well furnished and cozy. Highly recommended. And a convenient location.

I was looking for a place where i could come and go as i wanted without feeling i was living to much in someone else home and Tracy and her place was really perfect this way. It was easy to find and i got all the way from the street to my bed alone by just following the instructions she had send me beforehand. Everything seemed really well organized and addapted for being a Airbnb home.  The naberhood was quiet and nice. Id easy recommend this place!

Our stay in TD apartament was amazing! Beautiful place, in a special place in LA, very clean and confortable!!!! We had such an amazing vacation in Los Angeles and his apartament made this more special!!!!! I would come back for sure!!!! We Love it!!! Thanks for everything!!!!!

hi
Danny's place is location location
you can walk & bus around easlly(just dont tell locals)
good coffee & food at end of rd(melrose)
or Santa Monica Blv(5 min)or Sunset Blv(15 min)ALL WALKNMG
was easy to get into accomodation & and Danny was in contact,informative & helpfull

will stay again and recommend it to friends

cheers

Murray
Family of 4 and this apartment was ideal for us. Our first experience of airbnb and it was a good one. Denise was very helpful and the apartment had everything we needed (and more).
it was nice. all was nice. and the beach really is right there.

She was very sweet and gentle person. She helped us where to go to eat and the indication to the Hollywood, all information she approvide was very useful. We were appreciated of that. The position of the flat was wonderful, near to every where Griffith park and Hollywood Street, and so many cute and nice shops and caffetteria where to have breakfast, lunch and dinner. In the flat there was everything it needs Water, caffe, tea, fruits and some snack which is not in common. We loved stying in her place strongly raccomaned!

Best place to just go out and have a blast at the party side of Hollywood - but as its located in the middle of all the action, then the noise level is mid-high until the streets quiet down at 2 AM - there were new ear plugs provided on the night table, but we didn't really need them. The place was really clean and nice, including all the shared rooms (chill-out corners, showers, kitchen), the host was very quick and helpful in our communications and we enjoyed our stay
Christina was easy to work with.  Responded instantly to all my messages and resolved any issues quickly!

Ella's place was super clean, and a relaxing spot to hang our hats for the night. Having a parking spot in LA makes the world of difference, when driving is so constant, so that was especially helpful. Ella was wonderful in helping coordinate to hand off the keys - it was a great spot - would definitely recommend!

Vivi was great! She is so helpful and always available when needed. The check in was easy and Vivi had a lot of great suggestions for places to see and go. The apartment is in a perfect location, right by the promenade and a few blocks from the beach. All in all a great place to stay!

Carol was very accommodating and friendly, frequently checking in on how things were going (but not too often!).  The gardens on/near the premises were super cool, and it was an easy home base for getting around town.  The actual guest house was a great size and very nicely furnished, it had everything I needed.  Great spot!

The cottage is very nice and comfortable and near by the sea. 
There are a few bars around, "Wholefoods" Supermarket and you can walk to Abbot Kinney in a few minutes for a nice shopping.
Everything inside was good, clean with a friendly atmosphere. 
The conversation with our host was perfect, you got qick answers by email! We had very nice days in LA and would book again this lovely place.
Really lovely place. So much so that I extended my stay.

Jills place was cute,cozy, clean and well stocked with sheets, towels etc. She was super nice and immediately in touch and super responsive to emails throughout the stay. Place is in nice area, well connected to transit. 5 stars

We had an amazing time staying at Lisa and Joe's.. Unfortunately we weren't able to meet Joe as he was travelling, however Lisa and her ever smiling assistant Regina have treated us like one of theirs and made us feel very welcome in the warm and cosy house in Venice LA. Lisa also provided great tips and guidance on the Venice Area and LA in general which has been very helpful. If we ever go back to LA we will ensure to stay at Lisa and Joe's again as it was a wonderful experience and would recommend everyone else travelling to LA to stay at theirs.

Ruben & Ana
great place, nice area, easy acces to everything. Keller was a great host; getting in and out the place was easy and smooth. If I go back to L.A. I'll surely contact Keller

Our stay at Mark's suite was simply amazing. The room was beautifully decorated and clean and so is the bathroom and the rest of the house. The bed is comfortable with some nice sheets and pillows. The two cats are absolutely the sweetest! The location of the place is very convenient to drive to and is close to many stores and places to eat. It is very quiet at the house and Mark was always just a text away if we ever needed something. We also got to try some of the fruits that Mark left us in our room which was freshly picked from their backyard and it was delicious! Thank you so much for welcoming us in your home. Will come back and recommend!

I loved my stay with Jamalyn, she is so welcoming and helpful with local knowledge!  Very clean home, seperate bathroom and a comfy bed which was great after a long day in Santa Monica.  My first ever airbnb stay and hope to come back again one day!

We had a wonderful time at Beth's guest house.  She made us feel completely welcome but totally respected our space.  The jacuzzi is huge and absolutely great.  Would highly recommend over a hotel for anyone looking to stay in the beach cities.
Excellent place, great house, very tidy. No complaints.

Lisa was a great host who went out of her way to make sure my stay was comfortable and convenient - everything from stocking the cupboard with coffee and bottles of water to leaving a loaner bike for me to ride. The garage studio was comfy with a couch, soft bed, fridge, microwave, reliable wifi, its own bathroom, and plenty of privacy. Location was convenient to Santa Monica and UCLA, with coffee shops, Whole Foods, and 24 Hour Fitness nearby. I would stay here again.

Jennie did everything she could to make sure I arrive safely and without getting lost.

Friendly and a good host.

Even after seeing all of the 5-star reviews for this place, I was still blown away by how nice it was. Everything was sparkling clean, the TV was hi-def, and the bed was comfortable. Literally 2 minutes from the apartment to the convention center. Al was very accommodating (no problems with me checking in at midnight when my plane was delayed) and always available when I had a question. I would stay here again in a heartbeat, and will definitely look for one of his listings next time I'm in LA.
Lovely couple and lovely home!  Would love to stay again someday.

Convient spot, clean and perfect for my travel needs in the West Hollywood area. Stayed 2 nights, used the 222 bus line for $1.50(15min trip), it dropped me off 2 blocks away  by the W hotel and used Lyft to get back to airport.
Amanda is an Amazing host. Very responsive and caring about her clients. He goes the extra mile to make sure everything is perfect.
Had a great time! Nice and quiet place. Murray and Kay were very welcoming.
Schlüsselübergabe war sehr flexibel und hat gut geklappt.

Ben and Hiromi are very welcoming and helpful. Hiromi picked me up near the airport, the location is perfect and very convenient if you have a flight to/from LAX. The room and other facilities were fine, nothing to complain about.
El apartamento esta muy bien ubicado. Alex y Daniel estan atentos a cualquier duda.

My BEST BNB experience thus far. Xavier is a class act, communicating was made simple, he was very accommodating, and the was exactly as described. Our stay was wonderful. Clean, comfortable, and centrally located I will definitely be staying here in the future!!

There are not enough words to explain how wonderful my stay with Ciel was. The second you step onto Ciel's property, you feel as if you are transported to a magical, spiritual place. There is an instant feeling of calmness... perhaps from Ciel, the surrounding trees, all of the above. The cottage is like a lovely little cocoon that you don't want to leave. It is the quaintest little cottage that is so inviting. It's hard to decide whether you want to spend the day in bed, in the beautiful claw foot tub or looking through all the books. We stayed 2 nights and had initially planned on venturing out to explore Topanga but just couldn't bring ourselves to leave the property. We wanted to savor every moment we had...

And then the food! The breakfast is served right outside your door on the beautiful deck with the trees above you and the birds chirping. From the coffee to the eggs, to the homemade scones that she brings to you warm, everything is mouthwatering delicious. We had decided to do a 4 course Italian meal on the second evening and it was as amazing as we had expected form all the previous reviews. It was one of the most romantic meals I have ever had the opportunity to enjoy. The setup on the bridge, with the lights, fire, candles and the music... the ambiance was amazing. And then of course the food... every bite was more delicious than the last. You can taste Ciel's love and passion in every single detail. 

This truly is a bed and breakfast in every sense of the word and it would be in your best interest to spend at least one night with her before the world realizes how wonderful she is!!!

If you're visiting L.A., the location of Ena's place is amazing. I had a job interview at UCLA and wanted to see the rest of the city. It was a perfect home base for doing that. It is close to UCLA, Santa Monica, Hollywood, and is just a short drive up the freeway from the airport. The room itself is big and clean, and it was great to have access to my own bathroom. Ena and Paulo are great hosts! I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
The apartment was perfect for what we were looking for. The fact that it was near to Hollywood Blvd was very conveniently as most things we wanted to do were walkable. Overall a good experience.

Had a fantastic experience at Lillian's. Very aesthetic and warm apartment. About a 6 to 7 minute drive to the beach or 25 minute walk through the quiet neighborhood. Lillian was a great host and helpful in accommodating our needs. She was a gem.
Great bed, had a car, so no problem with transport. Felt the caretaker of the premises was a bit rude. No contact with owner. Overall OK.

Fantastic location.. We literally saw Will Smith on Hollywood bld on our way to check in. Icee was great and understanding of our flight delays etc. 

 Bed was a little uncomfortable and I had issues with sleeping because the curtains are really thin (city lights make it seem like day time during the night)  but for the price of the apartment,  it really is hard to beat!  

Would Def stay here again.

Excellent experience at Lilian's place! Lilian is super friendly and we had very nice chats. She was also more than helpful. The studio is located in a cosy and cool neighborhood and is within walking distance from Abbott Kinney and Venice beach. Would definitely recommended this place! Thanks for all.
I have been staying at Johnny and Mark's one weekend a month for four months. They are consistently helpful, easy to communicate with and you will without a doubt have a pleasant, comfortable stay.

Greta was a phenomenal host and I can highly recommend her Guest House in Echo Park. The Guest House is a perfect size for two people with room to extend your living space into the backyard, which sadly we didn't take advantage very much of as it was a bit chilly during our visit. All of the details were carefully considered to make our stay very enjoyable. The linens were wonderful, the bed was extremely comfortable and the organic soaps, hair products and body wash were added bonuses. The kitchen was well equipped, though we didn't do any cooking (we did enjoy the use of the hand held juice press!). As it was cold at night, we really appreciated the use of the portable heater and the extra blankets on our bed. Just a note, Google Maps gave us really funky directions, there are better ways, with fewer hills to get there. Just be sure to look at a map of the neighborhood before you arrive!

Dee was accommodating, and the room was comfortable. I especially enjoyed the proximity (location) and the cozy bed! 
Her place is orderly, sweet, and clean. And, the price is good!
Well-designed studio and convenient location with all the amenities you need for a great stay. Thanks John!

Jim is an absolutely wonderful host!  My friend and I are new to airbnb and it was such a treat to have this as the first airbnb to stay at. He made us feel very much at home when we were there.  Every suggestion and travel tip he had was spot on!  He even took us back to the airport!  What a guy.  Ruby (the dog) was very chill and this is coming from a non dog person.  Everything was very clean and the shower was amazing.  The neighborhood was quiet and very nice.  Walking distance to a great grocery store.  I would definitely stay with Jim again.

This garden cabin on the edge of Santa Monica and LA was perfect for two of us. The studio was clean and cozy indoors and we loved the patio in the garden outdoors. Easy routes to beach and city. James is an excellent host and we look forward to future stays.
Cute place. Very rustic. Feels like a cabin or treehouse. Super sunny and nice.
Maison bien équipée et terrasse très agréable pour prendre l'air et dîner le soir avec bbq à disposition.

Excellent location for people touring LA, equidistant to all attraction within 30 minutes of drive. Accommodation is as described, a studio home with an additional room. Marianella and her family are great hosts and were very accommodating. Overall very affordable and comfortable.

The best location in downtown.  Right above the classic restaurant Bottega Louie, and near a ton of other great restaurants and bars.  The place was immaculate.  The bathroom is huge and beautiful.  We hit the Kuerig coffeemaker very hard; it was great to have all the coffee selections.  The fridge was stocked with waters and other drinks, snacks were on the counter.  Overall, physically this is clearly a place with a host who cares.  But Al the host's hospitality was what put it over the top.  His communication beforehand was superb, and he took plenty of time to show my wife around the place.  He suggested many restaurants to try, and even texted us another list he found after we were already there.  We can't wait to try Al's other places on Air BnB.  Spectacular!

Though Marina was very nice, I can't say the same about the place. The pictures make it look A LOT nicer than it actually is. 

First off - there is a strange, stale  smell when you enter. Secondly, the place needs a deep cleaning, as there is dust on everything. We weren't sure if the sheets had been washed before we got there, because they felt flat and matted. The skirt of the bed was filthy. It was so dirty that it wasn't white anymore and was ripping. 

The chair and pillow by the desk are also gross. We wouldn't even put our bags down on them, let alone sit on the chair.

The bathroom is tiny! And the shower is rusty.  The towels are stained. 

The place is freezing at night, and there's no way to make it warmer. 

So, we would advise you to not be tricked by the good lighting and charm of the photos. This place isn't as great as it looks. We were going to extend our stay, but decided to get a hotel instead, and that's when we finally started enjoying our trip.

Courtney was a great host! When we arrived we were at the end of a heat wave, she had fans going in the Studio which made it so much better. The Studio was nice and clean! It is in a great spot, pretty central to everything which was great if you want to do some LA sightseeing. 
There were a few hick-ups with our stay, but she made sure everything was dealt with right away! 
I would highly recommend staying here! Courtney is a great host and the Studio has pretty much everything you would need for a home away from home!
Again, just perfect !

Tolles Haus. Viel Platz. Sauber. Sehr nah an den Sehenswürdigkeiten in Hollywood. Das Haus eignet sich für Reisende mit Auto. Bei gutem Verkehr 45min mit dem Auto zum Strand. Sehr gute Anbindung an den Highway. Ruhig. Eigene Garage ist Top. Die Reaktionszeit der Vermieter war Top. Ein Frage könnte direkt telefonisch vor Ort geklärt werden.

Our stay at Sofi and Federico's place was very pleasant. The flat is very well located (near bus stop and very close to Venice Beach and Santa Monica). They were very helpful and kind, they did their best to facilitate our trip in LA! Thank you very much!
Had an absolutely terrific time! Location was absolutely ideal and the place was incredible! Couldn't have asked for anything more thank you so much!!!! Highly recommended!!!!!

Mariano was a gracious host.  He is a true professional AirBnB'er and runs a smooth beautiful space.  

The highlights:  
-loved the Zen Buddha Fountain
-Bottles of Red and White wine
-snack box with goodies
-the comfortable foam mattress bed
-Gas fire pit outside
-Great TV with lots of channel options
-Proximity to K-Town
-Gated property with safe parking

Thanks for letting us stay late and creating win-win situations. 

Overall, I would HIGHLY recommend this space and will rent from Mariano again in the future.

Place was clean and the location is great to explore Hollywood. Luckily we were only 3 instead of 4, as it offers one king bed (fits for 2) and an inflatable queen which would not have fitted for 2. Stephan was a great host and I would rent from him again!

The studio was exactly what I needed. Very clean and up to (website hidden) was very helpful with providing information about the area and suggested I go to the farmers market in Sunday which was amazing. She is easy to get a hold of if I ever needed anything. Overall a great place and wonderful host.

我们在Ferhat的家度过了非常愉快的时光。街区很安静，邻居很友好，附近还有小型超市和加油站，非常便捷。整套房子的装饰很有艺术性，我很喜欢。房间空间很大，也非常舒适，洁净，从厨房到卫生间，生活用品一应俱全。房东还贴心的准备了纳帕的红酒欢迎我们。入住前房东已将house manual发到我的邮箱，里面有非常详尽的房间使用说明，如何check in，check out，车库如何使用，等等。非常棒的使用指南。唯一不便的地方是我们住的是整套房子的二层和阁楼，一层出租给了另外的两位房客，开放的空间和木质地板造成的噪音，以及作息时间的不同都带来了相互的影响。因第一天晚上入住，往楼上搬行李，收拾到很晚才睡，对此估计不足，影响了楼下的休息，导致第二天一早楼下的房客就来complain，她竟然说连续两晚都是彻夜不停的说话声影响了她们的休息，也太夸张了，要知道当时我们才入住一晚呀，况且我们也不是夜猫子，12点钟就睡觉了呀！这多少影响了我们在此入住的情绪，后来我们压低声音讲话，走路都放轻脚步，临走前一天还刻意跟楼下的房客打招呼说我们第二天会很早离开，很抱歉打搅她们休息了，唉。Anyway，也许我们碰上了tough的房客，除此之外，一切都非常好！感谢Ferhat提供给我们这个舒适的房子，让我们在LA暂时有了家的感觉。如果有机会，下次还会入住这里。

Jerry was wonderful and very helpful
The location is great and the parking indoor is a big plus

This appartment is really ideally located, very close to the beach, and nevertheless very quiet. The equipment is basic and old, but it was functionning and was more than sufficient for us, who merely looked for a clean place to sleep and have breakfast. It was rather tidy and clean. Two bikes, pairs of rollers and a surfboard are there for those who want to have some fun. Dan is a cool guy, who was quite friendly and helpful. Great holidays!

We stayed here with another couple and it was the perfect size for the four of us. The house was warm and welcoming, very comfortable to stay in with all the amenities we needed. The location was perfect. The house was in a quiet neighbourhood just minutes away from the beach, restaurants, shops etc. Erin was a great host and ensured we had everything we needed for our stay.
